text:
Terrible experience with these supposed professionals. I had an appointment with them to which I showed up on time and with my  child. The appointment was to register him. HOWEVER UPON ARRIVAL I WAS STOPPED AT THE DOOR WITH MY CHILD IN HIS STROLLER AND TOLD THEYD GIVEN MY SPOT AWAY 15 MINUTES BEFORE I SHOWED UP.
Upon asking them to clarify that they had given my spot away. And they said yes in the last 1 hour they had indeed done just that! Even when I reserved it A WEEK PRIOR when I questioned the lady as to why the blonde lady smirked at me and nodded not saying a word.
My son is visibly special needs and I am aware that they lied to avoid taking him on to care for him even though HE HAS AN AIDE THAT THEY HAD CONTACT INFO FOR.
Terrible daycare terrible service! Also I noticed when I walked in that they had a jungle gym Tree about 9 or 10 feet tall where kids were climbing unsupported and unsupervised. I also noticed that THERE WERE NO STAFF IN THE PRESCHOOL AND TODDLER ROOM but THERE SURE WERE ALOT ABOUT 5 OF THEM IN THE STAFF ROOM AWAY FROM ALL THE KIDS .

Un hindsight super glad I won't have to deal with such a place

My daughter LOVES attending ABC Daycare. The staff is very professional, welcoming and caring. They do tons of activities and lots of outdoor play time. The daycare is clean&tidy and they provide healthy meals. The owners are fantastic. Would recommend this daycare to anyone. 😊

I absolutely love this daycare and Teachers. It has a very homely feeling and the child to staff ratio is great! I know that my child is personally taken care of. My son is almost there for three years. I would recommend the daycare to anyone that is looking for quality care and prices!!

My daughter has been attending this daycare for 5 year. The staff are very welcoming and kind and treat us like we are part of the family. They are very attentive to the children and ensure that the parents are kept well informed of any issues. I highly recommend this daycare for anyone who Is in need of one.

This daycare is completely fantastic and they treat you like an extended family.
If you need more than that their rates are reasonable and they also make homemade meals for your child.
Sinah and Joe and the family at ABC daycare make my life easier knowing my children are well taken care of and treated like it is their second home.
I 100% recommend them to anyone looking for a warm cozy trustworthy place for your kids to learn and be welcome. Thank you for all you do as well to Bernie and Mente to name a few for taking care of my sometimes unmanageable son.

The staff are great with the kids. They encourage learning and socializing. The office staff are willing to answer questions or help when needed.  All the food is made in the building by dedicated staff which ensures the proper care is taken with cleaning and prep. Their menus focus on healthy and filling foods. They are mindful of food sensitivities and allergies.
We have been using them for 2.5 years and they have been fantastic with each situation we have encountered ie. injuries, sickness and a change in diet.

A Child Story Day Care is a fantastic daycare with a focus on learning and development. The staff provide a structured and nurturing environment that fosters growth and creativity. Our child has learned so much and has made significant progress in their social and cognitive development since starting at this daycare...

My son started daycare here in February of 2017. He has really done well here. Has adapted well to the structure and staff treat him so well! I love all the extra curricular activities they plan here. I really like how much they get the kids outside and don't just coop them up in a building all day. The staff seem very patient and are always friendly. Any concerns or assistance I have needed they have been more than accommodating.

My 2 children have been attending A Child's Story Daycare since it opened in February 2017. They both have enjoyed attending each and every day which is amazing. They love their teachers and all the staff. Everyone is so loving and they care for my kids as if they are their own. They provide a daily report that details everything a parent would want to know about their day so we can ask questions and discuss the day. Each classroom is equipped with a camera with secure access for parents / grandparents to view our kids when we miss them. This gives us such peace of mind to just take a peek at their day. They go outside everyday as long as it isn't unsafe to do so with weather. There is a great private playground out back for kids to play in. They do so many fun activities and field trips. The facility is very well organized and clean. I would highly recommend this daycare center to any parent and couldn't be happier with the care my kids get. Thank you Barbara and team :)

Very nice daycare, happy and safe environment. Teacher Sany in toddler room was very nice and patient to kid. My son enjoyed the day care very much. They had painting, sand and water play, circle time reading stories, etc. Every week the children will have one theme to learn about. I can see their improvement since we start, not only on the physical facilities, but also learning programs.

We love A Place to Grow! My daughter is currently in the baby room (and has been there for 4 months now) and we are very happy with the care she receives.  The three educators in the room are all incredible and so kind. I was nervous my daughters' first week and Linda reassured me that she would treat my daughter like her own, and she really has. 🥺
I don't know the educators in the other rooms as well, but they always make a point to say hi to us when we arrive in the morning and bye when we're leaving, and it's honestly so appreciated.
The ladies in the room always keep us very well informed. If she gets hurt (even a minor scrape) they let us know and they fill out an incident report.
They plan really fun and engaging activities for the toddlers in the room. Lots of painting, colouring, sensory activities, music, parachute, bubbles, they even saw a turtle one day!
One of my favourite parts of the daycare is that they use an app that sends me pictures and updates of what she's doing throughout the day.
If I had to think of one critique it would just be that not all of the food they serve is made in house. I know that some daycares have their own chef, but A Place to Grow is also quite affordable compared to others. They allow parents to send their own food to supplement their menu. With the money we save here we can buy her more fruit to send for snacks! Lol
Overall I would, (and have been) recommending this daycare to my friends!

My daughter was so happy at place to grow. We saw her transforming . Sana’s teachers were all amazing and helped her a lot to learn the way. We thank them all and appreciate their efforts towards each child .Hats off you guys….

My 3-year-old daughter goes to this daycare, and she loved being there just after a few days of having separation anxiety. The activities that the teachers give are very fun for the kids and make them look forward to going to A Place to Grow everyday. Being able to see what your child is doing through the app is one of the good things they do offer. They do have the balance of activities and rest for the kids. Overall, we have a good experience with A Place to Grow Early Learning and Care.

This daycare has been nothing but fabulous! My daughter loves going there and looks forward to going to her daycare everyday. She joined the preschool, where they learn daily. Her vocabulary has sure expanded, her knowledge of alphabets and numbers is impressive. Kudos to the teachers and minders there. Quite neat and tidy,  they have a whole lot of learning activities to keep the kids engaged.

As a first time parent I am emotionally attached to my child and finding a good daycare that would listen to my concerns and care for my child was very important. It was really hard finding a good one, but eventually I found A Place To Grow Early Learning and Care.
They have competent teachers and show great concern for my baby. Linda and Lani have been amazing. They are both fantastic and truly care for my child. My son has learned so much and continues to learn and grow and has so much fun at the daycare. Thanks to the amazing teachers and staff that makes it fun for him every day. It makes my work days so much better knowing that he is in good hands.
I like the himama app that gives me updates on my child but I would prefer if a live video was available. I hope it’s something that they would add soon. I would gladly recommend APTG to anyone needing exceptional childcare!!

I used to attend this daycare when I was around 7 so about 10 years ago. It was great at first however I’m bitter about some of the treatment.
Getting mad at us for not wearing our sweater in the summer because the workers deemed it “Too cold” when it was 31 degrees out. The food we were served was poor quality, oily potatoes slices with pepper is not a snack. And dry carrots without any drinks or dip is poor service.
I would not recommend it as someone who had to go here when I was a kid.

I have nothing but good things to say about this daycare! My son started going here when he was 15 months old. We are only leaving because we're moving to another area of the city. ABC set the bar high for our expectations of his next daycare! We always knew that our son was in good hands. He went from being upset when we dropped him off to hardly even turning around to say goodbye to us because he was so happy to be there!

The centre was also easy to communicate with. They always replied to emails promptly. The registration package was detailed. It took a while to fill it out and review the information package, but it was good to see that they cared about getting information on each child's routines and preferences to make the transition to daycare as smooth as possible.

We are really going to miss Noorani, Erandathie, and all of the other caring staff at ABC!

Awesome daycare, Pam is always very helpful. The teachers go above and beyond here. Shina in the prek is Amazing she’d braid my youngests hair and they had such a great connection. Mandeep is always very friendly, she’s awesome with my eldest in out of school care. Shawzia, Mandy, shuzie and all names I haven’t gotten a chance to learn (sorry for misspelling) thank you so very much for all your hard work and kindness. my girls will miss you all. Thank you for truly caring for the kids in your care

Our daughter started childcare at this centre when she was 6-months old. The staff were excellent at working with us to fit her schedule as being younger she required 2-3 naps a day and more frequent feeding then the toddlers in the room. She also had a big smile on her face when she saw her educators in the morning. We would recommend this centre to someone looking for childcare in the area.

My son has attended ABC for 8 years from his Toddler days to OSC. He loved the place and people. Great facility at a reasonable price with friendly and supportive staff. Throughout our time with ABC, it has been reassuring to send my son here while I go for work, as I always felt he is in safe hands. Strongly recommend this place!

After Mat leave, and moving one end of the city, I was looking for a daycare that can take care of my baby and my 4 years old. I was not feeling comfortable and had lots of doubts. I did research and asked Many questions. But I chose this daycare because the director’s answers fit me. My baby was 1 year and my 4 year old has two disabilities. And so you can tell how worried I must have been. But choosing them, was one of the best things I have ever done. They are so caring, professional, friendly how they always smile and welcome the person. Every person is important to them . They report and write down for parents of what children did that day and what they ate. They follow the rules and guidelines well. It is a safe, secure and clean place. All my doubts were gone and I always felt I am leaving my babies with people I can trust. The staff are well educated and might even give few suggestions for your children. And they are always open to suggestions from parents. This daycare is 100% great!

Unfortunately we were very unhappy with this daycare and had to remove our child. The owners are very nice and it seems like an organized clean environment. It was alarming to see ratios were repeatedly not maintained. I counted up to 17 mixed age kids all together with one worker several times. It was common to pick up our child in a soiled diaper. They have an outdoor area, but do not use it. The snow and ice is seldom cleared for safe access. Fish crackers are the staple food. Several times I came in quietly to see children huddled around a workers phone (I don’t blame the workers, they had far too many kids to handle by themselves). Our child afterwards told us they were locked in a room by themselves at times.  I cannot recommend this daycare to anyone I know or don’t know. Very disappointing.

We love this daycare! We were nervous moving our child from her old daycare as she had grown so attached to the teachers and children there but we had no choice as we had moved and changed jobs. She transitioned with no problems at all. The ladies working there are absolutely wonderful. They truly care about the children and their growth.
Very clean small daycare. My kids were here before. I will give them 👍👍
Very nice daycare

Bambini has been amazing! We only have one kid and he just turned one so it was our first experience looking for childcare. We were nervous and looked at a bunch of public and private facilities Bambini was hands down the best. Both locations near us had a lot to offer and we signed up for both feeling confident that either would be a great fit for our son. He did amazing with the transition, he takes naps and eats well and plays great there

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We cannot praise Bambini daycare enough, especially the staff of the Willow Room. The educators have played invaluable roles in our daughter's growth and development. Their genuine love, warmth, patience, and dedication to early childhood education have helped our daughter blossom into a confident and curious young girl. We deeply appreciate and believe in their Reggio-inspired child care approach, which emphasizes hands-on discovery learning. We are grateful for the strong foundation they've given our child in learning, socialization, and emotional growth. If you're looking for a daycare that goes above and beyond, where staff truly cares about each child, Bambini is the place. Thank you for being an integral part of our family's journey!

Cody and Shawna

Bambini Hamptons has been such a great experience for my family! I was nervous taking my one year old to daycare but the communication and care the team puts into making us all comfortable was next level. The photo and message updates throughout the day are great & I would recommend Bambini Hamptons to any family!

We have had our son attending Bambini Hamptons for over a year and cannot be happier about the level of care Bambini provides. Daily updates, pictures, personalized comments that we receive throughout the day via app are incredible and definitely giving us a piece of mind during our busy schedule. Special Thank You to Patricia for treating our child like her own, and always holding him for as long as he needs it in the morning, updating us on his eating habits, and overall well-being. Angela and everyone involved in our son's care - we are very grateful for everything you do.

Our family can’t thank the wonderful team at Bambini Hamptons enough. Communication is great through the app. The daily updates, photos, and meal details are comforting to see. The care has been top notch from Patricia, Angela, Chesell, Sarah, Floridelle, Keisha and Pam. All the other supporting educators have also been fantastic - it’s impossible to list them all. We feel strong support and care from Megan as well.

My daughter has attended the Nellie McClung Girls program at Oliver School for the past 3 years. It has been an amazing experience. Small class sizes and a huge confidence boost for my daughter. She has focused on her academics, had a great time participating in the various sports teams and has made many (lifelong I am sure) friends during her years at Nellie. I wish they had a high school program!

I can only speak about the Nellie McClung Girl's Jr. High. Oliver School is like getting a private education for free (as it is fully-funded through Edmonton Public Schools). The girls in the program are confident, supportive, and strive for academic success, especially in the STEM courses. Uniforms create a sense of belonging and identity with the school. Oliver School is also a historic building with great character, the library is amazing.

It was as good school and I'm talking about Nelly mcclung I was there from grade 7 to grade 9 and it was a pretty good school except for when we had to go on lockdown. But it really helped me get the learning I needed cause I was really low in learning and now I'm doing OK in math and all my other subjects.  I am now in 10th grade and I kind of miss my teachers from Nellie.

Nellie McClung, located in Oliver School, is an AMAZING program for jr high girls with a STEM focus. Encouraging young women to be strong, independent and outspoken.
Love love love the small class sizes and so much individual attention.

I went to this school three years ago and things still haven't changed, the lunch program is pretty pathetic. There are 2 tables to seat 40 kids, and they are in a tight hallway in between 2 bathrooms. And the principle does not care or respect others at all,  There where some great teachers and a lot of bad teachers that make you feel like a failure. And there is no funds for the elementary only for the nellies which I think is really wrong. And if you think It is a good school then you were either a Nellie or a parent who did not go to the school. I am helping you out here do not send your kids to this school

I love the school.  I am comfortable speaking with anyone there and have always been treated with a smile and good manners.  I especially love the end of the year fiesta which invites everyone from the community to participate, and has featured aboriginal dancers from treaty six territory for the past two years, giving gratitude to them for the land they have shared with us.  The dances, costumes, music, and art taught from several Latin-American countries is divine.  The children's Tango club is fantastic.

I love the inclusive attitude of tolerance and care for each other and the community.  All of the teachers thus far have helped my son through his learning disability.  Their patience and endurance is more than I could have asked for.

I love all the Garden boxes and benches they put into the field for their science nature projects; the trees they planted in the field to promote shade and biodiversity and an ecological education.

I am looking forward to the new building, which will promote education, technology, and culture.

Top Notch Staff!  The school is extremely well managed by the principal and the teaching staff.  I am constantly impressed with the quality of communication from the principal's office and the school room teachers.      The Christmas concert and the year end Fiesta are fantastic!
Fantastic modern building making its own energy! Good park too.
I always felt welcomed at Mill creek it was like a home a way from home
Beautiful school! The renovations are magnificent.

Such a great and small community league ! The activities are family oriented and the league is friendly !  My son attends the Aldergrove daycare/ OSC in their four year old program and I am very happy with the care and staff there !  Very hands on director and lots of activities ‘
I wish there was a better day care in the area I haven't such day care before.

It's pretty all right, it's fairly small, has no kitchen, no water fountain, and the male bathroom (not sure what the woman's bathroom looks like, haven't been in there lol) could definitely use an upgrade. But it -the hall- does the job! It's not great, but it's far from being bad!

This community hall is cute. It can divided into two separate rooms and there is a stage.

I come here every Wednesday for HIIT/Zumba. Would recommend!
All I have to say it's hell when I went there as a kid

I wish if could give this Day Care 10 stars I would!! This is the FIRST Day Care I have seen my Son happy in this City. You know it is an amazing place when they don’t ever want to leave at pick up. I love that they feel as though it is their home away from home.Ever since enrolling my kid I’ve seen many improvements. This place is great. Classes aren’t big so kids get all the attention. Director is awesome. I would recommend this place to everyone with little ones.

My 3- year old son has been enrolled at Allard Daycare center for 10 months and it has been an awesome experience. The administrator; Devaki is very devoted and excellent at implementing new strategies to  improve childcare. The facility has outstanding educators who are polite, professional and friendly. Also, the environment is clean and organized. Their daily routine keeps my little one engaged as they do so many fun and educative activities. He improved with sitting and paying attention, "self-eating" as well. My son is always happy to go to daycare every morning and i think this is the right place for your little one. Thanks team Allard Daycare. I do RECOMMEND this daycare to any parent who is looking for something more than just a daycare.

My son, 4years old, loves this daycare. He’s been here for 11 months in preschool room. First time my son had hard time being separated from us(besides, his mother tongue is not English), but we tried to work with experienced teachers. Now, with their supports and practical help, he's become stronger and more confident, and knows how to cope and manage when problems occurred. And he's got very socialized and active too. Teachers are working very hard, arranging various activities(including outdoor activities), I love they sent us pictures during the day so I could see what my son is learning on that day and how’s he doing there, and we could talk about his day when he got home. Teachers are willing to communicate with parents and they take care of kids as their own ones. They love kids and my son love them too. Special thanks to teacher Gulalay and Devaki and Nasreen. We will miss this daycare so much. And we absolutely recommend this day care.

I would like to thank all the teachers and manager for everything they taught my daughter in the past year. She has grown so much emotionally and mentally and has gained really valuable skills.
Everyone really cares about the kids there.

My kid has been attending this day care for a while now and I can certainly say he enjoys it. You can always see staff is playful and engaged with the kids. Great staff, well managed and very welcoming. Keep up the good work team..

My wife and I cannot say enough good things about the Allen Gray Child Development Centre. The educators here are outstanding. There is a culture here of continually trying to improve the care and education that they provide to the children. The educators actively participate in professional development opportunities. My daughter has been here for 4 years and has grown so much in that time, under the care of these amazing educators. From the infant and toddler rooms, all the way to the junior preschool and preschool rooms, we have been fortunate to have excellent educators caring for my daughter every step of the way. The extra programming, including Spanish, Music Together, and Yoga, is also top-notch (although sadly the pandemic has temporarily halted these extra programs). Would highly recommend Allen Gray.

Thankyou so much for the great care of my son and the sweet gesture for my newborn girl. The staff are wonderful. It's a great learning environment. My son can do simple addition and read simple books already even though he is only 4 years old.

It was so hard for me and my husband searching where to put our only child but Alta Montessori was AWESOME...The skills that my son possessed  before he went to Alta were all well improved..Mrs.Barbar is exceptional how she treats kids under their care and so with the rest of the crew..soon my son will be moving to grade school and i am pretty sure that our son will miss this place...Alta Montessori will always have a special place in our hearts-this very first school and where i trusted my son..Our family will be forever grateful for your love and care to our son..HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for young kids in preparation for grade school...God bless you more Alta Montessori and we are forever thankful for all you've done❤️❤️❤️Zarate family❤️❤️❤️

The owners of this daycare also own Alta Montessori. Both my children went to Alta Montessori. Both our daughter & son have wonderful memories of Alta Montessori. They got a terrific head start & were reading chapter books & doing basic addition & subtraction by the time they started grade one. They are now in their mid thirties and twenties. Both still love learning, completed degrees at university and enjoy good jobs. I credit the Montessori discovery learning method & the positive, creative atmosphere of Alta Montessori. This week my granddaughter started at Alta and I am thrilled.
very beautiful clean staff friendly daycare. My daughter has been going to the daycare since September 2022. She loves it!  She improved so much in writing, speaking.

Very nice and friendly daycare with OSC, preschool, and kindergarten.  They just opened their 2nd location and have over 30 years of experience.  The owner has raised 5 children that are all professionals.

The most SHADIEST and DISORGANIZED daycare I have ever dealt with. I was given the run around when I asked for information about the place. I paid the $100 registration fee and enrolled my daughter only to find out the numbers they gave me were incorrect even though I clearly asked them for the break down. I spoke to someone through email and over the phone and both individuals gave me different numbers. For a 50+ year old daycare, you'd expect them to know what subsidy and affordability amount is included and give the proper breakdown. My daughter went in for 2 half days and they tried to sneakily charge my husband for the full time fee. If he didn't inquire about the steep pricing, they probably would've gotten away with it. Definitely BE CAREFUL if you're considering this place. All they really care about is your money.
They don't provide meals but they charge much more than the other daycares in the area. Give them a call and see for yourself.

My son attended the daycare for over 2 years and he changed, developed, improved and learned so much in that time. I am so blessed, thankful and grateful to all the staff that guided and assisted my son on the day by day basis. They helped him with his speech and language, with listening to and following instructions, with making friends and learning how to share and treat others with kindness, just to name a few things. They are all extremely hard working, committed and dedicated to the children and strive to develop the best environment and atmosphere for the children.  Would absolutely recommend if you need a space for your child to thrive!

I've discovered Alta Montessori about two years ago. It's an amazing daycare/OSC that is not only subsidized (therefore, have to adhere to regulations and occasional surprised inspections from the government) but believes in the Montessori learning objectives with very competitive child care cost. If you want to provide your child with a great foundation prior to Kindergarten, this is the place. My daughter (who's currently 4) know how to spell, identify, and write her name. She can also do basic mathematics, pronounce proper English words, and problem solve (think outside the box concept). Besides all those great things, Mrs. Barbar treats the kids like her own, she will discipline (not physically or yelling or anything like that) like how any mother would want to teach when a child does something that is wrong. For example, I've witness her telling another OSC child that she's asked that child not to do that numerous times and why she would think that's a good idea. They were in another room, so I know it wasn't an act. So, if you want a Montessori program that incorporates realistic value learning environment for your child and their growing minds, this is a wonderful option.

Being new to the neighborhood about 2 years ago, I had no experience with the Daycares around, but was sure that I wanted a Montessori for my child to attend.
Since my son has been attending Alta Montessori Daycare and OSC, with the supervision of great teachers and also a great management, Ms. Eman and Mrs. Barbar, he has learnt so much and is still learning a lot. We love their hands on approach in their method of teaching.
I highly recommend this Montessori to anyone looking for a great place for their child/ren to develop with the great supervision of some of the greatest people who lead by example like Ms. Eman and Mrs. Barbar.

Best daycare in Edmonton. My son was at a day home when he first started, however, the day home close it's doors and we had to put him in a new daycare January.

However, that did not go well, I saw some signs of thing not going well so I pop in early one day and found him separated from other kids.

So long story short, I found amazing grace daycare on Google and decide to try them out and I must say, my son has been so happy there, finally, I don't have to worry about him being mistreated while am at work.
Great place for kids , wonderful teachers. I Highly recommend.

Our twins recently attended this daycare prior to going community preschool and we can't say a bad word about this daycare. Our kids loved going there to see their friends, do regular & new activities in a fun & supportive manner. The staff are incredible & look after the kids as if they were their own - warm, friendly & personable. Our kids developed more social cues, etiquette & overall more independence from their time there. Will be putting our 3rd kid there when she is able to attend.

My son attending daycare for the last 3 years. He is always happy to go there. The teachers are very nice and carrying about the kids. They do painting, do yoga in the morning, and do some craft activities. Every week the children will have one theme to learn about. I can see my son's improvement since we start, not only in the physical facilities but also learning program. In the summertime lots of nice field trips,  which are so much fun for kids. Every day we get reports from the teachers with pictures of what they have been doing throughout the day. I like to have the opportunity to see it. Highly recommended.

Very nice daycare, happy and safe environment. Teachers are very nice and patient to kid. My daughter enjoyed the day care very much. They had painting, yoga in the morning and doing some craft, movies and popcorn, and what I loved the most is they do have a Christmas presentation which parents can watch their children doing some acting, singing and dancing. Every week the children will have one theme to learn about. I can see my daughters improvement since we start, not only on the physical facilities, but also learning program. Very organized and well maintained daycare. Teachers and the coordinator of the daycare is very nice. I highly recommend this daycare.

Ambleside Daycare exhibits exceptional care and kindness extended to our son throughout his stay at the daycare he turned 1yo to 22months. His teachers played an instrumental role in his development and growth during his time at Ambleside Daycare. Their dedication and commitment to providing a nurturing environment have been invaluable. Our son has formed beautiful relationships with each of them.

5-star for care, professionalism, and dedication to providing our sob with a safe and nurturing environment. We are grateful for Ambleside Daycare's positive impact on his early childhood education.

It’s okay. The director is very involved, some teachers are great, others are not. Communication could be better. My 3 year old doesn’t love going. 12-24 month old kids are all together in the youngest room, and it really doesn’t work well due to the large range of development at this age. If you’re looking for child or parent directed daycare look elsewhere, this is very teacher driven.

My 4.5 year old boys have been there 6 months (home before). As a social worker I have encountered a lot of scary stuff. Amy's is amazing, the staff truly care about and know your children. My boys often ask to stay a few more minutes and the staff always know what's up with every child. A number of long term staff who are clearly experienced. Plus options like lunch programs and vans taking the boys to kinder in Sept. And the cleanliness exceeds expectations.

The best place I could imagine to care for my kids!

I am disgusted with this daycare and its owner. While I didn't have many issues with the staff, the owner, on the other hand, made my daughter seem like a burden. For context, my daughter has some developmental delays, and Amy has blamed everything from the team quitting to going on stressful leave because of my daughter. Multiple times my child has come home with diaper rashes so nasty she would have open sores and be in so much pain, she could hardly walk. When I brought this up to Amy, she would gaslight me on the issues and tell me my daughter made everything complex for the staff. Even though we had workers there assuring us and updating us on the leaps in progress our daughter has made. Please reconsider sending your children to this daycare, if you can even call it that. This has been one of my worst failures as a parent allowing this person to care for my child, and I hope no other family has to deal with such incompetence.
For a daycare that prides itself on inclusivity, they are far from that, especially when dealing with children with special needs.

Since day 1, the staff here has always been accommodating and absolutely wonderful to my little and myself. Every day since, pick ups usually take a little longer since my little has to hug all his teachers and tell his one and only fav teacher that he loves her lol!! The staff here are attentive and they treat every kiddo like they are their own. Keep up the amazing work ladies!
Staff are very nice and extremely friendly to all children. My son has been with Amy's daycare for quite some time now and he enjoys it so much.

Amy’s Daycare has been the best experience for our boys.

The teachers are so caring and understanding with them. The transition for our older boy was tougher - but the teachers made him feel welcome and now he loves going to see them everyday.

Watching them grow and learn at Amy’s make me so happy. To know they are in a safe and caring environment is such a relief as a parent.

Best.

My daughter's have been attending Angel Keepers for a few years now and I can honestly say that I have always had a wonderful experience with them.

The teachers are attentive and the girls always give them a big hug before they leave. They talk about the fun little activities that they do. I also like how before they leave the teachers make them clean up after themselves, it's a habit they carry forward at home. I also really like how they show them different cultures, the girls would tell me how much they think Sari's are so pretty.

I want to give a special shout out to the owner and  Kristina, they are both wonderful people and you can tell they genuinely have a passion for what they do.

I would recommend this daycare to anybody.

So these folks drive a van that drops kids off at St Timothy's I  Castledowns.
They routinely drive through my alley after dropping the kids off.
The driver of the van almost ran into my truck because the windshield was entirely covered in frost...IN THE INSIDE OF THE VAN!!
I called the daycare a spoke to someone there and they said the heater in the van isn't working but they plan on getting  it fixed
So they knowingly put kids in danger while in their care

This is the one of the best daycares my son has attended  (Hands down) my son really misses the out of school program. (We moved) He really enjoyed & looked forward to going there, the teachers are truly amazing they go above & beyond. & actually engage with the children. A big thank you to the Director Joanne for being so accommodating & caring, & of corse the staff worker, Kristina & another worker in particular (I’m terrible with remembering names so as my son is too) The teachers are very fun, passionate & playful with the children. One of the teachers taught my son many things even how to play chest.& he’s only 7 I was super impressed. Wonderful environment! I am just very pleased & grateful.
Well done & stay golden to the director & staff :)  I recommend this child care to anyone

My 16 month old baby has been going here since she was 5 months old. I Was so hesitant on putting her in a daycare until I found angel keepers! Since day one they have been soo soo reliable, friendly and overall a great daycare. My daughter loves her teachers and she’s always so excited in the mornings to go! 10/10

On May 2, 2022. This daycare had allowed a 3 year old to get out of the playground area, and onto 50th streets main busy road!!! My nephew was along and unattended for 9 minutes while he was wondering in traffic!!! They didn't even realize he was gone, someone from another store seen him and luckily went and grabbed him!

This is absoloutley unacceptable behavior! We trust you as a daycare to keep our children safe when we are not with them!!! Your negligence is astonishing and I hope this business gets shut down!! This could have went ALOT differently instead of filing a complaint here,I could be saying goodbye to my 3 year old nephew who barley has had  a chance to live yet!!! I hope you are completely ashamed of this & I really hope you get a negligence charge or better yet shut down. You should not be caring for kids if this is going to happen
This shouldn't have happened at all!!!!

Absolutely love this place! The staff is very welcoming loving and understanding! I love that they have lots of room to play for kids and they allow my daughter to play everywhere she wants because she really hates when she stuck in limited space .This place is amazing. The staff  really cares about each individual child. Each child receives a lot of personal attention. It is spotless and there is a playground in the backyard. The staff is fully qualified and experienced in their field..

This place is absolutely beautiful and great. Lots of room to play and my daughter loves to go there. It was recently renovated and now it's even better. They do a lot of activities there: reading, singing, dancing, crafts..My daughter learned a lot of new words there (she is 2). The price is very affordable compared to other daycares.  Staff is really friendly and nice.

Angels Daycare has been a fantastic place for my daughter. She has thrived with the care from the teachers and loves playing with all of her friends. The amount of attention my daughter receives is wonderful and I love how involved the parents can be. Truly feels like a second home - a place that we trust fully.  Our family highly recommends Angels!

Great staff, very welcome and the most important is that kids have a good care and understanding teachers for every kid personality.  An amazing opportunity for kids to learn new things and explore new experiences.
I am extremely pleased with the care and education my son is receiving! He’s excited to go every day and we love the ladies looking after him. The other parents are amazing!

My daughter had her tendon pulled out of place in her arm while going to Anne's kinder kastle.

She was in complete pain and they had no idea what to do. We dropped everything and drove there then took her to emergency.

She couldn't move her arm at all without excruciating pain.

They had paired younger kids with older ones, while understaffed, sort of letting the older kids watch the little ones. Great idea. Except they are just kids too and accidents will happen. The older kid was much taller and was running holding hands with my little one and yanked her arm in a way it shouldn't move... her tendon popped out of place around her elbow.

I was really disappointed that the older girl was blamed for this. No one comforted her. She was crying in the corner. Feeling guilty.

The staff was only concerned with deflecting blame - onto a child. It fell on us, the parents of the badly injured kid - to comfort the older girl before we left for the hospital.

The character of a place is easier to see in an emergency. Bad culture here. They need to respect their own staff. Respect them. Train them. Pay them well. Don't play games with our kids. Trying to have more kids than staff, taking in more kids... Trying to maximize profits. This is daycare not minimum security prison. I'm just glad I found out. I'm glad my kid got out.

We have relocated out of the province and one of our families biggest "cons" to this move was that we would not be able to continue bringing our son here. As most parents may find, it was extremely difficult for us to send our child to daycare and chose Anne's Kinder Kastle based on factors like the gym they have access too everyday, hot lunch and snacks are provided, we really liked the open set up of the main room but the reason we stayed was the staff. We felt our son was very safe, happy and loved in their care and the relief that brings you as a parent is priceless.

A wonderful place, with wonderful people. My daughter loves everyone there. She felt comfortable from her first day there. A very clean place, like not many others; and we have experienced other daycares as I have two older boys. The owner genuinely love kids and the kids love her. Thank you auntie Annie!!! Thank you Anna!!! Maya loves you truly 🤗🤗🤗

Our son has been here almost a year. The owner has been in business over 25 years, and director over 20. Low staff turnover and we feel like all the staff know and care for your child. He loves going there. Great community of other parents too.

I wish I can take them along when we moved to the other side of town. They are the sweetest and cared so much for the kids. Clean rooms. Have an inside gym as well as a fenced yard for kids to play. Everything surpasses my expectation. Im at ease when I leave my LO. All the best to Anne and Malou and Jovelyn and the rest of the staff.

Our daughter is  almost 4 years old and has been going here since before she was 1.
The people who work here are fantastic, and always have time to say hi, smile.

Such a great daycare with wonderful teachers. Definitely made the right choice by choosing this place!

My child has been going to Apple Daycare for over 4 months. I am really happy with the educators, staff and director. They are really kind and helpful. They do lots of nice activities and my child seems happy.

I've been sending 2 of my children there and the staff has been great with them. They send me pictures and menus of what they eat every day. I sent my firstborn somewhere else before Apple Child Care & OSC and I will tell you that they’ve been feeding my daughter leftovers. When I ask my daughter what she ate for lunch she will tell me the same thing for 3 days!!! I was furious and I feel the need to pull out my child there. The director in this Child care is kind, honest and reliable. If I make babies again I will send them all to Apple Child Care & OSC.

My son has attended Apple Daycare for over two years and absolutely loves it. The staff are very friendly, loving, patient, understanding and helpful. I have built some great relationships with my sons teachers and can always count on hearing all the important details about my sons day. He is always excited to go and even asks me on weekends if he can go. The daycare is always very clean and well maintained. Pre COVID I loved all the little get togethers with parents and building relationships with staff, the children attending and parents. Both directors are amazing and always go above and beyond, to make sure my son and I are happy. He has so many friends, loves all of his teachers and has made huge strides since attending. I highly recommend Apple daycare!

My son has been going to Apple childcare for a month now and we have had a great experience so far! They send me pictures of him on an app and updates throughout the day (which I love!) And he always appears to be having fun and doing interactive activities/play. He seems to be making a good connection with a lot of the staff now as well!

Appleton is an amazing place to send your child. My daughter has been going here for the past year, and she loves it. They make nutritional and diverse food, which my picky eater enjoys. The staff at Appleton is like a second family for me, which I appreciate as it is always hard to have your child cared for by someone other than yourself. I always feel confident that my child will have a good day, her needs will be met, and she will  learn something of value when she is at day home. I highly recommend Appleton, and am grateful for their amazing facility and continued exceptional service.

My kids both attend this daycare since 2022 , I have a 14 months old boy who started when he was 2 months and a 3 years old girl both going to this same daycare. The daycare has been an excellent place far. During The time my kids attended this daycare, there has been ownership change as well.. The current owner has been really good in communicating with us and solving any issues. We are happy here and we like the smaller house like feeling of the daycare. The kids all know each other well (tight-knit community) and are able to interact with each other of different age groups which is good for their development.

The price of this daycare is also the most affordable I have seen for this central area. I like that they took real care on making the fees affordable for parents which really help during these days when the cost of  everyday living have increased.

Our elder daughter started attending Appleton when she was 9 months old. She quickly adapted to the environment there and continued to thrive until we pulled her out in September as I am currently on maternity leave. She has made her first friends there and she has wonderful relationships with nthe staff.

I can't say enough good things about Appleton and the family type atmosphere that the staff there foster. We intend to have both of our daughters attend Appleton once I go back to work.

Thank you for all that you do!

Our son has been at Appleton since he was 9 months old and we are very happy with the care he is receiving. He is growing well and we are always surprised by everything he has learned at daycare. The staff is friendly and very involved with the kids and the activities. I highly recommend this day care.

My daughter  came to this daycare at age 3 and stayed  there till she was 6. This was her first day care and no English  language that she can fall back too. The care and love that she recieved  there helped her to adapt  quickly,  she started  talking.  And she loves her teachers dearly  and still talks about them! No other place can provide such care and love! Thank you dear Appleton  staff you were amazing!!!!

I am super impressed with my child’s development after starting at Aster childcare.
Mrs Ankur & Gurpreet are always super welcoming in the mornings. They really make my daughter feel comfortable I am very happy with this daycare.
Thank you for all you do :)

Ever since enrolling my daughters, I have seen many improvements👍They has become more active and Start talking more. I am beyond grateful for the tremendous efforts made by Ankur mam, Gurpreet mam, Jaspreet mam, Gagan mam and others teachers😊(because at earlier, my daughters have gaven you such a hard time).
Specially thanks to Anamika mam and Mandip mam for your dedication and efforts in making my daycare experience such a memorable😊. I really appreciate your innovative ideas and approach to bring out the inner babies abilities as well as helping them to explore new ways of learning with fun. Especially, I am amazed the way you both have worked on their eating😍.
Thanks to Alka mam and Sharan mam for always friendly, loving and kind😊. Highly recommend to let your children grow under the phenomenal team of Aster Childcare!

I am extremely pleased with the experience so far. The staff at this child care center are highly professional and caring,specially ankur mam and gurpreet mam , and they have created a warm and nurturing environment for the children.They provide daily updates on my daughter's activities, meals, and nap times, which gives me peace of mind knowing that she is well taken care of throughout the day. Additionally, they are always available to answer any questions or concerns I may have, and they are proactive in addressing any issues that may arise.

I am feeling very comfortable while writing a review about aster as all the staff is really helpful ,  towards my kids as well as they listen parents as importantly as they listen to kids .  I really appreciate all staff especially gagan, Saran, jaspreet , who are in charge for my kids .  My son use to say no to school anytime before but now he is adjusting as well as learning new everyday new !xoxo love and respect to all staff ,

staff are awesome and so genuine, they made me feel so comfortable as well as my daughter she is very happy and having a very good time.
The teachers were amazing, informative, and loving.
I would like to Thank you for always being available to assist. I genuinely appreciate your responsiveness and willingness to take the time to speak with me. I have recommended.
Once again Thanks a lot Pallavi!!

I worked at this daycare for two consecutive years during the summer camp and I have nothing but good things to say. The children’s health and safety is the number one priority of all the staff. They ensure each child’s needs are met, whilst still maintaining an engaging learning environment. The owner is very polite and treats all the staff with care. As well, she is just and fair with everyone. If you are looking for a great daycare in the area, I can firsthand say B-smart daycare is the best!

I will say there are definitely staff here that I feel care about the children, and want to do a good job. I’m not sure of the qualifications of the staff members.

Organization and communication could be improved.

We ultimately pulled our son due to the way the centre was unable to support potty training. At about 20 months old I asked the manager how the centre would support my son as I planned on potty training, her response was, “just let the staff know and they will follow your lead.” Our first attempt was unsuccessful, and a few months later when picking him up he said he needed to poop. I asked the same manager if I could take him to their potty and she explained they didn’t have an accessible toilet attached to the infant room (up to 2.5 years) he was in.
We ended up stopping attempts at that point, but he started withholding his bowel movements (resulting in multiple small poops in each day). Three days in a row I came to pick him up and staff were changing him and complaining how often he pooped and lecturing him about how he should use the potty.
I corrected them and explained it wasn’t fair to tell him that if he wasn’t actually able to use the potty at the daycare.
I couldn’t believe they were shaming him. I didn’t take him back after that day.

He’s been at a new centre for less than a month and part-time, and now is almost fully potty trained.

When he was a baby I think the centre provided the support he needed, but I’m not sure the centre or staff in the baby room are equipped or set up well to support toddlers.

This is a terrible daycare. The owner has no idea what she’s doing. She’s rude and condescending to the kids and the parents and has the most nastiest attitude, the children are nothing but a dollar sign to her if you want a daycare where you know your kids are well taken care of THIS IS NOT IT. My kids hated this daycare and it’s extremely unorganized this place should be shut down
The team is outstanding, very friendly and welcoming.They always go out their way to ensure the kids safety and wellbeing. Definitely recommend!

BE AWARE!!!!! THIS DAYCARE GIVES OUT INFORMATION TO ANY RANDOM PREDATOR WHO CALLS ASKING INFORMATION ON YOUR CHILDREN! If you want a daycare who has safety protocols in place to protect your children from STRANGERS. THIS IS NOT THE PLACE FOR YOU!!!!! don’t be fooled by the fake reviews
Great atmosphere and friendly environment
Great place and friendly staff who are easy to talk too. My daughter has been attending for close to 3 years and is super chatty! She loves it here.
Nice friendly environment.

my daughter goes to Balwim daycare and she loves it!her language has improved a lot since starting and she comes home singing new songs!the kids were all having so much fun,and the staff were always smiles and owner  and staff is very nice

Absolutely horrible and they don't hold the staff accountable for their actions. My young niece was hit by one of the workers there and the staff covered for her. Go to a different child care center. Don't EVEN consider this one. They are trash.
Nice facility ..new toys new furniture. They do nice arts and crafts for the out of school care children
Nice out of school care center modern and clean.
Nicest looking out of school care facility on the northside
checked out other centres and this one felt the best..+++recommend
Great looking facility..nice and clean.

In the short month that we have been with Bambini Granville, our expectations have truly been surpassed. The staff have assisted in the transition for our son (and his parents!) seamlessly. The communication and open relationship between the staff and us is unmatched in our daycare experiences over the last 4+ years. I would absolutely recommend Bambini to anyone seeking childcare!

Our family really love Bambini Granville because whole of team (Director, coordinator, teachers, chefs, everyone) is sooo kind and nice with us and our daughter. From the first day until today they are very attentive, kindly answer each of our questions and concerns and are interested in the well-being of our daughter. We have only one year in Canada and we don’t speak very good English and really Bambini is and will be our best choice for our daughter in this great change, since they have given us all the support in her adaptation, the teacher sends me photos reports to know how is she after leaving her in the center, we can really be quiet during the day. Thank you so so much Bambini Granville team.

We have had an amazing experience with Bambini. Both of our kids have been going to Bambini and the staff are amazing. They offer a very welcoming environment. Bambini truly deserves a 5 star rating. Highly recommended

Bambini has been a great place to bring our 2 little Boys.  They were able to rectify some early issues and provide a high level of care.  We are happy with the staff and their attentiveness to our children.

I have been very happy with Bambini Granville since my son started in February. The educators are kind and patient, and are very responsive to messages and providing updates throughout the day. My son is very happy attending everyday and enjoys the programming and activities that the educators have planned. Overall, I have been very happy with my experience at Bambini so far.

My daughter went to Bamby daycare from the time she was 19 months old until  5 1/2 years old. We left in August of 2021 because my daughter was starting French Immersion at a different school.  The workers are extremely affectionate, wonderful to work with, and very attentive to my daughter's needs.  She felt at home. We felt so lucky to find such an outstanding daycare in our neighbourhood.  Check it out yourself.

The baby room is pretty nice for small children.  When my daughter was younger she had a pretty peaceful time there at first.  As she got a bit older and started to age out of the room, her interactions with similar aged children became problematic and stressful for her.  She became so stressed and scared of the other children she would become sick.  She, a four year old at the time, was being beaten and bullied by a 3yr old male and nothing was being done about it.  The older child room (kindergarten and up) where my son was, was quite rowdy.  My son found it far too loud, and far too stressful.  In the summer, particularly last summer, almost the entire summer was spent in the hot school gymnasium rather than outside in the huge neighbourhood park.  The vast majority of summer programming was cancelled.  It was basically baby jail.  In the last one or two years this daycare has drastically dropped in the quality of care.

My child has gone to this daycare for 3 years. The teachers are always very nice and they plan a lot of special activities for the kids like bowling, water fights in the summer and celebrate the children's birthdays. I appreciate all the care the ladies have and I recommend this daycare to others!

Durning Summer they Won’t let you in for drinks even on the hottest of days. I had to drink mud just to stay hydrated. They will treat you like rubbish. They give you no time to eat your lunch and after won’t let you grab your outside stuff if you forgot it by your classroom. They have no activities for the older children. There are a lot of bullies in the daycare, one time some girl (grade 6 a few years ago) cried because we weren’t playing with her even though she didn’t ask to play with us when we went to the table and didn’t even talk to her at all. 4 year olds swear and so do the other kids. They make the boys go into the girls bathroom. You are forced into the gym after school to just sit on the bench while watching the littler kids slobber all over the newly polished floors and ride bikes that your not allowed touching. Kids will bite you and scratch you for no typical reason. Some of my stuff has went missing while having to go to this daycare. They bring ALL the kids to see Elmo, which for me I was really scared of him with his creepy laugh. When they served snacks they’d give you a tiny cup full and say you don’t get anymore. You have to pay like $260 for 2 kids when their only at the daycare after school, before, and at lunch. The question is how much you’ll have to pay when their in kindergarten or not even in school yet. Overall I would suggest NEVER bringing your kids to this daycare.

Worst place for your kids, careless  and mean caregiver, full mouth of lies and yelling at children even the owner of the daycare, always trying to push the responsibilities to the kids or the parents.

This daycare is so unorganized, they don't communicate properly, the teachers are so friendly but the directors are disgusting humans. They discriminated against my 3.5 year old daughter due to her mild focal epilepsy. This is illegal, and honestly so disgusting. I am due to start work in 2 days, they agreed to take her part time to start and everyone agreed to every parameter. I got an email today stating they were not willing to take her part time, they apparently don't have the space, which they told me they did, just yesterday. Steer clear of this place if you value your child's integrity.
The best daycare in Edmonton. They treat children with kindness and humanity. Always when I bring back my children happy, stuff is always helpful and Welda a very great person.

My son has gone to Bebe’s for 8 years. Welda has seen him grow, even with his ups and downs! She is fair and expects respect from all. She has made my son respect those in authority and to work well with his play mates. It is a multicultural mosaic with respect and learning for all. I am a gen X mom and love the leadership and love that Welda and her team provide. They provide feedback on growth and expect the best from the kids in their care.
Soon our daycare journey will be over but I know my son is a better person with their supervision.

This daycare has one of the most nicest people, and they are so kind to everyone that comes. They are very considerate of people's situations and most of all are very compassionate. The ladies that work here are always a pleasure to speak with and are very dedicated childcare givers. This place also clearly cares about cleanliness as it's always super clean with no toys or anything else out of place. Definitely would recommend this to be one the best in Castledowns.

This daycare has done wonders for my twin grandsons! I had to change a few times due to issues with staff at other daycare but then I found this one and myself and grandsons couldn't be happier ☺️ I 100% recommend this daycare for your children

We moved recently and were unable to keep our kids at Between Friends do to our new location. We are so grateful for how well the staff treated our 2 boys (2 and 5). Our 5 y/o had nothing but good things to say about the teachers and made some great friends in the year we had them there. I would highly recommend if you are looking for daycare/osc in the far west end of the city. (Would give more than 5 stars if possible.) Thanks for everything!

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this daycare.  My boys were so well taken care of and loved all the ladies there.  The level of care from the staff was above and beyond anything we could have asked for.  It’s obvious they are passionate about their work as there is zero staff turnover and you can tell they are a well oiled machine.  Cannot recommend this place enough if you are looking for a reliable daycare on the west side of Edmonton!! The rates were super reasonable as well!  The director Carmen is super helpful with any questions we had and my boys formed serious bonds with Faye, Nancy and Natalie.  Thanks for everything ladies!
Fantastic great  staff

As a working parent, finding a trustworthy and nurturing environment for my child was a top priority, and this daycare exceeded all expectations.

From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel like family. They have created a warm and inviting atmosphere that immediately put both me and my child at ease. The caregivers are not only highly skilled professionals but also incredibly caring individuals who truly love what they do.

The facility itself is clean, organized, and designed with the safety and development of the children in mind. There are age-appropriate play areas, educational toys, and creative spaces that stimulate learning and imagination. I appreciate that they have a structured routine that includes both educational activities and free play.

Thank you, for being an integral part of my child's early years!

All 5 of my children have been to the centre and still have great friendships with the staff and other children. I love the morning smiles and positive vibes that everyone in the daycare bring. Desiree has gone above and beyond to accommodate my childrens needs. Being a single mom isn’t the easiest job however I am truly thankful to have such amazing people be apart of my support team.

Although I can't say enough about the caretakers of the children who have been caring for my daughter since she was 1, my experience with the director has been sub par. Because of this, is why review is so poor. Her lack of communication has been very unprofessional and has left me scrambling for daycare 2 weeks from when I need it for son. I had him on the waitlist since July, have been asking for updates to confirm he has Spot and she said there wouldn't be any foreseeable issues for when we needed him in. I sent an email, having heard from a staff member that there was no space for my son,when I need childcare in 2 weeks and she said that there is no place for him now. Why was my daycare status being discussed among staff first when nothing had been communicated to me directly? As someone who runs the center I think she should more than understand how important childcare is so parents could work. She did not communicate any of this to me after we had been checking in, as I'm sure she would have had some indication much sooner than 2 weeks prior that there'd be no space. her behavior regarding this matter contradicts everything center stands for and expects from their employees according to their website.
Excellent facility, amazing staff , an inclusive environment. This daycare is  family oriented and my children and I love Beverly Daycare so much!

Amazing centre! The staff are incredible and very professional and caring. The director (who has been managing the centre since 2020) is incredible, very in tune with the community, families, and staff and it shows in the tenure of the employees and families. I’ve had the opportunity to volunteer and it’s a very clean centre with engaging programs. Would absolutely recommend!

This is the best daycare in the city. The director is AMAZING, as well as the staff, the board, etc. We had clear communication right from the start, all the way through to the end. The director took every concern we ever had seriously, and was so supportive. Extremely professional and authentic interactions. We moved and had to say goodbye, but my preschool kids STILL talk about how much they love and miss Beverly Daycare! They absolutely hate their new one. I honestly wish we could airlift Beverly Daycare to our new province!! We will never find another like it! The bar has honestly been set so high by this organization! A++++++++++

Edit:
The manager reached out to me to apologize and tried to make things right, I really appreciate the way she handled things. +1 star for how things were handled so quickly and how she tried to make things right, even offering to visit with myself in person. I might give this place another chance one day.

Original review:
Absolutely horrible experience, I would never recommend this place. I couldn't even use the services because the staff was so unhelpful. It's like they don't know who the people they're helping are or something. I just needed respite and they had so many arbitrary rules about specific stop off and pickup times, and they had no common sense. Like my kids are so bored with the endless paperwork that they are becoming destructive and bouncing off the walls so I asked if the kids could go in while I finish the paperwork and the lady says no. Like ok then stop going off on my kids for playing with the automatic door, they both have ADHD, I'm exhausted and looking for respite because I need help. And yet you guys can't even be a bit helpful to a person in need. Never reccomending this service to anyone.

This daycare is so amazing.  From the first day my son attended, they have gone above and beyond to ensure he and I felt comfortable.  It is so  reassuring to know he is spending his days at a daycare he truly enjoys!  They have amazing teachers who create excellent and engaging activities for the children. The menu they offer is very healthy, with great variety. I would highly recommend Blackmud Creek Child Care. Your child is in the best hands with Corinne and her lovely team!

I have two children enrolled in Blackmud Creek Childcare centre. I have nothing but great things to say about the centre. The owner and the staff are engaging, kind, enthusiastic, and seem to really enjoy what they do. They bring the kids outside everyday and encourage free play, however they also incorporate structured educational activities indoors. The centre is clean and organized with all kinds of craft materials, books, and toys.  I feel good sending my kids to the centre every day knowing that they’re well taken care of and happy.
My son loves going here, the staff are warm and engaging. Highly recommend!

My daughter just started on this daycare 3 weeks ago. she’s always excited to go every day. They serve good snacks and has a big space for children to play around. Its really clean and family like environment . Rachhpreet is great with the kids and I definitely recommend this daycare!
This daycare is amazing place! Very clean with great staff and very welcoming.Please keep on the great job that you ladies do.
Very humble and kind staff to take care of our kids  recommended to everyone
Hardworking staff and thoughtful management.
Very professional team. I have peace of mind every time that I drop my daughter there because I know she will be well taken care of. I definitely recommend this daycare!

GREAT STAFF! THEY ARE ALL AMAZING WITH MY SON, WHO HAS BEEN GOING THERE FOR JUST ABOUT 3 YEARS NOW, THEY ARE AMAZING WITH ALL THE KIDS!! VERY ATTENTIVE, CARING, AND KIND. THEY TRULY HAVE AND SHOW, A LOT OF INTEREST IN EACH CHILD'S LIFE, AND WHAT EACH CHILD IS INTERESTED IN. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DAYCARE VERY LOVING AND EDUCATED STAFF.

I just want to thank Violet, the director of the daycare, and all the teachers for taking care of my daughter Yasmin.  She started there when she was 11 months old, and she just left in February 2023 because we moved to another city. On her 10 months there I don't have any complaints. They were very kind and compassionate. My daughter was always happy when I picked her up. She also developed new skills. If you want a piece of mind, choose this facility. They made a goodbye folder for her, this made me emotional knowing that she was leaving a good place. Thank you, teachers.

Violet and the team at Blue Quill have been amazing. My 10-month-old started in October 2022 and the transition from being home to going to daycare was seamless. I am very comfortable with leaving my now 19-month-old in the care of Violet and the team. My boy eats very well, he’s developed so many skills and is so independent! All the praises to the fabulous ladies over there! I would recommend them to all my friends. Always clean and very professional and respectful. I enjoy the daily updates and the flood of pictures.

This daycare is fantastic. My daughter started when she was with only 15 months on the toddler room. From the start, Violet was very kind to wait for me after work to give me the tour. Teacher Kazi would give hugs to my baby when she was upset, and I knew she was in good hands. Their playground in the back is fantastic. They always sent me daily photos and even more if my daughter was crying when I left.

When she turned 2.5yrs old, she moved to the other side with the older kids, where she made good friends, and teacher Evelyn was taking care of her and letting me know of all that happened. I appreciate the honesty and concern, so that we worked together to educate her. Sangam and Sukhman are also very helpful and supportive of the kids. My daughter says she has many favourite teachers. In particular, teachers Raj, Dilpreet, Meena, Sunita, Merci, really helped my daughter grow in confidence and gave me peace of mind when I’m worried about her. This is a fantastic location and I am really happy to have trusted this team for so long. I am sad now to change to another daycare because we moved too far, but we will cherish many happy moments from this place, from fieldtrips and barbecues and so much more. I would highly recommend this daycare to anyone.

Our two year old son loved going to this daycare, (I am currently on maternity leave). He trusts the teachers and made some of his first friends here. We really appreciate the activities they have for the kids to do everyday and we feel he has learned a lot through the free play and structured learning. The zoo days and Christmas parties were really neat and he had some very cute crafts to bring home! It was nice to have the meals provided as well. We hope to send he and his brother back here as it is a great place and Violet is very inviting and involved.

My children have attended here for 7 months (our first experience with childcare) and we’ve been so happy with it. The teachers are friendly, warm and affectionate. I always feel confident knowing they will have fun and be treated kindly. The provided lunches are a bonus, making life so much easier. Thank you to Sangam and her crew, we love you ladies ❤️.

Staff there are always friendly and helpful, easy to talk to.  Eeshani will go out of her way to make sure everything is good with both parents and the kids.  They do lots of fun activities and crafts that keep kids entertained daily.  I never have to worry about my kids while they're there.

After viewing multiple daycares this was one I genuinely felt welcomed. My husband and I were nervous sending our kids to daycare - it was the first time and they had never been apart or been in someone else’s care for any extended periods especially 5 days a week. I can honestly feel at ease knowing that I don’t have to worry about my kids, being a store manager my schedule can be a bit hectic but Eeshani is always accommodating and the staff are always happy to help with smiling faces at drop off and pick up ! They helped us with our subsidy application as it was our first time applying and when things got mixed up, it took 8 months to resolve and not once was I made to feel uncomfortable or like I was doing something wrong. They were so understanding and patient with the entire process even though there were very few and far between updates! I would highly recommend this daycare if you want your kids to be taken care of by kind and compassionate people who are amazing with children ! Our youngest is now walking and talking more as well as our oldest who has never had a day where she didn’t want to go to daycare !

The ladies here took very good care of my son! He learned lots of basic pre school knowledge with a relaxed atmosphere. He learned his alphabet and to count to 30. He enjoyed many days in their park and playing with the other children. He was always happy to go! 😁

I cannot speak highly enough of this daycare. They are caring people, and have been nothing but amazing for my son, who has been attending for over three years. Shame on the people review bombing this business.

I hope you receive 100 5 Star reviews for every idiot who gives you a 1 star because they don’t like the owner, that you have no control over. These daycare women have always been polite and friendly !

We really love the care that all the teachers give our daughter at this daycare. The teachers, director and owner are excellent at what they do everyday and make all of the kids feel special. Thank you for all you do

My kids started here at ages 2.5 and 4.5 and I have been nothing but impressed with Bright Horizons!

Things I really like - lots of fun, outdoor programming - every day they spend lots of time playing outside, either in the play yard, or in the surrounding fields and river valley. Another thing I really like is the creative ideas they have for the children to do - this summer they have done a "mud day", taken them for a picnic, taken them to an indoor playground, as well as to a local splash park. They are always coming up with fun things to do! Elsa and Marshall even visited one day!

The teachers are very caring and professional, and both of my kids have really bonded with their teachers and the friends in their classes :) Highly recommend Bright Horizons!

From the moment we arrive in the morning, my children are excited to start their day at Bright Horizons Daycare. We are welcomed with the kind smiles of the site director and the assistant site director but it doesn't end with them. The entire staff and even the owners make you feel like part of their own family. Everything from the planned activities to the scheduled outdoor adventures makes an exhilarating experience that my children want to return to. They have made lasting friendships here.
During this pandemic, Bright Horizons has remained fully transparent, professional and follow all protocols, making a safe place for everyone.

Outstanding day care! Both of my kids love Bright Horizons! My four year old has been attending Bright Horizons since 2016 and is still excited to go everyday. He is always happy to tell me about his “special day with his friends” when I pick him up. Even on his days off he asking to go to “school.” My toddler
is also Gets excited when it is time to be dropped off at daycare. He enjoys doing crafts, going outside, and playing with his friends. When looking for a daycare, finding one that has learning opportunities and time outside were top priorities for my wife and I, Bright Horizons has exceeded those expectations. I am confident in the staff and appreciate how friendly and how hands on they are with all the kids. I love Bright Horizons and feel lucky to have found a daycare that takes such great care of my kids.

My husband and I visited a dozen different daycare programs before picking Bright Horizons.  We feel that we made the right choice as both my boys (3 year old and 1 year old) love going there. Knowing that both our kids are in the very capable and caring hands of the Bright Horizons staff helps ease my mind when I go to work. My oldest son has been attending since he was 11 months old and still gets excited when I tell him he is going to see his Bright Horizons friends. The location and building are fantastic and gives the safe tucked away feeling. I really like the outdoor play yard and big rooms, giving both my kids plenty of room to run around. I highly recommend Bright Horizons!

Can't say enough good about our experience at Bright Horizons!  Our daughter has been going for almost 2 years, since she was 11 months. From Baby to Bumblebee to Toddler room, staff have loved her like their own, and she has thrived because of it. Clean, welcoming facility, lots of outdoor time, and staff and owners who really care.

Bright Learners daycare is the best daycare in Edmonton as this provides a safe place for children to explore the world around them by giving natural loose parts. I never seen a great management ever in any daycare but this daycare has appreciable staff, director. Bright Learners daycare give opportunity to children to spark their imagination and show their creativity by doing activities on daily basis. Overall, I suggest everyone who is reading this message that this is the best and safe daycare for your child.

My little ones started their first daycare with bright learners and it was an amazing experience with them! Super friendly and caring staff. I’m grateful and thankful to the most supportive teachers.Thank you for all your care and love to our children ❤️ Best daycare in the city.

It's only been a month since my child started attending Bright Learners Daycare, and I'm delighted with the smooth transition they have provided. In this short time, they have created a nurturing environment that has helped my child feel comfortable and secure. The caring staff and engaging activities have made daycare a positive experience for my little one. Thanks to their support, I've been able to get back to work with confidence, knowing my child is in good hands. I'm looking forward to witnessing my child's growth and development further as they continue to thrive at Bright Learners Daycare.
