I am having a great time working at Bright Learners Daycare. It is a great place to learn things. Bright Learners Daycare has a very helpful and cooperative staff. Not only the staff, but also the director, Sheweta is a fantastic person and is very helpful and supportive.

Bright learners daycare is a wonderful space for children and families. Great outdoor space for children to play in the warm weather. Strong curriculum to support learning for all age groups. The staff is professional.Definitely suggest this daycare for all families in Edmonton.

Thank you for establishing this daycare as my kid was able to settle after trying a couple of other daycares. She wakes everymorning with more passion. She can't miss a single day and weekends are too long for her. I wound recommend that this is the right place for kids to enjoy and learn.

Three of my kids go to this daycare, all are always very excited to go. They always asks that we hurry to daycare & get unhappy if they skip a day. I’m really happy with Bright Life Daycare as I’ve seen lots of progress with my kids, thank you! :)

*UPDATED after reply*: I said that I pulled him from his old daycare because he didn’t want to continue going after they went under new ownership, he didn’t like the new owners and staff after going there for a year and a half. I also confronted them over cutting his fingernails, which daycares aren’t allowed to do. But I didn’t bother to tell you they were mistreating him and that is why I pulled him out of there. And I brought him regularly in the mornings for the first month, after he refused to go I knew I would continue having a hard time considering your response and how you handle things. So I started bringing him less and less, until it because obvious that he would never be happy going here. Plus, you told me everyone else brings their kids at lunch time and you only have 1 kid in the morning anyways. Thanks for also texting me minutes after I post this review, asking if I’d give you guys another chance and bring him back. Don’t you have kids to be watching instead of jumping on your phones as soon as you get a review? And trying to mend it hoping I’ll delete this. There are also fake reviews on here written by the owners themselves off fake accounts.

My son went here for one month and then I could not get him to continue going. They seem like they do not know how to handle a child throwing tantrums or dealing with separation anxiety, which is normal in toddlers. Each morning my son would cry while dropping him off and the daycare workers would stand there staring at me and wincing in awkwardness not knowing what to do. This is my first time seeing this at any daycare, and I have been dealing with daycares for about 10 years now as I have an older child.
The final day I attempted to take him, he cried and they suggested I take him in one of the rooms and try to out him down for a nap. I rejected that offer, as it is not my responsibility to put my child down for a nap at daycare. Imagine if I had somewhere to be at a certain time and I could not spend time sitting there waiting for him to adjust because they simply don’t want to or don’t know how to deal with it. At that point, you might as well put me on payroll and I can forget about finding work else where and I can do your job while spending time there, and make money at the same time.
Not sure why they chose to handle the situation in that way, but it gives off the impression that you don’t know how to take care of children especially in times of their distress. I don’t feel comfortable bringing my child here anymore.

My son has been attending for almost two months now and is really enjoying it. He even told me a few weeks ago “Mommy, I love my daycare.” Which is something I never heard him say at his previous one. The owner Mizan is wonderful as well and I am so thankful for her love and care that she shows to each child who attends. I have been recommending this daycare to everyone!
Very good environment for children all ages, great service thank you so much.

Daycare director Hema is highly professional, pleasant and is a great leader. Her staff are competent and experienced and sensitive to children's needs working well as a team. As a parent of 2, I have so much respect for the hard work they do and more importantly, I trust them with the care of my child. They provide hot lunches which is a great feature too. Highly highly recommend.

Both of my kiddos love it here!! They always have so much fun, the other kids are amazing, and they always have such sweet stories to tell about the teachers and things they did throughout the day. I would highly recommend.

I recommend this daycare because my children are really happy with this daycare. The staff is awesome. All the rooms are clean and I love all the monthly activities they have for the children. Pick up and drop off school options is a bonus for me.

This Daycare is amazing!! I was here a few days ago, and I must say that the owners are wonderful and sweet! The staff here is very professional, and they are very helpful as well! I am very pleased with the clean and safe environment for the kids, and the Interactive atmosphere! The director herself is very sweet, as she was able to show me various programming Plans that are wonderful ideas to do with the children! The children are treated with respect and kindness! I highly recommend everyone to come to this daycare and try it!

My kid loves to go and enjoyed the place. Other kids were so nice and friendly as well as the owner and staff. My kid is definitely well taken cared of. I recommend it to other moms too who live nearby.
So far they have been amazing

We love this place! My daughter has been going there for about 5 years sine she was 1 y.o. Now, she is in grade 1 and doing after school, PD days, school vacations and  holidays there. The daycare has been also open during the pandemic initially for essential workers and now for everyone else, which made possible for me to work  (I am a social worker). The staff is super friendly, patient, creative, and knowledgeable. They were the 1st to recommend a speech assessment for my daughter,  which resulted in timely diagnosis and services offered at school leading to significant improvement. This place is a gem and I strongly recommend it.

I've had my two eldest boys in this daycare and now my youngest since he was 10mths old. He loves going, which means he loves the staff and that speaks volume.  The quality of care is amazing, my son is always clean when I pick him up and never sits in a dirty diaper. This is his second home and it is great. Kobe loves Belinda and Rose. Another very positive thing is that the staff work on the children's fine and gross motor skills which is very important in a child's development.  :)

We have had an amazing experience with Bright Start Daycare. My three sons have all attended the daycare and I always recommend them to people wanting childcare; they have also had really awesome experiences.

What really matters is feeling stress free when your child is in someones care. I have peace of mind with Bright Start Daycare.........I highly recommend this daycare!

My 2 kids attend this daycare. Even though it is 12mins away from my home, I prefer driving them here.
Their teachers/carers are too kind and love kids.

They will look after your kids. I am glad with their services.
This place is home 2 for my girls and my family! Very beautiful place, very friendly staff and very good people! High recommended….So proud of this place! ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️🫶🫶🫶🫶

I really recommend this Daycare to all parents. My daughter has been there for two years and we couldn't have chosen a better place. A wonderful and qualified group of teachers with great patience and understanding. The program is really great. Ana is a great director with a big heart, thanks to her this place is unique. Thank you for the wonderful care of my daughter.❤️

As a first time parent, I was very worried about leaving my little one in other people's care other then my own!. Ana has been so wonderful in answering all of my questions, my son’s teacher is so kind and cares for him like her own, and every teacher is very welcoming! I love that their menu is nutritious and well rounded, their indoor and outdoor play areas are full of great toys and the teachers take the time to update you each day with photos and what your little one is learning. I feel safe knowing my kiddo is in good hands! Highly recommend.

My son has been coming to BrightPath Hermitage since he was 18 months. He's 3 now and I love this daycare so much, I will be sending my 13 month old as well! There's not enough good words in the world to say about BrightPath-Hermitage. The staff are friendly, the food menu is great and all the fun activities they provide keeps my little guy busy. My son even asks to go to daycare on weekends! Don't hesitate, get your little ones into a BrightPath daycare nearest you!.

My son started going here when he was only 11 months old and me as a first time parent I was so scared. My fears were for nothing as my son has been taken care of like he is family. He loves going and even reaches for his teacher and smiles in the morning when he sees her. He has learned so much since starting daycare and I’m happy I choose brightpath

I had a bad experience dealing with Anna's negative and cold attitude. While the daycare has good curriculum, the Hermitage centre is not ready for inclusivity. At least this is what was told to me. I was asked by Anna to not bring my son from July.She has stuffed 18 kids in a room and putting pressure on teachers. Such was her ignoring my son that no photos or any updates was made on that app they have.
Her cold attitude started when I didnot go for Brightpath's PUF program and chose another one instead.After losing the funding,she started creating hurdles so that I self willingly discontinue.She told no outside programs will be allowed whereas daycares cannot refuse out of reach PUF program for a child.When all these didnot work,she had to say that I have taken other kids and you have to discontinue.
Many have positive reviews because their children can adjust here without any extra help,but not all kids are same. But if a special needs child comes,you get to see Anna's real face.
Everytime I walked into that door,she would start sulking.Just had enough of her.

My son has been attending brightpath for 4+ years and we absolutely love this centre. They’ve always gone above and beyond for us, and they genuinely care about my son. The programming is of high quality, and there’s always something fun and exciting going on. My son loves his teachers! We’ve never been disappointed and I can’t even express how wonderful they are. I highly recommend this centre to anyone looking for somewhere who will treat your children with love and care.
My three children attend this daycare and they sure do a fantastic job! I'd recommend it to anyone.

I had to make a change of my daycare for my 2 girls very quickly at the end of August, and brightpath was the only daycare willing to work with my special needs child. My youngest was very sad to change daycares however absolutely loves it here and tells me she doesn’t want to go back to the old daycare. The change has been nothing but a positive experience. The children get the opportunity to do so many fun activities during the day! I love the communication emails that you get at the end of the day! There’s also an app you can access. All of the teachers at the centre are amazing. I highly recommend this centre and will not be changing.

BrightPath Millwoods has been fantastic. Our daughter has been going there for about 6 months now. Being that our daughter is our first child my wife and I were extremely afraid of this milestone for us and especially our daughter.
The teachers/caregivers are very friendly and personable. Our daughter just loved her teacher "Miriam" in her first few months. We were so happy to see her happy. Unfortunately, we don't see Miriam anymore but her new teacher is just as friendly and attentive.
In addition, the Leap Frog curriculum they follow really advances the children's growth. My wife and I are proud to say our baby goes to Bright Path. I could go on about our experiences so far but I'll just end this by saying, we are happy with our decision to bring our daughter here and wouldn't change it.

Our daughter has been at this location and she loves it. The teachers are great and she made significant progress in her development.  Big kudos to teacher Ravnit and Cassandra for being so caring and dedicated, being able to spend time one on one with the kids.
Great diversity for food, our daughter finally started to eat all sorts of things, due to the patience and persuasion of the teachers.  The management team is flexible and responsive to the feedback we provide.
Very happy with our choice to pick this location.

Today is my daughter's last day in this daycare, now she's going to the big school :-)
I cannot say enough positive things about this daycare. The staff are absolutely adored by my daughter and have all become like a second family to her. My daughter has been attending for a few years now and we are still impressed each day with the programming, the educators and the positive developments we see in my daughter as she grows and learns.
Highly recommended.

We are so happy with BrightPath, the caregivers are wonderful and the management is very well organized and attentive. Since we switched our daughter here she has thrived with the structure of the activities and has created a "social circle" with the other toddlers in her room because the room sizes are not too large. The security of the facility is also great with a friendly receptionist always there at the front door. Would highly recommend.

Our daughter has been attending BrightPath West Henday for about a year since moving here from Ontario.  They were so great at transitioning her. All the staff are welcoming with BRIGHT smiles on their faces from the moment you walk in. Our daughter absolutely loves it there and we are very pleased with her development.  Having the APP daily updates are wonderful. They are a fantastic dinner time conversation starter, discussing with our daughter what she learned today, how she ate and what her favorite part of the day was.  Great Job and would highly recommend!

Find childcare for your little one is a daunting process. Parents who are looking for a centre that is safe, clean, fun and engaging need not look any further than Brightpath.

Our family has been attending Brightpath since 2017 and while the tuition is high we understand and appreciate the value our children receive from these fees.

The staff are amazing. They are friendly, caring and really engage and encourage the kids.

The meals are nutritious.

The programming is age appropriate and the staff helped my kids adjust at every stage of their development with routines and expectations.

I personally enjoy their app. Throughout the day I am updated on the kids activities and provided photos. When the kids were younger I appreciated the knowing about their naps, they kept me updated on diaper changes.

Overall I  am very satisfied with Brightpath and would recommend it to others.

Sending our son to daycare was a difficult decision, one which we agonized over. BrightPath was recommended by a friend and has been a great choice. The friendly and kind staff have eased this difficult transition and supported my son every step of the way. Everyone knows my son’s name and they are always happy to see him. The communication via the app is comprehensive and allows me to enrich his learning at home. I also love to be able to see what he is doing all day. Any issues we’ve brought forward have been quickly resolved and feedback has always been welcomed. I feel like the staff really know and care about my son, and that’s what matters to me.

We can’t thank Rosa and Amanveer (infant room teachers) enough for their sweet, patient and caring actions and attitudes that made our sons fist experience at daycare such a good one! As a first time mom leaving my son with someone new, they made it a smooth and comforting transition.

Heather the director was also very easy to communicate with and was very responsive to any questions or concerns. All staff got to know my child in such a short period of time, and it just shows how personal they are. Overall a great experience!

I wholeheartedly endorse this daycare center! The staff's attentiveness and compassion foster a nurturing and secure atmosphere for the children. My child eagerly looks forward to attending and has made significant strides in learning.

The daily activities are both captivating and instructive. Communication with parents is top-notch, with consistent progress updates provided during pickup. It's truly comforting to know that my little one is under such capable care throughout the day.

If there's one aspect I'd suggest enhancing, it would be more frequent parent-teacher one-on-one meetings. Nevertheless, their overall performance remains fantastic

I love this center I can't rave enough about it, my son went here for a year and has just transitioned to kindergarten so I changed care , but his time here was an absolute delight, he grew in ways that was amazing, the teachers are very patient and kind, the staff at the reception are always a delight when you walk in , they are so kind and amazingly remembers all the names of all the kids as big as this center is. The kitchen staff are so good at what they do and food is amazing the center is clean . I am sincerely going to miss it here . Thank you so much for an an amazing experience.

Heather, Hima, Kim, Robynn, and I believe she is the other regular daytime floor manager (I am blanking on her name, I'm so sorry!) are all absolutely wonderful. Honestly they all are, there are really too many to name. Everyone has been so kind and attentive and accommodating whenever I have a question or request.

The educators are also absolutely wonderful. Meenakshi and Jashin (room G) and Sangita (formerly room G) were so caring and just hands down incredible with my son. It was so hard to transition him out of the room because he loves them so much, as do we!

However, he's recently moved up to pre-school and his new teachers are also so warm and kind and caring and go above and beyond, especially to make him feel comfortable during the transition phase. They are very attentive and the detailed reports are extremely appreciated.

He has learned so much from being at Brightpath and there is no way I would have been able to have taught him anywhere near the amount that he knows because of attending. The curriculum is jaw dropping and so well rounded, I am constantly blown away when I see the reports of what he is learning.

Never would have imagined my son would know his left and right's before he was 3! Nor would I have ever thought to even attempt to teach him that at such a young age.

Price wise of course you'll be paying more than a smaller centre or a dayhome, but in my opinion it's WELL worth it. We looked at the prices of surrounding centres that have opened up since he has been attending here and while we would be saving a couple hundred dollars a month elsewhere, the savings were not at all worth taking him out of this incredible centre.

Bravo Brightpath and bravo Heather for such a well run centre.

My baby has been attending this facility for the past few months and I am beyond happy that I made the right choice. Despite all my previous worries and fears, it is a great relief to know that he is in such a good care and he loves going to the centre. All the teachers are so pleasant, loving and caring, and all the activities and even meals are planned and prepared thoroughly. Getting updates through the app is another bonus! Highly recommend.
Wonderful educators and management the Daycare is clean and spacious. My child has flourished since attending Bright Beginnings her social skill is so advanced. Highly recommend this facility.
Incredible center. I cannot say enough good things about Brite Beginnings. My kiddos are so happy there. The entire team of educators and staff is so supportive and communicative. ❤️

The sincere and nurturing care my son received at Brite Beginnings from his caregivers in this active and engaging environment was truly excellent. The management is open and responsive to any questions or concerns, the staff are well trained and the building and property are well maintained. As someone who has worked with young children in schools, and currently as a coordinator in housing and care in disability services, I can confidently recommend Brite Beginnings to parents who are seeking a safe, accredited, inclusive and compassionate daycare for their growing children.

Brite beginnings has been the best child care experience I've had in my (almost) 5 years of being a mom.

This is a full service child care facility; with breakfast, snacks & lunch included. Learning through play, crafts and structured actives. The educators are caring and responsive. The admin staff are friendly and helpful. I cannot express how happy I am that I found Brite Beginnings.

We are so glad to have found the brite beginnings daycare for our son. My son started in Aug 2020 in the middle of the pandemic, and we were very concerned about the covid-19 situation. However, the staff and management team acted very professionally and put our minds at ease by following all the health guidelines strictly and keeping the risk at the lowest possible level. They check kids temperature every morning, wash their hands frequently and santize the toys regularly. One thing that we love is how they divided the playground area into 3 sections to keep the cohorts separated. Also, the management are very transparent about every subject and we deeply appreciate it. Our son is happy there thanks to his kind and patient educators.
Great facility! Caring and kind staff. So many enriching activities planned for the children each day.  We are so happy here!

My girl has been going to this place since last year. She loves this place! Everyone is so caring, kind and attentive to the children. Activities are diverse and well structured whilst the food/snacks are nutritious. Highly recommend!
We love this daycare. The food, staff and activities are amazing. They truly care. Both our kids love going there. Highly recommended
Very experienced teacher and very friendly

My kids have been in this daycare for almost a year now. I have 2 boys, and it was the first time I put them in a daycare. I am so grateful for having this daycare. The staff are so caring. They are patient with the kids, care about manners, teach the kids in a very nice way. They always do activities and crafts, very nice work. My kids enjoy being in the daycare, love all the staff. Their behavior has changed since I enrolled them, more politeness, helping me in cleaning up, speech has developed so quickly. I just feel comfortable leaving my kids with Bumble Bee staff while am at work. I highly recommend this daycare to any one. You won't be disappointed from any thing.
I Am happy with the well maintained environment set up for children, staff who are sensitive and responsive to children.I will definitely recommend this daycare.

My friends daughter goes to this daycare, and today some lady had entered the daycare and tried to take the children. No call to let the parents know, only told when picked up the kids. Very unprofessional!

I love this place and so does my child. I deeply appreciate all the staff being nice and caring, and the owner really cares about the children's and works with the parents. They are very flexible and have great hours and we appreciate that. And best of all, my son seem very happy there and loved. Thank you so much.

My child has been attending this child care center for three years. I am very pleased with the service and the staff. My child is always very excited to go there. Everyday, they learn new things. My child can count till 100 and recognizes the letters. My child has learned a lot from the center. I have recommended this day care to one of my friends last year, and she is also very pleased.

There is so much not sure where to start it’s crowded 2 care providers for over 15 kids.  manager intimidates patrents by telling them pick up your child and I will no longer watch them she is never present, my niace come home with a rare skin deasise which was transmitted via bodily fluids when I had asked that they put out a news letter letting parents know the manger claims it was not from daycare. Please protect your children from those money grabbing non English speaking ignorant people .

My daughter  is been going this child care center  for almost 4years  now!! Its  very  clean and bright she loves so much  all the staff are  very caring and loving!!I keep up the excellent  job  you do!!
This Daycare is indeed safe, magnificent, and remarkable. I will recommend this Daycare to anyone of my friends and family.

Cambridge was the absolute best experience for our daughter. She went at 6 months old to 3 years old and our entire family felt at home. They are caring, patient, friendly, so much more and on top of that affordable. My daughter hasn't been there for 2 years and still talks about Cambridge !!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

My recent encounter with Cambridge Daycare was an absolute nightmare. Their behavior over the phone was beyond rude and left me utterly appalled. I initially called them to inquire about a water purifier, and their response was nothing short of abhorrent.

During my first call, the staff member informed me that they were in a meeting and abruptly asked me to call back later. Fair enough, I called back as requested. However, when I made the second call, the individual who answered was incredibly dismissive and impolite. Their lack of professionalism was evident as they impatiently told me to "get to the point" and repeatedly responded with a disdainful "yeah yeah."
