It's astonishing that a daycare center, which should prioritize the well-being and care of children, would treat potential clients in such a derogatory manner. I am deeply disturbed by the utter lack of customer service skills displayed by Cambridge Daycare's staff.

Based on this encounter alone, I would strongly advise parents to steer clear of Cambridge Daycare. The callous and rude behavior exhibited by their staff suggests a complete disregard for providing a safe, nurturing environment for children. If they cannot even handle a simple phone conversation with basic courtesy, one can only imagine how they might treat children and their families in person.

I implore anyone seeking quality child care services to seek alternatives to Cambridge Daycare. The unprofessionalism and disrespect demonstrated during my call indicate a deeply troubling lack of professionalism and care within their establishment. Please, for the sake of your child's well-being, look elsewhere for a daycare center that values both courtesy and the welfare of the children they serve.

Attention to detail is of the utmost importance at Cambridge Daycare. My son started there in 2014 and now my daughter is there and the staff is largely the same since we first arrived.
The friendliest atmosphere, the kids explore through arts and crafts and have the opportunity to read and be read to. It's an educational environment with a wide range of toys and puzzles that prepares kids for their schooling years. Staff take extra care to communicate how my child is behaving and cooperating with the others. Monthly emails reporting on activities and progress are sent and timely emails regarding changes in policies or important information keep parents up to date with expectations and requirements.
I personally witnessed the work that went into the location change and the commitment made by everyone to make the transition. It is something to see. The layout of the new daycare is incomparable to any other. Plenty of open space with natural daylight streaming in, modernized kitchen, sinks and washrooms in every section. The pedway that centers the space is unique and beautifully constructed. The playground outside is inviting and spacious for kids to run and play.
There is a family feel to this place. I recommend it to anyone in search of a daycare for their child.

Our little girl was at Cambridge daycare for two years. The staff took amazing care of her and were extremely kind and attentive. Our daughter always looked forward to going. The facility is new and is spotless clean. Hands down one of the best daycares in Edmonton.

Our kids have had such a wonderful experience at Cambridge. The owners and staff are so caring and invested. You truly get the feeling that the level of care they provide is the same level of care they would give to their own children or grandchildren. They have also spent so much time and thought into creating a unique and child centred space where kids can learn, adventure and grow. We're so grateful to have found them!

I strongly advise against sending your child to the daycare mentioned as it has been a highly negative experience. Over a period of 9 months, my child was subjected to consistent bullying by another child, enduring daily hits to the head. Shockingly, the teachers failed to inform me about these incidents. It was only when my child reached an age where they could communicate about the situation that I became aware. Furthermore, it is important to note that unless you specifically inquire, the daycare staff will not disclose any injuries your child may have sustained.

We LOVE CPCCS and more importantly our daugther loves it! The team at CPCCS is decidated, patient, kind and professional. The food is nutritious, the activites are engaging and educational. We would highly recommended CPCCS to any family looking for quality childcare.

This daycare is the best in the city. My son has been here for over 3 years and he is now learning French there along with yoga and music. It is a non profit with extremely experienced, caring staff. The cook makes them healthy, made from scratch meals, and his class is always working on some enriching project or going on a nature adventure. He is excited to go every day.

Very mediocre experiences here. The one being when I had to go through the whole passport ideal. Expect to wait for a long time before you get called up. The staff for the most part werew friendly. From the other reviews I read, I guess it's hit or miss. Seems I lucked out. But the wait times were extremely long and agonizing.
We love Canada Place Child Care Society! It is an excellent daycare with engaging programs and kind staff. Our daughter loves going to daycare everyday - highly recommend!

We absolutely love CAPILANO Daycare. I had my 2 children go here for just over a year. 4 year old and a 2 year old. We were so sad to leave because of the amazing staff and wonderful director. She truly does go above and beyond with all the fun activities the children do! My children loved going. I highly recommend.

My daughter has been going to the capilano daycare for last two months. She loves going there and loves to spend time with her teacher and the friends. The directer and the staff are very caring and supportive, especially , the snacks and the lunch are awesome for kids. Strongly recommending as a safe and healthy place for kids.

As a first time mom I was very anxious and was not sure how the whole daycare process worked. I was reassured and guided through it.

I like the app that they use for keeping you updated on what care and activities are provided throughout the day. They use an IPad for the sign in and sign out method, which makes it simple.

Daycare staff are very friendly and welcoming. They are very open with communicating and are able to promptly take care of any questions, concerns, and issues that arise.

My child has been in the daycare for a short period of time and we have not had many issues, if at all.

We love Capilano Day Care. Our son has been attending Capilano daycare for almost 5 months now and I can't imagine sending him anywhere else. He loves it so much and has so much fun there everyday, that we sometimes have to convince him to leave! The teachers in his class are amazing and give so much care and attention to the children in the class. They have a great outdoor area for the kids to play so they aren't cooped up all day . They plan so many amazing activities for the kids, even the young ones, so they really get to experience so many wonderful things while they are in their care. I was so happy to find a place where my son could go that I knew he was getting the same love and affection he would get at home. I never worry when I drop him off there. I know he is in great hands.

Capilano day care is amazing!!!! The staff at this centre are so friendly, caring and loving towards children. My son is here and I would and do recommend it to anyone the lives or works nearby. Capilano offers competitive rates, provides snacks (and usually has ample food). Bring your own lunch. Lots of activities to do, and my son has never come back upset or sour. He loves his teachers and has a lot of fun.

No complaints whatsoever. Staff is very caring, kind and nurturing to the children. Very flexible and accommodating to schedules and needs. Any concerns or problems are dealt with immediately and with no hesitation. Have had my daughter there for over 2 years and she absolutely loves it.

Our son has been attending this daycare since September 2022. The staff are very kind and the kids seem to enjoy going here. We are moving and that is the only reason our son will be leaving the daycare and we are very sad to be leaving them. The program director, Kiran is very friendly and organized and seems to really care for the children.I would recommend Castledowns childcare to anybody looking for a daycare.

Great daycare. My youngest went here as his first daycare experience and its been a good 9 months hes not there anymore and he always asks to go back! Mrs.Ohana is AMAZING with him, i call her his daycare mom

My four years old daughter has been attending since she was one years old and in the past years,she has been introduced to multiple Friends and learning oppertunities and continues to develop in many more ways each day.

My oldest  was at this daycare he practically grew up with the lovely staff they have... and my second boy is now attending also, this daycare helps your child to be happy and have fun but most important is your kids learns also they teach them everything a mom would like her child to learn manors , kindness, sharing and being happy !!! Love this daycare recommend everyone to being there kids here won’t be disappointed at all :) . Can’t thank you enough for all that you do for my son . Great owner and staff very clean and well taken care of .

My son and daughter have been going here for 4 years and I have absolutely no complaints.
Always accommodating. Amazing staff and owners. Never had my kids to go to a daycare that felt like a second home until I came across Central millwoods Daycare.

I LOVE Central Millwoods Daycare! My children have been coming here for 4 years now! They absolutely adore the loving teachers and all the educational activities that are planned each day. The owners and management are amazing- they are really dedicated to making the center great and are very customer service oriented. They also recently renovated the entire center (brand new floors etc.) which shows they are willing to put in the work! This center is our second family!!! We would never think of putting our children anywhere else!

Amazing, caring and family owned. I just love this daycare so much, I appreciate everything that they do to help our family in general learn and grow. Staff are very amazing with the children, very loving environment. I would recommend this daycare to anyone and everyone. Always very efficient in getting back to you when u email them certain questions about anything and everything too. My daughters absolutely love this place as well.  ❤❤❤❤❤☺☺☺☺☺☺

My daughter just started attending this daycare after a year of using Tipaskan Daycare. She loves her teachers and said the daycare is amazing. The owners are great, they’re always willing to go the extra mile to accommodate parents.

My daughter goes here, she loves it, the staff are wonderful and caring. We really appreciate the structured activities during the day, Christmas and other holidays they have special activities. Also my daughter LOVES the hot lunches!

Excellent school. My three children attend here, and we've used the daycare and preschool as well. The teachers are so caring and knowledgeable. My children are very happy here! They have after school clubs like choir and science club, hot lunches once a month by our resident chef, school activities for parents and families to mingle- it's really terrific!
Fantastic school! Great diverse community of staff, teachers, students and parents. My kids love it!
Google Park for taking kids. Be aware you will be asked to leave playground when the school kids came out for recess.
Fantastic school. Attentive and caring teachers. Great community.
Incredible school and amazing staff.

Aminah is an excellent executive manager for Center Highlands Daycare. She is the type of manager that everyone should have. She is very understanding, calm and goes out of her way to help people who need help. She has done a remarkable job in keeping her staff knowledgeable by making sure they know how to incorporate Alberta Flight Framework when working with children at the centre. The children get many opportunities to explore the environment which encourages them to use their imagination and creativity. This is a great daycare for children to attend and staff members are highly educated and well trained in what they are doing with the children.

I love this place and so does my child. As a parent I deeply appreciate the staff being nice and caring, and the Director and staffs of Center Daycare really cares about the children and works with the parents. I’m grateful for their hours as well, a facility opened for 11 hours really helps especially since not everyone works a 9-5 job. The facility is well thought of, rooms separated to keep the ages apart, but structured so that the teachers are able to help each other out. My baby is happy and that makes me a happy parent.

Awesome staff. New management has done good job to rebuild the reputation. My son has been going to the day care for almost an year. He likes the day care so much. Staff take good care of kids and provide updates daily. Lots of indoor and outdoor activities for kids.

It is a wonderful place for your lovely kids to be in. Our 2 year older daughter is in this daycare and I feel safe and happy about her being there. The director Mrs Ramya Ramjothiram is a gem of a person who understands all the requirements by us as a parent and gives her best to fulfill it.

Caretakers Song Hu and Nasreen Momin and two wonderful people who takes care of my daughter so well. They understand her routine, gives good attention and update us with her day today activities. Ramya even sends us pictures and videos which makes us feel comfortable and joyful to know how our kid is doing that day.

A very friendly environment. Lots of toys and spacious play area and they get innovative in the play approach with kids. They even a outdoor playground reserved only for daycare usage. This is our first daycare experience and we love it so much.

Song and Ramya are absolutely wonderful. We had tried a couple different daycares but our daughter never seem settled there. But she loves this place!

They also go the extra mile by keeping us relaxed by sending us images and videos throughout the day. Truly an incredible day care, we're so glad we found this place.

My older child attended this daycare for 2 years. She loved it there and really liked all her teachers. The staff is very professional, friendly and calm. There is a huge, great outdoor playground and an indoor gym as well. The director is very responsive and runs great programs for the kids. Price is reasonable and they provide good food. I will be enrolling my younger child as well.

Hands down the best daycare my children have ever attended. They treat you like family and take such great care of my children and are always compassionate with them and really know each child and my kids have learned so much just being there in the 6 months they've attended so far. My children love going and are always so excited to go, no tears! Thank you for taking such great care of my babies.

My son has being going here for years. Joy is always so friendly and welcoming.  Always willing to go above and beyond.  Any time I have had any concerns she has addressed them quickly and efficiently. We definitely recommend sending your child here. It will quickly become a second family. Lots of care and attention.

I am highly NOT recommended to attend to this daycare. Very slow response. Every time I called to find the director, the stuff asked me to wait for a call back within the same day. But every time I did not receive the call back. I had to try to call again an again.
The director even asked me to have my child commute 2 hours per day to go to their center. It is impossible to see they love children and would take good care of them.

Chappelle daycare is excellent at taking care of my son. I am so impressed with the way Joy treats him like her own. Couldn’t ask for better. Feels like I’m dropping off my son with Family. Thank you for all that you do.

Great small business, and awesome owners, children and staff. It was way too different from the reviews Ive seen in here, A MUST SEE, so you can decide it for yourself :) don't be blinded with only one or two reviews,  the programming is child based interests and staffs are well qualified and experienced.

Staffs are friendly and kind.. My daughter never complained and she's happy.. provides a safe and nurturing environment with good physical, social, emotional, and intellectual development of young children.
Appreciations to the staffs..!

Today in their  back yard play area.I saw all staff 3 sitting in the corner by the outdoor shed.
20-25 toddlers Iam guessing.
I saw the staff with the white hijab and black clothing garab a child by the arm ,throw in the corner. Child left there to cry after she screamed at child.

My daughter loves this daycare and the ladies here. Whenever we drop her off she is smiling and wanting hugs from the ladies I never feel scared to leave my baby here I definitely recommend! She has learned new things here and made friends it's so nice knowing my baby is having fun and playing during the day in a place she loves ❤️

Good staff bad management. Also the facilities security is very concerning they should not be giving out the door codes to whoever has kids there. This is probably what caused the break in during December
Star quality staff, very respectful and reliable. This daycare is extremely organized, clean and well taken care of. Would highly recommend to anyone who lives in South Edmonton :)

My son has been receiving services from the Children's Autism Services of Edmonton for a few years and we've had a few fantastic experiences. I did want to highlight the support that I received from Thomas Pasterfield was amazing. He was able to not only answer all of my questions but direct me to the correct people. I felt he took the time to really listen to my questions and give relevant answers. I did leave that encounter feeling supported when I had initially called him in a panic.

CASE has been nothing but supportive and helpful to us for the past 4 years. All the staff are wonderful and knowledgeable. They treat us as a valuable member of their organization and has been with us throughout our journey.  My child (and our family) will not be where she is if not for the amazing work of all the therapist we’ve worked with. Thank you CASE and all the best!

CASE will always be a part of my son's journey or should I say our family's journey. We had a great experience with our specialized services team. They are definitely skillful and never failed to show professionalism.  We felt their genuine support to help us cope with my son's everyday challenges (i.e. skills such as communications, social, behavioral) Never had regrets of choosing them as our service provider!

I have been working here for several years in many roles from Respite Worker, Child Support Worker, Summer Camp Worker, Primary Consultant, and Intake Worker. I have seen so many caring staff members across programs who support children and families with dignity and expertise. The organization is honest with its funding and fundraising, and strives to provide quality programming for families. Parents and caregivers can find hope and community here, regardless of their child's diagnosis or developmental level. The Annual Conference is one of a kind, and always a highlight of the year for me. I've enjoyed working here, and I plan to stay here for a long time.

We have really enjoyed the services that we have accessed here. Our son did the bowling program and is in the second round of the floor hockey program. I highly recommend joining some of these programs if you have a child that loves to move. The staff goes above and beyond and are always encouraging and welcoming. We also access therapy services and we are very happy with how committed and supportive the therapists are.

My kids have both loved CDO! What I love about it is that it is one of the only full day preschools in Edmonton. No dropping of my 3 year old for a 2 hour program just to turn around and drive right back for pickup. CDO runs from 9am-3pm! They go outside every day, and they do tons of large motor activities and arts and crafts throughout the day. Both of my kids have gone together this year which I also really like. The teachers are great and the program is positive and inclusive.
CDO is by far the most cost effective option too. With the new government subsidy the cost of sending kids 2 days a week is under $100/child a month!!
The volunteer portion and fundraising requirement are a little annoying, but I like that these keep the cost down for families. We paid out of the volunteer commitment this year as it worked better for our family.
The facility is older and I wish they did more music in the program, but those are minor complaints.  My kids are always excited to go in the morning and happy at the end of the day. You can’t beat that! Highly recommend!

The quality of the preschool really depends on who is running on the parent board. The teachers are great! My youngest misses Miss Ziniira the most.
I felt very welcomed when I was new to the program. However, as the years progressed, it became very toxic to be volunteering for the parent board. I was never recognized for my efforts; other parent board members who left the program were White and I am Chinese. I felt discriminated against. I helped the school save more than $120 in bank fees a year by getting them to change their bank account types. This school is great if you have a great support system and if you have retired parents who can help. This preschool is not very inclusive or welcoming towards busy working parents with little to no support system. I have since found a better preschool with less volunteering requirements — and more importantly, no casino volunteering.

This will be our son's 3rd year at CDO, and we absolutely love the program! The teachers and parents have created such a safe, welcoming  and stimulating environment for the kids. We love hearing about and seeing everything our son has done at school! My son looks forward to every day at CDO, and we can't wait to send our daughter when she's old enough!

This is a great pre-school program!  Thoughtful lesson plans by genuine and wonderful teachers.  You can choose up to three days a week, so it’s a great transition to kindergarten.  We started at one day a week for a couple of years and then two days a week in the final year.  We will miss the program and the teachers!

My kids attend the program for a couple years and loved it. The teachers are caring, attentive and my kids felt safe and happy there. They still talk highly  about the teachers and friends they made during their time at CDO.

I have worked in the child care field so I was very picky when it came to choosing a daycare for my children. I definitely made the right call choosing Children’s Explore Centre! The staff at the daycare are amazing, the owner Corona goes above and beyond making sure all the kids AND PARENTS needs are met. Love this place, highly recommend!

This place is amazing. The owner Corona has been very helpful and hands on. She even helped me fill out the subsidy paperwork. My wife and I were very nervous about day care as it was our first time but the staff are great and send pictures of how the kids are doing. They are very reasonably priced and keep the kids active.

I highly recommend checking them out !

I really love this place. The kids always come home happy and tell us about all of the fun they had. The staff are great and the owner Corona has been really good to work with. I am a high maintenance parent. I get nervous and worried about everything. Some times this overflows and I can be a bit demanding and/ or accusing. Corona has been very accommodating and it has really helped me to feel comfortable having my two boys at her Daycare.

If you’re looking for a centre that will
Not only treat you  and your children like family , but doing so while staying professional and accommodating, this is honestly among the best daycares on 118! The space is kept clean, and organized! The staff is devoted to creating  learning and explorative  experiences that allow the children to build their autonomy and their shared experiences with the other children !
Staff is awesome they always put the extra effort in for every kid. The owners are great and very accommodating setting everything up for us. Overall really good daycare highly recommend!

My son has been coming to Childrens Playce daycare for almost 5 years the daycare has done exceptional work caring for my son Joshua Letendre also the staff do a wonderful job as well they call me when someone not on the contact list to pick up my son and they never released my child without my consent.He has progressed beyond my expectations they are very good on writing reports if a child has a any issues including accidents. All the staff are very good with the children.I am very satisfied with the daycare and there work.Good job all of you guys.

The staff do interact very well with the children. My child's diaper was always changed and didn't get rashes. However my child was released to someone not on the pick up list. The person who picked up my child was safe and related to him, but was never supposed to be able to pick my child up. When I confronted the director about this, she denied it and said that it had never happened. I had four other people that I trusted confirming that it did happen. Eventually they changed the policy but still refused to acknowledge their mistake. I filed a complaint and as a result the director retaliated. She called my funding to complain that I ask too many questions and would not bring them an entire box of diapers at once. She also complained that I had filed a complaint. After this I gave my immediate notice. This daycare is not worth the drama. The prices are great but food wise you get what you pay for. I would never recommend this daycare to anyone in a million years. It was a nightmare.

This is a wonderful place for KIDS, staff teachers are competent in their job, compassionate, caring and friendly too. My two kids love to stay here because they enjoy their daily activities which are educational and is a big plus in further improving and transforming them into better and more responsible kids anywhere they go...
They are able to explore and learn while they enjoy playing with other kids in the daycare as they keep telling stories about it when they're at home.

I will give this daycare and osc a thumbs up!!

This daycare has mice running around the kitchen, they do not clean the change table after every or any diaper change, the last comment was correct in saying the children would be better off eating in a soup kitchen, the staff handle the children roughly and do not treat each child with respect, the children with special needs are not having their needs met... Actually none of the children are. They also accepted a child who did not go to the center. They did not know who this child was and they did not have any contact info. They also did not call authorities until 8 pm that night! There are so many better daycares in that area..

My son goes this place for last 2 years or so, the staff are all so caring and help any parent feel at ease leaving their child in daycare. My son always has a smile on his face when we drop him off at Children's Playce.

My son has been attending CityKidz since March, and I couldn't be happier with the care he is receiving. While I am grateful for the dedication of the staff and their hard work, I am particularly thankful for Prabhleen, my son's caregiver. She is truly exceptional – thoughtful, caring, and incredibly creative in her teaching activities. I'm also delighted with the Storypark app they use to share daily highlights. One of the moments of joy this week was when I realized my 14 month old son has learned to use sign language for "more". I highly recommend them for any parent who is looking for a daycare.

Fantastic staff; really attentive to my 2year olds needs. Wonderful staff such as teachers Kim, Prabhleen, Reena- they are very supportive and my son is always happy at pick up and drop off. Highly recommended.

Excellent care provider, There's no place we'd rather be. The management and staff always go above and beyond, in our case our son has a sensitive skin so diaper changes will be more than usual and they accomodated our request related to this matter. Although we will be moving to a different daycare due to wife working to a new location. Thank you for taking good care of our son, we'll be forever grateful. Ms. Kim, phrableen, reenah, mandeep, daman, and to the new ladies i can't remember their names.

City Kidz has amazing staff with so much heart and a caring mindset.The educators are affectionate, kind and gentle with the kids. The director is very responsive and takes her time to explain things and is very reliable. Highly recommended!!!

Love this daycare! One of the best daycares I've had any of my children in. The staff are super friendly and caring. They do so many different activities with the kids, my daughter had a blast everyday. They make connection and understanding a priority, both with the parents and the children. Highly, highly recommend!

We really wanted to love this daycare but it fell short. The waitlist process wasn’t fair. They seem to prioritize image and offer spots based on ‘who you know’. It lacked diversity and didn’t promote the right values. Business over the kids. The director was difficult. We found a daycare with a much better culture. Wish we were more informed before a long wait and negative experience.

City West is an outstanding daycare. Every day, I feel so fortunate as a parent to drop my two kids off at a place they love. The educators are so caring and thoughtful with their programming–introducing fun ways to learn. The director is outstanding and the tenure of the staff is long. We love the community feel, and have met so many wonderful kids and parents. I highly recommend City West.

My family went to CWC for 7 years (2 kids) and had nothing but a positive experience. This daycare is the best one I've seen in the city. A few highlights for me: a very strong, caring and attentive staff with very little turnover, an excellent and organized Executive Director and office staff, enhanced ratio in every room, all meals and snacks are provided and prepared on site so as a parent you do not need to pack anything, and excellent outdoor space at the facility with access to what seems like endless options of outdoor parks and ravine. Would highly recommend!

We had a horrible experience. My child was repeatedly hit and ultimately injured by an unruly boy in this daycare due to poor management of his out of control behaviour, even after a history of beating other kids as he went around hitting several girls with me witnessing this during transition visits. When speaking with the director, her response was that this child’s parents were doctors, so she prioritized them over me, and that they knew what they were doing with his behaviour. Unacceptable. Left the impression that the “executive director” priorities image and management pretend language over children’s safety. We complained to the Alberta  government child services, check their records.
City West - what an amazing daycare!! The director, staff members, and teachers go above and beyond. They are incredible! This is truly a special place that has done so much for our family.

I am a child development assistant and I visit many daycares. This one in particular has fantastic staff that really care about the kiddos. There is order and routine in the rooms and it is not chaotic. The children are safe here and they have fun! The director, Bina, is absolutely awesome.  It is a very well run daycare. I would highly recommend this daycare!

My Little one is going on this daycare since January of this year. As a pandemic baby and an only child she’s really attached to us her parents and is not really a social butterfly at first, but everything changes when she started coming here. All the staffs are great and we can see the great care they give to the children. Now, my little one loves to socialize and though she’s a happy baby before,she’s much more now and even better. We are grateful and we appreciate all the staffs of this daycare.
Very friends teachers/educators, I have 2 daughters in their care and the business owner is very helpful and understanding. Always willing to help and go extra mile to help.
My son was there for 3 years ,  people are very kind and friendly, the facility is old they have to do something regarding this issue

All the staff are very professional and amazing at their jobs. My son has made so much growth since he started / they are great with all his medical issues.

The director is very communicative, friendly, very easy to work with and very accommodating of any additional needs !
This daycare I do not recommend, unless you want them abusing your children. Found out they were pinching my 4year old daughters ears! Never again will I put them in that child care facility

My friend referred to this daycare to me. My son has been going to Clareview daycare Centre since January 2020 and I would not be happier! The staff runs an incredible daycare full of love, instruction, and above and beyond the care that is not found in many daycares. Lovely welcomed my son every day he gets there. They took wonderful care of my son. They have been amazing and have always cared so much for him. Given his favourite trinket  (Dinosaur ). The staff is very professional, friendly, and respectful. The director even called to check on my son when he was sick. It is a joy to see my son light up when he sees the teachers. I definitely recommend this daycare to parents looking for a daycare in Clareview.

My kids going to clareview daycare from more than 1 year now, my kids are very happy to go there, staff is very professional, responsive and respectful.Daycare director is very cooperative always ready to help.
We definitely recommend clareview daycare to all the parents who are looking for quality childcare. Believe me you will love it.

Excellent attention to the children, shawing  initiative and motivation to kids to learn and to be able to thing (to draw,to sing to speak,...)the team work have a good communication to the parents,...
It is very neat and clean daycare,staff is very friendly,owners are very co-operative my kids are very happy there.I will strongly recommend this daycare.

without any exageration it is the best daycare ever my daughter was refusing to stay at the old daycare ,but in Clearwater daycare she was happy from her arrival in the morning until her departure and the location is caracterized by high hospitality,and all the teachers are at a high level of professionalism.really thank you very much and i advise everyone in Northside to deal with Clearwater daycare.
Very clean and safe daycare.The owner is careful.
Not good experience…and I won’t even recommend to anyone
Excellent daycare!!!
amazing !!!

Thank you Cornerstone Child Development Centre for helping my son feel welcome from the very first day. Their programming is thorough, based on a each individual child, and developed to enhance the dynamic of the group. Communication is very succinct with the owner and staff, which I can appreciate as a working parent. Even despite the changes we have all faced, the staff maintain their high level of care, cleanliness, and professionalism. I love to see how involved the staff are daily, and I really enjoy hearing my son talk about how much fun he has during his time in the Out of School Care program!

My son was at Cornerstone last year and he really enjoyed his half days before his afternoon kindergarten. I found the team so great - wonderful attention to safety, well-being, great activities.
I was so comfortable with this team I sent my daughter this year. She LOVES daycare and hates missing time there. Such fun learning activities, unique and really helpful to ready them for school. Love these people.

Very satisfied. We are new to Canada, and my kid feels at home. A little reconstruction of her former life and affections happened here.
She loves to spend time with the other kids and always has  positive comments about the the adults working in the Centre.
The management invites the parents to come in with new proposals and involves us in activities to know each other.
After two years we will be  moving to another. neighborhood. We are leaving  the centre with lots of great memories and nothing but gratitude for giving way more than expected.
Cornerstone  Dev Centre made my daughter feel that she was loved and safe.
I recommend it.
And I want to make a special comment to Danielle Lebreton:  you know our kid loves you!  Thank you.

We are clients of Cornerstone after school care and are extremely happy with the centre. The staff are very professional and work very hard to develop programming tailored to the children’s interests. Honestly, pre-Covid, their summer programming was amazing! I have never seen such diverse and interesting activities for the children and I am sure that will return after things get back to normal. The staff really care about the children and are so diligent in ensuring the children’s safety. The staff and owner are extremely responsive and (pre-Covid) hosted parents nights and other events that encouraged communication with parents. They really are great and I wholeheartedly trust them with my child.

The owner of this daycare is completely rude and passive toward the parents. My daughter had went to this daycare and on more than one occasion I could not believe that I was dealing with someone so unprofessional.
The worst was when I had told them that my daughters father is not allowed to pick up my daughter and they said unless they have a court order (unnecessary cost for a single mother) then they will give her to him...they only ever saw him once before and treated me as if he pays for her daycare (haven't seen money from him in years).
They don't have stable location for daycare as the school is constantly reminding them of relocation. They also up costs for whenever they feel they want more money. Horrible do NOT take your children here.

I have been a part of the country club family since 2009. I have NEVER had an issue with any of my 3 children. I was nervous when new management came in a few years ago, but the family vibe and caring staff members have never changed. All of my kids were at the daycare from the baby room to after school care. I have a very close bond with a lot of staff members and have trust in the staff that I don't know as well. I feel that the country club staff have done nothing but assist me in raising my children, and without a doubt, in the most positive way. I wouldn't want to have anyone else watching over my children and as long as my youngest needs daycare, country club it will be!

I highly recommend Country Club Daycare for both daycare and out of school care. I never have to worry about my kids when they are there; the greatest gift anyone could ever give a busy mom. When my dayhome closed her doors to move to Toronto in the middle of the pandemic, I researched several options for care including both dayhomes and daycare options. I chose Country Club above all options. Samantha, the owner, and her team of care givers (teachers including Carrie, Maria, Shania and Gazelle to name a few) are like second moms to my kids. The kiddos love the variety of activities and the morning oatmeal! I love the pick-up/drop-off to school, lunches, outdoor play, and PD Day coverage that is included! Additionally, Samantha was always very diligent about making sure I was receiving the maximum amount of financial support through all government programs. These ladies are exceptional. I could never thank them enough.

If I could give it -100 stars I would. I was recommended it as a very good daycare, but it can't be worse than this. The worst daycare center with incompetent teachers who traumatize children. My child was constantly pushed and beaten by another child, and the teachers did not react or notify me about this situation. I learned about the bullying from my two-year-old child. But the educators kept silent all the time and said that everything was fine, although I asked them more than once if they noticed that my daughter was hurt by another child. My child stopped sleeping at night and started pulling out her hair when she he was nervous. After visiting a psychologist it turned out that my child was traumatized by the experience of attending this kindergarten. These are the most incompetent teachers who do not care about your children at all. They are obliged to provide your child with physical and emotional safety within the walls of the center, but I did not see it. If you want your children to be abused and you know nothing about it - come to this daycare, your child will be traumatized for the rest of their life. I am very disappointed and angry. I thought Canada cared about the safety of your children, but they don't.
The daycare is a very nice one , they take care of my toddler daughter, clean her up regularly give her balanced diet and the daily activities which they engaged her in ,the app is also awesome.❤️

We feel so fortunate to have found this daycare for our sons. We feel so comfortable sending our sons here, they love going to daycare and they do the most wonderful, creative hands on activities with the kids. We love all the special thought the put into the different theme days and holidays. The center is extremely clean and well cared for and the kids get such wonderful, healthy meals. I also love the app they use to share about they day, it is a highlight for us to get pictures of them doing so many fun, enriching activities. Thank you to everyone at Country Club Day Care for taking such good care of our sons. Its such a relief to know they spend them day in a wonderful, caring place.
All of my children have attended this daycare for many years, these are the staff I recommend for any children, they also have a great baby room staff. The staff are amazing here.
My children spent many years at this centre. The staff is like a family environment, inclusive and friendly. Jas goes above and beyond for her staff, the parents and children.

My kids so far have been loving this facility and so have I! Staff is amazing, they have so many fun activities for the kids. And they were willing to work with me for payment.

Five stars well deserved!
They don’t have the patience to take care of a 15 months old baby. They are expecting a very matured behaviour from a baby. I had to find an other day care for my baby and he is very happy now.
In my opinion, this is the best daycare in Millwoods. The staff is amazing and they care for your children to the best of their abilitys.

My kids love this daycare! They are enjoying all the summer activities and trips. Staff are very professional and they are always helpful. I personally love the fact that it is a family owned daycare and the entire family is involved on a daily basis.  I did my homework and this is by far one of the best daycares in the area! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for childcare.
My boys have been there a couple weeks so far!! And so far my oldest has no complaints!! My baby is to small to say!! As for me they all seem very nice the owner is amazing!!
My little guy loves the time he spends here. They all seem great. My son seems to be learning something new everyday. Thank you.
great daycare very reliable staff clean space
Great place that’s run by great people.

I couldn't be happier with Creekwood Daycare! The staff is incredibly attentive, caring, and experienced. My daughter loves going there every day, which puts my mind at ease. The facility is clean, safe, and designed to stimulate kids' learning and creativity. They offer a well-rounded curriculum that combines education and playtime, and I appreciate the regular updates I receive about my daughter's activities. I highly recommend Creekwood Daycare to any parent looking for a nurturing and enriching environment for their little ones.

My daughter attended Creekwood from when they opened in 2021 until August 2023. We are very excited for our new adventures as a family however; saying goodbye to these wonderful people is not easy. Trusting someone else to care for your child brings on a lot of stress and anxiety for a lot of parents. I remember attending Creekwood’s open house prior to their official start up. As we toured the facility, something inside me said “this feels like a good match for our family.” I’m glad I trusted my gut because I could not have been more right. Our daughter was well cared for, made many great friends, learned so much and was always greeted with a big smile. The facility is well kept and clean. The staff always have fun and engaging learning opportunities planned. Words can express how much we would recommend Creekwood. Thank you to all the staff for making a difference in our daughter’s life.

My daughter has been going here for the past two weeks. She loves the daycare and the transition was much smoother than I anticipated. I love how well-maintained the daycare is and how welcome we feel walking in everyday! The staff have all been amazing and accommodating in every way possible!

I feel like we hit the lottery with Creekwood Daycare. As all parents are, I was very nervous sending my one-year-old to daycare. The transition couldn’t have been any smoother and I felt immediate confidence with the staff and educators. Fast forward a year and we are beyond happy. Our daughter has built relationships with her educators and fellow children and it has been so much fun to watch. They are always coming up with creative activities and it’s amazing to see how she learns something new each day. The educators are unbelievable and do such an amazing job with the children in each and every room. Communication is excellent. All concerns are addressed away and the educators do a great job of keeping parents updated throughout the day. Our daughter leaves in a great mood, with a smile on her face, every day. I can’t recommend them enough and I feel so lucky to have her attending Creekwood Daycare!

We started at Creekwood in December with our one year old daughter and couldn’t be happier with her care. This transition was so hard on myself and our daughter but the ladies that work in the infant room are so kind, providing lots of updated and great communication. I know she is in good hands. Now a little over a month into daycare we have no tears and our daughter is so excited to go everyday. The facility is always clean, warm and everyone is very welcoming!

My fiance and I love Curious Learners daycare.  When we needed a daycare for our little guy Brady, we looked at a couple of places.  For how convenient at the time it was great but even after my fiance and I have had a few different jobs over the years it's still great!

When we knew we were going to be working elsewhere we did take a look at other daycares.  Holy cow!  Curious Learners is hands down better than anything I've seen.  Learners' makes those other daycares look like prison cells with a few toys scattered around!

Our little guy is safe and comfortable at Learners'.  They've been there from just a little guy that could barely crawl to a rambunctious, incredibly chatty toddler.  The staff are all amazing!  And I know Brady is going to miss them terribly when his time over there has concluded.  I'm pretty sure I'm going to miss them too.

Having our son go to daycare for the first time was a scary thought for us as first-time parents but Tammy and her staff at this facility have made the process as seamless as possible. We have loved the experience and have been amazed at how much our son has flourished under their care. They offer tons of options from full to part-time and are very respectful to accommodating new parent needs. Most importantly they have made our entire family feel supported during our transition to daycare. Couldn't recommend this facility enough. The focus on fresh air, fresh food and learning in an incredible environment with the incredible staff has been a joy to be part of. After searching and touring many facilities we were utterly impressed with their handbook, and commitment to child care and feel lucky to have joined this beautiful new facility as we look forward to the future.

One of the most important decisions we’ve ever made was choosing this daycare …which gave us peace-of -mind leaving our children there every day in a place which allowed them to thrive! This has been our experience at Curious Learners.

The Director, Tammy Yulo, is a phenomenally dedicated, knowledgeable, nurturing and caring professional with a unique vision for the Centre.  She fearlessly leads her team of loving supportive educators/staff. We appreciate that there is constant feedback and communication. They even display and share insightful stories in the Centre of growth, experiences and interactions of the children and staff. These are happy such things to see.

We signed on after speaking with Tammy as she immediately was interested in sharing her experience and experiences to help our children. One of the main goals was making life easier at home with the daycare helping with transitions. We toured the facility and she instantly bonded with them and they with her, feeling very comfortable playing there for the first time. She made it a great experience.

The daycare gem is a newly-opened, spacious and well-maintained facility which is constantly improving. Located near a nice park/playground/spray park, it is in an ideal location. There is also a rooftop play area as well. The children enjoy healthy, nutritious home-cooked meals and snacks which are included. Staff are extremely diligent on cleaning and sanitizing all environments. Children are respected and assisted to progress with their best interest, independence and development in mind. They are helped to reach their potential.

Our kids love going there every day. They have their own special place that is safe, healthy, educational, loving and nurturing which allows them to progress and be kids at their own pace with the staff and other children. They and we look upon everyone as a second family. Our kids are flourishing at Curious Learners and I would not hesitate for a moment to recommend them!

Our five year old daughter has loved going to this daycare from her first day! The staff have been so welcoming and I've been so impressed by the quality of care all the kids receive (including gluten free meals made from scratch!). The location is convenient as well...I would highly recommend this daycare for anyone looking for high quality childcare in Edmonton.

My daughter started attending this daycare on March 1st, 2021. It is a brand new daycare in a very convenient location. The centre is beautiful and has a very calming atmosphere and there is also a very impressive rooftop play space that my daughter loves! The director (Tammy) is very passionate about her vision for her daycare and she is friendly and easy to talk to. Within one week, I have seen positive changes in my daughter and she is learning a lot. She is eating foods I have battled with her to eat at home, she is learning how to zip up her jacket and so much more! All within the first few days. I am excited to see how she will learn and grow over the next few months. I am also excited about the kindergarten program that this centre is planning to provide. All in all I am glad I took the leap of faith in trying out this daycare. My daughter has attended a few daycares and I hope to make this her permanent one.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!  all the teachers and the director are so caring towards my two boys. My kids are always excited to go to the daycare! Also, the daycare center is super clean.
Great clean facility.. Staff is friendly and great with my overly shy niece.. Highly recommend Curious Minds Daycare..
Perfect everything Environment and staffs respectful.

This daycare is the best! I started at this daycare when I was 4 and aged out at 12, and now 10 years later my son is starting here and they still have the same morals and commitment to keeping your kids safe. I wouldn't trust any other daycare as much as I trust this one. The teachers are amazing with my son and his transition into daycare, and the communication between the staff and me is great!

My daughter has been going to this daycare for 6 months. She had a traumatic experience at a previous daycare. The transition with this one was smooth because of the experienced and knowledgeable staff. The communication between the staff and I on my child’s day and behaviour is transparent for my daughter’s development. I personally feel confident in the quality care.

I would stay far away from this place my daughter went there for around 6 months and the stuff that happened and we seen is unspeakable they got shut down for mold during this time as well. We walk in one morning and Mrs Linda is telling a kid to be Quiet stop singing abc`s it's to early to be singing. your working  at a daycare why you telling kids they cant singing first thing in the morning that is very wrong Mrs Linda is the mom of the owner and we have had nothing but problems with her she keeps suggesting we put our 4 year old on medication because she can't handle her or just plain out doesn't want to put in the work we put in a complaint on her over 2 weeks ago and they still have no answers or refuse to do anything Linda just needs to go home she is a horrible person and should not be watching children

Finding a daycare that we can trust and will TRULY CARE for our kids is imperative for me and my husband. We chose DaLy Grove as I can say from our experience, that they have  the qualities of a good caregiver. I love the staffs dedication, and how they ensure every child meets their needs. The patience, encouragement, and care that we are receiving for our daughter who has special needs have such a positive impact and I am forever grateful for that. Thank you for welcoming our family. Moreover, I am confident to recommend Daly Grove to any parent who wants their kid/s to be in a loving, caring, safe and educational environment.

This daycare is  amazing place! Very clean with great staff and very welcoming. My child have been going here for 6 years and  I have never had a problem with any of the staff or owners .
I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. Please keep on the great job that you ladies do.

It was the best daycare ever.  Wonderful teachers. Very clean , organized.  Learning experience fun and my kid learned all kindergarten program in Kolobok preschool and now he is on top of things is school. Teachers helped with potty training with my younger one as well. Director is on top of things and organizes holiday events, birthday parties, and more.

I can’t recommend this daycare enough. We toured a few other facilities and walked away feeling impressed but something was missing for us.

When we toured Kolobok, we were very happy with the educational program, AND could also feel their genuine warmth for the kids and their love of early childhood education. It made us immediately comfortable leaving our child here.

When you walk in, you see happy kids, happy teachers and happy assistants. The staff have all been there for a long time, and I think both of those things speak to the positive environment here.

We all want our kids to be in a safe and positive place, and feel loved when we can’t be with them. This is that place for our child.

Thank you Kolobok!

I can’t express how wonderful staff is at this daycare, it’s basically home environment away from  the home. They definitely take care of little ones, they do so many fun things with them, if you are looking for fun, creative, safe, caring, hands on childcare this is a place to send your little one. They cleaning and organization skills are outstanding. My daughter still cherish and remembers her daycare days 🙏thank you guys 🙏 I do RECOMMEND this daycare to any parent who is looking for something more then just a daycare 🙏

Amazing teachers, very clean classrooms.

They helped with potty training my son, he has so much fun when he's there. Love getting all the photos and seeing the amazing improvement in him every day!

After doing a tour at several facilities, I didn't have a doubt Kolobok would be the best choice for my son! It gave me the best 1st impression out of all the other ones I've researched. The cleanliness, the organization and the program they provide for the kids are amazing!  The facility is well maintained, the staff are really competent and courteous, the security system is great and  the discipline is definitely noticeable. Thank you Kolobok team for the great work!

My daughter started at this daycare after we moved here from BC in December. Her very first day she went, within 10 minutes she was comfortable and already off on her own exploring and making friends. I was so nervous for her as we had already had such a big change but she has been so happy at Delton that I couldn't have wished for anything better,  she is so comfortable with the teachers and loves all here friends! Thank you guys for all you do taking care of our tiny humans when we can't. 💞

The owner is involved and aware of what is going on. The staff love their jobs. My child is always happy learning so much. They take photos to show what they do in the day. Very open communication, really friendly staff. I just love this daycare for my son.

My daughter loves attending daycare on the daily. She's been attending for a month, and feels so accepted and loved. I love hearing about her days, they keep her occupied and have so many fun little activities!
I'm so happy with my decision for choosing this daycare.

Literally love this daycare so much and the staff! My boys also love it and all the staff there 🥰♥️
Thank you Delton Daycare for always being so caring for all of the kids and also being so amazing to the parents ♥️

A great daycare with lots of activities to aid children learning and development. I took my child to this place from another daycare and I have loved it from the first day. The owner have listening ears and the teachers love what they do. My daughter is always happy here
Great school. Great teachers and super supporting staff.
Great school with amazing teachers and the principal and vice principal are also amazing. The children are all so very nice and polite. I'm happy to say my son goes to this school.
I've met beautiful people from the admin, teachers, EA's, custodian plus the fun loving cute 100 voices children.
We love school and I will miss my best friends and my teacher miss Harvey and I will never forget them🥹🥹
St. Vladimir is a fantastic school with a great community behind it.

This daycare is a BAD daycare.Most of the Filipino staff run this daycare,who do not have any knowledge,no manners.When they walk in the hallway, me and my so many friends listened Filipino staffs are shouting with children. Great service, patient staff and welcoming services
My kids love this place. Milan and the staff take care of kids like at home.
very good day care ,my kids love it.
This place is TERRIBLE I dont recommend sending your kids here my oldest daughter once came home crying because she did nothing wrong
A hidden gem. The kids love this place!

This center is a family style childcare center that helps children with their learning and skills all while having fun. They encourage the children’s learning through a wide variety of activities both indoors and out. Nutritious snacks are provided. My daughter absolutely loves going to this daycare. The staff is wonderful and they build a great relationship with the children and their families. I highly recommend this center to all families.
Professional Staff. My children feel so happy in this daycare. The welcoming staff make feel my children safe.
Awesome daycare! The staff are friendly and helpful. My kids enjoyed their time there!

Excellent service, even the babysitters are professional, polite and knowledgeable. My kids love being a place. They also improve my little one's level of French, crafts, painting and other activities
This is a good daycare. workers are great.  My daughter went dare for almost 2 years and she learns a lot of things, which makes her ready for kindergarten. The owner is very human.

My Grandson goes to this daycare for 1.5 yrs now. Most important to me is he feels loved and loves to be at this daycare. It’s a warm and inviting atmosphere where the children appear comfortable and cared for. I don’t have any other daycare experience to compare it too ... except how well my grandson is doing.

We have been bringing our son to this day care for almost 2 years now and our son loves the ladies who work there.  The owner, Josee is really hands on and it's a comfort to me that she cares so much about the kids.

We've sent our son to this daycare for multiple years now.  It's a small business run by a very sweet and caring woman, and staffed by similarly caring ladies.  If you live or work in the area, I'd suggest checking them out.
Our daughter has been here for almost a year now and she absolutely loves it! Providers are warm, friendly and welcoming. They work tirelessly and that's appreciated!

I have nothing but but positive reviews for Discovery Nest. As a first time parent, my partner and I looked into multiple daycare and day home establishments. None gave as good a first impression as Discovery Nest. The facility is well laid out, well equipped, clean, and welcoming. The entire staff is friendly, responsive, and seem to have made a genuine connection with our child.

Discovery Nest uses the Brightwheel app to keep us informed of activities throughout the day -  we're informed of his nap lengths, what his meals are and how much is eaten, and all potty events. It keeps communication regarding needed supplies and upcoming activities very straightforward and easy to keep track of. Best of all, we get activity updates and photos throughout the day.

Most importantly, though, our child is excited to go to daycare. He's happy when we pick him up, and lights up at the sight of the employees when we drop him off (he's under 2yrs so no direct feedback from him yet!). He is picking up skills, language, and positive behaviors that constantly surprise us. There is an obvious emphasis on education of the children.

I wholeheartedly recommend Discovery Nest to any family looking for a daycare.

UPDATE: Four years have passed, and our little one has now moved on into kindergarten. We're only a week into the transition, but that time has given me much more appreciation for everything Discovery Nest has done for him. He is thriving! There were no tears at the first drop-off. He was excited, eager, and ready to be there. On his first day, he mediated a dispute between two other children ("they needed to take turns, so I got a timer"). We've received very positive feedback from his educators - he's friendly, polite, attentive, and a joy to have in the class. Now, I'd love for my partner and I to take all the credit for that, but it's painfully obvious that the skills that have set him up best are the ones he learned at daycare.
Scarlett, Gloria, and the rest of the fantastic team there - THANK YOU!

I can not say enough positive things about Discovery Nest!!! Starting daycare with a child that was born at the start of the covid pandemic was an uncomfortable feeling but Discovery Nest staff were so kind, thoughtful and professional. The daycare facility has a homely feel, the staff are happy and so caring and warm towards the children. My girl loves attending she is encouraged to learn new skills and enjoys the activities which are always varied, child centered and purposeful. The communication is also fantastic, I'm always kept upto date on my child's day and to be able to see the photos during my working breaks gives me a smile. Thank you Discovery Nest!!!!

My daughter loves her daycare and couldn’t wait to see her educator and friends everyday. Ruw and Scarlet are both very professional. I can see that they care about kids. They have different activities everyday for kids to explore the world. They also summarize each day and communicate through an APP with parents. Discovery Nest is one of the best daycare in Edmonton. I really appreciate their work and have recommended to my friends!

We love sending our son to discovery nest! They are organized, friendly and caring. We appreciate how well the communicate with us and let us know about all the fun activities they have planned. Our son is learning loads and never wants to leave when we go to pick him up! I can tell that the staff really care about the children there. Would highly recommend this daycare!

We truly feel privileged to have found Discovery Nest Early Learning Centre. The Directors are responsive, organized, and very kind. They communicate quickly with parents, and I always trust that my child is in very good hands. The programming is evidence-based, contemporary, varied, and puts the child’s learning and wellness first. Everyday is filled with developmentally appropriate activities (with environmentally friendly materials) that are inclusive and diverse. The language and problem-solving strategies that are used with the children are similarly intentional and thoughtful. The activities are then posted regularly on an app, thus helping parents feel connected to the Centre. The Directors/Educators ask for parental input into the activities and are so responsive to feedback. Guidelines and regulations are rigorously thought-out and make us feel safe even in a pandemic. Our kiddo loves having new adventures and dare I say sleeps/eats better at the Nest than at home! Thank you to the educators for your hard work, dedication, and genuine care for our children!
Am not sure what they teach and how they care about students. Kids were left with less supervision in the Recess. I highly recommend to watch out.

Hello I was in this school before  the teachers here are really mean and racist but there is one teacher i hate ms cowell she is really mean and racist one time i went to the bathroom she said i was going in the school outer bounds
My daughter has been going here for a year now have had such a positive experience she loves it and can’t wait for her sister to join her we have had no issues

The teachers are very nice the only thing is some of the teaches are sort of mean like yelling at children and there is a small bullying problem but other than that its a great school
The teachers are very nice and grateful im moving to duggan great school u gotta go to this school

I look back only two months ago, with my heightened anxiety of my 11 year old starting a new school in a new country. It didn't help that he was special needs and a non-verbal.The most horrific thoughts would come to my mind knowing that he wouldn't be able to communicate with his new teachers and share with me his day. Rideau Park has been a magical intervention straight from the Heavens above for him. Its like God especially hand picked a team of exceptional human beings to take care of him and shape his weaknesses into strengths and his strengths into power. I am sure you must wonder how I am writing this review in just two months of him being part of the system... its because in just two months my child comes home as a calm , organized child. Empowered with sign language that I could never have imagined him to be using and comprehending. The wisdom, patience and experience that these three ladies exhilarate is beyond words. (didn't share their names as i hadn't taken permission from the school)The endless energy they exhilarate is almost infectious. Having them in my son's life i feel he can conquer anything .They have opened unlimited possibilities with their knowledge. A small school driven only by passion, kindness and remarkable attention to detail. Just what any special needs would require. Indebted for life!!

Attended here for elementary from 2004-2011. I was enrolled in the German bilingual program which is definitely the selling point of the school. I enjoyed the teachers I had for all grades and the education I received in both languages.
I love this school they keep the students safe they have a big park every one is nice there all of the teachers the students I love this school I suggest this school for you
