Awesome staff, very carying and due to the fact that it is a small school altogether, teachers pay extra attention on each and every student's indivudual needs and help them where needed. I recommend it with all my heart!
Went there in the mid to late 80's such great memories and the teachers especially Mrs Patterson were amazing I sure she is long retired but they made school a fun learning experience.

I went here in grade 2 and I'm just now realizing  how messed up this school is .when i went they taught Christianity even though they where apart of epsb. my family and i are not religious but had to go to that school and did not really think of it because is was apart of epsb. I think me not having the same beliefs had huge impact on my experience at that school. my teacher at the time really did not like me and i was not bad kid sure i wasn't perfect but i was i grade two. i sat outside of the class almost everyday and got in trouble a lot which i have never really experience other than this school. kids even bullied me and once someone stole something from my backpack and instead of trying to figure who it was she got mad at me and i had to stay in for recess i was. another time i got in huge trouble was when i accidently said oh my god and a lot of people from my class started to be mean but my teacher yelled at me and said she was going to call my parents over such a small thing i understand how that can be disrespectful but i was in grade 2. this was all a while ago but i really hope this school mainly my teacher to teach students with respect.

My children have attended here for several years. The staff are fantastic, and the building is gorgeous. The playground and fields are well kept, and there are lots of bus stops nearby to get to and from here for kids and parents. I love that it is a small school and my kids are not lost in a sea of faces. The staff know them by name and will always greet them with a smile and a kind comment or question. I can call the office and chat with the principal or admin if I ever have any issues, and they are always friendly and supportive. I know my kids are well taken care of here physically, spiritually, and academically.
I have my two boys enrolled at this school and will suggest anyone moving into the area and you got kids, make sure you make this school your first stop

My family and I love this daycare (my kids especially). The staff are very caring and work hard to care for the children. They cater to every child and treat them like family. I'll choose them any day.

My 2 year old is so happy to attend Discoveryland. We love the workers and all their hard work they put into everyday activities. My little one learned how to count to 20, and her ABC’s! Something she didn’t learn at home. I’ve noticed an enormous improvement in her from before she started daycare, until now. I can’t thank the workers enough. She’s a happy child!

This daycare is absolutely amazing! Alecia and all of the workers are fantastic. We have been struggling to find a good daycare for our son as the transition from day home to daycare and school has been extremely difficult for him. We came here stressed and helpless and explained everything we were dealing with to Alecia. We left there feeling confident that they cared about children and that they would do their best to help him be successful. Since he’s been there  we have noticed major improvements, he has started to feel more confident and we can tell he’s growing fond of the workers and building trust with them. It’s been a difficult and at times a stressful process, but they always make sure to let us know of all of the positive things he’s achieved that day. Thank you all so much for giving him the time of day and to continue to work with him! We appreciate it more than words can describe

Our daughter has attended Discovery Land Daycare for the past 2 years. It is an amazing daycare, full of activities and constant fun and learning. The summer schedule is incredible. They take the kids everywhere! Never a dull moment.  I cannot say enough good things about our experience. All I see are smiles from our girl when I pick her up. She even gives me trouble for picking her up too soon as shes having fun with her buddies :0)

My two boys attended this daycare for the past year (ages 2 and 4). I can't give the staff and program enough praise. My boys learned so much while attending this daycare, I couldn't believe it when my 3 year old came home able to clearly write his name! I also definitely didn't teach my (just turned) 2 year old to count to ten. I couldn't believe my ears when he came home one day counting everything! The staff are simply wonderful. They were so helpful at drop off and pick up, and I could tell they genuinely cared for my children. Our experience here was 100% positive and I would recommend this centre to anyone!
My Daughter went there for 2year, such a nice place with caring staff and management.
Great staff!
Have nice parking,playground  and its clean daycare and multicultural kids.
My kids grown up here

This school’s Performance has really gone downhill, not impressed with the teachers and how they let some students get away with tormenting others. It’s really sad when the reason why your little sister doesn’t want to go to school is because the other kids are mean to her all day.

When I went here as a younger kid, some of the lunch supervisors/daycare workers were just downright abusive. The daycare staff made it so You had to eat every single bite of food in your lunch. They would also raise their voices often, which startled me. As for lunch supervisors, to this day they still don’t care about the kids, they’re just around to make sure they’re quiet. One even frequently told me and my class to shut up! We were second graders. Even though this all happened almost a decade ago, it still infuriates me.

Tragic.

I went here for 2 years (2012-2014). This school does not care about your children, and as one reviewer stated; the daycare staff are abusive.

If your child is being bullied, or is a bully, nothing will be done about it. The staff seem to think that a call to the office is enough to resolve any and all issues the students may have. And as a former child, and attendee of this school, i can safely say; It’s not.

If you care about your kids, do not send them to Duggan Elementary.

Genuinely great school with very kind teachers. Mrs. Smith (My personal favorite) Has been understanding and supportive of every student I know. Was there since 3rd grade and moved out in the 6th but I made really great friends there that I still hang out till this day (3 to be specific) and I've made some great memories here. Recommend that you guys pick this school it is filled with great people and a great environment!

My son went there for Kindergarten 2017-2018.  First off, the Principal (Mr. Hess) and Assistant (Mrs. Stainer) are outstanding.  When registering my son, they were so helpful and friendly.  Honestly, the administration gets 5 stars easily.  They were always on the ball and ran the office very smoothly. The Kindergarten teacher (Mrs. RK) was fantastic, very patient and knowledgeable - also 5 stars.  The curriculum she taught and ideas she had were fun and engaging for the kids.  I can't say enough good things about the staff here.
This school breeds bullies. A few teachers seem to love bullying as well. Not a safe environment.
Didn’t wear mask upon entering for the first time and the lady told me not come back again. Worst experience ever. I didn’t even say a word 😶
Nice place for kids

It’s one of the best decisions we perhaps made to our child into this day care. Not only are the staff here knowledgeable but also caring and the good part is they are all happy. A happy care giver will always have the enthusiasm to give their best so their passion towards helping kids reflects in their day to day work. My child gets to do a lot of activities here and most of the time returns happy 😃. If I start sharing the list of good things that has happened here probably will cross word limit. We are thankful to the educators for making potty training seamless. The total time taken was hardly a month since our child started going to the daycare. Ms. Sherry the current director is a very good manager and well aware of all the work that is going on under her supervision. Every staff probably feels the vibe and gives their best. We shall also be indebted to Ms. Vanessa, Ms. Angy, Ms. Brittany and Ms. Christina and everyone (I may not know the names of sorry) but who are involved from cleaning to preparing food and imparting fun filled play bases lessons and STEAM activities for all kids there. One other good thing to observe is that Edmonton’s weather is so unpredictable. However I feel relaxed to even know that the educators will have a perfect plan in mind to switch between outdoor and indoor activities for which touchwood very few children fall sick on a regular basis unlike other day cares we tried before. A BIG THANK YOU 🙏🏻 to all! Much love and respect ✊ please continue with your good work. Because it’s such a reliable support team depending on whom a parent can go to work with the inner confidence that their child won’t be neglected when they are not around to look after in person. Thanks 🙏🏻

Our child marked the last day at this extraordinary daycare center at the end of last month due to our relocation. We feel compelled to share our experience and express our gratitude for the incredible care our little one has received. From day one, we were welcomed by a team of caring, understanding, and dedicated staff members. They created a warm, positive, and welcoming atmosphere that not only made our child feel secure and comfortable, but also fostered a sense of belonging. We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to Sherry and the entire team. The memories formed here will undoubtedly remain with our child.

My wife and I were hesitant to put our child into a daycare, that was until we found the Early Learning Childcare Center.  I can not say enough about how amazing their staff is.  Every day they plan an in-depth activity for the kids, things like obstacle courses, building a volcano, or bringing in guests like a dentist to talk about why their teeth are important.  Their days are filled with playing, and hands-on learning ensuring they are building the skills that will help them succeed once they enter kindergarten and beyond.

Such a warm, welcoming, loving environment. The staff are amazing and I never had any concerns leaving my child with them. We received daily updates and photos. My little one was always excited at drop-off!

My daughter has been at ELC for the past two years and I can’t recommend them enough. Having family overseas, I can say the educators and the director truly are my village. They go above and beyond to accommodate whatever necessities, questions and issues we might have at home. They even helped me potty train my daughter before I had my baby this past February since I was having a hard time on my own. They make you feel welcome as soon as you walk in the door and I’m certainly enrolling my new baby over there when the time comes.

My daughter attends York school, and as an Educational Assistant that has worked in over 25 schools in the Northeast division, I can say that York has something special.  I cannot say enough good things about the school, the teachers and staff, and the sense of community contributed by the parents and students. My daughter has two years to go and is already so sad at the thought of leaving. I have experienced York both as a parent, but also as a working staff member. It has been a wonderful experience.
Although there is a lot of drama, this school is very funny and nice and the teachers are cool
I dont like this school, people here are very rude.
I really like this school

Such a fabulous daycare. A true hidden gem. Sarafina is a very warm, knowledgeable and approachable director. The staff in both the infant/toddler and school age rooms are phenomenal and bring such a wonderful energy. I truly feel like I’m part of a team there when it comes to raising my child. After being disappointed from a previous daycare in the city, this one has ticked all of our boxes! I would recommend it to anyone. We are very happy here.

One of the best daycares in the city. Amazing service and staff are the most caring individuals who want the best for your child. I could not recommend more. There are amazing art projects and tons of learning experiences. I cannot emphasize how great the staff are and how your kids will be well looked after. My kids attended for 3 years and they have had great experiences here. Take the time to meet their people and you too will see that it is an excellent daycare to send your kids too.

My wife and I have been very pleased with the care and education our children have received at this day care over the past 3 years. The staff are well educated themselves and most have been with the centre for many years. This retention speaks to positive environment, reliability of the staff and the ability to build trust with each of them. They genuinely care about each kid and really like their job.

The staff is always warm and kind to my child.
The access they have to multiple parks, a gym for very cold days, and when in preschooler class access to a pool, is amazing. I love the emphasis they place on getting the kids playing outdoors and engaged in activities that are meaningful.
During COVID times they hired an extra cleaner and over 18 months in no COVID break outs or any other infectious disease break outs.
The combination of facilities and a group of child educators that really care about the kids can not be beat.

It’s an inspiring environment for little ones to be exposed to healthcare situations and professionals. My daughter is already thinking that she’s “working” in Glenrose while I worked in Alex! Try their contingency program if you want to try out. Let’s show our children what’s their “real” futures looks like. Many thanks to the educators despite of the ongoing pandemic, their flexibility with day to day changes makes our little ones’ life pretty normal in Glenrose daycare.
Wonderful place. Everyone is easy to talk to, with wonderful staff. The centre is up to accreditation standards and uses the FLIGHT curriculum framework.
Caring staff, accountable people.
Very good daycare

EMS is an exceptional Montessori school that I highly recommend. The friendly and professional staff create a supportive environment where my daughter has improved academically and socially. The teachers really care about each student, fostering independence and curiosity. Thanks to their dedication, my daughter has developed critical thinking skills and increased self-confidence. We wholeheartedly recommend this school to any parent seeking an outstanding learning environment for their child. Thanks a lot Miss Wendy and all the amazing staff.🫶

My son loves coming to his school. He had an absolutely wonderful time at EMS .
Wendy and other teachers are professional, caring, and very attentive to my energetic boy. He learn new things every class and I could see the progressive positive development in him.
The school is beautifully laid out, tidy and well organized. If you're searching for a good preschool, I highly recommend this place.

Great great pre school. I daughter is going to summer camp there right now. They played lots of educational games, musical games, and do lots of crafts and exercises every day. The most surprising thing is they are teaching Chinese words, and my daughter came home showed me how to write some easy Chinese characters. Highly  recommend!

my daughter is studying here,  what i like the school including below:
easy parking,

easy to drive to this school.

it has two gates so the parents can stay warm when they pick up kids.

kids are happy in the school.  my kids talks about the school for 2 hours after coming back because there are so many new things.  for example,  they have magic show,  coloring the T shirts,  cooking cookie,  etc.

the teachers are friendly, patient,  flexible.  for example,  my daughter missed the T shirt coloring,  then Wendy pick up another time to make up the project only for 3 kids.

the classroom is very big,

the school location is very safe,

the teachers are experienced.

Great place. I was hesitate to send my son there before because it is new, but when I visit  the teacher and the palace. I feel comfortable to put him there. Teachers are kind and nice, a lot fun activities, place is clean, parents get kids report/message to understand what they learn and what the kids improved.
Best out of school in Canada with the greatest staffs ever!!!!

Horrible day care system , absolutely can not do drop in other than waiting for a whole day response to check if there is space or not . Pretty much management doesn’t care about part time or drop in attendance . They would literally tell you that they will give u the response whenever they feel like it . They would just give you the worst treatment .Same way they would treat ur part time kid in the day care not like others . Worst day care ever !

It’s wonderful seeing our Son get excited about going to daycare here. He started at age 3 and still going. Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. The teachers really make an effort to engage the kids and develop them in a very individualized way. The management is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment and we’re very thankful to the whole team for treating us like family. I highly recommend sending your children to Edu-care Daycare. :)

Edu-Care Daycare welcomed us with open arms 4 years ago and now are part of our extended family. My daughters love the Educators and many activities they get to participate in. They certainly go above and beyond for my children. We can always rely on them for support and understanding. I consider us very fortunate to be part of such a wonderful community.

I enrolled my daughter here starting in August 2021, her best friend also attends.
They had previously been in another daycare together that was so expensive, amongst other things. Edu-care staff have been great since day 1. They have made my daughter love going to daycare, she comes home excited to tell me about her day, and to show me her art work!! I love the Facebook group that allows me to see photos of all the fun things that they do.
I am so happy with the decision to enroll her :)
Thank you edu-care 😊

Michelle and her amazing team at Educare daycare are one of the most compassionate, inclusive and professional team I have ever met. They are a high quality educators that strive to met the needs and goals of every child that comes to their daycare.

Our daughter has been going to Educare since January 2021. Throughout  the pandemic, the staff have been communicative and supportive. The staff in the toddler room have created a kind, engaging and fun environment that our daughter looks forward to going to each day.

We love Educademy! They truly take the time to understand your children, their needs and special “isms” as well as ensuring you as a parent are taken care of as well.  They are very structured but also encourage your children to be independent. The staff makes you feel as if you are leaving your children with family. The food is excellent, the toys are fun and the learning based activities they come up with are fantastic! Both my children learn so much each day. We consider ourselves lucky to have stumbled across such a fantastic second home.

AMAZING is an understatement to describe how Carla and all the staff take care of the kids. As a first-time Mom, leaving my daughter to other people is the hardest, but knowing how Educademy treats, handles , and nurtures  my daughter has been such a great relief. They provide  great activities and delicious food for the kids. The facility is safe, and always clean.They keep the parents updated in everything. My daughter is always  so happy to be at the centre. I would highly recommend Educademy !

After several childcare situations that didn't work out, we were so relieved to find Educademy. We love everything about it. Staff are amazing and really connected with my child. Delicious meals made from scratch, a beautiful facility, and a really great selection of high quality toys. Lots of open ended play opportunities. The daily updates in their app are reassuring and fun to open throughout the day. Admin are so welcoming when you arrive, and know their stuff! I'd 100 percent recommend Educademy to anyone looking for high quality childcare in the south east.

There are too many wonderful things to say about this place, which isn't often what I write in a google review. ha ha. In all seriousness, the staff are fantastic and wonderful. They are attentive, great communicators, creative with the activities, fluid where they need to be and above all calm. Even though my girl may not always want me to leave, I don't have any concerns leaving her in their hands to head to work. The transition was a great process and the timing with going back to work was perfect for this first time mom. Very clean and well organized facility. Carla runs a great ship! Would highly recommend this place to friends and family.

I cannot thank the staff enough for the amazing care they provide for my 2 children. My children have learnt so much from the staff and they are always creating new and fun ways to learn. The facility is always clean and organized. The staff are friendly and caring to all the children. Great communication! I go to work everyday knowing my kids are in great hands! Best day care ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
The daycare workers are very caring, the owner is very sweet and helpful. My four year old son is happy here.
It teach children Arabic
The best school ever !

Our children attended Eduplay from Sept 2022 until we moved in July 2023. Freya in the infant room was so kind and gentle and made our kids feel loved everyday.  We were nervous when they moved up to the toddler room,  but Alecia took great care in planning fun activities that really helped our children to grow and learn new things.  The director Vanessa greeted me every morning and knows the children intimately.  All the staff knew our children well and took the time to care for them as individuals.

One improvement I would suggest is to get a communication app so that parents can follow along with their children throughout the day.

My children were always happy and excited to head to daycare and we really enjoyed our time there.  Thank you Eduplay!

My very strong willed 2 y/o son goes here and the staff are amazing with him. They are accessible if you have question or concern. They work with you if you have any specificities that your child needs and everyone is very genuine and kind. I highly recommend.

My son started going here when he was 4 months old the staff is amazing and very kind hearted highly recommend only reason why we’re leaving is because we’re moving other than that it’s a great daycare ! If your thinking of putting your child here you should the staff are great and you will see great development with your children thanks again to everyone at edu play - Lindsay and family

It was a hard decision for us to make to send our youngest to daycare. But the director here was very approachable and informative. She really helped us with the process into daycare. My son still cries when I drop him off but he’s playing and happy when dad picks him up. And he seems to have gotten the hang of the routine at daycare. The staff are all very cheerful and knows the kids by names. I know he is well taken care of while we are at work. His teacher comforts him every morning when I drop him off to make him feel better. I’m so glad we decided on this daycare.

It’s a new daycare but I would highly recommend 👍🏻

I highly recommend this daycare! My daughter moved out from her former daycare with a bad experience. Took a chance on this new daycare and glad we made the right choice! Teachers are friendly and nice, and I like how they plan out daily activities for kids to get busy into every day! Kudos also to Teacher Alicia for taking care of my daughter!

Unsafely crossed through intersection with children in the morning.  Started walking into intersection with children at split second light turned green without confirming my car was at a full stop, had to slam my car breaks to avoid collision.  Would never bring my children here.

This out of school center has the most rude director with the kids and parents. Can not deal with any problem wisely. Not professional at all. Even the teachers very strong with the kids. Made my kid very coward and negative because of so much blaming for every tiny thing.

Very clean and well maintained. Spacious rooms. Secure entry with key fobs. Management and staff are helpful and professional.

Kids at Ellerslie school walk about 5 min to the OSC. Lots of different activities for the summer months.

Easiest payment option is monthly auto withdrawal.

I have my kids in the OSC for the last 3 years and I can’t say enough good things about this place. The owners are extremely reasonable and the teachers are caring and awesome. The activities and services are top notch!!
My child has been going to this daycare for more than 5 years now, it's been a great experience for her. Staff are nice and very helpful same with their Director.

I recommend this daycare to everyone I know! The staff is fabulous and always super clean. I've been with them since 2014 and have never had an issue. Both my girls went here and always loved going into daycare. I love that I can watch my kid on camera during the day and get updates constantly through an app they use! Best daycare in Edmonton! You won't regret it I promise!

This is an amazing daycare.  My kids spent a few years here and they were well taken care of. The teachers are great and truly care about the kids in their care (My kids still talk about Teacher Rimpy 🙂). I highly recommend ellwood daycare.

Aurelo & Virginia run an amazing child care facility! I especially love the family like team they have and the care they all put into the children. I was recommended here by a friend and in turn I also recommended a family friend, because its that great. Thank you Ellwood!

Very honest and humble family owned Daycare, it's sad to see my daughter leave as she will be with her grandparent's care. She always felt safe and comfortable with them. She will miss them dearly as they take care of the children as if it's family. They focus on behavior and learning skills. As parents with a very fast pace lifestyle we do worry where we leave our kids and here at Elwood I always felt great leaving her behind. I wish this place nothing but success and hope the city our govt can start funding Daycares like this properly so parents don't have to pay a fortune. Also don't bother reading the bad reviews they are all from competitors of other daycare owners which obviously you need to stay away from(fake google reviews)

My kids have been attending this daycare for a few years now. The staff have become like family. Highly recommend this daycare. I can leave knowing my kids are well looked after. They are safe, happy and have so much fun with all the activities.

Instead of taking any program here, take it at UofA instead. MacEwan falls far short of the mark in terms of quality of education. Cannot recommend to anyone for anything. Edmonton has one of the top Universities in Canada, go there instead.

This building is amazing.  It’s been around for a while and at the time it was built it was a college but now is a university.  The university is attended by many students, hard to imagine but hey that’s what it is here for.  I personally have not attended but I work downtown and have passed through this building many times over the years and have always enjoyed the experience.

Brought my kid here.  Parking was $10 for the day.  People seem surprised when they get tickets.
Tons of restaurants, groceries, and other services within walking distance.

I'd like to provide some feedback based on my experience in ENGL108 under the instruction of Safia Ahmad at MacEwan University. Initially, I found the course guidance somewhat ambiguous, as the assignments were issued without supporting rubrics. Despite my previous academic successes (a BBA Honours degree from NAIT with a GPA of 3.92 and a BSc degree with Distinction from UofA with a GPA of 3.7), I struggled to meet the grading criteria, which were not clearly articulated.
During my entire academic journey, I have never previously encountered such low assignment grades without receiving appropriate explanation or constructive feedback. This led me to perceive a certain lack of clarity in Ms. Ahmad's communication with her students and a need for improvement in her organization skills.
Additionally, a series of quizzes we undertook were marred by various errors such as misspellings, incorrect answers, and issues with grammatical accuracy. I had to take the initiative to contact Ms. Ahmad on multiple occasions due to errors in the answer keys, which added an additional layer of frustration to my course experience.
I regret to say that I found the response from MacEwan University to my concerns regarding academic competence, course content, and grading, less than satisfactory. As a result of these experiences, I felt compelled to withdraw from the ENGL108 course under Ms. Ahmad's "teaching". However, I subsequently completed the course with another instructor and was pleased to achieve an 'A' grade.
In light of my experience, I would urge MacEwan University to review their hiring processes, specifically when recruiting from countries beyond the G7, where verifying qualifications can be more challenging. This is not to question the skills or experience of educators from these regions, but merely to ensure that the university continues to maintain its high standards of Canadian education.

If you are planning to apply to this university, I dont recommend you doing this. Seriously, dont even think about this place. I have applied 4 months ago, still no answer. They are just ignoring me. I have sent several emails about my application, but no answer.(((
They are just making money on international students. 1/10

My daughter has been with them for a few years now and I am blown away with the staff! They put so much time and effort into the kids , my daughter was so scared to be away from me at first and again returning after the covid outbreak started , they knew exactly how to help her and make her comfortable! She has formed some amazing bonds with friends and staff, somedays she would rather stay with her friends and play longer, somedays they take the time to braid her hair when she wont let me.  Amazing team and so much compassion, excited to see everyone back once it's safe to do so.

I am quite shocked to read all the reviews because my experience with FirstChoice Daycare was nothing but pleasant!
My daughter went here for a whole year. We didn't have any problems at all. Initially I had some difficulty with the staff in the baby room as some weren't very fluent in English but they turned over all their staff and every one new that came in was excellent.
My daughter loved being there and she talked about all her teachers. Her teachers in the toddler/pre school room were very nice,warm and friendly they helped with potty training and kept me updated on her progress. Also her portfolio was up to date with development assessments.  Her teachers also knew her likes and dislikes and really encouraged her.
I will definitely recommend this day care.

I am shocked at how rude the daycare workers were to me since day one. My child has only attended 2 weeks out of the 6 weeks he was approved. I told them this was the worst daycare my child has ever been in and the daycare worker chased after me just to threaten to call child and family services. An incident the Thursday before, i go to pick up my child from daycare, he and other children were playing in the halls. I go to grab his jacket from his locker, turn around and he is gone. He ran out the front door right in front of them and they insisted that he was still inside. While i wasted that 5-10minutes searching for him inside, he was outside on the street. I called daycare accreditation and they are going to investigate. I pulled my son out immediately. This is unacceptable. I have a few more complaints but the bottom line is "this is the worst daycare my child has ever been in". Watch your child and the staff very closely if you choose this daycare. They did not even have a clue why my child had a gash beside his eye. They just noticed that his face was bleeding!! Awful and absolutely rude
It's just  rude  that while I am speaking nicely on the phone just to inquire and they just ended the call. Arrrhhgg!
Applying for a job you are spoke rudely too before even meeting. Not very friendly that’s for sure.

It is difficult to find a daycare that will accommodate the special needs of my child. While I moved to spruce grove I have kept my boy in firststep. Due to their caring atmosphere and dedication to the childern. They put the kids first with my boy autistic they work with him and encourage the other kids to understand him. With out first step I don't believe my son would be so good with other kids.  They work with his case worker and lamp programs to accommodate his needs. I highly recommend this day care as they also accommodate my busy lifestyle.  Knowing that my boy is welcomed like family I wouldn't have it any other way.

This place is the hands down the best day care on the Northside, staff are amazing and  treat the kids great, the owner seems like a very stand up guy and takes alot of pride in the daycare, it's always clean and there's lots of toys, crafts and activities for the kids. The hi mama updates are fantastic, the access to the cameras lets you check up on your child in real time and really gives you some peace of mind, if there was ever an incident it can always be reviewed.

We've been going here for 3 years now and soon our 2nd child will be going too, couldn't of asked for a better daycare, if your reading this and still unsure, just phone and talk to staff to book a visit you won't be disappointed.

As a new mom without my family here I must say this place has been a big part of our families growth! I want to move closer to it lol! The staff and owners are so great. I plan on fully keeping my child here for consistency! The app and cameras are so much help for parents!

Highly recommend this daycare.

The staff are all super friendly and amazing with the kids, attentive and patient. Everyday when we walk in to drop off or pick up our son all of the staff take the time to say hello/goodbye and engage with him (and us) which he loves. It makes us feel very welcome and comfortable.

The facility is huge and organized in a smart way. Very clean and open. Lots of variety of activities and toys for each age group. They take care of infants, toddlers, preschoolers, and before and after school care for older kids. They provide healthy kid friendly on meals and snacks.

My favorite part is the app they use to send me updates/information and photos throughout the day showing me their activities, his mood, what he is eating, etc. Also, a live camera to check in anytime while my son is there. It helps give me peace of mind that he is happy and having fun. Also, it's very interesting to get to see him interact with others when I am not there.

I would 100% recommend this daycare. The staff are absolutely amazing with both of my children. They provide an educational and fun environment, as well as lunch and 2 snacks everyday. Lots of crafts, activities, and field trips. There is also an app with daily updates, as well as an app that gives you camera access to check in with your kids at any time. I was so nervous to enroll my daughter in daycare for the first time and they made the transition so smooth, and were so comforting to both myself and my children. They always go above and beyond for the kids, I couldn’t ask for better!

Such a lovely group of nurturing, kind and well organized women! Feel so at peace leaving our 20 month old daughter in their hands. Kids are fed good food and have fun daily activities. Overall so happy with this day care.

We are so happy with Forest Heights Childcare & OSC. Our daughter went at 12 month and we were nervous about the transition but the staff there are so supportive, kind, professional, and flexible with all our needs. She is so excited to go every morning and we feel fortunate and grateful to have found a daycare with such caring staff that we trust, and who are there to help our daughter learn and grow :)

My daughter loves going to daycare here. She has learned so many songs, made friends, and comes home with art projects. I can see her growing in her interests and her time here has helped her explore some of those.

My only concern would be on some staffing turn over, but I think that's just the nature of the industry right now. The staffing changes have not changed the quality of care.

I cannot express enough how much I love this daycare. My daughter is excited to see her friends everyday, the workers are so kind and always answer all my questions when asked. My child has learned so much being here over just the passed few months. I have 0 complaints. If you’re thinking about it, just do it, you won’t regret it.

Let me express feelings of gratitude and exhilaration for Kinder Kollege Day Care, Edmonton. To me, it is one of the most caring daycares with incredible and exceptional facilities in town. My daughter was here for 4 years. Even though she is in school now, she always relishes the memories of days she spent here. We are so contented with the services, environment and professionalism that I have enrolled my granddaughter too in this center. She is also very elated and joyful. I wish her to be here for years to come.
The center has all state-of-the-art facilities for indoor and outdoor activities including art & craft, multicultural, seasonal and recreational services for different age groups of kids. I am delighted to share that, among other amenities, halal food is also served and dietary preferences like allergies (if any) are also taken care of. Even in these critical times of pandemic, standard and quality of service has been maintained. Guidelines laid down by the Govt. of Alberta are followed with specialized care and regular thoughtfulness.
The director has qualities of head and heart. She is experienced, qualified and consummate in her proficient outlook and personality. Her behavior with staff, families and authorities is so inspiring and motivating that all team members of daycare vouch for it.
I would highly recommend this place for those who are looking for comfortable and creative pastime for their children.

My son & daughter have been going here for a few months now, and my son struggles a lot in school/daycare, it was such a relief finding this place, Teacher Jovie is one of the best warm hearted people I know, she is so kind and supportive, with having my son being so difficult and hard to manage she definitely helps me so much with it, they have been nothing but accepting and loving of my children! Shout out to fort crossing daycare & all the teachers! You are all amazing especially jovie, she definitely knows how to run a well maintained, fun, safe daycare!! ❤️
Toxic place.never go there's for work.they make you feel  your not belong hear. The have two faces one when parents is there and one when parents is away

Great daycare! We’ll trained professional teachers! My son loves going there. When I don’t bring him he would ask me “Why you did not bring me to daycare?” He loves his teachers! Owners and administrators are very helpful and accommodating. They help you with subsidy applications and everything! They provide breakfast/morning snacks, lunch and afternoon snacks and pizza every Friday!!! I strongly recommend this daycare to parents seeking for a child friendly and welcoming environment that meets your children needs.

I've had such an incredible experience switching my kids into Fort Road Daycare in September. My boys were apprehensive about coming here at first, but after their first week, that changed. They look forward to going there before and after school!  The place is kept clean, and the kids are visibly happy when you go in. The women are wonderful and joyful. I'm very grateful for the staff!

Fort Road Day Care is a great place for children to have fun. I know this Because I have children attending there and always telling me about the fun activities, healthy snacks, and the nice staff who provide the children with whatever they please!

‘‘This day care is wonderful,  Staff are respectful to the children’s needs and help them to learn through play and many more. My children are here for more then 3 years. I never have any problems. They loves to be here. Staff are responsible, respectful, helpful and friendly. They address parents  concerns in respectful manner anytime. I am also impressed with their transportation services for the children attending in the neighborhood schools.Even though you are not qualified for the school bus transportation, no worries. I recommend this daycare as a best daycare in my experience. 100% satisfying.

Just want to make parents aware, I have my daughter in daycare and would want to know if the daycare was putting my child in danger!! Their school van just ran a stop sign on 137th Ave  near Michael's and I had to brake to avoid hitting them...I called it in to the daycare as well!

My children have attended this daycare since late 2019. When my son first started he was very nervous and the staff all comforted and stayed patient with him! Having the daycare feel like a comfortable place with people he was comfortable with also helped his rocky transition into kindergarten! The staff have always gone above and beyond for my children and for me as a parent. The out of school care side is also fantastic! My girls always have such a wonderful time and always ask me if they can stay longer. Even my shy daughter feels like she can be herself in the space.  It's a place that is very comfortable and welcoming.

COVID practices are always upheld with the highest standard!  I have never worried about the staff not following procedures. They always place the kids health and safety as priority.

The staff are always communicating with me. Always willing to work with me and provide resources when I need them. Overall the most amazing daycare!

I have been a member of this daycare since 2019 and I can not speak highly enough about them. Through my own personal struggles, COVID and a three month break in care we have recently just enrolled again with Fraser. The staff on both the daycare as well as the out of school side are amazing. Both my children enjoy attending the centre not only for the staff but the activities that are provided. They are very accommodating and understanding to ensure that the needs of the children are met as well as the needs of parents. In addition to providing care there is always an abundance of resources located in the lobby for easy parent access. I also appreciate the little updates given about the kids' days. I would absolutely recommend the Centre to others looking for great care.

I enrolled my son at Fraser Community Child Care Center in September 2020. I was very concerned when enrolling my son because of COVID. When I went for a tour the Director ensured me, they followed all the health and safety protocols outlined by AHS. Starting a new Daycare and being exposed to so many new children and adults I was prepared for my son to catch a common cold or sickness. To my surprise and delight he has not been sick once. This confirms how clean and sanitized the center truly is. When I drop my son off in the morning he is always greeted by a warm and caring staff member. My son is always in good spirts and seems very happy and comfortable at the center. My son is a very picky eater and often refuses to eat. The staff and owner always make an effort to try and get him to eat. They have often given him ketchup or ranch so he can dip his food in (which for some reason he loves) or offer a different choice. I really enjoy the private Facebook Page that keeps me updated on what’s going on in the center and I absolutely love seeing the pictures of my son playing 😊. Great center!!!

I called end of Sep. 2017 to enroll my almost 12 month old for October. I was enthusiastically told there was space and to come in for an orientation.

During orientation with the owner, I asked a few questions about childcare any concerned mother would ask. For example, I asked the infant teacher how she deals with children who cry during their first time in daycare. The owner said that it's good I ask these types of questions since many parents don't. Anyways, my husband and I liked the centre and left.

We then phoned that Friday to register. We were told to call again Monday morning, and I informed them that we would then bring our child for a couple hours as his first transition day. Monday morning (last week of Sep. 2017) I phoned at 6.30am to confirm we are coming and I get a call back at 7am from the owner that unfortunately there is no space as she has a director (whom she never told me about) that apparently booked and registered another infant without telling her. She said she'd call me back later in the day to see if she could re-arrange with the other parent as they also wanted part-time, so maybe we could do alternate days. She never phoned.

My husband and I found this entire situation odd, so he phoned the following day on Tuesday from his cell, inquiring if there was space available for a 14 month infant for the first week of October/right away. The owner answered enthusiastically that there was space and he could come and register his child right away as there were only 4 kids in the infant room. When I called half an hour later from my cell, asking if she has space, she answered that she is full...

The owner outright lied to my face. Why? Because I asked some questions? As a concerned parent and mother, I would urge every parent sending their child to THINK TWICE about sending your child to this daycare. To me it verifies the authenticity of multiple online reviews that state that children may be neglected and/or parents who show even a little concern are NOT WELCOME here.

I am grateful that I did not enroll my child in this program and that I found out the nature and true colors of the owner and this centre.

I feel privileged to say that I have known the owner and have volunteered for this daycare for nearly 7 years. The owner, my friend Mrs. Denise, is my greatest mentor. Many times I have thanked her and she questioned me why. Now I find myself starting a career in being a youth baseball coach. That is why I thank her. The hard work she does goes beyond her own self. I know over 6 years of  working with her that this is the best daycare in the city. I have seen it on a daily basis. My recommendation is another act of friendship that proves this daycare is #1 and  the owner is an A+ person.

My children went to friendly forest for 11 years. The staff were loving, attentive and supportive, not just to my children, but to our entire family. Many years on now my children still talk fondly of their time there as well as the staff and the relationships they built with them. This is a wonderful childcare centre.

I have really enjoyed having my son in the OSC program. He really enjoys that his teachers are personable and friendly and he is making great friends. The culture of this daycare is one of happy, healthy kids. I would highly recommend this daycare!

I absolutely loved working here! I have worked at a couple other daycares and this daycare really tops it for me. The staff are super friendly and supportive and I’ve felt no stress being or working here what’s so ever. I even looked forward to coming to work. The children are sweet and incredibly well behaved. One of the nicest and most family like daycares I’ve ever worked at and I’d suggest it for any one looking to work in daycare. 🙂

I’m so glad I found this daycare. The staff are very professional, personable, and welcoming; they greet you every morning, always say goodbye at the end of the day, and give you any updates if needed. They truly care. My kid loves it here and has built such a bond with staff. He’s been going for a little over 8 months and there’s been such a growth in his socialization and motor skills.

Great managment and staff. My son absolutely loved Ms. C.
This daycare provides lots of outdoor activities which i loved even during winter! There is also an option to have meals which makes it easier to not worry about packing lunches!

The BEST daycare. If you are looking for the best learning environment for your child enroll them here. They are so amazing my son's been here now for 1.5 years and he is thriving. The teachers and staff are nothing short of amazing. My child has learned so much from these kind and caring ladies. The director Larissa is the most genuine and most thoughtful woman you will ever meet. 5 stars for this daycare!

Friendly Frog provided childcare to health care workers when daycares were shut down for COVID-19. It was a very nerve wracking experience to place my child in a daycare I had no previous experience with but the staff were absolutely amazing! They navigated all the changes in regulations very proficiently and were so accommodating to my 16 month old. Highly recommend them!
Fantastic daycare! The workers are amazing! Great place for childcare!
My daughter loves going to this daycare. Staff are very friendly and take very good care of the kids
Excellent care, quality staff, have genuine concern for your child's safety and well-being.

Fulton is a fantastic non-profit, licensed and accredited daycare and afterschool care facility. The Director and volunteer Board do am amazing job and have the most incredibly loving and caring staff for the children. The early childhood education is  current and curriculum based. The new location in the renovated old Fulton Elementary School was well done with the natural play structure being the perfect finishing touch. I love the hot lunches cooked fresh on-site; and having breakfast there too is a lifesaver! I was lucky enough to stumble across such a great facility so close to home for my family.

This is the best daycare and afterschool care program ever. As noted by others the centre is fully accredited, has very experienced and caring staff, excellent high quality meals and snacks including a balanced hot lunch. The kids spend lots of time outdoors with the newly renovated natural playground for the little ones and have access to the sports field, skating rink, spray park and ravine for the older kids. They have a wonderful summer program including field trips. As a not for profit the parents and families are very engaged in the programming with lots of communication and the opportunity to work with the dedicated and excellent centre management through participation on the board or even some of the committees. The kids are always treated with respect and taught all of the things you would want to - positive ways to resolve conflict, sharing, manners. Our kids are always happy to go, love their staff and rooms and as a parent I feel confident going to work knowing they are having a great time and are well cared for.
I’ve heard great things about Fulton, but the waitlist is very long and the front staff are incredibly disorganized.

By far the best daycare in the area.  Accommodates families of all types, diets, religions, etc... Just simply provides the best daycare.  Lots of good early childhood education, support for special needs and hot lunches and healthy snacks for your kids.  You will love this place and your kids even more so.  Fully accredited and very well educated and trained staff.
My kid was forced to nap when not tired so we pulled her after a week. It still bothers her years later. Security was really lax too... This was pre covid to be fair. They may have changed since.

At approximately 0750am.  I was walking my son on the sidewalk outside Saint John Bosco school when the Van from "Fun 4 Kids Daycare" came speeding towards the side walk,  The driver pulled into the drop off area right next to us. As the driver quickly approached I held my hand out and tryed to yell at them to slow down.
First: of all this is a school zone.
Second: its winter and the children are walking on the icy sidewalk. My son slipt on the sidewalk just moments before and went just off tge curb. Luckily it was before the Fun 4 Kids Van otherwise they would of hit him.
Thirdly: your transporting other peoples children, have some sence of responsibility.

I would seriously reconsider this daycare after what I witnessed.

My infant son attended Fun4Kidz for nearly five months and absolutely thrived! He had the biggest smile on his face every morning when seeing the friendly staff members. We received great communication from Lori and her entire team and felt comfortable that our child was taken care of as if he was family. We were incredibly satisfied with our entire experience at Fun4Kidz and were sad to say goodbye when we moved out of province.

I have nothing but great things to say. My son loves coming here. Staff are always so friendly and polite. As a first time parent, it was a great comfort knowing my son was there. They keep the kids busy with crafts and going outside daily which is a nice surprise to get after work. The advancement my child made in his development was 10 fold as soon as he started daycare there. Came home singing many different nursery rhymes. Great staff and care!

I'm so happy that I switch my son to this daycare. The staff are friendly and cares deeply for the children. The environment is bright and helps engages with little minds. The owner Lori cares for the children and goes out of her way to make sure the daycare has things that each child likes. They have a cook that just prepares the kids snack and luches daily. I swear my child eats better at the center then he does at home thanks to Bonnie!  My son has changed so much in the short amount of time he's been going. He's using more and more words everytime we talk about something and just overall more of a happy toddler. Its such a piece of mind knowing my child is in such good hands and he loves it there. Thank you Fun4Kidz Daycare!!

I have been working here for around 2 months and have nothing but good things to say. The entire group of staff works as a team and I feel completely supported. All staff are kind, caring, compassionate and passionate about quality care. Lori is an an incredible owner and director. She is hands on, always checking in with staff and children and is so positive and joyful. I love coming to work every day and am so happy here!

Our child was bullied. Bitten and scratched deep enough to draw blood. When I picked her up I saw the bully hit another child.
The supervisor was argumentative rather than concerned.
Our child said that the supervisor told the children, if someone hits you, hit them back.
Not a safe place.

I must say, it is one of the best daycare centres in the Edmonton, with a homely environment for our children. The staffs are very humble and responsible regarding their duties of children. I really appreciate their hard-work for the betterment and safety of our kids. You guys are doing great job. Kudos!

The only reason I liked this daycare was because of the afterschool worker that my son had. There were 2 times that my son was not picked up from school. The first time, the director assumed he wasn't getting picked up because he wasn't at daycare the day before. The 2nd time, the van got stuck and she refused to notify schools or parents until after they were already 25 minutes late, and AFTER I had called her to ask her why my child did not get picked up. I am not happy with the way the situation was handled. She turned the blame to me, and started accusing me of a whole bunch of things. I will NOT recommend this daycare to anyone!

my child and I have really enjoyed our experience with fun station daycare .  There are many things that I like about the daycare such as the education , cleanliness and safety . The staff have high energy and engage in activities with the children . This daycare is very affordable and has helped me greatly with the out of school care & drop off and pick up .
Good daycare, the staff is very nice and the owner cares about the well-being of the children. My children feel good there and the price is really affordable. Thank you for your good work.
I do like how empathetic all the staff is at this daycare. When there are issues to deal with, they are looked after right at the moment when it happens. Everyone is very professional and friendly
Very nice and clean daycare large outdoor grassy play area very under standing staff
Loving and kind staff my kids love going there!

I’m so glad that I had found this daycare after many bad experiences with daycares , this one has been amazing my kids are happy and have been attending this daycare for 3 years , I’m truly happy with all the workers & owners are wonderful as well . My kids love going to daycare & look forward to always going even my 15 month old is always happy to go . Couldn’t be more pleased with such wonderful people taking care of my kids , would truly recommend.

All three of my children have attended- my youngest still does and he loves it, and my girls did as well! Staff are great. The owners are kind and accommodating. Monthly cost is very fair. I reviewed other centre's in the area before deciding, and this one is by far the best!!

This daycare is awesome!!! After having a bad experience in a previous daycare, Future scholar was a blessing for my family . The staff is great, very professional, and friendly...They were able to put back structure into my daughter's life.They have awesome educational activities and programs for children. They make sure every kid's need is met. I am very thankful to the staff and the director for the good work they do everyday...the daycare is always clean, organized and welcoming atmosphere!
If you are looking for a great daycare in that area, this is the best daycare...you won't regret it!
From a very satisfied mom
Future scholars day care is an amazing place for your kids, very clean with great staff.

This is a great place to bring your child,
I brought my 3 years old boy to these guys 6 months ago. I had some concerns about him having some problems with the English language coz he was not born in Canada, he came here when he was 2 and half years old. But believe me, my son start well communicating to everyone in English just after 2 months of attendance, as well as his eating and sleep patterns. Good job to all the staff!!!

The Owner and staff at Future stars child development centre have been incredible. Everyone there is very dedicated and have gone above and beyond to make your journey memorable and successful.Staff and Owner have always been professional and caring.Highly Recommended to parents who are looking for daycare.

As a current employee, I would say that this centre exceeded my expectations. My professional and personal goals have been met and I continuously have opportunities to create and work on new goals . The team at the centre never works in isolation. Everyone relies on each other experience, skills. New owner Guri helped me do start my career as early childhood . I have done level 1 here and going for level 2 . My both girls 1 year and 3 year attends this centre . It is clean , well maintained facility to friendly and experience staff. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of child care . So thankful to have found such a excellent place for my kids . Girls enjoy their daycare .

Guri is the best. She is the most amazing human being I have ever met in my entire life time. She knows her job really well and knows what she is doing. I would never even think of sending my kids anywhere else . Always recommend her to everyone I meet looking for day care. She is very professional and at the same time makes the kids feel at home.

Great daycare. Owner is so welcoming and pleasant every morning . Great updates at the end of the day. My son attends her dayccare from 2017 when he was 9 months and now this daycare.we are with Gurinder from last 5 years .We are very happy and positive and honestly i love Guri and her family .I will recommend everyone this daycare who are looking for child care. My son loves to come here everyday.

The year 2019 was simultaneously the hardest and best year of my life. My son would be starting daycare as I returned to work from maternity leave but it was also the year we met one of the most caring providers around who quickly became family. Choosing someone to fill your role while you are gone, is not for the faint of heart. From the moment we met with Gurinder we knew our son would be in the best of hands. The amount of pure love and dedication to every child in her care was palpable. Not once did we ever have to worry while being away from him. He transitioned with her and her family as they ended their home based daycare and took over ownership of Future Stars Child Development Centre. Everyone at the daycare centre is wonderful. Plenty of opportunities for play, learning, cultural immersion, home cooked meals and reasonable rates! Our son has now transitioned out of their care into a new place in preparation for school next year. It was one of the hardest decisions we have had to make. I know how hard it is to entrust your child's life and wellbeing into the hands of others. You will not have anything to worry about here! We love you “Aunty Guri”!

Don't waste your money on wait list fee. I paid back in 2020 and it's now 2023. My 4 year old was not offered a spot but they also do not answer my emails or provide updates... why are they taking wait list fees if they provide no services???
Look elsewhere for your childcare... the waitlist is a pure money grab. BEWARE

GUELC has been my children's daycare for the past 3 years and it is a really wonderful place. The kids have access to their own playground and the school's gym and field. They spend a ton of time outside in nature. The teachers are all wonderful and with very little turnover. GUELC has a Reggio Emillia philosophy so has a child-led and inquiry-based learning approach. Each month has a learning theme that incorporates the kids' interests (space, insects) through curriculum including art, music and movement. My kids have learn so much being here and love it.

GUELC has been exceptional at stewarding the growth and development of our son. The program is a Reggio Emilia inspired and the teachers are skilled at designing a curriculum that inspires curiosity and fosters a greater understanding of key concepts. Our son joined the program during the pandemic in Sept of 2020, and has attended the Wonder Room and the Discovery Room. They managed to keep the students safe with increased hygiene protocols. With student's safety at the forefront, this program has created a successful and safe learning environment.

I would highly recommend this program to anyone looking for an early learning centre for their child. They successfully integrate outdoor time and indoor learning centres - and the staff are very knowledgable and skilled in early education. They create a comfortable environment - and from the first day, our son entered the school - which was unknown to him and everyone was masked - he felt instantly comfortable. This is due to the warm and inviting nature of the team of teachers assembled. This program has a long history of serving the community.

The teachers work closely with the parents to provide a collaborative learning environment that is supported at home.
They do not answer emails and do not provide any spot and do not return your wait list fee
Great centre, staff, and experience for our kids. The centre is in the Garneau school, couldn't be more conveniently located. Currently no wait list.

We have thoroughly enjoyed the time our girls have spent at Giggles daycare. The staff are always genuinely excited to see our three young girls each day. Our daughters have also developed a strong bond with the teachers at Giggles. The staff have always strived to make our girls feel comfortable. When we were looking for childcare for our girls I recalled reading reviews that Staffy and Naveen treat the kids as they would treat their own children and I can confirm that I see this trait in them as well! I highly recommend this daycare!

Giggles is so great! The entire staff are so good to our 3 girls. At dropoff, it is easy to tell just how much our girls have bonded with the daycare teachers at Giggles. We really appreciate that each of the different daycare teachers make sure they have a realtionship with each of our girls.

Giggles Daycare & OSC has surpassed our expectations.The hands-on care and attention to my children is topnotch,the environment is ideal and thier kind,incisive handling of my little one with special needs is most satisfying.

My daughter has been in giggles daycare for a few months now, sometimes in the mornings and more so after school. I have nothing but wonderful things to say about Staffy & Naveen and the staff they have been great to us. They go above and beyond weather it be activities, or birthdays, or pizza parties, etc. They are great with the kids and have a great space with lots to do to keep the kids busy and feeling comfortable. I have recommended them to other and will continue to!

Giggles daycare is the best thing that happened to my kids.
Staffy and Naveen went above and beyond to ensure the kids had the best experience. The facility is clean and the staff are friendly and pay special attention to the needs of each child.
The kids always loved to go there and I never had any reason to worry about anything.

My boys have been going here a year now and absolutely love it. The daycare is very clean, the staff is friendly and accommodating to our needs.They provide a great structured program. They are always doing fun things with the children,providing healthy snacks, taking them to the park including them in activities and sports. The owners have done thoughtful surprises for the children on birthdays and holidays which is rare from my previous experience.
We have had an incredible experience being at this daycare, and will continue to stay here. They actually treat your kids like family and show compassion… Best daycare in this whole area of town.

We love Giggles. My 3yo daughter, who had separation anxiety, is now excited to go to daycare everyday. 😊 She also chooses to go to the daycare instead of coming with his dad to drop me off to work. That's nothing but a great sign that she's loving her time there. I have also seen improvements in her knowledge, social skills, and behavior. Thank you Giggles.
My son has been in giggles daycare since 18 month now he will 5 soon, I have nothing but wonderful things to say about all the staff, they have been great to us. I have recommended them to other.

My son absolutely loves going to daycare every morning, it settles my mind and heart knowing he is well taken care of and comfortable with each teacher and classmate that he genuinely enjoys school. I Couldn’t be happier
The owners and staff are truly amazing with my children. I highly recommend them as a child care provider!

I wish I could add more stars here then 5, however there are not enough stars for me to rate such a wonderful place. Our daughter loved going to daycare, the hardest part for us was when we moved for my job and she had to change daycares. They treated her like family, she was well cared for and loved. As a first time parent I was extremely skeptical, hesitant, and overly protective. The owners (who are a husband and wife team), and their wonderful staff, put all my concerns to rest and I was able to drop my daughter off each day knowing she was in the best hands. The facility is clean, the food she had daily was delicious and filling, she made lots of friends, they had easy ways to contact them if you need to change something or if our child was going to be late (and she was all the time), they worked with us on our needs and recommendations of our pediatrician, and! she learned so much from the staff, her development was crazy! If you are looking for a daycare in the Edmonton area. This, this is the place you want to send your children, do not look anywhere else, its not worth your time. Close the other windows you have open with daycare options, and just contact Gilgal and set up an appointment. Seriously best choice you will make today.

Also they are genuine about their faith. As a Christian myself I wanted a Christian daycare for my daughter. I was happy to know they are Christian and live out those values in how they treat others.
One of the best caring people looking after children here, so glad they exist, I highly recommend them

Cannot say enough good things about Gilgal day care.   The owners and staff are wonderful, kind and generous with their time.  My kids are never unhappy to be dropped off and are happy to see me when I pick them up but not in a rush to leave which is a good thing.  The staff answers all of my questions no matter how many I have and are true partners when it comes to milestones like eating solid food, toilet training, etc.  I never worry about the care my kids receive.  They are also always doing fun things like Canada Day parties, fashion shows, lemonade stands, etc. There is so much genuine care and effort that goes into everything that they do.  I am so happy to have found this daycare for my kids and highly recommend it to anyone.

The name gilgal attracted me to the Daycare. I became very interested because it's a family business and for their Spiritual faith.  I knew my daughter was in good care as they took extra time to feed her. For me, we are family now because of the love and care they shown to me and my daughter.  I  recommend gilgal Daycare to you.
Vera .E

Sent from my Galaxy
my kids love this daycare they r so excited and happy

Glengarry Child Care Society is awesome! Our kids have loved going to see friends and educators since they were infants. The indoor and outdoor play spaces are exceptional; we really appreciate the park setting and mature trees. You can't beat the creative programming, hearty meals, and quality of care. This organization is focused not only on the well-being of kids but cares about family and community. They host seasonal events, provide parenting workshops, coordinate food donation programs and so much more. We wholeheartedly trust the staff and have never considered going elsewhere.

Glengarry Child Care has been nothing but EXCEPTIONAL! Our daughter wakes up excited for daycare everyday. We love the diversity and how they incorporate different cultures into their menus and activities/holidays. Their indoor and outdoor play areas are amazing, the fenced park and garden area allows the children to explore safely and be in tune with nature. Glengarry is truly the best Daycare we have ever came across, their standards are high and we are grateful for all the genuinely caring Educators! Highly recommended 10/10!

My daughter has been attending Glengarry for 5-6 years now, and have always gone above and beyond my expectations for what a daycare should be. I know my daughter is safe and well cared for while with the team of child educators at Glengarry and have never hesitated to recommend Glengarry to friends searching for child care for their children.

My eldest daughter has been in daycare at Glengarry since 2017 and my youngest joined her last February. Both have enjoyed high quality care throughout this time. I really appreciate the spacious rooms for the children to play in and the beautiful, huge, fenced outdoor area for their daily outdoor play. Even better Glengarry is situated in a very large park so educators take the kids outside to play in the wide open spaces that surround the centre. I would recommend Glengarry to anyone needing childcare.

Being a first time mom the hesitations leaving your child with anyone are inevitable. Doesn't matter who it is, you don't want to leave them. Glengarry has made the transition so easy. And have been so amazing! You can tell the Teachers love what they do and genuinely care for all of the kids!
They are always doing something new! Teaching something different. The rooms are spacious! The outdoor area is huge! Watching my daughter thrive in this environment... there are no words to express my appreciation!
And my picky eater eats all the food! So a special shout out to their chef! She definitely doesn't do that at home!
I can't say enough about the Daycare and the staff!

I can't say enough about the program and the educators. They are supportive and have great communication to ensure our children excel at GCCS!

They have found the perfect balance between learning and play. The amount of time the children spend outside is phenomenal!

Great personable educators that know all the children’s names and all are very caring. My son went to GCCS from when he was 1 years old up until before he attended kindergarten. Now my daughter has been here since she’s been just over a year old and loves going to daycare. It is definitely the staff that makes GCCS a positive atmosphere.

Glenora Child Care Society has exceeded all my expectations.

The staff at GCCS are kind, loving, energetic, respectful teachers that bring excitement to my daughter's life, day after day. The classrooms are open, inviting and playful, and the outdoor space is constantly evolving and a highlight of the center. My daughter regularly eats lunches that I would pay top dollar at a restaurant for, all thanks to the in house chef, Noriko. And most importantly, the connection between the kids, teachers and fellow parents makes this center special.

The amount of outdoor play that the center fosters is unprecedented - at least 2 hours a day outdoors (weather permitting - though snow and coldness are usually only factors during season transitions, where some kids may not have all their gear yet -). Open ended and "rough play" are encouraged, under supervision, and children are often playing with friends of various age groups. Given the amount of cold weather in Edmonton, it would be remiss if a center did not have adequate strategies to deal with snow and negative degree temperatures. Last year, the center only had "indoor days" during the Polar Vortex and a select few other days. Most other days, the kids will be outdoors. It also encourages the family to explore the outdoors, since we know that the children are used to being outside. GCCS even loans out snowshoes during the wintertime to eager families.

After speaking with the staff, I was also pleased to learn that they are happy to work at the center - well paid, benefits, overtime, fully staffed and with  excellent opportunities to improve their skill sets. Other parents I have spoken to have had several of their children go through GCCS and have been so happy with their experiences. After discussing with many friends, I have also discovered, happily, that GCCS rates are very reasonable given the caliber of the center.

When my daughter was starting at the school, she was 18 months old - hesitant to take even the smallest set of steps - and constantly asking for the assistance of others to help her do tasks. At GCCS, she grew into a very brave, independent, thoughtful learner. She is 3.5 years old now, and can set the table, put away dishes, serves herself (usually healthy) snacks, and can dress herself with her winter coat and accessories. Best of all, she loves her friends and her teachers. Each day she has amusing stories to tell and with the App, I can usually prompt her to tell me more about her day.

What an incredible environment for our daughter to learn how to be a part of a community of caring humans.
My daughter loves going everyday. Great educators, tons of experiences, lots of outdoor play and yummy food.
Really terrific daycare- educators, staff (and the families) all help create a safe, caring, stimulating environment that supports our littles and is a lovely community.

After the first daycare location (different franchise) my 3 years old older son in 2021 attended but did not worked out well, we found Global Aware Summerside and it was the best decision we made.

All staffs here were great with much caring and love for the kids. I was impressed very much that the staffs knew every single kid’s name!
Our younger son will be attending here starting September this year, and he will surely love this :)

IWe are very happy and lucky that we are part of global aware family.
Our daughter started daycare last year in October, and within 6 months she is very much connected with her educators. She does not want to stay home even on weekends. It is very hard for a new mom to return to work and leave their child, but Global aware management team made it easy for me.

The curriculum is amazing, the educators are extremely talented and the management is very supportive. They keep a good track of child daily activities and supplies.

One of the best and my favourite feature is getting updates over himama app on what my daughter is doing and what they have done throughout the day.
We as a family highly recommend Global aware for your child.

Thank you team global aware for taking care of my daughter and helping her in the her growth.

So in love with everything about Global Aware. My daughter has attended since December 2020 and has flourished socially and academically since. The amount of love and care put into each child from management and the staff members is incredible and hands down the best care you can have for your children. The facility is clean, great educational programs, communication is open, and even the food provided is delicious. I highly recommend Global Aware to any parent looking for high quality care for their children.

We feel extremely lucky to have found Summerside Global Aware Care (SGAC) for our son, who has been attending the centre for just over a year now. Since starting, he has become increasingly more confident and social, and above all, he is happy! From the fantastic programming, incredible educators, and wonderful management, it is extremely evident that every aspect of SGAC is designed with the children’s best interests and needs in mind. Daily, as a parent, we receive constant communication via the HiMama app, including an outline of daily activities and learning objectives, photos, and meal plans. Communication with the centre director and educators is always open and quick. And it is incredibly noticeable all the wonderful things our son learns as he takes and applies his learnings home and elsewhere. We look forward to being part of the SGAC family for years to come! Thank you always, Wenny and team!

My family and I can not say enough good things about this daycare centre! We are so happy that we have chosen Global Aware as a home away from home for our daughter.
