We love this daycare and trust our son is in knowledgeable, caring hands. The teachers are so kind. Our son has warmed up to them and we can tell he feels loved and supported here. They genuinely care about him. He gets to try so many fun activities while there. The director goes above and beyond to reassure us and build a relationship with us. My son has allergies and she has implemented a lot of strategies to ensure he is safe. The management team is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment and we’re very thankful.

Leath and her team at Kepler are amazing.
They care so much for all children, they get back to us very quick on our phone calls  if my children have any problem. Very safe and fun environment for the kids. Thanks all the teachers and the managers team for being so professional and kind to our children ❤️

Amazing centre and childcare! Our children have adjusted so well, which is a testament to Leath and how well she runs the centre! Jaspreet goes out of her way to tell me how my sons day was - you can tell she truly cares about him and is so nurturing! Heather, Taylor and Rabia are also wonderful educators- they keep the children engaged and have them learning all day. They all go above and beyond - planning activities and summer field trips!

I have worked for Kepler for over 4 years, at various locations. Keswick has by far been my favorite. Leath and Alka are super supportive and are always challenging the staff to be their best. There is opportunities to grow within the Center and the company. I feel very supported and cared for at this location. I look forward to growing with this team more!

Kepler is my son's first school, we are lucky to have Ms. Daxa and Ms. Harmwet be his teacher. They have lots of patients with kids and always gentle and caring them. im glad that my kid likes his school too.

We love Kepler Academy. My 4 years old twins started there more than a year a go and they have enjoyed every single day. All the teachers they have had are very caring, and thoughtful. They love little things that teachers did for them, for example they mentioned “we love teacher Lakshmi, teacher made me beautiful hair ties” or “we love teacher Francis, she helped me drawing puppies”. Sometimes they mentioned “teachers told me I was not listening today, it was not good”. Even though they were reminded, they still love teachers so much. I know the teachers have had great ways to remind them and help them improve and develop everyday :).

My son started daycare in December. The staff are amazing. Suki and Amy always make time to chat with me and say hello to my son. The class teachers, Asma and Rajini are extremely loving and caring towards my son. He gets lots of cuddles and kisses from them and he loves them. I'm really happy with the way they treat him! Thank you.

My son has been enrolled at Kepler for approximately five months, and we couldn't be happier with his experience there. Both Shobha and Manpreet, his teachers, consistently surpass our expectations and provide him with an excellent educational journey. We want to express our sincere gratitude to both of them for their unwavering dedication and hard work.

We must also extend our gratitude to the incredible support staff and management at Kepler, including Amy, Ruw, Suhki, and all the support staff. Their commitment to creating a conducive learning environment and ensuring the smooth functioning of the school is truly remarkable. We appreciate all the effort they put in to make Kepler a fantastick place for our son to thrive.

I cannot express how much I love and appreciate all the staff at the Kepler Cavanagh my older son started when he was 4 and a lot of the same educators are still there. And they still remember him. And my younger son looks forward to going everyday! I don’t know where we would be without Poornima! She is such a rockstar and we are soooo lucky to have her teach our children. She is easily my son’s favourite person outside of the family. I am not looking forward to the day the moves up to the next class but she has done such a great job he will no doubt be ready for the  Pioneer class

Our little one has been at Kepler since august of last year. We couldn't imagine leaving our little one anywhere else. Since day one, our little has had tremendous separation anxiety and struggles with change. Her initial teachers, Anisha and Dehl have helped her develop tremendously and brought out her passion of dancing, helping and cleaning :) When she had to transition into her new class, Uma and Sabu helped ensure that she would be OK and is now thriving in her new environment. She is so happy to be at daycare each day and we are constantly amazed at how much she is learning and learning new skills weekly if not daily.

All the teachers, support staff and management staff help ensure that all the kids are well taken care of.

I cannot thank Kepler Academy enough for providing an excellent childcare service to my daughter for nearly a year. My child is advanced, and thus, a daycare denied her. Thanks, they did because Kepler took her in. Therefore, my child improved her listening skills significantly, and her interest in science and math has grown exponentially. Her social skills have developed far better than I ever expected. Thank you for transforming her. Thank you, Kepler, and the incredible team.

I can promise you , we will miss you all very much . I’m very emotional about the change that we have to make due to kindergarten . But I appreciate everything , every single person at Kepler has done for my daughter and myself . Mary Jane and all the staff honestly made her daycare life a much easier transition than I imagined it would have been ! She had some favourites there which I’m sure they know who they are and she will be asking to visit I’m positive ! For anyone considering Kepler academy at college plaza you will not be disappointed .

We have had our son at Kepler for the last 6 months and have really enjoyed the experience. The teachers are all very attentive and very compassionate towards the children. The day-to-day variability in activities for the kids has been great for our son's development. As this was our first daycare experience, we greatly appreciated the patience and attentiveness from the staff at Kepler. Teacher Mary Jane in particular was very responsive to emails in our first few weeks at Kepler and did a great job at helping us transition to having our son at daycare. He talks about his teachers often and now can't wait to see them each morning!

We had a great experience at Kepler college plaza. After an acceptable waiting period we finally received a spot for both of our kids (2 and 4yo). From the first day we were amazed from the warm and welcoming atmosphere. My kids had a short adjustment period thanks to the experienced educators. The kids loved attending this daycare and enjoyed the great activities and delicious food. The director Mary-Jane and staff ( Angie, Amima, Samrin, Mishlen and more to mention) were caring, friendly and went above and beyond to make sure the kids had a memorable and excellent experience. Well done.

Hallon Family

Since Day 1 Kepler Academy has been a positive addition to our child's life. Maryjane, the facility's director, has always had great communication and that has really helped build a strong foundation of trust.
Daycare is such a monumental and incredible journey for our little one, we had our reservations about this big change in our child's life, however it has become very clear that even after a short period of time, our child has already learned so much. Kepler incorporates a wide variety of activities that really speak to the children, it is so fun to watch what they discover. I really appreciate that they provide meals for our child; their onsite cook prepares delicious snacks and meals throughout the day.
My child's teachers Afsana, Buddhika and Kate have been caring, patient and kind- they are incredible and we couldn't ask for anything more. I am fortunate to have found a facility that meets the needs of my child and puts their growth at the forefront of their curriculum.
I recommed this team to any parent looking for the best care available.

We were waitlisted for the Oxford location and was contacted as a spot had opened up. Did the tour, the facility is okay. Programming looks great etc etc. That's what the 2 stars are for. The problem I have was the admin and follow up. After sending in some questions after the tour via email, they were promptly answered and it was communicated a registration package will be sent our way. When the registration is completed, a welcome package will then be forwarded. We were excited that we had an opportunity at our first pick facility. So, we stopped searching and declined other opportunities that contacted us as we didn't want to hold up spots for other parents waitlisted at those other places. I guess that's where our mistake was made, we put all our eggs in one basket. We never received a registration package from Kepler, even after following up and are now searching, again, for quality child care. Good times. It's been a few weeks since any communication or reply.  What's the point of having your customer service rep and client experience lead cc'd on the email communications only to be ghosted? At least one of you have the professionalism to email back whatever the issue was. Isn't that the point of your roles, to follow up on the experience or service that is being rendered? I've gone back and forth about posting this review. However, I'm also in a high level admin role and know how these processes work and this is just terrible. Just poor consideration of a family's time and effort looking for child care when it's already not easy to do.

I contacted the daycare in winter 2022 for my son, we live in the area and I was looking for a good daycare. I enquired about the inspection -critical incident report on the Government on Alberta website and if I could book a tour, they took my name and number to get back to me and said that there are not aware of any inspection, even tough it’s on the government of Albert official site, and told me that there is a wait list. I asked if I could to a tour of the Oxford location and they said that it’s waitlisted, then in asked about the St.Albert location if I could get on the wait list and do a tour of the location( I know for facts that they do tours of both locations), however very rudely I was brushed off and was told that they won’t get me on the wait list and that someone will contact me( of course they didn’t like that I enquired about the critical incident). 6 months have pasted by and nobody contacted me and I am still disappointed of the mistreatment I got.

I cannot say enough great things about Kepler Oxford. The entire staff is amazing, the menu and snacks provided for the kids are healthy and delicious. They don’t simply dump the kids into a room to play all day, they are constantly doing different activities and learning new things while there. They have a rooftop play area and spend lots of time outdoors. Our daughter loves going and we are very happy we made the move!

This business has a waiting list on which you need to pay $50 to get onto and then you won’t hear from them for likely years. Their staff/directors won’t even call back when left voicemails/requests to call to discuss openings. Very bad experience dealing with management. This is not just one location but multiple.

Our family enjoy taking our son to Kepler. All the classrooms are really bright and educators are great with the kids with fun activities. We enjoy the themed days and the daily photo and app updates on what our son is doing. They have an on-site chef and food sounds really yummy. Our son is learning lots at Kepler.

Parents Beware- Fraudulent Activity
---

I enrolled my three children at Kepler Academy at Sunlife Place from January 2022 to August 2022. Unfortunately, our experience was marred by several significant issues.

To begin with, we were quoted a monthly fee of $1,700 after grants. However, during the first three months, we were charged over $3,500 per month, totaling a staggering $10,500 for that period. The lack of communication and clarity regarding this discrepancy was deeply concerning. Attempts to seek clarification from the director only led to conflicting and unclear explanations.

The problem persisted for nearly six months before the charges were finally resolved. Even obtaining statements of costs for tax purposes became a protracted four-month ordeal, extending into April 2023.

The breaking point that prompted me to write this review occurred in August 2023, more than a year after my children attended the school, when I received an unexpected charge of $200 from Kepler Academy. My wife made multiple attempts to contact the director through email, phone calls, and text messages, all of which were marked as read, but received no response for over 30 days.

I visited the academy in person to resolve the issue. To my disbelief, the director attempted to deflect responsibility and claimed that our billing team had contacted my wife. However, she couldn't provide a clear reason why, after 12 months of service, our account was being charged. There had been no prior email notifications, physical mail, phone calls, or any indication of an outstanding bill.

When I requested a point of contact in the billing department, I was met with refusal, as the director stated she couldn't provide that information and insisted that I contact her directly.

Regrettably, I am now compelled to involve my bank and initiate a fraud investigation against a company that I had initially considered reputable.

This experience has been characterized by a lack of transparency, poor communication, and unexplained charges, leaving me deeply dissatisfied with Kepler Academy.

——
Update Sep 14 2023

We have yet to receive any communication in the form of a statement or invoice that clarifies the rationale behind a $200 charge, which was incurred over a year after our departure from your service.

It is disconcerting that it took a public post to prompt any response to our inquiries. Even following that, neither the Centre Director nor the Finance Department has taken the initiative to reach out and address this matter.

It is essential to highlight that withdrawing funds without notice or authorization, especially one year after the termination of a service agreement, is a practice that lacks transparency and professionalism. Had there been an outstanding balance in our account due to an audit, we should have been promptly informed and provided with a statement.

We are at a loss as to why our account would carry a balance, as we consistently adhered to timely fee payments and provided over two months' notice upon our departure from the facility. It is not our responsibility if the Finance and Billing department encounters difficulties in maintaining accurate and up-to-date records of parent account fees and subsidies.

Moreover, in addition to these unauthorized withdrawals, the Centre Director's refusal to acknowledge our numerous calls, emails, text messages, and in-person inquiries has further exacerbated this situation.

Given the circumstances, we formally request the immediate return of the funds in question.

We enrolled our son on this program and unfortunately at the end of the month for personal reasons we decided it wasn’t a great fit for our family. We paid the extra month required for not giving enough notice, but the institution “forgot” to remove the automatic deposits on my credit card and charged me for two more months. The month of November was only reimbursed in the middle of January and we are one day away from February and I still haven’t received my reimbursement for the debit on December 1st. I don’t understand what’s the difficulty in reimbursing an amount that was debited mistakenly by the own institution. I wouldn’t trust Kepler Academy again after so much problem to solve something that was their own mistake

Our daughter has been attending the Kepler Sun Life location for over 2 years. We are grateful for the stable routine she has with attending the Kepler program and has had many excellent educators…Shoba and Gurmeet were both wonderful at assisting her through some difficult transitions. Currently we are grateful for the gentle care that she is receiving from Ambika. Ambika greets us with a smile every morning, is open to communicating with us to ensure our daughter is well supported, and is always working hard to provide the children with a great day.

My husband and I enrolled our 15mo back in March and we were nervous wrecks about whether we were doing the right thing about putting our daughter in daycare. Especially in downtown with downtown parking. Armeen was amazing from the start with the tour and answering any and all questions for us. She really helped ease our minds. Parking turned out to be no big deal since there are multiple 15 min loading zone street stalls in front of the building and people are pretty quick with drop offs. We have never had a problem with parking out front.

I must admit the first month was rough with our daughter (and us) getting used to daycare, but now she absolutely loves it and is always happy to see her educators and friends everyday. Ji Hwa and Ritu are so great and so adorable with the babies, we trust them completely with our daughter. They have been nothing but amazing. We would recommend Kepler to anyone!

Our daughter was one of the first children enrolled at Sun Life when she was 12 months old. Trusting your child to anyone is incredibly challenging but we could not be happier with how much our daughter has flourished as a result of the environment, love, and care provided by the workers/teachers. Additionally, the Kepler team was always willing to work with us through any concerns that we had.

The only reason we are leaving Kepler is because we are moving out of the province. We are sad to leave & our daughter will miss her teachers and her group of best friends. Thank you for providing such wonderful care to our daughter, we are forever thankful!

My daughter has been at Kepler for nearly a year and she loves it. I am always touched by the deep relationships she develops with her teachers and I know she feels cared for. I love that I get daily photos of whatever craft they are working on, and the staff are always responsive to any concern I might have. They have rolled with the punches of Covid, while providing fun, educational experiences for the most important person in my life. I feel my daughter will be prepared for Kindergarten, thanks to the social experiences she has had here.

Putting my daughter in daycare for the first time was definitely nerve-racking but the staff at Kepler West Block made it such an easy transition. The teachers are all so amazing and take special care with each child. My daughter loves going there and I love seeing how much she’s learning each day. I highly recommend this child care facility!

I used Kepler Academy for my son from age one until 2.5 years old (we relocated). I was the parent that was nervous to take their child to daycare for common reasons as other parents: 1. will they be safe 2. will the daycare providers give them love and attention 3. will daycare provide the parents with daily updates on my child 4. will my child be provided nutritious meals 5. will my child get outside time... The above was not only met, but Kepler Academy exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this daycare to anyone. West Block location is also gorgeous!

My daughter (3-year old) started at Kepler in April. The first few days she cried a little, but Eleni and Sukhleen are amazing teachers, they are very loving, have lots of patience and made this transition much easier for us. The centre director, Sunita, is very attentive and dedicated to the centre. She also makes sure to know every child and family that attend Kepler. Actually, within a week, almost everyone knew who my daughter and I were. I felt I was welcomed into a family. Sheila, is always smiling and welcoming us when we get to the centre. I feel safe when I talk her as she is always reassuring me that my children are doing well (you know how this transition can be harder on parents than on the children!). The food menu is diverse and rich in fruits and vegetables, so I don’t have to worry whether my daughter is eating healthy while there. Actually, we get daily updates on what and how much our children eat (plus a picture of an activity!). The activities are well thought out and appropriate for children age and development. My daughter developed a lot since she started at Kepler, in all aspects, cognitively, physically, socially, and emotionally. She didn't speak English at all, now she cannot wait to say "hello" to people on the street and talk to them. My son (18-month old) is also attending Kepler now, he started in July. I cannot say enough how much I appreciate his teacher, Sujata. After a few weeks he would go to her without crying. She gave him lots of attention and love, she is always smiling, kind, and has the best humor. She is on top of everything and very approachable, making my life way easier when I drop and pick up my son. I am so lucky to have both my children attending a great centre! They have many more great people there. Teacher Happy and teacher Veronica are sometimes in charge of my children and they are so lovely and caring too. I have a feeling they like what they do and are happy in their professions. What else could I mother ask for?

Absolutely love this place and my daughter will miss her teachers dearly. All the teachers and staff are amazing. My daughter has been attending since she was 10.5 months old and is always happy to come and always happy when I pick her up. And the food they feed her is fantastic! Thank you for doing such a great job Kepler Westblock, we will miss you!

Kepler Westlink is AMAZING. I took my daughter to 2 other places before I found Kepler. My daughter had a really hard time transitioning from being home with me to going to daycare. Every staff member at Kepler has treated my daughter as if she is their own. They teach the children so much, I am amazed at how much she is learning. Chona and Maria have been exceptional with comforting my daughter when she has a bad day. I can't say enough good things about Kepler. They are all wonderful, they are all like family to us. I wouldn't feel comfortable leaving my daughter anywhere else.

I can not say enough amazing things about Kepler and my son's educators Anu, Alisha and Sita!  All three of them, and the entire team at Kepler have made our son's transition into daycare so wonderful!  Our little boy loves going to daycare, and I know these three lovely ladies give Finn the best care and attention while he is there.

We are so happy we chose Kepler and love love love our son's educators!  Our son has learned so many new skills and gets to do so many fun activities throughout the day!  I would recommend Kepler to anyone and everyone!

Thank you again Anu, Alisha and Sita!  We love that you are so amazing with our little boy! All three of you have made this experience so incredibly wonderful!

Kepler westlink is amazing. Our daughter is a very sensitive girl. We had trouble at first leaving her and tried 2 different daycares. Kepler has been so good for her in expanding her social skills, her alphabet and numbers, and just all around knowledge. She has just turned 3 and knows more than a kindergarten aged child. Rhrizlane, Chona, and Maria have been paramount to her learning, and her Comfort there. Kris, the chef is awesome too!!! It smells so good when we come in and we know there are amazing healthy meals prepared for our child there everyday. We are so thankful we have this facility to care for our child. They're an incredible team and I am so glad we she has a place there. ❤️ thank you Kepler or being so kind to our baby girl. You are like family to us and we wouldn't trust anyone else with our baby.

Toni is an amazing director. We are so happy she has returned to Kepler Westlink. Her communication with parents is exemplary! My son is 3 years old and this is his first experience with daycare. His Educators Ritika and Jory have been very good to him. I can see they really do care about him. Ritika is always smiling and so happy to see my son, greeting him excitedly. Jory seems to have a very special bond with him and some of the other kids, she is great at comforting them. My son will often fall asleep on Jory at nap time when he has been upset. She has a calming and caring nature about her.

We were asked to write a good review at first so I did. Won't make that mistake again. Things started great but we soon realized that the turnover at that place was out of this world. I often went to pick up my child and she was alone in the window waiting for me. Too many kids, not enough educators to take care of them. They kept telling us that they were short staff... Ever since we moved our child to a different daycare, we've notice a huge difference in our child's development and happiness. Fun fact, when I asked the last daycare director (had 3 come through in 15 months) if she was curious to know why I was pulling my kid out of there, she simply told me no... and that just validated even more my decision to move away from that Kepler Academy location.

my son loves this place. Suni is the best and gentle teacher…. she is so nice and understand what kids need…. nice and clean. The location is great for parent work at downtown. easy park vehicle . Suni always detail report kids regulary. Suni is the best ♥️♥️♥️

My child loves Kidspace MELCC and sometimes they don't want to leave. The place is kept immaculately clean and the staff are incredibily friendly. They focus on  a Montressori approach to a child's development and we've seen that in our own kid when she washes her own hands or wants to potty. Also the kid's meals are great! Makes my fussy eater eat! 100% Recommend!

Amazing staff with so much heart and a caring mindset. It's wonderful seeing our sons get excited about going to daycare.
The management is committed to providing a safe, fun and loving environment. I highly recommend the parents to try it.
Great place! The facility is clean, the staff are so kind and professional!
Nice place for kids!

I have been taking my son here for almost 2 months. The staff are very friendly and do an amazing job making my little guy feel welcome and safe. He’s been coming home learning something new everyday, I also appreciate the feedback I get from staff on how he’s doing in daycare. The place is very clean and organized and lots of toys and crafts for the kids. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a clean and welcoming daycare for their kid(s) first experience away from home!

Absolutely fantastic childcare center!!! Amazing staff and fantastic communication with parents. My 4 year old was struggling and was diagnosed with ADHD and the staff and center worked with us, and together we figured it out. My kids beg to go to daycare, they love their teachers and the staff. They do a fantastic job of planning events for holidays and letting the parents know. The food the kids get while at the centet is healthy and they love it! Honestly I couldn't ask for a better group of people to watch and care for my children.  You won't be disappointed if you pick the amazing team at kiddie company!!!!
The owner is lovely lady with lots of experience in dealing with kids. Experienced staff. Very bright and clean facility.

Very good daycare in my opinion, I’m a first time mom and this was my first time placing my child in another persons care and I am very pleased with them. My daughter was comfortable from the beginning and loves it here. They love her and are always happy to see her come in everyday, just the same as she is to see them. Some days she doesn’t want to leave lol. Would highly recommend sending your child here

Facility is really nice, bright and clean. However it is poorly run. Also, if your preschooler doesn’t nap or isn’t potty trained, this isn’t the place for you. Poor communication from teacher and director and did not feel like my child was well cared for.

My son has been attending your daycare since he was 11 months old and we have appreciated the wonderful care and attention that he has received from your staff during his time there. I would like to give a special thanks to his teacher who has shown great compassion for him.
We would like to express our gratitude for the high level of care and support that you have provided to my son over the years. We have been impressed with the quality of your facility and the professionalism of your staff. It has been reassuring to know that my son was in good hands while we were at work and we really appreciated the warm and welcoming atmosphere that you have created at Kidlets.

My daughter attended preschool at Kidlets and had an incredible experience. She developed her communication skills and gained confidence. Now, it's my son's turn and I'm sure he'll have an awesome time. Teacher Sandy is caring and encouraging. The facility is always clean and organized. Teacher-children ratio is great, I can see that they are able to focus on them. When pandemic started, I have seen how they followed and implemented safety guidelines which is really commendable. I highly recommend them to family and friends. Keep it up!

We have been sending our daughter to this daycare since she was 2 years and now she is almost five and she is still going there. We have seen immense development in her and lots of changes for good. The staff is very friendly, responsible and very much involved with kids.
The daycare staffs are really amazing they take care of the kids very well, it's wonderful seeing our daughter get excited about going to daycare here. The teachers are always making an effort to engage the kids and involve them in the activity for their developement.
The staffs are really committed to providing a safe fun and loving environment for the kids, we are really thankful to the amazing team.

Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. It has a very homey feeling and the child to teacher ratio is great! I know that my children are personally taken care of The management is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment.I would recommend this place to everyone with little ones.

It was the very first time I would be taking my kids to the daycare and I was a bit nervous about what the experience would feel like for my cuties. Every inch of worry that I had disappeared when I interacted with the staff here. I was rushed and needed to start off immediately and they indulged me. They gave me daily updates about my younger child's schedule.

I can say I'm loving this first experience. my kids are happy, I have peace of mind, We do not have to break the bank to pay for these services.

My daughter is going to Kidlets from last 18 months. She always seems excited to go to the daycare. Even at home she talks about her teachers and friends. I am glad that I found the daycare which take cares of my daughter as we do at home.

I highly recommend kidlets daycare, my daughter wasn’t into sharing or repaying what I said for 123’s-ABC’s and she’s been there for about almost 2 weeks and she’s done a high improvement. The tour of the daycare was amazing as welll the director mehak helped through out the process and helperd understand the scehdule and action . I enjoyed how it’s set up with three different parts for the age group. If you’re looking this is the place to go. Five stars all the way

This is the best Daycare ever! My kids recently started going only twice a week and they absolutely enjoy every bit of it. The educators are also very welcoming and I can see from my kids just how well their taken care of. I have also noticed some improvements in their developments in learning/speaking.
I am happy to say that my kids will be going full time. They love it so much. I would like to say a special thankyou to Sukhdeep for being so patient with my little ones. Thank you for everything!

My daughter extremely loves going to Kidlets Daycare everyday. The teachers are amazing, welcoming and approachable. The classroom and facility is always clean and tidy. It is without hesitation and extreme pleasure that I would recommend Kidlets Daycare.

My nephew goes to the kidlets daycare. It is one of the best daycare I came across till now. Teachers create a home environment for the children and family. Well organized with active staff. I would recommend this daycare to everyone..
My kid started here at 18 months and the classroom teachers are great and seem engaging. Kiddo loves daycare and comes back happy when she's there. Good stuff.

It’s been couple of months now that my Son has been going to this day care.

All I can say is he seems to be happy there, loves his teachers, ‘Yuvi’ , ‘Irene’ and ‘Fozia’ all are very loving and caring.

The Director ,Charyl is also great and very responsive and responsible.

Thank you for caring for my Son when we can’t!
My kids love it everything!  Thanks you so much! It’s best daycare!
Very well run with exceptional staff.

Our family has had a fantastic experience at Kids and Co Ice District. I had researched and toured many other facilities before deciding on this one. It is organized, clean, and I love the ability to see the kids on the app and receive updates about what they did during the day (what they ate, drank, slept, etc). It is apparent that the leadership is outstanding because communication is fast and open, and all of the staff and warm and welcoming and made us feel that our boys would be well taken care of. Vidhya, the center director has been so accommodating. I highly recommend Kids and Company Ice District.

Amazing facility! After a not-so-great experience with one daycare, we had to make a switch quickly. Kids & Company was our obvious choice — the director and teachers put our worries at ease. They even let us do a free trial to make sure it was a good fit for our one-year-old son before we registered. They let the daycare do the talking instead of just telling us what we wanted to hear. We were so happily surprised by the attention and care given to our son, who is quite sensitive. We get face-to-face updates at the end of the day as well as throughout. They really care about letting us know how our son is doing and making sure we’re happy with how they’re handling his care. Our little guy loves playing with his new friends and has a blast every day! Can’t recommend this centre enough.

My child has been with Kids & Co for over 4 years, and the daycare and the staff are amazing. The programs are great and is tailored to each and every child’s ability. The staff are the best, they take such great care and always provide one on one for my child when I ask. The daycare is bright, the large windows provide natural sunlight for everyone. The outdoor space is great as well. I would highly recommend this daycare to those who work in downtown, such as myself, as it is really convenient.

Recently started sending our toddler to this location, all the way from Southern Edmonton, and have had a great experience overall! Our son loves being there and we are seeing some very positive improvements in him. We are very impressed and happy with the amazing staff there who always greet us with a smiling face. Special thanks to Yvette, Claire, and others for being so caring, supportive, and dedicated. Kudos to Vidya for not just her leadership but being proactively involved with the daycare activities as well. Keep up the great work!

The team at Kids and Company Ice District are amazing. Like many parents returning to work, I was very particular about who would take care of my boys. My boys have been attending since 2017 and we could not be happier. The staff turnover is very low,  the leadership team is clearly strong, everyone is responsive to your needs as a parent and your children's. Love the ability to log on anytime to take a peek at what kids are up to, the food, the fact that it isn't one big open space but rooms are divided by actual walls. You receive reports throughout the day about activities, sleep time, potty times etc. The fact that the parking is underground and K&Company have reserved spots (free) for pick up and drop off is a real perk - especially in the winter.

The staff are like family for my kids and we will certainly miss them all when my kids go to full time school. I will say it is on the expensive side but you get what you pay for. I would not hesitate in recommending this place to family and friends.

We have had both of our daughters in this Kids & Co for a few years now and the experience has been fantastic.  Our children love their teachers and quite often give hugs to them upon arrival.  They have made many friends and their staff are very cognizant in ensuring there is enough staff for each class to adequately attend to the children.  We unfortunately have to move our children to another daycare to accommodate our eldest's kindergarten commencing shortly and I am sure they (along with their parents) will miss all of the great staff and friends they have met.   I can assure you the lower star reviews are not a true representation of this particular location.  Many thanks to all of the staff for helping in our children's growth and we wish our eldest's school was closer so we could keep them there.

This daycare is so awesome! I highly recommend for anyone who is looking to enroll their child in a caring and safe environment. I enrolled my two year old and he absolutely loves it. The caregivers are so caring and give so much love towards each kid. Along with that the daycare director and assistant director are so nice! They ensure every morning they welcome us with a big smile and every evening they say good bye again with a big smile. I’m extremely happy with this daycare!

So disappointing. I enroll my kids in this daycare because was on front of the school.
This was July 2019, Chloe, the director email me the prices and how much it will be starting on September after the yearly price adjustment and summer break time. On September, the amount withdraw from my account was higher that agreed so I asked what happened. By that time, the director was Tam and she asked me for the emails.
I sent all the emails exchanged with Chloe stating the price and she reply that was a mistake from the previous director and accounting agreed to do a 1 time discount, but they couldn't respect the price given.
Well, on December 3rd I was notified at 7pm by Jackie Winter, Senior Are Manager that the center will close on December 13th and they will transfer all the kids to a different one, 20 min away from that one. A daycare that has been running for 20+ years, no caring for the problems this would carry.
As there are no other daycares that work with my kids school, we agreed.
On January 30 I gave my 1 month notice to take my kids to somewhere else as the distance is killing our days. Next day we receive a call asking what they could do for us to keep the kids in the center, that they could offer us a great discount, but honestly, the distance is stronger than the money, so we refuse.
2 days later, Jackie email me saying I'm owning them money the Subsidy didn't cover in October.
I not even have subsidy...I forwarded her all the emails of why I do got a one time discount and she never replies.
Now my kids are somewhere else, I'm receiving emails trying to charge me this mystery amounts.
I tried to call the main office in Ontario and no one answer ever, the current site director (because no one seem to last over 3 months) said she want me to send all the emails again.

Please avoid the headache, this franchise is so poorly managed and they close the daycare no caring for the effect on the kids or parents.
My friend in BC had the same situation, they close a center from one day to another.

My daughter is 4 and she went there for preschool but it would be mistake to call it preschool it is mostly just a daycare. They barely learn new things. It is mostly free play time. They have open door bathroom policy which means kids all see each other when one of them is in the toilet. Isnt it privacy violation? I told them i was teaching my kid privacy and she needs to close the door and the manager said she will come with a solution by the end of the week but nothing has been done. Also most of the time my daughter came home starving. I was bringing food with me so she can eat some in car. And when i mentioned this they said they cant force kids to eat. And one day her lips were so dry and i asked didnt she have any water? And she said she asked for it but she couldn't get and I checked with teacher and she said there was a construction in the building so they couldnt use the waters. So my poor kid couldnt drink a sip of water all day and she was dehydrated.It is the worst worst worst daycare/ school i've ever seen.
Only good thing teacher Rose is nice.

I could not recommend the Tamarack Kids and Company daycare more. Claudia and Joy are absolutely delightful and always so helpful and in-depth whenever I have any questions. Gagan and Shireen (in the infant room) are so patient and caring teachers. I have never doubted the care that my daughter gets on the daily!
We are glad that we chose Kids & Company Tamarack daycare for our daughter. Meena is absolutely passionate & caring teacher that we could have hoped for! Would definitely recommends to others.

Our child had some difficulties with staff members. To be fair, our child was being very defiant with some of them. We had been there for 5 years, when one day, I was brought into the office, and told that our child was no longer welcome there, and we had til the end of the week (it was Wednesday) to find a new daycare, with no previous written, or verbal warnings. I dealt with Kidco corporate, and they gave us another week, and 2 months refund for our troubles. At this point, I wouldn’t be writing this review, but the director, who was chastised, called the surrounding daycares in the area to warn them about us. Our kid needed a change of scenery and is doing well. Also, the food quality is poor, and the staff do an insufficient job of protecting the kids on field trips. I wouldn’t sent me worst enemy to this place. The reviews on here may seem mostly good, but go on Indeed and see what former staff have to say, that’s the real scoop.

Love this daycare. Our daughter has been here over a year and it has been a great experience. She looks forward to going every day to see her friends and her teachers, she talks about all the fun things she did during the day, and has learnt so much. Any time I have had concerns, they have been discussed promptly, professionally and have always had a follow up initiated by the director which has always been appreciated. While it’s on the pricey side for daycares, it’s absolutely worth it for the quality care our daughter is receiving.

I heard about Kids and Company from my boss at the time. We checked them out and I am so glad we did.
We really liked the fact that we could check in on our daughter on their webcams. Which, by doing so we saw some things that gave us cause for concern. We brought them up to the director and she was FANTASTIC. She took our concerns very seriously and acted immediately on them to correct them. She also kept me informed throughout the process.
We also brought a concern up to the assistant director about the angle of the camera and how we couldn't see a corner of the classroom very well. She immediately looked at it and corrected it while I was there.
Now what we see is fantastic staff engaging with my daughter and the children in her classroom.
I used to be worried as a first time mom leaving my daughter in the hands of strangers as I didn't know what level of care she would receive but I do not worry anymore. I know she is in GREAT hands. It shows by the enthusiasm my daughter has when she comes to this place.
My daughter used to cling to me and cry when I tried to pass her off to the teacher, because it was a new experience for her, but now she almost jumps out of my arms to go to the teacher, Joy or Claudia when I drop her off! She sometimes even waves goodbye to me, which makes me very happy to see she is comfortable with the ladies there!
You can tell all of the staff love the children that go there, that its not just a job to them. The staff know all the childrens names as they pass in the hall, whether they are in the same classroom or not.
We are even buying a house in the same area (even though we wanted to go further south) so that we didn't have to find a new daycare.
I highly recommend this daycare!!

I could go on for hours about how amazing this daycare is! The staff members are some of the friendliest people I have ever met. At first, I was so nervous to send my daughter to daycare, but my anxiety quickly went away. These people really care about the kids in their care and it shows. If we didn’t live so far, we would have stayed. We are beyond sad that we had to leave. Thank you so much to all the staff for treating my daughter like family! You will always have a special place in our hearts!

AMAZING DAYCARE! I enrolled my daughter in this daycare when she was 6 months old. I was very nervous but I needed to return to work. My daughter is now 9 months old and she smiles and kicks her legs when she sees the Kids ‘R’ Us staff, especially her main caregiver in the baby room. The staff here love my baby and it helps to put me at ease when I work long hours. There is a 8 person stroller that the babies are regularly taken on walks with when the weather permits. There have been multiple times where I have came to pick the baby up and she is out on a walk, I love that she is able to get fresh air! I highly recommend Kids ‘R’ Us daycare #1!

This is one of the best and affordable daycare in whole Edmonton. My child is going to this daycare from last 3 years. I never had any trouble with anything. The staff is very well qualified. The care, love and support that my child gets can not be defined in words. The Director of the daycare is very nice and warm lady. The staff take very good care of the hygiene of the kids. They provide variety of activities and keep the kids busy all day. The daycare park is very well built and safe. The amazing part is they have gym in the daycare. I don’t have to worry about my child food as they provide very nutritious and healthy meals. The location of the daycare is awesome as they have community and spray park on the walking distance. I would highly recommend each and everyone to enrol their kids in Kids R us #1 daycare for the best and affordable services.

I love this daycare, my daughter is always so happy when she sees her teachers. The director is very understanding, flexible, caring and patient. I like that they have lots of activities and try to get the kids out as much as weather permits.

The Daycare has good access to community playgrounds and parks. When my child attended the daycare, she had fun especially during the summer time. The daycare owner provides lots of toys and arts and crafts for the children to enjoy. During Christmas season, they hold a concert for the families attending the daycare and they are very welcoming to many families. The daycare fees are competitive with most other daycares. My daughter is now in Kindergarten and she still talks about her time at Kids R Us Daycare.

They’ve been in business for over 12 years and have served hundreds of families in the Edmonton area.

Staff is super friendly and well trained in child care. They have all been vetted by the director who has been a child care worker since the 90s.

The new building they have built is three floors. All custom built to be a state of the art child care center.

No where else this much attention is paid toward each individual child. Parents have visited and always left confident and satisfied their children are in good hands.

This is an exceptional day care facility!!! The owners and staff are very welcoming and friendly. Staff members are highly experienced and give the children outstanding care. All employees are very diligent in upholding health and safety standards, with daily temperature checks and increased sanitation due to COVID.
My kid's love seeing their teachers everyday. Very friendly staff... very loving... They are very helpful and understanding.

My daughter is attending this daycare from past 6months and she love this place. She is always excited to go this daycare.  Honestly, all the teachers are well educated and skillful. They love children so much that they do not  want to go home. They provide nutritional meal as well. The owner is really helpful and flexible.  I recommend this place to

everyone.

Absolutely love this place .The staff are excellent and responsive .My son have been attending Kids R Us 2+ Years. They’ve always gone above and beyond for us and they genuinely care about my son. The programming is of high quality and there’s always somethings fun and exciting going on. My son loves his teachers, we’ve never been disappointed and I can’t even express how wonderful they are. I highly recommend this centre to anyone looking for . Somewhere who will treat your children with love and care.

What an incredible daycare!!! The owner, director and staff always go above and beyond to ensure that my children are loved and cared for. The fact they drive both my kids to and from school is a huge stress reliever. My children get so excited to talk about the amazing crafts and activities they do everyday , as well as tell me how excited they are to go the next day .
I recommend this daycare . What a great place !!!!

Just wanted to take a moment to really tell you all how happy I am with kids club , not only is the staff amazing with kids but also at keeping parents informed and up to date daily. My kids are truly happy at kids club and I would drive from any part of the city just to keep them there. Laura and Charlene go above and beyond to make you feel heard and take any concerns you have very seriously. Staff are super friendly and very great with children.

It’s truly a kids club with lots of fun and love.

Thank you :)

The staff are good with the kids but the management is abysmal. The management lacks integrity and they also seem to think it's fun to defraud foreigners.
The owner of this establishment does not issue receipts and is never clear on the daycare charges. They kept changing how much my kid's fees are. They are also the most expensive after school OSC, they charged $650 for my 3rd grader.
My kids went here for 2 months and I only received 2 updates about their daily activities.
My younger son came home with an injury twice and I never received any information from the daycare about the injuries. When another kid punched my son, the management at the daycare simply scolded us and our son in reaction to him being punched. Somehow, it was his fault that another kid walked up to him and punched him.
The total disregard for my kids motivated me to pull them out as soon as I found a more organized daycare that is accepting of all races.

Out daughter loves coming to daycare every day! The staff is friendly and great with the kids! We get email updates every day about what our daughter does during the day with pictures, and we love it! They feed her fresh homemade meals everyday that she loves. I would recommend this daycare to anyone!

This daycare is amazing. Our twins have been there for over a year, and are excited to go every morning. Every worker there is great with the children. The daycare is very warm, and they want parents to be involved. During COVID, they have done their utmost to keep parents informed and keep everyone safe. They also email us every day at lunch time, tell us what our children have been doing, and send along photos. Cannot recommend it enough!

Hands down one of the best childcare experiences as a mother.  My twins started here when they were about 5-6 months old. They are now 20 months. The workers go above and beyond to keep the children safe. The communication is clear and the environment is clean. I keep coming back because there is no other place I trust with my babies. It is hard to leave once you feel the family environment. The twins love running to their teacher the moment we walk in the front door. Thank you so much to Sharron and her wonderful staff for providing peace of mind childcare.

The staff are incredibly kind and caring. They showed great compassion during a time of need, and our son felt truly at home with his teachers. Although we had to move him to another daycare due to logistical reasons, we greatly appreciate the positive experiences he had here.

This is one Daycare that my Son enjoys alot. The Director is approachable and the teachers are very Kind. Always smiling whenever I come to pick up my son, also the daycare is clean and  have lots of fun activities for kids. I highly recommend this Daycare. No discrimination at all!

Kids Cove is a very well-run daycare. My child absolutely loves going.  The staff is amazing and the kids learn a lot and have fun as well.  There is great cultural diversity and representation among the children, staff, and programming. They have been amazing during COVID and I am happy to have them in our neighbourhood.

The staff at Kid’s Cove are incredibly caring and made meaningful relationships with my children. Many of them are furthering their childcare education and clearly have a passion for children. I loved how the educators shared their cultural traditions with the children. Any issues or concerns I had were always resolved in a timely and professional manner.

i strongly disagree , with the review of M i have been a customer for 6 years.  I have 2 daughters, one of them attends the day care from the baby room, now she is about to start grade 3 and she absolutely loves this place and my 2-year-old enjoys it a lot, the food is fully balanced and meets the nutritional needs of the children, dietary restrictions parents can bring food to warm up.  I personally recommend this day care.  all the staff are amazing when i pick up my kids i see how they are all engaging and meeting their needs.  the director is always willing to help and answer all questions.

We called the daycare in May to confirm the availability, they said they have a spot, sent us the application form, we filled it and send back. Comes Sep, called back they said even though I submitted the application, doesn't mean they guarantee the spot. If I can't trust them to handle an administrative task like that, how do I trust them with my child 8 hours a day?
My kid loves coming to this daycare. Sometimes it’s hard to get him to leave. Friendly staff. Very happy I picked this place.

This place is very FILTHY, don't bother brining your kids here. They don't follow kids diets, the owner is cheap and doesn't like spending the extra money to buy quality food, counting to feed kids cheap meals. The director is rude and talks down at parents and her workers and doesn't care about the children at all she just sits in her room, doesn't even engage with the kids at all.
This daycare is one of the best daycares around the city it’s very clean and organized and the workers are so nice and welcoming also the location is very good

Great my kid loves it here and Jen is such a hard worker that makes it all run. Healthy different types.of meals.  They go outside . They can explore and they always do their best to meet each kids
needs.

I had the opportunity to witness the exceptional care and learning opportunity provided at this daycare. The staff arepassionate, knowledgeable and dedicated to the wellbeing of every child in their care.

The facilities are exceptional, with bright and spacious play areas, outdoor spaces that encourage exploration and physical activity, and age-appropriate toys and learning materials. The curriculum is carefully designed to engage children in a range of activities that promote creativity, critical thinking, and socialization.

One thing that stands out is the staff's commitment to individualized attention and support. They take the time to get to know each child, their unique needs and interests, and create a personalized care plan that helps each child thrive. This approach ensures that every child
receives the attention and support they need to reach their full potential.

The staff also maintain a strong focus on safety and communication, ensuring that parents are kept informed and involved in their child's care. They work collaboratively with families to create a supportive and nurturing environment that promotes growth and development.

Overall, I highly recommend this daycare facility to parents looking for exceptional care and learning opportunities for their children.
The staff are passionate and committed, and the facilities and
curriculum are designed to promote growth, development, and lifelong
learning.

I have been so impressed with this daycare, I was nervous to send my kids to a daycare in Edmonton because I do not know any of the workers personally but they have surpassed all of my expectations.

The facility is new, clean and beautiful, there are so many different activities and toys for the kids to play with as well as a fenced in play yard.

Every morning when I drop my kids off my oldest is so excited to be here that she can hardly wait to say goodbye to me which is totally unlike her (in a good way).

The staff are so warm and welcoming, I can tell they truly enjoy having my kids and are always so happy to see them, which is huge! There is nothing worse than leaving your children with someone who views them as a paycheque.

I am so grateful that I found this daycare and that I can have peace of mind when I drop my babies off for the day!

Thank you Kids Village and staff ♥️ you are all amazing

Nav and Jen are awesome! They really do the best they can and go the extra mile. They listen to the parents and are so patient with the kids. They also offer transportation, which is awesome! Highly recommend!

Can't say enough good things about this daycare. My baby was here since 5 months old, he has grown so much, and developed a strong bond with all his educators. My oldest used to come here during the weekends and she loved it so much. You can tell that all the teachers really love kids, truly caring and inspiring. The owner is very friendly and cares about the staff. Each room is quite spacious. If I were to give any critical feedback I'd say if the baby room could be a bit cleaner, not that it's a concern just improvement.

Only 10 months at this daycare and my son developed so fast cognitively. Everyday he learns a new word from the daycare and it's as if all the children share a bond with him. Rich environment for children to grow and develop. My son is always happy and bubbly at this daycare

My daughter attended Kids3 for three years (from ages 1-4). She grew so much from all the engaging and educational activities the staff organize for the kids everyday. The staff were all so wonderful and caring. I can’t recommend this daycare enough.

I had wonderful experience. Highly recommend Kids3 daycare. Owner and staff are awesome and very friendly. Love the diversity of kids and staff here. My little one started going at the age of 18 months and now he is 3 years old. Never had any concerns or issues. Always felt like I am sending my little one to his another family where all the staff work very hard and take care of kids so much. My son love to go there everyday and I had to wait for him when I pick him up as he doesn’t wanted to leave his daycare and love to play there. Recently we moved to a different place and that was the only reason I had to change the daycare. Otherwise I would have never changed as he was so much used to and love his teachers. He still says his teachers name at home. Thank you to everyone for taking care of my little one. Special thanks to Sohaila, Avneet and Harleen for your hard work and love towards the kids.

I am currently the Director at Kids3 Daycare&OSC
It is a great daycare. The families and children are amazing.
The staff are very dedicated to their job and plan many wonderful activities for the children and have amazing  loving interactions with the children and their parents.
We have  a full time cook who makes yummy snacks and lunches.

I have only worked here a short time but  the owner has been very welcoming and so appreciative of me and the staff.  She has made me feel very welcomed and valued.

I would recommend anyone to bring their child here.

Great staff here. I would highly recommended them. They are not money greed.
Coordinate well with the parents and transparent. I'm very grateful we have good relationship with the staff. Friendly people and reliable.. .
Jesus bless them.

I'm so happy and thankful to the staff of Kidstown Daycare for their best services. My niece is always so excited to go to daycare each day! We noticed such a positive growth in her speech and learning capabilities in a short span of Time. We as a family feel so secure and confident that she is in good hands. I highly recommend Kidstown Daycare to all who want quality service for their family kids. Keep up with the good work Kidstown Daycare

The teachers and all the members treat the children like their own. Very clean and well maintained daycare. Place where my son loved more than his own house. Can trust them blindly with your children. Havent found a better daycare.
I have started sending my son too from today. He liked the daycare very much. Everyone is so caring.
We are customer of kidstown for almost 2 years now they take good care of my son as they are family member. I did not encounter any problem and all the staff are very nice.. Owners are good people.

It was a great experience with kidswise daycare.The staff is amazing and  friendly with kids. Specially Iqra is a wonderful personality she always heeds the attention to all my requests beyond expectations.

I usually don’t often write reviews but I couldn’t help it after my experience with this daycare. They are so kind and amazing. Both of my kids attended this facility and they loved it so much. You could see the excitement in them every morning on their way to school. My daughter would always tell me everything teacher said😊😊 she would always say i like my teacher. Their communication and understanding with me was so beautiful. Trust me leaving your kids with this facility, you have nothing to be afraid of, they show that they are parents. I will most highly recommend them.

Iqra is the best care provider ever. She is exceptionally kind, trustworthy, reliable and flexible. She treats children as her own. My daughter has been under her care for many years and she loves to be with her. Highly recommended!

I cannot speak highly enough about the quality of care provided by Sabeen. Her level of communication, kindness, and patience is unmatched. My daughter felt so comfortable and there were never any issues with drop off, because she felt so safe with Sabeen.
10/10 would recommend. You won't regret it.

My children have grown up under Iqra's care and she treats them as her own. She takes great care of their nutrition, and provides plenty of play & learning opportunities. Now that we've moved farther away, we still send our son to her because we can't think of a better care provider for him.

As a newcomer to Canada, I really like this daycare and am very happy with their service. I have 2 kids who attend the after-school care and 1 who goes for the daycare and all 3 totally love it! They have an amazing app that gives continuous updates on the kids and that way I am fully aware of what's going on there. The teachers are amazing and Aimie is great too! Keep up the good work and keep our kids smiling.

My daughter is going to this daycare. Everyday I received daily pictures and messages about her well being. All educators take care for every child and develop their different development skills. Director Emy is professional and warm with the children. Highly recommended, very professional and Amaging management.

My daughter goes to the daycare very happy every morning, all the teachers are very good and patient, especially Miss Amy, the daycare is always clean.
I'm very happy

Amy and her team are very friendly and professional.
Daycare’s very clean and organized.
My daughter always having good days at daycare and never wanna leave there in the end of the day :)
Strongly recommended !

They only want to keep the kids with normal speech and behaviour, I was on waiting list with kids cloud so my sister visit them to complete the formalities, but when she said he has ( my son ) has autism, they quickly changed their topic and said we will keep you updated because someone else already took the spot. It doesn’t make any sense.

I learned about kidz cove daycare through someone else who had such a good experience. My kids never went to daycare before and was little nervous on what to expect as I decided to go back to work. I was amazed how the stuff cared for my children and learned their needs quickly. Every stuff that works their is great with the kids and cares for them. The owner Manisha is an amazing caring person and professional that communicates very well with the parents. I would recommend this daycare 100% to any parents that is looking for safe, loving environment for their children.

The staff at Kidz Cove are wonderful, caring, compassionate and work hard to keep the kids happy and safe. They provide great educational activities and keep the kids engaged all day long. The snacks and hot lunches are healthy and filling. I would recommend this daycare to anyone!

I had both my boys in this daycare for 4 months. The staff are great, always had something to say or talk about what the boys did during the day.... Or if there was problems with fighting or accidents, they always spoke to me about it right away and tried to be very helpful about ways to work out the problems.... I found the staff to be generally good and caring people toward my children, and very friendly. My children loved this daycare and I would recommend it to anyone!

My daughter absolutely loves going here every day. She could be cranky driving to daycare but once I open the door and she see the place so stops fussing and starts smiling. She’s smiling when I drop her off and smiling when I pick her up (I know it makes it easier for me dropping her off knowing she enjoys it there). The staff are all amazing, super friendly all the time and they also update you daily on what you kid did that day. I’m so glad I chose this daycare for my little girl.

My children are excited to go to daycare in the morning, something which has never happened before, the staff are incredible, patient, loving, attentive to the kids. They are ALWAYS doing something that involves learning and new experiences. The staff are very upfront about our children and are always giving updates on daily activities. They are very aware of the kids moods and encourage safe and appropriate ways to display emotions and feelings. I am so happy with my experience and am excited to stay with kidzhub for the duration if my kids daycare needs!!
My son goes to Kidz Hub and he likes it there. All the teachers are so nice, very friendly and easy to talk to. They always have positive attitude. Two thumbs up!!!
Kidz hub is amazing.this daycare is very clean the staff is friendly and really cares about the children, my 2 daughter love to spend time here, we are very happy with this centre.

We are so happy with the ladies and the wonderful work they do with our children
Great place to give your kids a head start on early education

Very well organized. All the staff take good care of the kids. Highly recommended. Trustworthy and reliable.
All the staff members are dedicated and hardworking.
They give all their energies for the better future of the kids.
Salute to them.
Highly recommended.

Kids junction day care and out of school care Ltd is a very professional, warm, friendly and caring facility based from my own experience. They treat children like their own family. I would say it’s one of the best day care in Edmonton. The owner Param is very experienced, professional, warm and caring personality and same goes to the rest of their staff.They have a dedicating, hardworking and caring team. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

I have nothing but good things to say about this daycare and all the staff. I have been through this daycare for five years with my first son and now since 6 months with my second son. When we moved from the city into Sherwood park I still drive my kid to this daycare because of the trust, reliability and love I have for them. A daycare should make you feel comfortable and treat your children like a family away from home, the director teacher Param has always gone above and beyond for our family when needed. Teachers Melani and Cathy have been nurturing and always informing me of changing situations with my youngest babe. A big thanks to them helping our kids grow.

Kidz Junction daycare is indeed the best facility in town. With extremely reliable and cooperative staff who not only understand about our values but also our concerns. As a working mom I had some concerns about sending my kids to fulltime daycare facility but fortunately I got to meet staff at this facility who not only   considered my request about serving  (halal) food but also made sure my kid is well taken care of.   They were also cooperative at
Times when I was in hurry or was late. The staff is polite and very professional. They take their responsibility very seriously, its never easy to trust someone with ur kids but these gals made me feel so relax.

This daycare is amazing place! Very clean with great staff and very welcoming. My children have been going here for almost 12 months on and off. and I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. Please keep on the great job that you ladies do.
Cheers !

My child has been attending this daycare for a year now, he really like this one teacher Crez. My child adores Crez completely, every morning he is excited to come and play with her. Crez took great care of my child, she makes sure nothing happens and that the children are always happy. Thank you Crez!

The teachers here have really become a second family to my kids since they have been going there. I know that when I leave my children there, they will be well cared for and loved. The centre is always clean, and the children are always engaged in activities every time I stop in. I do not have enough wonderful things to say about them.

No words can do the KIDZONE day care just. Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. It’s wonderful seeing my 3 kids  get excited about going to daycare here. The teachers really make an effort to engage the kids and develop them in a very individualised way. The management is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment and I'm very thankful to the whole team at KIDZONE DAYCARE🥰🥰🥰🥰❤❤❤❤❤❤.

I chose this daycare 2 years ago bcz it was close to my house.
recently we moved but my kids refused to change the daycare.
they really enjoy their time there.
staff is friendly and lovely.
they offer healthy snacks that my kids really likes.

My son would always be left neglected on his own ostracized from the rest of the children. He would be in a high chair by himself with his back turned to all the other children while they played. And this was somehitn I witnessed on more than one occasions when I wen to pick him up.He would always have a diaper rash when either my mother or myself would go to pick him. I think they would leave his diaper unattended to for most of the day, they would change his diaper just before I would come to grab him. But because I didn't pick him up the same day everyday they would always tell either myself or my mother that his diaper needed to be changed. This was not an isolated event it became a pattern with my son's diaper suspiciously needing to be changed just when someone would arrive to pick him up.

The director of the daycare seemed quite apathetic and it is not a daycare I would recommend to anyone. Save your money and look for a better daycare that actually cares about your child or children's well being.

I would give it a -5 stars if I could.
My son attends here 5 days a week and loves going to daycare. Lots of fun activities are planned and the children are well cared for. A great daycare!

My child has been at kinder Academt for 3 years and I'm grateful for Hayfa and her staff and the connection my daughter has with them! I don't worry when I leave my child there, i know she s safe and I appreciate the good communication and the family atmosphere. Thank you for being dedicated to our little ones and their wrll-being! 💜
A great place for children to learn and Grow. Educators are experienced and truly care for the children. My son loves it here!
From my experiences this day care is best , I have to daughters my little one is counting 1 to 30 in age of 2 , they feed kids home made , 5 days happy kids .
This is the best daycare ever. Your kid will get a nurturing environment 🫶🫶

My daughter has been going going to Kinder Campus for nearly two years now. Our original goal had been to find something a bit closer to home once we moved to the south side (it's a 45 min commute every morning), but that simply isn't an option anymore. The reasons are numerous, but it really boils down to the fact that while many daycares and dayhomes portray themselves as having a family environment, Kinder Campus is the family that we want our family to be.

The staff are not just caring - they are passionate about creating the safest, most nourishing space possible for every child in their care. From private, personalized blog posts about our daughter that are almost mini novels in length to stacks of art projects every month to things like "international mud day" and "Batman day", I firmly believe that no one else would be able to care for my daughter the way that this daycare has - even myself.

I guess I'm writing this review now because when we were looking around for prospective daycares, I must admit that Kinder Campus was not even on my radar. There are many daycares in Edmonton after all, and as I tend to shop for products and services via reviews, I didn't even notice this one. However, my wife had heard great things from two of her friends, and ended up spending half a day at the daycare just observing the staff's interaction with our daughter and the other children. She had done the same vetting process with multiple other daycares by this point, and she immediately knew that Kinder Campus was the one. Now, after having the pleasure of interacting nearly daily with Hanne, Debra, Danielle, Jezelle and all the other great people at Kinder Campus for the past couple of years, I can't imagine trusting my daughter with anyone else. So if any prospective parents happen upon this review, do your child a favor and take the time to personally visit Kinder Campus and compare with the other daycares. You won't regret it!

There are better options for your money

-Expensive rates. ($1200 for a child 2+…not competitive.)
-Constant rate increases (3 over a space of 3 years totaling an extra $225+/month)
-High turnover of staff (Only 1 consistent employee over a 4 year span, outside of the owners family)
-Closed for 3+ weeks of the year (not including stats), and still charge full price
-Poor communication skills.  Not forthcoming with information regarding staff changes, or changes to daily structure.
-Older kids (4+) are forced to be beds for two hours of each day, regardless if they nap or not.   No exceptions.

I feel incredibly lucky to have my child at such a wonderful facility.  They made the transition to daycare as painless as possible and the staff are incredible.  I wouldn't want my child anywhere else!
Excellent facility with amazing programs and childcare services.  The environment is clean, well lit and the staff are friendly.
I just called this place to find out if they were hiring and the director who's name is Gemma was quite rude to me on the phone. I definitely don't want to even apply to this place.

Safe, caring and engaging learning environment for young children and babies. Stimulating and thoughtful activities are performed throughout the day with the children (check out Instagram at #kindercampusyeg).
Both my children were fortunate to be a part of the Kinder Campus program and greatly benefited from the educational experiences. Staff are held to high standards without exception and that is so comforting to know as a parent. I tried other daycares and this one is by far above the rest!
Family-run daycare that has caring and competent staff. Highly recommended if you are looking for childcare.
I live next door and I hear staff yelling at children.

I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care provided by Kinder House Day Care. The educators and facilities have been wonderful, and both of my children have thrived under their care. Thank you for creating such a nurturing environment for our little ones!

Teacher Agnes and her team in the baby room are outstanding. My son had a rough transition to daycare including lots of crying, refusing to be held by staff and not eating for the first few days. Agnes and the staff were so patient and genuinely caring with him despite all this. Two weeks later he made amazing progress. The owner Nadia is amazing as well. She helps out in the baby room each morning, knows all the kids by name and I've seen the kids say they love her. Nadia and Agnes truly love what they do and it shows. You will not be disappointed with this wonderful daycare.

Both my children have loved going here (3 and 1). My oldest attended for over a year. The only reason we are leaving is because we are moving to the west end. Nadia and all the caregivers here have been absolutely amazing. Our kids always have fun, and come home with cute arts and crafts too. Kinder Kollege is inclusive, clean, loving and safe. I highly recommend this daycare.

I would highly recommend Kinder Kollege. Nadia and her staff is very caring, friendly and always welcoming. Our son started attending about month ago and he loves it. I noticed huge improvement in his speaking skills, interactive play and overall development. Nadia is amazing and kind person. She treats every child with same respect and always smiles. I am very happy I chose Kinder Kollege.

Our child has been attending this daycare since 2 years old and the staff and Director, Nadia are beyond incredible! They always go out of their way to ensure the children are safe, cared for and having amazing learning experiences! It's the only daycare we have trusted for our kiddo!! Truly a hidden gem in the north side!! Their food menu is always something different, the professionalism and kindness of their staff is reflective in kiddos happiness and exciting to attend daily. We also volunteer at the daycare and see this quality of care more then at just drop off and pick ups!
