If you are looking for a fun, kind, respectful and safe environment for your kiddo we highly highly recommend this childcare provider!! Thank you Nadia and your incredible management style!

Quality care from staff. Nadia is wonderful and always available for questions and any concerns, she is very present and knows all the kids by name. Cynthia in the OSC room is also super helpful and my oldest loves hanging out with her. My youngest also loved all of the time spent in each room since he's went through a few as he aged out of each. Definitely recommend!
After several bad child care experiences, we are so grateful to have found this place for our son.  Attentive staff and incredible program. (The summer program is so much fun!)

Our daughter had been attending this daycare for 2 years. The curriculum they teach is very age-appropriate, and she has learned so much there. The teachers really care about the kids. I would recommend this daycare to anyone! We feel lucky to have found this place.

My son started when they first opened up. Hands down the best daycare. I wish they had out of school care....I would definitely send my son back...... :)... We miss you Marija and of course your team :)

We are so great full to be part of the Kittens Mittens family! The staff and management are very nurturing and care about each individual child. The curriculum is age appropriate and each child receives lots of personal attention. Our child loves the food, meals are tasty and nutritious. The day care is very well kept, the facility is spotless and there is fully enclosed play yard on the roof top.
The staff is friendly, fully qualified and experienced in their field. We couldn’t be more happier with the choice of day care for our child.

I have been at kitten’s mittens during my practicum and  I love the environment they provide for children.
Proper nurturing and caring staff.
Very welcoming staff and the director is super awesome ❤️ and kind.
I would suggest kittens mittens for children if someone needs my advice.

Our child has been attending Kittens’ Mittens for about a month now. We’ve been so impressed with the attentiveness and care they show for all the children in their care! The programming is great and we love all the crafts that get sent home. They also use an app to provide updates, schedules and communicate with parents. It’s so great knowing what your child is learning, eating and experiencing on a daily basis! We couldn’t be happier. I would highly recommend Kittens’ Mittens to anyone looking for childcare.

My children (3 + 6) have been going here for over a year. This was their first time in a daycare setting and I am so glad it has been such a great experience. The staff is always welcoming and the environment is safe & always kept clean.
Thank you Klarvatten Daycare!
Best daycare around.

My son has been attending Klarvatten daycare for almost 2 years now and it has been an incredible experience, even through the pandemic. All staff are so engaging and are wonderful to deal with. They really go above and beyond with all the educational activities that they plan for the kids, making sure everyone is learning and having fun while doing it! It's a really comforting feeling knowing that my son is safe and in good hands.
I'm so happy he will soon experience another room with more wonderful people once he turns 3. I highly recommend this place to everyone!

I love love love this daycare. What an amazing staff, management and facility. I felt a sense of safety and comfort for my kids the first time I walked in to this daycare and it hasn't disappoint me. I recommend this place 100%. Thank you KLARVATTEN Daycare my babies are happy.

I am beyond happy with Klarvatten Daycare. My son has such a wonderful time everyday! He is happy and very excited to go to daycare everyday! Thank you so much to everyone of the staff members for everything you do for my son! I would recommend this daycare to anyone looking for a good place for their child!! The staff and teachers are so welcoming and kind, very well kept daycare!

I use to enjoy sending my kids there but ever since I said I want to put the girls in a full time kindergarten treatment have changed especially because there is no full time kindergarten around the daycare. And they told me that they have no staff available to for bus drop off in the afternoon. And the daycare is on the bigger side not sure if that's a good or a bad thing
Over all care for my kids declined over the past 6 months.
My son last year attended. He was so happy. Staff was so caring.

My two children were recently at this daycare.  The staff is amazing!!!  Always excited to see the kids arrive each morning.  Always acknowledged each by name.  I saw so much growth in my children, which was evident of the kind, caring and educational experience they were receiving at the daycare.  We will miss all the staff immensely.
The staff was very informative and supportive of my children's needs.

My 2 youngest children have attended here for over a year they enjoy going. The staff have been patient and helpful and keep us posted on the children's progress regularly. We love this center the activities are engaging and the crafts are wonderful the staff is kind and compassionate and work very hard with the family and children to ensure everyone is happy with the experience.
As a previous early childhood educator I feel I am particular with my children's care and I've been impressed . I would reccomend this child care center for other families seeking attentive quality care for their children.

This is one of the best daycare you can take your kid to. the staff are kind, responsible and taking care of the kids. each day new activity to help children grow and learn. big thank you to all of you ❤️
My twins love going here. They love the teachers and activities. They love my kids like their own. They make every child feel welcome.

STAFF IS SUPER FRIENDLY. I CAN FEEL THE SAFETY OF MY SON WHEN HE IS THERE. THEY ALWAYS SHOW LOVE AND AFFECTION TO MY SON. THEY HAVE LOTS OF ACTIVITIES. AND I CAN TELL THAT MY SON HAD SO MUCH FUN EVERYTIME I PICK HIM UP. MY SON SPEAKS HIGHLY OF THEM. I AM REALLY GRATEFUL TO ALL THE WONDERFUL STAFF.

My Children attended this daycare over a span of 5 years.  The staff and managers at La Petite Academy showed Genuine care and interest in the well being of both my kids.  We were sad to move on as grade 1 started and the kids still talk about how they miss going here. Also, the updates on the App were greatly appreciated.  Thank You La Petite for the great care.

My son had a bad experience of daycare. La Petit Academy did a great job in a week of orientation to make him interested in daycare. It took just 10 days to get to the point that my son says bye to me happily.
I love this daycare. It is the place I can leave my son without being worried about his safety, mental issues, health and hygiene! Highly recommended

Very poor communication via email, phone, text.

My family toured La Petite Academy Childcare Centre August 2022 looking for childcare for March 2023. We liked the facility, program and services explained. We put a $75 deposit to be on a waitlist. We understood through viewing other facilities that there are waitlists spanning 0-9 months. We have since met another family whose child is in this program and they expressed similar concerns. Mine are the following.

Between August 2022 - March 2023, I have called 14 times:

12 calls rang until disconnected (no voicemail)

1 call answered by Admin staff letting us know Fatima would be contacting us within the next 48hrs. - no return call

2 calls answered by Fatima
1/10/23 - Fatima let us know that they aren't aware of the status of our position but will follow up in 48hrs. - no follow up
1/16/23 - Fatima let us know that they aren't aware of the status of our position but will follow up in 48hrs. - no follow up

1/26/23 - A voicemail was left from La Petite Academy Childcare Centre that was inaudible due to their phone reception. We called back and left a voicemail. - no follow up received.

If the facility, program and services explained on our tour were met, this would be a great option. The communication between La Petite Academy Childcare Centre to my family has been very stressful and frustrating.

My daughter attended LaPetite from age 1-6; my son attended from infancy to age 4 as well. Both kids were very happy to be there, and it was a tough day for all of us when my daughter aged out of the program (when she started grade 1). During their time at LaPetite, my children were extremely content - always happy to go to daycare each day, excited to see their friends and teachers, and always coming home with crafts, fun stories of adventures, new songs and french words! I loved the innovative use of their HiMama app, which provided updates throughout the day in the form of photos and staff communication.
I trusted the staff at LaPetite so completely, and always felt very confident my children were in good hands. I would have kept my children there longer if I could have.
We miss you, LaPetite!
The ladies are wonderful!Strongly recommended!!
my kids love to have a time always there thankyou lake view

My 2 year old son has been going to this daycare since September of this year. Amy, the owner is very kind and accomodating. Rebecca is in charge of the toddler room and she has been above and beyond of look after my son. She is kind, loving, caring, and communicate well to us (parents or whoever picks my son) to what the day went by. She also paid attention to my request which is very important for my child's health as he has low neutrophils. I cannot say anything but great to the staff here.

I also see a lot of progression of my son's speech and extrapersonal skills.

This daycare was the worst daycare I have ever dealt with. In the first week they lost my daughters hearing aid band, she constantly came home with owwies and scratches. They always lied about what happen probably because they never paid attention. My daughters only attended this daycare 2 months. I pulled them out because I had picked up my daughter and noticed a huge gash on my daughters forehead. I completely seen red! On their incident report it says it’s a scratch which I got confirmation from a doctor that it was in fact a wound and not a scratch. My older daughter said she was pushed and hit her head and blood was pouring from her head. I asked the daycare why her jacket she wore to daycare was wet and they said “she threw it in the water” turns out they were attempting to wash the blood out of her jacket. They did so basic first aid and my partner nor myself was notified. On the report says it happened at 2:30 we picked her up at 5:45pm. HER PARENTS SHOULD HAVE BEEN TOLD!!! Incompetent people watching other peoples kids. I am amazed people are trusting them with their children. They will allow anyone to be a daycare worker these days. If I could post pictures I would of all the evidence I have of this horrible daycare!

As a mother I was very skeptical. I went in for an appointment and met with Amy and Rebecca. I must say that they made the session so comfortable and educational. They gave me a 3 day one hour trial period to see how my 11 month old would adjust and I will tell you it made the transition so easy. I have no regrets sending my child here as they treats her as if she was their own child. The best place for your child.

My grandsons went to Lakewood Childcare for 7 years.  They received the best of care.  Amy & her Staff were always willing to go above & beyond.  Very friendly & very professional.  I felt comfortable & at ease placing them in their care.  I would highly recommend Amy& her outstanding Staff

My daughter has been attending Lakewood daycare for 2 years, and I'm looking forward to sending my infant in a couple of months. As a mother and a psychologist with over 15 years of experience (which includes advanced training at the University of Alberta, a competitive and accredited program) I would highly recommend this daycare. Our experience with teacher Rebecca was more than we could ask for. Our daughter is a strong willed and sensitive child, and it can take a lot of time for her to warm up to someone. She immediately established a bond with Rebecca. She is no longer in that classroom, and she will tell us every week she wants to be in teacher Rebecca room. Over the years I observed Rebecca create a safe space (physical and emotional), while also developing an age appropriate curriculum. My child has learned so much from Rebecca and we are grateful for that. Recently there have been some concerning reviews about Rebecca that are not consistent with my experience or the other parents I have talked to. Professionally speaking, I disagree that this daycare would lead to childhood trauma. This is a reputable daycare with over ten years of the same management. This daycare has seen repeat customers and many families find their way there through word of mouth. Finding a child care provider is one of the biggest decisions you will make as a parent. I hope in addition to looking at online reviews, you will talk to the owner, staff and other parents when making this decision. I would be happy to talk to anyone that is curious about this business from a parent perspective but also a child development perspective.

Kind, caring and compassionate educators. I felt confident entrusting my child into their care for the out of school program. Would very much recommend their program to anyone new to the community and looking for a new daycare or those in need of out of school care. My experience was excellent. Thank you LCC&F.

We had a very very good experience with Lansdowne child care. My daughter was a picky eater when she first started but the staff were so patient with her and now she eats what is served. I know my daughter has some communication issues but the staff were always supportive in her growth. My daughter enjoys field trips during summer. We also like that they have family activities via zoom like cooking and arts and crafts. I notice the staff sanitizing the things inside the room whenever I drop off my daughter at the centre. The centre has also a spacious play area for the kids to play.  I highly recommend Lansdowne child care.
This daycare was exactly what our family and son were looking/hoping for. Everything from the food to the educators on the site were great!

My two year old twins boys started in this daycare just over two months ago and we all love it! They have so many activities every day and go out to play outside regularly, the food is great, the staff are amazing with kids, teaching them so many things, treating them with so much care and love. I would highly recommend this daycare to anyone. The wait list is long, but it was worth it for us and worked out well in terms of timing.

I have 1 child who attended here for both daycare and then out-of-school care, and a younger child currently in the daycare. It has been a great place for both of them. The staff and management are concientious and personable. There are great outdoor spaces and playgrounds. The out-of-school program was especially convenient, as it was literally in the same building as Lansdowne Elementary school. I've had a very positive experience with this daycare.

Not the most professional place I never hear about the good things my son has done. All I got were phone calls and complaints. I tried to get my son help through community options and the daycare worker said he needs more help. And threatened to kick my son out if we did nothing about it. Would not recommend if your child is full of energy. My son got sick lots of times, outbreaks of lice and came home with a full diaper and dirty hands and face. Not a good experience for my family. Also they admitted to locking my son in a stroller because they were unable to watch him. Why label your daycare as one that helps kids on the spectrum and say you can accept my children then kick them out. While I’m at work, going home making supper and cleaning up. My son was at the daycare being locked up in stroller. I will have trust issues after this and not trust anyone with my children again.

Before this daycare was under new management I was not impressed. The owner was rude and never around, there was a constant staff turnover and my kids hated going there. In February new management took over and did a complete renovation inside and out. The owners are always there and so kind and approachable. They put tons of time and love into this daycare to get it where it should have been years ago. My kids now love going to daycare and I am very proud to say I wouldn't have them go anywhere else!

No idea how to take care of high energy kids. Completely confused with the daycare facility, the open house was great with the meditation to work with the children but my children are a problem for being outgoing and joyful. They kicked out my oldest, I got him help with children development and now all of sudden my youngest is a problem. Now I have to look for another day care but THANK GOD FOR CHILDREN DEVELOPMENT GUIDING TO ME A BETTER DAYCARE.

We couldn’t be happier with our experience at La Perle Child Development Centre. Our daughter attended for 4 years (aside from a hiatus during Covid) and thoroughly enjoyed her time there. The teachers and administrators truly care about her. On top of that, their fees are very reasonable. Can’t recommend highly enough.

No idea how to take care of high energy kids. After not even a day of trying they gave up and kicked out my son. All he does and get excited and become loud. He never hits other kids and this daycare claims he hit every single one, strongly do not recommend this place for your child.

Amazing childcare in north Edmonton! As a former childcare worker I stepped into Lauderdale afterschool care and felt a scene of peace.  Kids laughing and playing with one another and very friendly staff. The owners are outstanding people.  They transport kids to many schools in the surrounding area.   As an educator I highly recommend this daycare to families in and around our community.
Awesome daycare very nice and considerate  ladies to kids  specialy the owner madhu
Had an awesome experience with this daycare .... staff were great .... environment was fun and clean.... all around great experience.... ❤❤❤ to Mahdu and her staff...

I disagree with all negative comments about Laurier. As an active student, I think it is an amazing, diverse, helpful and educational place as well as a supportive environment. All my teacher have been absolutely incredible. I strongly recommend sending your kids here.

Went here from grade 5-7. Left the school because of the disrespectful and incoherent students and teachers, switching from my past school to Laurier made a downfall on my education.. started failing because the teachers never cared about what they were saying and always sped through the classes so you wouldn’t have any idea of what they were talking about.. students would play with their vapes & watch inappropriate videos in class and they never even cared, got yelled at from a teacher and the principal over throwing jolly ranchers to a friend.. JOLLY RANCHERS!! Overall sour attitude from everyone and terrible environment to have your children in this school. 0/10 do not recommend this school for your kids mental health and education towards their future. (French immersion students are rude and they think they are better than the other students just because they talk another language, like miss girl we learn French too babes). Switched to the catholic system and it’s 10x better than this school will ever be

No diversity, bullying, lacks options and doesn't meet the requirements that are needed for junior high. please rethink on have your child attending this school. Also teachers fail to teach certen materials and dont care if you do nothing all class.

I'm a very disappointed parent when it comes to this school....and even more so with the new principal 'Steven Greene.' His lack of understanding, compassion and desire to learn what works best for individual children learning needs and abilities is just not there. Numerous parent teacher conversations and zero results towards change. "Beating a dead horse." All my children started at Laurier Heights from kindergarten in the French Immersion program and the bullying was prominent. Issues were never appropriately handled and swept under the rug. We chose to have our one child transfer from Laurier Heights in grade 7 do to constant bullying (causing mental health struggles) and a HUGE lack of option classes. Understand- there is NO technology class, a multi purpose library, NO construction and fabrication, NO cosmetology, NO costume design and the foods class that Laurier Heights does offer is very small and limits the kids ability to excel. I strongly encourage you to reconsider this school, there is a VERY good reason why their reviews are this low!

If I could give 0 stars, I would. I really do not recommend this school. No wonder no one knows about Laurier Heights. Bullying is prominent here and students are not disciplined. Staff and teachers provided 0 to no help when it comes to bullying matters and other student concerns. Undisciplined students will influence your child with racial slurs and bullying. Please reconsider if you want to enroll your child here.

Coming from a former laurier heights student's family.

Leaps and Bounds has amazing teachers and facility. My kids are loved and taken care of.

With our new director, Ms. Amandeep and other staff, - all our questions and concerns are tend to and they are always happy to help.

My boys are happy at pick up all the time. Its great to see how they’ve grown and are learning so many things!

Thank you for all your hard work.

We have been going here since 2017, and we are so happy with this early learning centre! The teachers are fantastic and caring, they dealt with my son so well when he was adjusting. The HiMama App is great I get a photo everyday, so nice to see what the kids are during through the day. As for management, I am very happy with our communication and the monthly newsletter is great! Mrs.H is very easy to talk to and you can feel the passion she has for the kids and striving to creating the best learning environment. The summer activity list is also amazing, so excited for my son to go and enjoy those outings. Our family is so happy with this centre and would recommend this centre to anyone that is looking!
J.E.

My Children have been at the daycare centre on and off for the last 7 years. The Staff are caring and attentive, and the owners work with you to make sure the children receive the best care. My son who currently attends, has some behavioural issues and the daycare has worked together with his CASA group to provide an amazing experience for him. My youngest daughter also currently attends and has learnt so much in her 6 months there already! My Oldest attended this daycare until they moved the OSC kids to Weinlos OSC, but she has many lasting memories and friendships from this daycare.

Very happy with this daycare. I know my kids are safe and well cared for. The staff are friendly, informative, involved and most of all, they love all of the children. My kids have been going here for almost 2 years now, my youngest started at age 1. I would definitely recommend this daycare.

My son attends this centre and its wonderful to know that he being cared for so well . The teachers a Have a great connection with him .my son loves all his teachers . He is also learning so much from animals, space, good manners and so much more. From The teachers , management and the facility its self we are so happy . Thank you Leaps and Bounds !

Dima & her staff have ALWAYS been fantastic, I’ve never had any issues with the staff, always welcoming, able to handle the morning meltdowns and mom guilt we feel!
I recommend Learn N Share to all my friends and family looking for childcare!
This daycare has gone above and beyond providing so much more for my children and their safety and well being. I am so blessed to have them.

Based on my conversation I am assuming with the director the other day about a space for a child and how she talked down to me and kept talking above me I do not recommend them based on that. I hope how she talks to parents is not how she talks to the kids.
What a great daycare! Very accommodating and friendly! I love leaving my child here knowing he is in great care! Thank you Learn and Share daycare for being different than the rest!

My love and appreciation for the this daycare, its staff and owner runs quite deep. I first met Razia the owner when my first daughter was 18months. We put my daughter in another daycare before that but within a week, we pulled her out and then I came across Learned Robin Montessori. Fast forward to 3 1/2 years later and still counting; both of my girls go to LRM and we have never had an issue with the way the daycare is run. The staff is really compassionate and patient towards the kids, Razia has a natural nurturing and motherly personality. She knows details about each child and she treats everyone like one big happy family.
Recently I took my youngest daughter who just turned 3 for a preschool program screening and she didn't qualify because she was well above the developmental scale. This just assured me that LRM not only does an amazing job with caring for my children, but they also do a thorough job with teaching my kids. My eldest will be starting kinder in the fall but we plan to keep her there for after school care as well.
Bring your kids here!! You will not be disappointed at all.

We have been sending our kid at Razia's daycare center since 2013. We found it a wonderful place. Never had any issues regarding any mismanagement. Razia and her staff has been quite compliant to the bylaws of the Alberta's child license and regulations. Razia was running this day care in a house just a block away but as soon as she found that the house was getting old, she rented a much larger space with a dedicated backyard for the kids. So that helps kids alot in get some fresh air even in winter. Overall we had a good experience here otherwise there are three other child care centers just a few blocks away. We could have moved our kid there but we are quite satisfied here.

As parents: we found LRM Day Care a welcoming place for our kids. We are very satisfied with the arrangements offered by Director at the facility. Day Care provides fresh nutritious food in breakfast and lunch and snacks in afternoon.

The Director is generous, cooperative and helpful with parents, children and staff. Director usually planned for refreshers courses, workshops and seminars for staff members. These training's are no doubt essential for growing needs of kids, and I have noticed a clear image of these new strategies being practiced at day care in my Son: as his intellectual, organizational, and emotional skills are improved a lot

Where should I even begin? Raiza the owner is such a wonderful and kind woman. I cannot count the many times this woman helped me and my son out. I had enrolled my son into raiza's daycare after my son got kicked out of another daycare due to "behavior and speech problems" he was only a year old and it was his first time in a daycare and they also had an app where I can monitor my son, the way they treated him gutted me. Since then I was afraid to ever let my son out of my sight.  I took a faith of leap when I enrolled my son into raiza's daycare and within months I began to see improvement in my son's behavior and speech. She helped me get in contact with the early childhood development education and has even went out of her way to let my son continues his education when I had financial issues. He has been in her daycare for 3 years now and not once did i ever regret enrolling my son into her daycare She is hands on and immediately returns your calls right away. She truly is a blessing to me and my son. My sister recently also enrolled her daughter and let's just say my sister and I have never been happier with raiza and her wonderful  staff.

My son have been in this daycare for 5 years already. They have amazing staff and the owner Razia will give you support in any way she can. The facility is very clean very attentive daycare teacher and very secure. Im very satisfied with the service.

I had my daughter in the centre a few years ago before she started school and was in special pre-k, and I really appreciated the way that TJ and Neetu worked with my daughter. She had a language delay and needed extra time and patience and it was always afforded to her. I miss them! She remembers them still and talks about them and their daycare 🖤

PART 2:  .... I don't need to defend myself or go into any more details, but this response is EXACTLY another reason why my children no longer attend this daycare.  3 years was enough to try and work it out and improve things.
Simply unprofessional,

I am very disappointed with Learning Hands Daycare. Rather than console or talk to a child who is having a difficult time, they take their phones out and start recording them which is enough to make anyone angrier. Nothing can justify them to record a child for this reason, I did not consent to that. This happened on many occasions and more than 1 child.  They also threatened me that moving forward, I would have to pick up my child in the middle of the day because they could not handle them around nap time as they don't have enough staff to separate kids who sleep, away from older kids who don't. By threatening me to pick them up, they are no longer guaranteeing me or providing the care that I paid them for.
Learning Hands Daycare is extremely unprofessional. They do not take any accountability. Look at any of the negative reviews and you will see they are always redirecting issues and blame to the families who have concerns.
I would NEVER send a child or recommend this place.

Learning hands daycare is an amazing place! Very clean with great staff and very welcoming. My children have been going here for 4 months and I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. My son loves teacher Sunita so much and he's always happy when i come to pick him up. Please keep on the great job that you ladies do. Thank you

We love this daycare. Neetu and TJ are absolutely wonderful. They have treated my kids as if they are their own from day one. The teachers are amazing as well and always make make my kids feel special. I feel confident that the moment I drop them off in the morning my kids are being taken care of and going to be treated with kindness and respect.

This place is too good for kids. My kid started here when she was 18 months old. She had so many feeding issues also she screamed to death when i left her there. I went to work so shattered after leaving her there.. But the staff were too nice , they took care of her really nice. They feeds her the food. They have a very high patience level.  They also updated me every single day how she was doing there. That was a huge relief for me. Now she loves going there. I recommend this place strongly.

It is the first daycare my kid attended and I was lucky to find the perfect childcare Center. It has the spacious rooms for all age groups, even the faculties over there are very kind,gentle and helpful. There are so many new activities for the kids. Surely recommend this center to everyone is looking for a daycare in that area.

I found learning ladder childcare center from my neighbor. Owner Sonu and staff were so helpful to get my daughter adjusted to the new environment. We came from ON and adjusting to a new daycare was bit hard at the beginning but Sonu and the staff tried different strategies to get my daughter calm down in the morning.She played with lots of kids at there and learned different skills. Unfortunately we are moving to a different location and we are going to miss this daycare. I really recommend learning ladder to everyone and wish them good luck!

I was very picky when it came to choosing a daycare, and I toured a lot of daycares before I found this one. This one checked all the boxes. First and foremost, the staff are amazing. They treat my daughter like family, and I know she is in good hands. The place is clean, they do a variety of activities and go outside almost every day (weather dependent), and the food they provide is healthy. I feel so safe bringing her here, and she loves it as well. She has grown so much since being here since only February. Her language has grown dramatically, and she learns something new every day.

For 2 years my baby has been well in this place. Which give me a peace of mind because As a single parent and a student I needed a kind of Childcare like Learning Ladder Childcare.

That is why every time when I left my kid in this place I know for sure that my kid would be safe until I come back.  I am also happy that my kid loves this place.

I recommended Learning ladder childcare very much. This place is clean and it has enough space for kids.

Teachers and owner of this childcare they truly loves children and care about them I am satisfied about their generosity, kindness and easy communication.

I am so thankful for Learning ladder childcare for continuing taking care of my kid. You make my every day to be manageable.

Kindly please keep doing great work for our community 🙏
.

They definitely put child development and milestones first which I love! If your child is delayed in any way, Sonu and all the educators make sure that they do whatever they can to help — I would let the director & the educators know what happened & what was said during doctor/specialist appointments and they would also follow those instructions I was given, especially with speech! Very up to date with technology, they use a lovely app that they update throughout the day with pictures to let you know what is going on throughout the day.
Our daughter loves attending Montessori. The workers are so lovely, inclusive and professional. So glad our child has a spot at a wonderful service provider. We highly recommend.

Our daughter has attended Montessori in Rutherford since she was two years old.  She adjusted to going to daycare over a week, and afterwards absolutely loved it.  The school is small and she knows the names of all of the children and teachers.  The environment is amazing.  There aren't many splits for age groups and the younger ones learn from the older ones and the older ones learn to be leaders.  She has learned to count to 20, and knows all of her letters and their sounds in half a year.  She loves her teachers and looks forward to going every day.

I have tried four daycares and preschool before this amazing school they were just sitting on their phones, and they were forcing the kids to sleep they were factories not schools , but learning together it’s a real school. I’m so happy that I found what I was looking for my kid. They are amazing teachers and they are creating activities all the time. The place is super clean. I can’t say enough about their efforts finally I feel that my kid in a good hands he is learning having fun and feels loved at the same time. They deserve 10 stars not just five .Hands down

Great place to send for learning and growth. The teachers are wonderful and very caring. Their programs are amazing, my daughter learns so much and have a lot of fun too. I highly recommend to everyone.

If I could give this school 10 stars I would! This preschool is a home away from home. I have plenty of preschools nearby, but I have specifically chosen to drive 20 minutes each way for my son to attend here.
The instructors are phenomenal. They are focused, patient and appreciative of each child’s well being. Everyday we receive full updates. I feel like my child is with family here.
I can truly say that your little one will be in secure and safe hands ❤️

Amazing place for kids! Everyday new activities. Kids are learning so much in preschool. If you are looking for place for your child - I highly recommend Preschool Learning Together. Magda and Agnieszka are the best teachers!

My children attend preschool. Teachers are amazing! Program plan is interesting. Teachers communicate with parents daily and send photos daily. Program plan and observations are uploaded weekly. My children love the cozy space and variety of activities. Program also runs outdoors!

One of the worst Daycare‘s I have ever experienced! The owners do not care for the children but the money they bring in, the lady who drives the Daycare van for school pick ups is always late and talks down and yells at the children, this coming from my seven-year-old! The facility itself is run down and the fees are high.

Summertime comes around and they increase fees again because subsidy goes up and again the more money they can get the better for them. They have hung up on me numerous times well just trying to understand these fees. They have little regard for parents and the way the children are treated is horrendous! My son has come home crying! Not wanting to go back to daycare the next day because of the abuse and neglect for care. I would not recommend this daycare to anyone!

We started with this daycare in August this year and we are so happy that we did! The staff are so nice and they really care for the children. My son was having anxiety and so many behavioral issues at the last daycare and now those issues are completely gone! The staff are so patient and understanding. The daycare is clean, they provide snacks for the children, there is a play area all along the side of the daycare outside and they take them to the park often. They do tons of activities with the kids. They also usd the himama app and send me photos of my child during the day! I know my children enjoy this daycare because they never want to leave! Highly recommend this daycare.

This is a fantastic day care and my daughter loved going there. They are absolutely amazing!! The staff care about the children and treat them as their own. I received pictures and video of my daughter every day with a summary of her activities. The staff engage the children in a variety of activities that build their
skills and excitment of the world around them. They also promote a warm social interaction between the kids that is more of a family environment. Again great daycare!🙂

All the staff are awsome and responsive. My daughter improved in her behavior and independence since she started to go here on February. They treat your kid like she/he is their own. We are happy that we chose this center for our daughter.

The people that work here care. It’s not the newest and most up to date, but it’s clean, organized and uses great communication
as well as preparedness. Of the fourth daycare our kids have attended they enjoy this one the most. Staff is involved and our kids have even come home showing us how to play 2 different card games. This is invaluable as far as I’m concerned. The only downfall may be location, and I believe the playground is less than impressive, but a minor inconvenience IMO. I’m comfortable sending my kids here.

If you are looking for quality child care in the West and/or SouthWest Edmonton Li’l Einstein is the best place! Karim and Noshaba have extensive knowledge and experience providing care for children of all ages.  Given their training is in education they really do have an ept for offering different learning methods.  They help children thrive in learning environments that best suits their level and needs but most important of all they always ensure the children are having fun.  Their program also offers delicious meals that the kids love! The facility layout is very well thought out to ensure there is sufficient space for all the age groups and is very secure with code locked doors at the front.  Go see this place and meet the owners and staff.  You will know right away why your kids will love it there.

A proud parent, David

This place does not accomodate autistic children, please dont mention you have more than one child because they will require all your kids to attend their preschool compulsorily. They care so much about your money than your child.

Worst place

I can’t express how wonderful staff is at this daycare, it’s basically home environment away from the home. They definitely take care of little ones, they do so many fun things with them, if you are looking for fun, creative, safe, caring, hands on childcare this is a place to send your little one. They cleaning and organization skills are outstanding. I do RECOMMEND this daycare to any parent who is looking for something more then just a daycare 🙏

HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SCHOOL! The staff and teachers are just great! The care and attention they give to our daughter by far exceeds any of our expectations. Thank you Lil Einstein our daughter will always be ahead of her classes because of you. Even though you didn't attend to my daughter's birthday, we still love you.

The Montessori group in Li’L Einstein center is absolutely splendid, the kids learning life skill's and independence on top of language and math study.
My three years old loves going there and he is coming home with a new skill every day.
I will definitely recommend the center.

It is a pleasure to work with Michelle and Frank. In July 2007 I began working for the daycare, but I was let go in August 2008 due to health concerns. In addition to overworking me, the director underpaid me. The daycare had a problem hiring people without experience or with some experience, some thought it was easy. As a childcare professional, I have completed childcare level 2, WHMIS, and safety training. Later on, I found out from two employers that I was fired for calling a daycare license on the director, when I didn't. Some parents complain about some of the staff's ability to care for children. Make sure you check in on your child or children by showing up unannounced. I had to also remove my daughter from there because the out of school employ couldn't handle a child with special needs.

The managers Michelle and Frank are amazing people. I feel bad for removing my kids from here just because of them as they have helped me alot. I still believe though that the daycare needs some re-arrangement in terms of kids per staff ratio, as this number is way disproportionate. The staff themselves are also amazing, I just think they are overworked and as a result cannot properly take care of all the kids as they wish to which is why I had to remove my kids. But at the end of the day, no one is perfect.

I was bullied during my time there and when I told the adults keep in mind that I told them multiple times and they still didn't do anything about it.It didn't stop until I left overal DON'T SEND YOUR KIDS THERE
Frank is an amazing person !! Kids absolutely love it there

My son spent his summer in Little Bunnies. He had a very good experience and cant stop talking about it at home. The place is kept clean. The owner & teachers are well equipped and amazing with kids. I can see that the kids love their teachers as well. They have tons of learning activities throughout including fieldtrips. They send you pictures almost everyday to update you what your son is learning/doing at the moment which is really nice. Thank you Little Bunnies!

I just want to say how awesome Fatima and her staff are such a caring, loving and welcoming team. My 1 year old went from crying at pick up and drop off to smiling in a matter of a few days he LOVES being in their care he definitely feels safe and loved from them all. He’s only been with them for a month as well. They are so wonderful with all the children in their Daycare. My 10 year old even likes how much he sees his baby brother being in the daycare as he can’t wait to be apart of the daycare soon as well. The staff are very communicative and make you and your children feel comfortable and welcome. I HIGHLY recommend this daycare first daycare in years I found a daycare where they treat your children with love where you have no worries for your children. 💛

My daughters been at this daycare for months, and has been loving every minute of it. She loves the teachers and her friends she's made. Learning so much, and is always excited to come back to daycare. I absolutely love how communicative the teachers and the owner Fatima is. I would absolutely recommend this place for your kids daycare! It's been an absolute blessing to have such a great place for my daughter to be in.
My twins boys and my daughter love little bunnies, , great staffs, excellent owner, very friendly, highly recommend this daycare. Thank you for little bunnies .

The best daycare for my son. They are affordable, my son is thriving. Grace is the best thing to happen to me. I was so scared to drop my 6 month old but Grace has been kind, friendly and great for him. Fatima the owner is the friendliest face you will see there. Always smiling and kind and great with the kids. Teacher Margie is kind and caring.

I really love this place for my kid

One of the best day cares in Edmonton I have come across so far. My daughter attended the daycare for an year. Priyali and her staff are phenomenal. They take care of kids like their own kids. I felt comfortable leaving my daughter with them from day 1 and she absolutely loved being there. She learned so many things and had best of her time at daycare. While my daughter was in Kindergarten, they used to drop her to school with utmost care and responsibility. I highly recommend Little Champion Daycare to anyone looking for a reliable daycare.

I would highly recommend Little Champions Daycare to anyone looking for reliable, structured and loving care for their children. Priyali and the teachers at Little Champions treated my boys like their own and we always knew they were well taken care of. Their preschool style programming also helped my son to learn valuable skills prior to entering kindergarten. We can’t thank Priyali and her team enough for all they have done for our family!

We are so happy and blessed to be a part the Little Champions Daycare family. Priyali and the entire staff treat my children like their own - from day one it was amazing to see first-hand the love and care that my children received, and continue to receive, every day! My children have learned so much and have had many of their pivotal moments here. Their growth and learning are fully nurtured and welcomed by Priyali and all the teachers! Thank you to the entire staff - we could not be more grateful!!

This Day care  is amazing! They love your kids like their own. They are clean and very engaging. My son enjoying going there but due to some circumstances we have to move but he still missing his teaches over there especially Mala and Priyali.Thank you Little Champions and Team for taking care of my son so amazingly. We will miss all of you dearly!

My son going here since 2 years. He loves here. Putting him here was the best decision i made for his early learning. All the teachers truly care for your kid. Day care is very clean and organized.  Kudos to Priyali mam and team. 👍

My 10 month old daughter attends this daycare. I viewed at least 15 daycares before I chose Little Champs. I was really nervous about leaving her since she was only 8 months when I enrolled her, but she seems to love it there. She is happy to see her teacher when I drop her off in the morning, and happy to see me when I return. The teachers are very attentive to her, and there is lots of space and play areas for the children.

There is a true sense of family at this daycare. The staff are friendly and well prepared with engaging activities for the children. The family that owns the daycare take the time to get to know each of the children and their parents and their care can be felt throughout the centre. I appreciate this family and this daycare very much for their role in our family. The gym is also a great feature of the centre. Kids get to be kids and they can run and play all year long.

If your kids are neurotypical this is an amazing daycare for you. They treat your kids like family and always have fun activities to do. Unfortunately if your kid is neurodivergent (adhd, odd, dmdd ect) find somewhere else. I chose this daycare because I was told they had staff trained for kids with extra needs, but after a few months I realized they had absolutely no idea how to handle my kids. I tried pulling my kids a few times, but they promised they would work with them as again "they have a teacher who is trained". Either that's a lie, or they need to take a different course. I started getting really upset after every single day it was a new problem, and I was made to feel like it was my fault. I am at work and putting my trust in staff to keep my kids safe amd know what to do. They are kids who need a little extra help, but unfortunately the daycare just doesn't understand that. I ended up leaving my job and pulling my kids out of this daycare and won't be recommending them.

My son has been going to Little Champs for nearly 2 years . He is very advanced in speech and intelligence for his age and I attribute this at least partially to his amazing teachers, whom he adores by the way. They have a large indoor gym which I love because I know he still gets the opportunity to run around and play on equipment even when its too cold or wet outside. I highly recommend this daycare.

Nutritious breakfast, lunch and afternoon snack. Friendly and responsible staff that lead a variety of activities throughout the day to keep kids stimulated. Also low turnover of staff, which means that the the staff and kids will develop longer term relationship.  Reliable school pickup and drop off. I also like the large private indoor and outdoor spaces at the daycare that allow kids to stay active.

I am so glad to send my 3 year old daughter to little flowers daycare. Staff is very kind and professional. Teacher saroj and teacher poonam are running daily preschool program with utmost sincerity and dedication. I am thankful to Teacher parul and teacher gitu for providing kids such a nourishing, safe and resourceful environment , essential for their physical as well as intellectual growth. I highly recommend little flowers to those who are looking for best childcare facility. ☺️☺️

My daughter started her first daycare with little flowers and it was an amazing experience with them! Super friendly and caring staff, teachers I met. I’m grateful and thankful to Parul mam and Gitu mam, the most supportive ladies!! Thank you for all your care and love to our children ❤️

Had both my littles at this daycare in almost every room, nothing is scarier than leaving your children in the care of someone thats not you, and i had absolutely no anxiety when leaving my children here. Absolutely amazing teachers, my son never wanted to leave, he’d try and hide when i showed up to stay longer! My 4 year old, would talk about her teachers at home all the time. She still plays ‘teacher’ at home and uses her teachers names.

The director is so kind and considerate. Only reason we left was i started mat leave, I will 100% only go here when I'm ready to go back to work.

P.S my kids miss everyone here ❤️

I have always loved sending my both sons to this preschool. They learnt alot while attending this school. The teachers put a lot of effort in making kids do different activities to instill different learning skills in them. I am glad that this school is so close to our home and I will be sending my daughter here as well when she is of that age.

We've been part of the "Little Flowers Family" for almost 4 years - my older son has been through both the daycare (from infant through to pre-kinder) and pre-school program and my youngest started daycare last year. I myself run a business; I can confidently say that Parul (the owner) runs LF with efficiently, professionalism, and kindness. All the teachers go above and beyond, helping make each child feel important while fostering a sense of independence and responsibility. Both my boys are excited every morning to go to daycare; they've made such amazing friendships and learned many valuable lessons and skills along the way. LF is amazing - highly recommend!

My daughter has just started at this Daycare for couple months. She LOVES it here. She is so happy everyday when I pick her up, I know she is having fun and in good hands. Staff is very well trained and experienced. The facility is very clean, esp. In this pandemic they handle very well. I am very comfortable to send my daughter here. Keep up with the good work Little Genius!
Couldn't say enough good things about this day care. They were so good to my son and daughter such professional and wonderful people. Would highly recommend. If google allows I can give 10 stars.
I would recommend this daycare to anyone, excellent care of the kids and fun, enriching activities! My kids always looks forward to going to daycare, such a relief for a working mom!

My oldest daughter was there from  2015 to 2017. Eventhogh we change a location we still come back to this daycare and my youngest daughter is attending at little golden daycare.

The staff and manager are awesome people I love to give my kids to them.

Definitely suggesting.

My little brother went to little golden daycare for over 6 years. I was very happy with the facility. The staff are amazing, very caring and really good with the kids and the environment of the daycare is a also great and welcoming.
My child has been going to this daycare for the past 13 years. They have amazing and my two younger are going they’re. The staff is amazing
My son absulutely loved it here.The staff is very friendly and caring .He learn so much through all the activities that were provided by the staff.
Very kind stuff and my kids enjoy their time there I love this daycare 🥰

I just watched this company interact with their children on a field trip at a spray park. I was shocked how terrible one lady was treating the kids. A lady was grabbing them by the arm and screaming at them at the top of her lungs. As a parent, I’m genuinely concerned for these children’s well being.

Fantastic centre! Staff are friendly and engaging with the children and the centre is always clean and full of games toys and activities that engage my son and keep him learning and growing even after he leaves school! I would definitely recommend Little Haven to all the parents I know!

First daycare my little guy has been too since going back to work from maternity leave and we couldn't be happier! The ladies have been so amazing with him and he's learned so much in just the last 4 months. Thank you!
I found the staff to be very organized and friendly a much adorable family vibe. My daughter loves them.
Great staff very well looked after

Ever since we put our kids to this daycare. We feel we made the right decision ！ My daughter every wednesdays have dancing lessons in school after school and gets off at a later time.I requested the owner Carolyn if one of her staff can go pick up my daughter up from school and back to daycare . With no hesitation Carolyn said yes absolutely ! Furthermore it was getting late passed 5:30 pm and I was so anxious because I know I was going to be late but traffic  was terrible . Pillar that took care of my kids said to me “it’s ok do not rush “ “it’s ok” I feel so relieved! All the staffs at Parkallen daycare are so nice , kind, and really make sure the kids are safe . If kids are hungry and ask for food the staffs always gives them food / snacks .
C- care
A-attitude
R- responsibility
E- excellence
You guys have the above . Keep up the good work!
Thank you all and Carolyn for making us feel safe putting the kids here at Parkallen daycare!

We recently joined Little Learners with our two little boys (3 and 1) and it was the best decision we could have made. Not only are the teachers SO kind and wonderful, but our older son is also learning social skills and respectful problem solving. The language he has been using to talk about other students and himself clearly shows that the teachers have experience teaching young children how to navigate their feelings, and he feels safe to express himself and knows he will be supported in a kind and loving way. And there is tons of outside time and play!! We love Little Learners and would absolutely recommend it!!

Our daughter has been attending Little Learners Daycare for just over two years and we have had a wonderful experience. The staff has been welcoming right from the start and have provided a fun and engaging atmosphere for the kids. Any issues that have come up have been addressed head on and in our experience, the owner has been transparent in communication with parents. I would fully recommend this daycare to any parents looking for a great community daycare.

My son has been attending Little Learners for almost a year now. The OSC program is great as they are continuously learning and have a mix of free play. There are days that they spend at the park/spray park which is great for my 6-year-old. The center is disorganized at times, but my family feels that since the teachers spend most their time with the kids it is a minor issue. My son has a great time and loves going which is the most important thing. Highly recommend!! They provide all meals and snacks which is great for busy parents. The center is convenient for kids that attend Park Allen school.

My son has been at Littler Learners for just under a year and our whole family loves it there. The staff are friendly and welcoming. They provide lots of outside time, fun crafts, and good food. My son feels comfortable and happy when I take him there and is happy when I pick him up. All the staff and management is approachable, willing to hear concerns, and provide follow-ups when required. I would definitely recommend Little Learners.

A follow up note on this review: My family was very happy with Little Learners for quite a while but in September of 2019 we decided to leave because of a high turnover in staff. My son had four new room teachers in five months. This was especially difficult for him since he was potty training. The last teacher he had (Jess) was a lovely and dedicated teacher but was ultimately set up to fail by the managers by pairing her with many different assistants who were not up to the task of teaching or associating busy toddlers.
We ended up having to find another daycare when my husband showed up to drop our son off on September 3rd and did not know any of the child care providers in my son's room. We were later told by management that his teacher was burnt out and moved to a different room and that the teacher should have told us that she was moving. It was not uncommon for the teachers to look absolutely exhausted at the end of the day.
Jess, did everything should could to help our son transition to potty train at daycare but it was not a success.
My husband and I were no longer comfortable leaving our son there with such a high turnover of staff. Our September fees were taken out of our account that day and were never returned.

Can't say enough good things- truly a lovely sense of community, safe, friendly, warm and welcoming. Love the director and the educators in the baby room are incredible. and shout out to Maria the cook who always has a smile on her face. Great place!!

My daughter goes here and it’s such a nice, welcoming place. I am a special needs educational assistant so I am very picky about where I take my child for daycare. All the staff are friendly and ensure your child feels safe and included. There are a lot of daycare options out there, but they’re not all created equal. This is definitely one of the best options in the area!

I have both my infant and preschooler at little learning house. It is my first experience with a day care, after looking at many and I am so glad that this is where we went with! in the infant room they pay close attention to details, they make sure that the kids are well looked after and most importantly loved! In the first few weeks they made sure that I felt confident in leaving my infant in their care.

in the preschool room they are always doing some type of activity, free play, movement and learning exploration. they are excellent at dealing with the conflict that arises with these young minds.

in both rooms I have been impressed with the communication as well as their responsiveness to any questions I have. Both of my kids enjoy the meals that are provided. I also appreciate that they post daily plans so that I can discuss with the kids what they did that day. they are very up-to-date and in the know about licensing and are careful to follow safety and cleaning practices.

I would highly recommend little learning house to anyone looking for a daycare for their child!

We highly recommend Little Learning House! This is our first time with childcare service outside of our home and we feel held and supported in the transition for our little one. The teachers and director are highly communicative and authentic in their way. We love that out infant gets to spend time with the older kids, they eat well, and they get plenty of outdoor time. A real gem!

Little Learning House has been amazing! They quickly and thoroughly communicate through the HiMama app or email and provide a wide range of foods. Our son has mad many crafts and worked with different sensory materials. I appreciate that they take the children outside and on adventures to the park. The staff is wonderful.

seriously such an amazing daycare!
Staff are so friendly and welcoming.  The best nutritious snacks and lunches for the kids.
Safe and fun environment for both staff  and children. I highly recommend “little Munchkins childCare” as our kids learning academic, science, art , games and manner and respect for others.  They have amazing programs for all kids and keep them engaged throughout the day .
This day care is really awesome. Great facility. Staff are responsible, friendly and caring. I will surely recommend this daycare to all the parents out there.

Unfortunately I cannot recommend this Daycare to any parent ! I understand that working in a day care can be tedious but the teacher Mira was rude  when I asked her not to wake up my child during nap time even when I come to pick her up. I suggested that I can always come back when she wakes up but she was not having it .She woke my child up 15 minutes into her nap! My baby woke up crying on the way home and stressed. When I  called to complain about this she said it was my fault for coming to pick my child at a time she told me to and refused to give the owner’s phone number so that I can file my complain directly.
I like this daycare, my kids love this place and so far everything has been very smooth. Appreciate the teachers and caregivers, they are very kind and gentle with the kids.

My son has been going here for two years now. Love the staff and daycare . Daycare is clean!  Health and  safety protocols are done daily and efficiently.  Would recommend to others. Once daughter is old enough, she will attend this daycare as well. Thank u.
its a good place and environment. also friendly staff
A wonderful place and the staff is more than good. Zayed, peace, Hana, grace, serenity and happiness. Thank you guys. I am happy for you.

Amazing daycare! My son has been there for 2 years and he adores the teachers and staff! They truly care about the kids and their experiences. They are always thinking of new activities to keep the kids interested and learning. Just a wonderful, safe facility with truly one of kind people!

We have had our little girl here since right around when they opened, almost two years and she's now three years old.  Fantastic people!  They genuinely care about her well-being and day-to-day experiences.  Our daughter loves the staff!  We have recommended them to friends and will continue to do so!

So caring. I love the Little Nemo's daycare because they take care of the kids with passion. Our kids need love and care. With the diversified cultural background of the child care specialists there,  I got the love and care in Little Nemo's that comfort me to refer any of my friends and family.
Place is terrible  children runs  around no direction managment  awful  no body speaks English all toys are broken  and yard in the middle of parking  lot  never never go there

Little Nemo's Daycare has been a fantastic experience for me. My kid is always talking about how nice it is there. If you are a parent looking for a second warm home for your kid, or a staff member looking to improve their experience, Little Nemo's Daycare is a fantastic place to start.
The management is very caring and friendly and the space is clean and welcoming
Beautiful Centre with caring educators👏
Amazing caring staff

We have not enough words to say how grateful we are our daughter goes to this amazing places that we can call home. We are first time parents and the transition was so smooth that we do not regret at all bringing her here. Everyone is caring and loving towards the big impact they do for this little babies every day. Miss Shelly is an amazing woman that thrives for her staff, for the parents and for the kids well being, she is so understanding and flexible with a huge heart. Thank you guys, looking forward for more years to come and have our little one under your amazing care. Ericka & Kavi

We cannot express how wonderful we feel about LPDC, the facility, the team, and the experiences our daughter lives each weekday. We are certain that the great education has positive affects on our daughter's growing up - our work with potty training and manners is amplified every day. When she consistently says please and "thank you, Daddy," my heart warms. Also, we've always worked hard at using utensils when eating and this also shows. The fun, the singing, and the relationships in which our daughter shares is evident in how she interacts with everyone there. In fact, we have to go out of town for a work event and are so comfortable, one of the favorite teachers is going to stay at our place and watch our daughter. There is so much love and trust we can't recommend more highly.

My kid loves this place. Day care is clean and organized. All the teachers are wonderful and very informed. Owner Shelly is gem of a person and really engages with parents and kids. I highly recommend this place !!!!

As first time parents it has been a wonderful adjustment for our family to have our daughter enrolled at LPDC.  The staff are amazing!! The love, care and attention that they provide for all the children is wonderful. Not only do they have constant activities for the kids to stay engaged, but they have plenty of events for the parents as well.  It is satisfying to know that our daughter likes going to daycare and has fun with people of all ages!! Thank you to all the staff and ownership. We look forward to the rest of the year!!

We LOVE having such a safe and caring place to drop our daughter while we work. She is always in a good mood when we pick her up, and is sad to leave all her friends and teachers. Shelly and her team are always just a text away, and are extremely accommodating to our daughters MANY dietary restrictions. We are so grateful to be part of such a wonderful daycare!

I have been using this Daycare since 2019 and it's the best Daycare in this area. The owner and staff genuinely cares about each child,  their development and well being. I have watched them bond with children and always give great feedback while keeping families up to date with information regarding their child/ children. Staff is friendly and very approachable..Highly recommend.

Very well managed daycare with exceptional nuturing environment for children. Extremely friendly and well trained caregivers. All take pride in engaging children in activities, learning through play, food, celebrating all holidays. Has an additional outdoor gated play area as well. Highly recommended!!

My kid has been attending the Little People Daycare since August 2022. All the staff are helpful and knowledgeable. They answer your questions and give sound advice.
My kid is always serene and balanced when she comes back from daycare.

This daycare is truly exceptional. With a fantastic outdoor area and a team of experienced, creative staff, they offer a wide range of engaging activities. From arts and crafts to nature walks, children thrive in this nurturing and stimulating environment.

This is one of the best day cares in the city. The facility is clean and pleasant. The staff and director are friendly, cooperative and highly skilled in nurturing children. I found the staff creating pleasant learning environment for the children and let the children explore and learn to their fullest. I believe parents will not be disappointed by enrolling their children in this daycare.

We have a great experience with this daycare. They have the awesome curriculum, which is really helpful for toddlers and preschoolers. The staff are very caring and loving. The owners are very knowledgeable and helpful. They reviewed my child's developments at every stage and helped us to understand child's psychology when we started. As a returning parent, our full registration fee was waved and I found this is the best daycare that parents can rely on. I am glad that my kid is in a good hand. I would highly recommend this daycare to any parent.

Both my children are attending this daycare. The centre and outdoor play area is very secure and safe. The facility is separated for the different age groups and is well laid out.  Parking for drop off is underground and convenient. The communication with staff is great and communication response times with owners are great also. Overall I am very happy with this daycare centre.

My 1 year old daughter has been going to this daycare since January 2019 - I am a first time Mom and still concentrating on my career but was stuck with a tough decision on which daycare to pick. I went in for a tour and the owners seemed amazing so I decided to enroll her. Within days I knew I made the right decision. Anita who works in the baby room is absolutely amazing and my daughter adores her. Such wonderful and attentive staff and I am soo happy with my decision. Going back to work with a baby is so tough but they made it so easy for me and I really feel like she is in such good hands there! Thank you for looking after my pride and joy with such care!

My daughter started in February 2017 and she still attends and is turning 4 next week. She has been in every room from baby room to pre-school room. I am pleased with the little staff turn over as there are some “original” staff from when we started. The location is excellent with easy access to parking which makes drop off quick and easy. For being downtown the monthly fee is very reasonable. Security is great as you need a scan card. The facility is brightly painted and has a wonderful outdoor play area for being downtown, that was one of the main attractions for me as a parent. Recently, I’ve asked staff to not let my daughter sleep at nap time due to difficulty putting her down at bedtime. They seem to be following my directions which I am pleased with. My daughter has developed and learned so much in her 3 years at this daycare which will definitely prepare her for kindergarten!

I would recommend this daycare to other parents.
Great daycare. It is unfortunate that one individual is intent on ruining the reputation of this location. Context is everything -

Our little one attends 'Little Stars'. The owner is a wonderful lady and the staff are fantastic, too. Everyone is thorough and communicative. The atmosphere is bright and clean. Your kid should come here and play with my kid.

We love sending our kids to Little Stars Daycare - the owner and staff members are wonderful. Our children are learning so many wonderful lessons, including their ABC's, counting, culture, art and science. The space is beautiful with tons of natural light and is kept super clean and organized. The COVID policies and procedures are followed and I feel very safe sending my children to this daycare.

Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. It’s wonderful seeing our kids (4y and 2y) get excited about going to daycare. The teachers really make an effort to engage the kids and develop them in a very individualized way. The management is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment. THANKS!

I personally visited this daycare and met with the owner.  She is very knowledgeable and professional. She explained in a detailed way about her policies and procedures of the daycare, specially Covid safety measures. I am very impressed with the classroom size and environment. I am sending my children in little stars.

Our daughter is 3 years old and has been going here since she was 1. The teachers are amazing, informative and loving. They are always communicate and transparent about everything. I was so nervous in the beginning sending my  daughter to daycare but now i am comfortable with their care. My daughter loves to spend time with her friends and teachers.i love the safety measures they have in place and feel super safe with my daughter being here. if you are looking for quality care with a safe and fun environment, then this is the place for your kid.

Best daycare for your kids. If you are looking for a spacious place with sunlight all day so your kids don't feel stuck this is the right place for you. It's always clean and smells nice. Kitchen and washrooms are always clean. My kids are always excited to come here and enjoy their time with amazing teachers and friends. Lots of activities. No screens except a movie Friday. Women owned. Highly recommended.

We have had our little one here for almost a year and the staff have been great. They great us warmly every morning and happy to see my son playing with his friends when I pick him up at days’ end. My toddler was non-verbal when we started at Little Wonders (Covid baby). Almost 10 months in and he can’t stop talking. Thanks to the staff, Venus and Community Options, everyone has done a great job in my little ones milestone journey.

The staff are so friendly and easy to talk to. My son loved this Centre and every teacher there. We were sad to leave because we had moved out of the area. This was one of the best child care centres we have been a part of. I would recommend them to any family who needs a safe and loving environment for their little ones to grow and learn.

They do not have any education for the children and tried to hide an accident that happened to my son. Health and safety had to come explain to them the safety protocols... these folks went to school for this. They didn't call me. they tried to hide it. Excuse was that they didn't know us well enough to talk about it. Not professional at all. Took our kids out and they are now at eduplay. Not a safe place

Great daycare! Staff are happy and content and have an amazing relationship with all the children . I’ve enjoyed getting to know everyone! They are all very helpful and teach the kids kindness caring and sharing! They also have a great summer program with different activities everyday. I highly recommend this daycare to anyone who want’s amazing care for their children. My niece is leaving the daycare for kindergarten and I want to thank everyone for their care and support during a very difficult and stressful time, THANK YOU everyone ❤️🤩🙏

As a father finding childcare can be a daunting task. However we have found our home away from home at Lorelei daycare. My son goes there and is absolutely thrilled everyday to go see teacher “Amina” and teacher “Jordan”. My son was struggling for a bit with regulating his emotions but with the help of these patient and caring ladies I’ve just been seeing Noah shine so brightly and overcome these challenges! Thank you Lorelei daycare !

My 2 boys easily adopt the surroundings and more fun and feels like home along the way, there were days they wouldn’t like to go home yet during the pick up time.
Management and Teachers are so professional and easy to dealt with.

I do appreciate the little extra care that they are doing for my youngest who has an open heart surgery history when he was 3 months.

Overall awesome daycare. My daughter enjoys going to daycare everyday, it has been a really positive experience. The care and support from both the director and the teachers has been impressive. I would highly recommend.

Lorelei daycare has been a blessing for myself my son. This is by far the best daycare we have ever used. They truly care about the kids. Everyday I pick up my son he tells me about all the great stuff he ate and all the fun things he’s done that day with his friends and teachers. I highly recommend Lorelei they are amazing!!

This was one of the best daycares my kiddo has been to. Not only has an amazing location and infrastructure but inside is well ventilated and properly sectioned rooms with variety of supplies,  toys, books and everything available for all kinds for kids of ages. The owner for this place Ajay is an amazing person very cooperative and looks after the kids like his own. The kids here feel really belonged to as the teachers are amazing too. I highly recommend this place for your kids.

Luxdaycare has been a great experience for us. They really helped us in transitioning my daughter to help settle in daycare. All the teachers are very loving, caring, pay attention to a child’s need and groom their individual personality. They provide good food and accommodate for any allergies. My daughter learned a lot, made some good friends and lifelong great memories. Every day, my daughter was happy to meet her teachers, do crafts and play with her friends. My daughter did fun projects throughout the year about different cultural events. She enjoys her kindergarten now but still misses everyone at her daycare and asks me to take her there. I would like to thank Ajay and all the teachers to take such good care of my daughter. I would highly recommend this daycare to all the parents.

My two boys started here on the first day they opened and today was their last day over two years later. Our experience has been nothing but fantastic. The owner has been open, accommodating and easy to communicate with. He and the staff have honestly cared for and loved my kids as if they were their own. Recognizing difficulties and challenges and really helping them overcome them with kindness and compassion. The boys made lots of friends, always had fun activities and learned so much. They were always happy to go and sad to leave. Our last day was filled with emotions both excited for a new chapter and sad to leave such a loving, fun environment. They send out many pictures and updates daily so you always see what they were up to since we know kids don’t tell us anything. Thank you for everything!! You are all truly a gift to care for these kids!!

I'm really happy that my daughter enjoys this place. She's developed her fine motor skills. The added bonus that I liked is, I get updates on my child's activities (thu the day) including her photos and artwork that she did in the day. The teachers are very attentive and caring. Each and every one of them needs a perk.
Ajay is constantly on his feet trying to make improvements to the establishment.
