At the beginning I was very hesitant about sending my child to daycare due to child negligence horror stories, but Lux has put my mind to ease..

I will definitely recommend Lux.

My two boys attend lux daycare, both have had different experience and issues settling in that were handled very professionally and with kids best interest in mind. As a parent, it gives you a sense of relief knowing that your children are taken care of even in your absence.
For younger one I tried two other places and even nanny before Lux and at both he used to cry so much that he would get sick and with nanny i would still have to pitch in with everything. But things changed with lux, from second day I could sense that he will settle in here and now he is even has his afternoon nap there which is truly big for us.
I would confidently recommend Lux Daycare to any parent....

Mama Roza's is absolutely amazing. My daughter Aria (15 months old) began attending in June when my wife was medevaced to Edmonton from the NWT. We found out that we would be in Edmonton for several months while we awaited the birth of our second child. Mama Roza's was recommended to us by a nurse at the RAH and I went to meet with Esta (Mama Roza's daughter) and immediately fell in love with the space and the compassion shown to me and my family. Not only were they extremely understanding and accommodating, they have created a wonderful community and familial atmosphere of caring and respect (a quick message out to the community and they helped me get a playpen for my daughter so she had somewhere to sleep at oir AirBnB). My daughter absolutely loves the daycare, which is incredible, themed curriculum that is shared with parents in advance that includes experiential learning amd STEM activities (which as an educator is a huge plus in my books) and freshly prepared healthy meals and snacks daily by their in-house chef. Every one of their staff I have interacted with are both knowledgeable and professional (Huge thank you to Esta and Ruth for going above and beyond to support us) and treat my daughter as their own. If you are in Edmonton and are looking for childcare or know someone who is, I highly recommend Mama Roza's. Thank you for being so amazing.
Michael Small

Fantastic daycare.  Staff is wonderful, very engaged, caring and loving.  I continue to be impressed with all the different fun activities they organize in each of the rooms.  My son has been at Mama Roza for a year and half now and I could not be happier.  They always have the kids' best interests at heart and do their very best to equip the children with the skills they will need to succeed in life and dream big! Thank you to all the staff for all you do!

I’ve had experience with a couple of daycares and Mama Roza hands down is the best. The staff is wonderful, they are professional, organized and above all caring. The communication is top notch. They have an app to log into to view snack/lunch menu, activities and acts as a forum for additional communication. I love this daycare so much. They treat me and my family so well. I feel so lucky to have found this special place for my children to attend.

Highly recommend sending your little ones to Mama Roza’s!  The team is so wonderful with our two kids. Excellent communication and the way they treat and teach the kids is well in line with what we do at home and is in line with the current studies about managing big feelings and emotions in toddlers. Our children are very well cared for, they love their teachers and talk about how excited they are to go back to “preschool” when they’re home on the weekends. They have amazing field trips, and visits to the splash park. Nothing but positive things to say about the staff and facility here!

Highly recommended daycare. As a first time mom, I was very nervous about transitioning my 1 year old to daycare. But the owners were amazing! They made our transition very smooth and were in constant communication with me. Now my daughter barely wants to leave when I pick her up. She absolutely adores her caretakers in the baby room. What I like the most is the open communication with the staff/owners.. our needs are always heard and met.

If you want a daycare where both you and your child will be treated like family, then check out Mama Roza’s! (Bonus: it’s a family owned business)

I cannot thank Mama's Day Care enough for the incredible experience my child had this summer. The staff truly embodies passion, love, and care in everything they do. Their dedication to providing a safe and nurturing environment is evident from the moment you walk through their doors. Their thoughtful and helpful approach made us feel at ease, knowing our child was in good hands. We will definitely be returning next summer for another amazing experience at Mama's Day Care.

- Amber

Very nice quality care. My cousin sister has been going for about a month now and is loved and treated so kindly. Daycare educators arealways thinking of things she can do to brighten everyones day (both for children
as well as parents). Staff is very responsive and easy to communicate with. All staff members
are also very talented at meeting children's needs.
They always make sure the kids have lots to do,
and go outside for exercise and fresh air all the
time.
Highly recommend

My children(son & daughter) have been attending Mama’s Day care for two years. I really appreciate their learning through play approach and that they appreciate each child for who they are. All the educators are passionate about their work. They are very friendly and upfront. They treat every kid like their own.
My daughter is attending OSC- she teaches ME new things because she learns so much here. Most importantly, my daughter is excited to come here every day and their daily outdoor activities are a huge benefit!   The staff are fantastic, their communication with parents is great, they give daily updates about her when i pickup. I feel so satisfied that my kids are in safe environment. I would highly recommend Mama’s day care to all my friends.

I have 3 daughters. Two of them started going to the Mama’s daycare when they were 24 months old. Now they both are attending kindergarten program in Mama’s daycare. And my other daughter is in OSC in the same daycare. I have always been treated as if I am a part of their family. The environment is very safe, nurturing and stimulating. My kids love going there as they learn so much through play. They are always excited to share with me whatever activities they did at the daycare. It makes me feel so happy. The staff is so welcoming and caring. They treat my daughters as their own. I have never had any concerns or issues with either the staff or the owner.
Very soon my two nieces will also start going to the same daycare. I will recommend MAMA’S DAYCARE to everybody who is looking for a high quality childcare.

My two kids went to Mama Daycare and OSC for more than two years and had a really caring experience. The staff are nice and well trained. It has abundant of toys and nice little centres for the kids to play with. The owner is very friendly and treats the kids like her own. My kids did not experience any bullying or abuse in their entire stay there. The recent accusations on a male staff is baseless. It also has CCTV camera  surveillance 24/7 to make sure the staff provide the best experience to the kids. I highly recommend the daycare for the new family to take a look. Thank you staff for providing such a great care to my children and everyone else.

My son went to the manning crossing daycare from 11 months old, all the way to 5 years of age (5 days a week) He built strong friendship with the teachers and kids that grew up with him at this daycare. I would recommend this daycare to any parent in need of a safe place to watch their kids. When my son was 11 months old, he used to give his arms to any teacher of this daycare which gave me a peace of mind he was safe and trusted the staff. I also made many friends with the staff at this location and the owner is very very nice. Thank you all for the love and care you provided to my baby for all theses years 🥰 David's mom ❤️

My kids go to this daycare . Staff is friendly and always ready to help. Day care is clean all the time. I never smelled any type of food smell. This day care is a multicultural and they celebrate all the cultural festivals ( Christmas/Eid) .
One of the best daycare . Ruksana the director is the best educator and human being . She do her best to provide best care to children. Nice facility and environment

I brought my daughter her after we had a very negative experience at her first daycare. In a short period my daughter developed beyond her age and started to progess even further. She loves going to see the staff daily and sometimes gets sad they're closed on weekends. They're a loving daycare that treats your child like their own in the best ways. I couldn't be happier.

My son absolutely loves it here. All the staff engages with him so well that he smiles when we drop him off. The staff truly love working with the children. The owner, Rukhsana, gives you and your child a warm welcome every time! She always out with the children when we go pick up our son. She loves what she does and what more can you ask for? They treat your family like their family.

This review is for the south side location. I’ve had the pleasure of sending 2 of my children from 12 months old all the way through to OSC care up to grade 3 and pre-school. I made a surprise visit when first considering this daycare and they served healthy veggie snacks and the director was also hands on & they gladly gave me the grand tour. I was lucky there was no waiting list at the time either. Their pricing is competitive and, I dare say more affordable than some others. They were excellent at offering tips on how to reduce separation anxiety at drop offs when we first started and as my kids developed, they had communication sheets/ books so I could read on the progress and they posted photos on the walls so I didn’t feel like I was missing out ( I work full time). They staff are great at communication and were always quick to call if my child was ill or if an incident happened with another child, their follow up processes are excellent. They post everything too, everything from audits, fire drill results, if there was COVID exposures (rare), first aid qualified staff, resources for parents, and even what the daily menus are for the kids (I really appreciated how they served healthy meals and hot lunches). Their programs offerings are excellent and included other fun things like kid yoga, and even Zumba at one point. They’ve had community guest speakers like police and firemen, and even did neighborhood field trips to the seniors centre & the grocery store pre-pandemic and did Halloween trick or treating with the shops on the same strip mall. They also do outdoor walks, trips to the playground and even silver berry park/playground sometimes. Their teaching programs in general are fantastic, my youngest learned the names of continents through song at age 4 and the special days like teddy bear picnics, or multicultural days are fun & taught my kids about ethnic traditions re: my eldest had learned a Punjabi kids rhyme (we’re not Punjabi), and they learned about Diwali, Chinese New Year, etc. We opted for the summer camp preschool program this year while my youngest transitioned to a new daycare within the school she’s starting at this fall and MMSSCDC did direct pick up & drop off with her for their day amp program. I feel like this daycare has been like a second parent to my children and they have raised them so well. It’s a little bittersweet having to leave, we just found it more convenient for a direct drop off and pick up at their school for OSC who are open just a little bit earlier and closed later, even though I feel the service is not up to par and not as good a value compared to MMSSCDC (now called scholastic). If and when I have another child, MMSSCDC will definitely be the top choice for daycare in my books!!

I can see from the pictures posted on the website that this "Montessori" daycare does NOT employ an authentic Montessori program. I see the endless amount of toys and am doubtful proper toy cleaning is being executed.  After an arduous few weeks of contacting daycares, the tone of the response given to me upon my inquiry was cold, short with no provision of additional or helpful information. Not to mention a highly disturbing amount of grammatical errors, which raises red flags as to the legitimacy of any business.  Furthermore, a week waiting for a follow up to my other questions is absolutely unacceptable.

My daughter goes to this Preschool and she loves it! The teachers are great, and all around a great atmosphere. Would definitely recommend their preschool program. Its a little pricey but worth it! In just the few months of her going its amazing all that she has learned in such a short period of time.

Very caring individual attention given. My son has
Learnt a lot through their Montessori program. Both my kids have been to the daycare they love it.
Don't put your kids in the cheapest daycare you can afford. Their care will greatly suffer - the teachers physically/ mentally hurt students as corrective behavior.

My children have been going to this daycare for almost 2 years. My daughter has special needs, and they have done a great job keeping her safe and having her engaged with the other children when she is able. I’m very happy to have my children here and would highly recommend them.

My daughter has been  going here part time for over 5 years! The staff are friendly, accomodating, and have good structure for the kids. It is clean and organized, with lots of activities for the kids' enrichment. They even pick the kids up from school! Thanks to all the wonderful staff for looking after our kiddos!

This is by far the best daycare ! After my child went in two daycares , we were referred to this daycare, and I could not think of putting my kids elsewhere ever since. The management is very professional, caring, attentive and on top of things. The structure and the rooms are wide and clean. There is also a big gym that the kids use when they are unable to go outside, which I did not find in the previous daycares my child went into . I did not hesitate to put my second child here and have been referring my friends to this place.

I’m really enjoying working in Maria Montessori Stepping Stones. The staff and children make this an amazing place to spend your day. Working here I’ve learned the meaning of a positive work environment. We are like a one big family. I would highly recommend this daycare for your children.

Hello everyone, I have put my kids in this deck for a year and they still say it is a very, very good place.  It is clean and people are very nice.  They are just like her mother, father, they are very smart.  And I wrote what I really saw.  I have never seen such a clean and kind decker place.

My baby Mia has attended this daycare since Octobet 1st. I'm a new mom so I was a bit nervous about putting my baby in a daycare. However, once I met director Ragini and her assistant Olivia, I felt relived to know my baby was in good hands. All the ladies are amazing. Very helpful and caring. The place is so spacious and fun for my baby.

Our son has been attending this Daycare for the past 6 months. The staff are caring and loving and when I leave him, I know he is in good hands!  If there are any issues or concerns we are notified in a timely manner.

The daycare is always clean and organized and that was important to us, having visited other daycares that appeared unclean and chaotic. Since starting he has had the opportunity to go on interesting field trips that enhance the learning program.
My son has been going to this day care for almost a year and he LOVES IT!! The teachers are amazing, very clean and the atmosphere is so positive. I am extremely happy :)
Very caring staff. They are absolutely amazing with our boys.
Amazing !!!!!

My kids love it here… They both started not talking and now they talk so much :) It is neat and tidy, with a very friendly, reliable and caring staff… Very understanding as well… My son who is in the spectrum is well cared… Lots of activities to keep them occupied… Kudos to Rabia and Stephanie! They are both great people… Thank you! I appreciate you both… I would definitely recommend!

The day care is very good. This was the first day care of our child. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Both staff is very kind specially teacher Rabia.very good safe environment.our kid learned so much good things.

This daycare was recommended by my friend, went there spoke to the manager (Rabia) who was the most awesome daycare manager ever (knowing that my son has been attending daycares for years ). Rabia and Stephanie are understanding and treat all the kids there as their own, with love, patience and kindness. It’s the type of daycare where you feel that your kids are in safe hands all the time.
My son’s behaviour and attitude started changing to the best ever since he started attending this daycare.
Both me and my husband are very grateful that Rabia and Stephanie are part of our son’s life growing up, instilling a lot of the virtues and preparing the kids for the next step in life. Rabi and Stephanie are always trying to teach the kids new stuff in a creative way, they can’t stop impressing us. I feel like I’ve learned a lot from them dealing with kids.
So much love and appreciation

I do think they have all the qualities being professional in handling this business reliable in taking good care of our kids . They are also very responsive and had a good quality , because they teach well , and kids learn something from them. They also teach good values with our kids. My kids really loves to be in the out of school care. She was happy and always talk what they did in school.

I am greatly thankful to Ms Rabia she is so kind and approachable . It is a great help for me for putting my daughter  in the out of school care. I will be greatly recommend it …

I am so happy with the staff and owner of Masterminds Daycare. The owner Denise is so easy to talk to and helpful and the staff do a wonderful job providing excellent care for my daughter. They always update me on what she is doing at the centre and the curriculum is engaging and educational. Really happy with the activities they provide her and the staff are all so nice. Sharon and Lucy do an amazing job taking care of my daughter. She  is always happy to see them when she comes to daycare.

Great place with a great team of workers. They have supported my son consistently as he grows. They have also been flexible with our requests in terms of things we want our son to do or learn or practice. And this past year they added a trained cook to the team to help prepare varied and nutritious meals for the kids.

Most importantly my son loves his time there and is excited about going back every weekday.

Our kids loved their year at Masterminds, and only stopped because we moved away. Reena and Lila were wonderful teachers to him and he still asks to have play dates with them! My little guy loved his teachers in the Ruby room and would always say "Yes!" when I asked if he wanted to go see Paula and Sonija. The lunches were great and both our kids spent lots of time socializing and making friends that we still meet up with. We miss the center very much. Thank you Masterminds!
Very good daycare. I will recommend it to all the parents. Nice staff and the way they take care of children is very good and do wonderful activities too.

Wish iam qualified again to get the subsidy so I can return back my daughter and enrolled on your OSC but sad to say ididnt approved so my daughter missed this day care I've been in other daycare before they didn't have a complete meal for my daughter inside the daycare no snacks lunch or anything if I want my daughter learn something like activities I need to pay another 100 dollars for that extra learning activities here in daycare are complete I will just drop my daughter and nothing to worried if she eats because they have that and they will have activities that I don't need to pay extra amount so next year if iwill be approved iwill return back my daughter again in this daycare
I am happy to study  here

We absolutely LOVE MCE daycare! Our son started when he was 6 months old from infant room and has moved up to the toddler room recently.

It is not easy to leave your child at daycare for the first time, especially when they are so young, but soon enough we got peace of mind that he was receiving the best care.

All of the educators have been so lovely with him, and so enthusiastic to see him every morning. I love how MCE childcare is so proactive about planning thoughtful and educational activities every day, and I also love how they provide such a healthy well-balanced menu for lunches and snacks.

Yes, there is always room for improvement but they are so dedicated to improve proactively. Especially the Director Benazir is impeccably hard-working and passionate about this childcare. The director is an exceptional lead and a true asset to our community. She brought together some amazing teachers who are so caring and welcoming.

We’re overwhelmed with the level of care, professionalism and quality of early learning the MCE Childcare team provides.

My older daughter started to go to this daycare when she was 1.5 years old. She had strangers anxiety. The way educators (Aman and Sandeep) handled my daughter was amazing. Looking at the way they handle and manage kids, I decided to put my younger one to this daycare when she was 1 year old.  The facility is clean, well-maintained, and regularly sanitized. They keep checking your kids development regularly. They are always open to answering our questions and addressing any concerns promptly. The staff is caring, attentive, and truly dedicated to the well-being and development of the children in their care. They provide the report by the end of the day. Looking at the pictures and videos they send is always exciting.
Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend MCE daycare to any parent looking for a safe, nurturing, and enriching environment for their child.

MCE daycare has been so great to our daughter for the past year. They made her feel like it was her second home. The staff are compassionate and skilled. Banaazir, the daycare director, is kind hearted and attentive, but also very professional. We are extremely grateful for their care and would highly recommend this daycare :)

This place is really a lifesaver for immigrant kids or kids who are living far away from their extended family. Teachers are well trained and cordially accommodating for new kids. It has a plenty of open space, so kids can  play happily within the building during the bad weather day.  There is always room for improvement for everyone, they are not an exception. The teachers in the daycare are always eager to improve their service that is really satisfying. I recommend this daycare and my kid loves to attend it. I hope and pray that MCE childcare will always provide best service to the community. Thanks!

MCE Childcare is really the second home for the children. I like how they take care of the kids showing them love and compassion. They take them for tours outside and let them interact and learn new things.

I feel safe when my kids are there and know they are well-attended and taken care of. Really talented and skilled stuff.

Seriously the most amazing staff you could ever ask for. They are so good with our kiddos and so  responsive to my questions.  The minute we toured Mckee we felt welcomed and at ease. 3 years later and we love them so much.

Our daughter went to McKee Child Care for 2 years (Age 4-6) in Room 17. The staff, program, meals, and activities were excellent. But what stands out the most was the *care* and *love* she received - it was exceptional.

Terrific Daycare! It is very well established with amazing staff and programing. If you are looking for childcare, this place is worth your time.  My children loved it and so did I. The community here is wonderful too
Very good place they watched our daughter for about 4 years, we consider the staff almost family ❤️
Had a great time at this daycare! Staff are the best! Wish to this day I could have stayed.
Excellent daycare.  The staff are amazing.  The facility is new and well designed.  Definitely one of the best daycares in the city.

We Love this daycare♥️ !!!! Amazing staff!!! Great program!! Great atmosphere!! Been here with my toddlers for almost a year and I would NOT take them anywhere else!!   Would definitely recommend anyone here!!!

We love McLeod Community Early Learning !! When I was searching for a childcare facility I came across this  preschool, which stood out to me for it’s private like setting and warm environment.Assistant Director Ms.Angie is awesome.She is friendly and very helpful. Ever since enrolling my kid l've seen many improvements. I’d like to thank Teacher Lily with so much heart and caring mindset.
If I could give this school 10 stars I would.

We have sent both our children there for preschool and it was a valuable experience for both. My daughter did five days a week in the preschool (the option wasn't there when my son was in the program) and greatly benefited from it as she ramps up for kindergarten.
Such a great school with wonderful teachers. Definitely made the right choice by choosing this place.The staff is friendly and it isn’t super expensive.Ms Lily and Ms.Angie is amazing
Great staff and program!

Registered my daughter and niece in this daycare and the first day they went they called me and told me they can't handle my children. They didn't give them time settle in or get used to the daycare. My kids have been in 2 daycares and each one said my kids were good and they loved having them there but due to moving across the city I thought I'd try one closer to home.  I don't think the workers there are qualified whats so ever. I wouldn't recommend this daycare to anyone who's kids aren't quiet and don't sit still for long periods of time and who aren't hands on learners.

I honestly wonder how this place has 5 star ratings. Maybe there was a change in the last few years to necessitate the 1 star rating that I am giving it? I live close to this daycare and was hopeful that they would be an easy daycare to get into for convenience. Instead it's been a battle trying to get in touch with literally anyone from this facility. They don't answer their phones or respond to voicemails, they do not respond to emails, facebook messages... The one time I managed to call and actually get through to a person, there was no professional greeting or "thank you for calling McLeod Day Care" just a "hello?"

Any parent who is concerned for their child's wellbeing would probably find it distasteful how bad at communication this facility is. If I have to buy, train and employ a carrier pigeon to get in contact with this facility, then you probably aren't a good place to put a small child.

Either way, I was very disappointed, as were other parents I had talked to who had similar experiences. Avoid.

Incredible ladies take care of my 18mo little boy every day since July and he love love loves them. Learning so quickly, they are always teaching him new things. Extremely clean, they regularly have him in his spare outfit at the end of the day when I pick him up so he's presentable I stead of dirty if we have to stop anywhere before going hope. So very happy with my decision which was a difficult one to make to leave him with someone full time.
Kids are well attended and well behaved. My daughter is 2yrs old and always excited to go.

went here when i was younger, terrible staff, very abusive, every time I got hurt bad by another kid they blamed it on me, now i have a really big record of "incident reports". they would record us with a camera if we ever did something they didnt like, they wouldnt even feed us actual food, it was all extremely low calorie snacks that they called a lunch (it was just whole wheat crackers). The amount of times i was assaulted at that daycare is far more than i can count anymore, and not once did they ever help me out. The old supervisor used to act really nice to me, but then say the worst thing to my parents, then this new guy named ronny started running the daycare and he was just all around a terrible person. I cant remember a day where I didnt have an extreme migraine, and they wouldnt let me sleep on the extremely worn down couch to deal with it, I had to sleep on the tiles in a corner next to the radiator that never actually kept me warm, because of this daycare I learned how to sleep on hard surfaces comfortably. If you actually respect your kids, dont bring them here, put them in moms choice daycare in lymburn, thats where I went after going here when I moved, its far better and the teachers there are actually respectable people
My son loves this daycare. I have no complaints.
The staff are amazing!

The staff there are not very nice and give horrible punishments. They also blame stuff on you even though you didn’t do it, if you are unlucky the big lady will pick on you. I was very happy when I got out of their and moved far away.
The daycare staff is very attentive and friendly. our daughter has thrived and learned so much at Menisa. She never wants to leave, when we come to pick her up.

Our son has been going here since he was 10 months old. He’s always excited to get to daycare and seems to really enjoy his time there. I would recommend this daycare to anybody who needs child care.

My nieces and nephews attended this day care!!! Amazing place and I’ve meet with Prescilla a couple of times, such a wonderful lady. I Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a new daycare for their kids. 10/10!!!

A very good friend of mine have recommended this daycare after trying out few daycares. She was very satisfied and have recommended to bring my child. I went for inquiry and tour and I was impressed how clean it is and very spacious. I have seen the very accommodating owner and staff.

The most wonderful loving staff we've ever had the pleasure of meeting. We can drop off our child and not have to worry about them. Very clean, professional and secure. I highly recommend Mickey daycare for your little ones. Thank you !

This business is operated incompetently and dishonestly with no respect for trauma informed or nonviolent approaches to caring for and resolving conflict with children. I will never be able to put my kids in a care centre ever again after their trauma here. Stay far away..

My wife and I have had our girl at Mill Creek’s Finest for over a year. The staff are so compassionate and caring. We are so happy we found this daycare, and would highly recommend to parents with kids of any age.

This is the best child care centre in the city.  The staff are loving and compassionate.  They make each child and family feel incredibly special.  The quality of care is outstanding.  I would highly recommend this Daycare / Out of School Care to anyone in the Ritchie area and beyond!!

This facility is not inclusive or considerate of children with differing abilities. I suggest the staff and directors take the time to be trained and train their staff on basic human rights and understand that this is discrimination and should not be tolerated. DO BETTER.

Having my two toddler boys at Mom’s Choice is my first ever experience dealing with a daycare (I have an older child who I was always a stay at home mom with or had my parents help me with her) I was skeptical because of the foul stories you hear that can happen at daycares.. however it’s been over a year since my kids have been attending and they love it there & I love how great ALL of the staff is with them. My 4 Grandchildren attend here. The youngest is 1.5 . She displays distress when I dropped her off. A worker who to us is a stranger was too quick to tear her out of my arms. I had to tell her to give me a minute to hold her. The other 3 older were fine.
Very happy with this daycare center, my son is always happy and staff their are very warm and friendly.  Feel very confidant leaving my child in their hands.
My son has been here nearly a year now. In two different rooms. I absolutely love this daycare. Very caring and understanding staff. My son has made great friends as well. Highly recommended  😊

My son has been going to Mom's Choice since he was 1 yr old and he is now 4 yrs old. I am very happy with the love and care that he has gotten. The staff are very thoughtful and understanding. I am very happy that my son was able to attend Moms dream daycare. My son always gets excited when I tell him we are taking him to daycare. I don't usually do a Google review much but, this day care I had too. Me and my wife had been looking for a daycare for our little one for almost over a month around north side of edmonton. We looked at couple of places  around and we where not happy with most of them until we came across this daycare. Helen, the owner and director of  Moms dream daycare took her time to explain and showed us around. She walked us through their amazing program plan for the children. During the tour, the kids kept on coming up to her and the staff members for a random hugs. We could tell how passionate Helen and the workers were. The interaction was unbelievable. The children seemed very happy. It wasn't easy finding the right daycare for our boy ,but now we can finally say we found the right place. Our son loves the daycare from the moment we went to see it, he didn't want to leave the daycare when we went the first time to see it. All I want to say is, Thank you Helen what an amazing place you created for these children, keep up the good work !

I cannot say enough wonderful things about this daycare. Such caring and amazing staff. The program is amazing, lots of time outside with nature, crafts, and learning. The daycare itself is so warm and inviting, with so much natural light. The owner posts pictures of the daily activities, which is fun to see. My daughter always has a smile on her face when I come to pick her up :)

After searching and almost giving up on a day care for my kids, a coworker recommended Moms Dream Day Care. My wife and I were so lucky to find this amazing place. Just moved from south side Edmonton.i had to change my house.i have to say this day care works best for my son location is great and safe .have lot of parking spot for parents.great outdoor playground.the inside is very clean it a huge place with a lot of toys and play area.the owner is very friendly and always want to works with family .thank you for the private tour !!!!

This has been the best decision yet for my 3year old daughter. Within 3 months at the academy she is able to write her name correctly without assistance. My daughter loves it here, the staff have a heart for children. They are very warm and always willing to help. Montessori Bilingual Academy I don’t know how you do it but I love it. This is a place to be for my preschooler and I don’t mind driving a long distance to bring her here. Thank you so much for all you do. I can confidently say you’ve got me till when it’s time for grade1.

I commend MBA for the high quality of child development and education that they deliver. I feel confident and at peace since my 4-yr old son started going to this school. I highly recommend MBA if you’re looking for the best!

I am really impressed by the high quality of education that these teachers bring. My son started in January 2021, and he has been going here for 4 months now. I would recommend this preschool to anyone who wants their children to excel.
Great place of learning for kids.  Focus is on learning and developing.

I love sending my toddler to Montessori Early Learning Child care. They have open concept as the house is divided into two floors instead of small compartments (which most of daycare have) that provide ample space for child to do activities as well as roam around. Aman has gone far and beyond to help my child. This is far from our residence but we continue to be at their place as I could feel that my child is always looking forward to go to daycare. Thank you guys for doing good job!!

We have just had our first week at Montessori Early Learning Daycare. We could not be happier! It is very clean and well organized. I only wish they provided lunch..
Aleisha is fantastic and all the caregivers are so great with our little girl. The ongoing communication and pictures throughout the day is comforting and reassuring for a first time mom, sending her little one to daycare for the first time!

I am so happy to share my thoughts about Montessori childcare...!! Very professional team working beautifully for the development of children enrolled here. I m particularly very satisfied with the development of my daughter, as we moved here and started daycare when she's only 3!

When I met Aleisha for the first time, made me calm as a new parent sending child to daycare. They took care of all my queries and concerns amazingly and reflected in my childs development!
The App HiMama is very fruitfull as well, updated with kids info always.
Thereby, I would recommend this daycare if you’re looking for one!

I highly recommend this daycare as the owner and staff are always going above and beyond. The owner Aliesha and the staff treat the little ones as there own! This daycare is an amazing place! Very clean and very organized. I absolutely love this place and the teachers.  I definitely made the right choice by choosing this place!The staff goes above and beyond for your child! The teachers really make an effort to engage with the kids and help them grow. I know that my son is well taken care of. He loves going to this place every single day. I would recommend this school to anyone that is looking for quality care and great staff. You wouldn’t be disappointed at all!

Such an amazing place for child development & growth. Aleisha & staff take the time to use positive reinforcement & learning skills. I would 10,000% recommend this wonderful day home & how they beautifully use the Montessori act.

My daughter, myself & her father are more then comfortable with this fantastic establishment & how adamant all the facilitators are, on keeping up with the parents & posting our children’s daily routines.

Thank you Aleisha and instructors for the safe/fun learning environment you are able to provide for our babies!

I do not even know where to start from. I wanted to give my feedback about this daycare so every parent can have a peace of mind that their child is in professional hands. All the staff members are so nice, caring and professional. I really appreciate for their hard work. They have an amazing way of communicating with each child, they kind of became part of our family. I am so glad that my son is bonding with them. They have very healthy meal plan, the rooms are always clean. I would definitely recommend to everyone!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️

My son joined this daycare on April this year and I super love it because of all staffs are so kind, they taking care of all the children just like their own. This daycare are super clean even during winter season, now they put artificial grass just make it more nicer and cleaner. The best thing I am happy with it which is they don’t put all children together the end of the day, some of the daycare will combine the kids haven’t been pick it up by parents the end of the day, so that made my son sick so often with different environment in different age kids. Their activities are so diversification. Movie day, international ice cream day, swimming party, that just make my son so happy everyday to go to the daycare. Really appreciate all the team member working so hard over there.

My daughter joined this daycare in April, and she has adapted very well. Since I pick up my child a bit late, I always see the teachers cleaning the floor and washing the toys. The teachers are very patient, and the curriculum is also rich in content. Regarding the food arrangements, there is a wide variety of food and fresh fruits, and my daughter loves it. I am very grateful for the director Katy, she is exceptionally kind and remembers the names of every child. She is very good at comforting the children’s emotions, and my child really likes her!

My son started daycare a few months ago and I have nothing but great things to say! From Center Director Katy to staff everyone is extremely professional and cooperative. They provide utmost care and attention to my child's needs and are always looking for ways to improve their service. As a parent, I am very satisfied with their quality of service and would highly recommend this to any parents.

Putting my son in daycare for the first time was definitely nerve-racking but the staff at happymind made it such an easy transition. The teachers are all so amazing and take special care with each child. My son loves going there and I love seeing how much he’s learning each day. I highly recommend this child care facility!

Absolutely the best Montessori in town! Juliana and her team took great care of our son during the pandemic. We were very lucky to find this Montessori, after a horrible experience with another day care facility. Their Kindergarten team is excellent with Miss Kimmanthudawa and Miss Kaur and the kids are way ahead of the peers in the public system. Highly recommend the Montessori any day!

Our two children have attended Montessori Play and Learn Centre Preschool and Kindergarten for the last three years. We have nothing but praise for the teachers and the director, Juliana. We have been very impressed by the programming and academic strengths our children have achieved from their time at MPLC. The teachers are truly exceptional, they provide children with lots of time to play and foster social relationships, along with a good balance of ‘work’ time. The teachers have always communicated easily with parents on our children’s strengths and areas that require more focus. The school is very multicultural and students are exposed to many cultures and traditions, which we as adults have learned from. We are very grateful both our children have been able to attend MPLC and only wish the school continued into grade school.

Both our girls went preschool and Kindergarten at MPLC. We love it. Pre COVID there were lots of opportunities for parents to meet and get to know each other. The teachers are patient, kind, adaptable, and treat each child as an individual. The centre itself is well run and organized in newly renovated custom space. If it went beyond Kinder, we'd stay!

Our eldest daughter attended this centre from ages 3 to 6, and we loved it! All of the staff are caring, attentive, patient and kind. The centre helps to nurture the children's creativity, confidence, compassion for eachother and are especially good at helping the children excel academically. We cannot wait to send our youngest daughter there. I would highly recommend this centre.

We are so fortunate and thankful to have had both of our boys "graduate" from the Montessori Play and Learn Centre. The staff are so skilled at teaching the children in a structured, yet nurturing and playful manner. Our boys developed a strong foundation for reading, printing, arithmetic, science, and the arts--may it be visual, musical, or theatrical. The staff also a ensure that children have ample physical play and they provide the children with a variety of activities such a dance, yoga, swimming, and sportball for developing gross and fine motor skills. The staff also make it a priority to teach the children (and their families) about a variety of cultures, and they take pride in celebrating the lovely diversity that we have within our city and country. And best of all, our children still "got to be kids".

The staff are very transparent, and are always trying to evolve the program with input from parents/caregivers.

During the covid-19 pandemic, Mrs. Lambert (director) and her staff were extremely conscientious with their infection control precautions and the safety of the children and their families; the quality of teaching and play never waivered even for a moment during this stressful time. This allowed me and my husband to continue working in the front lines of healthcare during the pandemic, for which we are ever so grateful.

I only wish that the centre could continue to teach my kids beyond the kindergarten years! Thank-you MPLC!

Both my kids have been going here for about 6 months. This daycare is the first experience for both of them. They both adapted well. The educators are very kind, my son loves to say how they are his best friends. My son was a very picky eater before coming here and now he tries food I wouldn't think he would. They are very patient with the kids. They both get excited to go everyday. I recommend this daycare for everyone. Truly a happy, safe, clean environment for the kids.

One day I got my nails done and this little boy came into the salon apparently he went to this day care (we didn't know at the time). He ran out on the road and we had to go and get him. If I could give them zero stars I would.*this happened a month before I posted this*

Karen and her team at Morning Glory are phenomenal. Karen has a safe space for children to play, rest, learn, grow, make friends, feel loved & nurtured.

Our story of coming to Morning Glory:
Our dayhome closed its doors end of May, I was looking for a place for my son, he just turned two. And I had driven past Morning Glory a number of times, and was intrigued. I went in and met Karen. She showed me around, inquired about my children and told me about her vision for her child care center. Upon meeting Karen I could tell that she has a gentle, loving nature & her eyes light up when she sees the children. I felt at ease in her presence. The first few weeks my son cried when I dropped him off (obviously, 🥴🥺). Morning Glory uses an APP to share photos and updates of each child personally to the parent. This was extremely helpful in easing MY comfort. Now that my son has been attending Morning Glory for 5 months, we have noticed an increase in his language skills, his confidence is up and when I drop him off he says ‘BYE MAMA’ and excitedly joins his friends! (The crying at drop off is few and far between hooray!)

Karen has put together an amazing meal plan, play activities and learning. The children enjoy outside play 2 times a day (in good weather). There is an enclosed play area out back that is super fun!
I feel supported in the growth and development of my son, but also in my own journey as a mother.

If you are touched by our story, please get in touch with Karen. I am confident you will find a home here for your child!
Incredibly clean daycare with lots of fun and activities for my son. Very good team of professionals and my kid feels comfortable and supported there. 👍

I just feel like the owner of the daycare is a lier. Working in childcare business I believe all the educators need to be honest and passionate. Children do not talk sometimes, which is why educators need to be honest to theirs job!!! I am associated with industry where we are dealing with kids and I don’t recommend this daycare at all!!

Great daycare! We love seeing their daily updates and activities via the app. The staff are all very attentive and caring. Our child is always smiling and happy when we drop him off. Highly recommended

Our son is 1 year and 3 months old, he goes to this DayCare and we are extremely satisfied, from the first day he really likes everything. We do not worry at all, because the employees are very good and kind people, real professionals in their field. every day they send his photos and videos to the HiMama app. it makes me very happy. we are extremely happy that our baby visits this place. Definitely 5 stars and above. Thank you

My child has been so happy. There is a variety of activities and parents get updates & photos of their children on the app every day. The manager  & all other educators are awesome. We feel so blessed that our child is in motherhood childcare

My daughter recently started to go Motherhood Childcare.She is almost 3 years old and its her first time at a daycare & she just loves it. The staff are very friendly, and warm. We have peace of mind every day when we drop her off knowing that she is being well taken care of and in good hands.They are professional and truly care and invest in my daughter's developmental needs. I appreciate the daily communication and the daily reports with the Hi Mama App.Thank You Staff :)
Motherhood child care is absolutely incredible to my daughter. Her and her staff are always friendly and amazing. I highly recommend sending your children to their child care Center.
The best quality childcare in Edmonton. The teachers are often planning great activities that keep children engaged
Overally good experience. Staff is very caring and do a good job taking care of my child. Owners are also friendly. I would highly recommend this daycare.

Some child care workers need more training specially handling infants and junior toddlers and also lost my childs items.Also,had a terrible experience getting our refund back as I had to follow up several times.

I recommend My Daycare to all parents. My daughter has been there for two years and we couldn't have chosen a better place.
A wonderful and qualified group of teachers with great patience and understanding.
The program is really great. Thank you for the wonderful care of my daughter.❤️ and see you soon with my son 💙

I could go on for hours about how amazing this daycare is! The staff members are some of the friendliest people I have ever met. At first, I was so nervous to send my daughter to daycare, but my anxiety quickly went away. These people really care about the kids in their care and it shows. Thank you so much to all the staff for treating my daughter like family!

This is my son’s first daycare , he attended My Daycare for 1 year full time. He was 18 months when he started and despite of his big separation anexiety he settled in very quickly. It is not only a beautiful and resourceful place but it is very clean and welcoming. My son loved going there; it’s been 1 month since we moved to BC and he still asks / talks about MyDaycare . The childcare providers/ teachers are all very experienced, calm, loving and attentive to children’s needs and they’re very responsible and patient. They provided tons of creative and educational activities and helped my son gain so much confidence and knowledge in many areas. I highly recommend this daycare. I cannot say enough great things about this place and the staff working there!

If you want a daycare that does Montessori activities, celebrates all your child’s successes, and is like an extended family then this is the daycare for your kid. We had our kids there for over a year and only left when we moved out of town. The caregivers love their job and it shows in how they care for your child. The daycare is tidy and clean and bright with huge windows, the daycare has outdoor play areas and a nearby green field too. It was perfect.

Both of my daughters are currently enrolled and we couldn’t be happier! We were referred by friends and family that had their kids enrolled and loved it, and we continue to refer our friends and family. We interviewed a couple other well known daycares in the area and as a mom I immediately felt a connection and sense of trust with the staff at My Daycare. These amazing women have become like family and we trust them 100% with our babies! They treat the kids like their own. I also love that my girls are exposed to a mix of cultures and language at My Daycare. The staff are so incredibly loving, accommodating and very professional. The same staff have been there for the three years we’ve been enrolled which says a lot about the management and environment. Many have been there much longer. Our daughters learn manners, social skills, hygiene, rules, kindergarten prep and have so much fun with so many creative activities! Some of the parents are teachers themselves and have raved about the learning program at My Daycare as well. I also love the outdoor space and large windows. The kids get lots of time outside in the nicer months and lots of natural light on the days the weather doesn’t allow for outdoor play. I can’t say enough about this daycare and feel it’s incredible underrated.

My son went to this school and faced some of the most horrible things I've ever heard, 1. Being my son was constantly bullied for being overweight and was even called things like whale, pig, and the big mac enjoyer. Its come to my attention that in a public schooling system these things are bound to happen but this isn't even the worst of it
My son was even jumped all because he he likes men
My children get  their Canadian education and Islamic education together ❤ teachers are so loving and caring. We are happy parents.

Kids are constantly receive discrimination against race and their beliefs. The school never pays attention to actual present issues that are happening like vulgar language, dangerous weapons and the constant bullying kids are receiving. It's not fair to the students and their parents.

Strong academic lesson. The homeworks used to encourage my son a lot. At kinder level kids are starting to read , The Arabic lesson and Quran was fantastic . welcoming adminstration staff.
5 star for english teacher, 5 star for Quran teacher.
I will highly recommend to parents who are looking islamic study as early as kinder.

Thank you very much for their great efforts. Learning English does not depend on the school or the teacher, but on the student. Everyone makes great efforts to explain to the student over and over again. We appreciate your efforts and we are grateful

Absolutely wonderful daycare. This daycare deserves every star. The staff members are really like family.The dedication of the staff towards my son is truly heartwarming. I have complete peace of mind when I leave him there. All the teachers are kind, patient and loving. Definitely would recommend it to friends and family!

This is an amazing facility. The staff are all extremely friendly and warm. We love how clean and organized they are. The daycare is full of toys and activities for the little ones. It's hard to find a good daycare and this is definitely one you can trust. 100% recommended

irresponsible management
I tried over 3 times to reach the manager about registration spot , I told them I no longer have time to search for daycare and no one call me back even when I went to their I didn’t find the manager I started to feel like a non-existent !!!! impossible to reach her. This is very tiring

Both of my kids have gone to this daycare and loved it. The staff have been amazing. They truly care about the kids and taken care of them. Even during the first weeks of drop offs they always reassured me they were doing good. We have recommended this daycare to other families and they have loved it as well. Nareeta is fabulous and has been so accommodating while taking care of her business. Can not say enough good things.

I really enjoy working in this daycare. My daughter is going there for 2 years now. She loves it. The staff are very friendly. Nareeta is the owner she is very nice and caring. The daycare is very clean and nice.
Thank you for all the great work.

Our child has been attending this day care for the past few months. She loves it here and is always excited to attend. They are diligent about feeding her nutritious meals, playing outdoors, facilitating interactive activities, introducing and educating to themes, and providing a well rounded experience. The facility is brand new and well taken care of. The staff are friendly and supportive.

My 5 year old has been attending this daycare since it opened at the end of January. The staff are extremely caring and go out of their way to accommodate the kids. I'm impressed with the educational content; the staff here have made far more progress teaching my daughter to learn in a few weeks than I have in several months!
You know you've got the best daycare when your daughter doesn't wanna leave at the end of the day.  Thanks for being so great Next Level!
I'm Impressed with the setup and the environment that the Owners have created. The owners are nice, easy to talk to and the staff are very nice as well.
Staff really cater to children’s needs, providing excellent care and a home away from home

My son had a nanny for almost a year and was unhappy at home. I had changes in my job schedule and decided to try a daycare that is convenient. It has been 8 months since my son started with them and he absolutely loves it there. The owners Nick and Lou are almost always there and the staff is friendly and down to earth. The building is kept very clean and cosy and organized. My son looks forward to going there and they have been teaching him manners and organization. I feel safe leaving him there and recommend this place to anyone who wants the right environment for their children.

my son has been goin here for 3 years now, one of the best daycares i have ever came across. they make you feel like family. and my son absolutely adores his daycare workers and enjoys going in everyday . never had any kind of concerns here

Lots of bad experience in this daycare. Nick, the owner, is only concerned on getting money. He's arrogant and disrespectful. He yells in front of his staff and the kids the being watched. (He has serious bad breath issues too) Their high chairs and bouncers are old. My baby got sick and had rashes. I thought maybe he's only adjusting to the environment but last Friday, I picked up my son and his upper lip was swollen and bruised. We're not going back to this place. Beware mommies and daddies.

Nick and Lou and the rest of the staff are amazing. My lil ones have been going there for 6 years. I wouldn't trust anyone more then my own family with my kids and well they are definitely family. You will not be disappointed in the quality care they give
I went to that daycare for 11 years. Ninys Daycare is the best daycare ever. The staff is kind and helpful. Always doing hands on activities and games.

Its been 3 months since my  daughter started attending North 🌟 star daycare, and I'm delighted with the Smooth transition they have provided. In this short time,they have created a good environment that has helped my child feel comfortable and secure. The caring staff and engaging activities have made daycare a positive experience for my little one and director Sonia send me a few pictures of her day which really make me happy Thank you so much.

I'm thrilled to share my wonderful experience with this day care! The facility was impressively clean and tidy, creating a safe and welcoming environment for the kids. The staff members were incredibly attentive, showing genuine care and dedication to each child. What stood out the most were the fantastic activities organized every day, which engaged and entertained the children while promoting their development. I couldn't be happier with the exceptional care they provided – it's truly a top-notch day care that I wholeheartedly recommend!

Our family has been very happy with North Star Centre. The facility is clean, well-stocked with appropriate toys, and big enough to provide plenty of playspace. The staff are attentive and well-liked by the kids. They get the children outside often and walk them to the playground regularly in summer. The director is very approachable and hands on, provides frequent photos and updates on the kids, and puts a lot of effort into arranging special activities for them. Our 4 year old has been very comfortable and happy during her time here.

My daughter has been at northstar daycare for the past 4 months and it has been a wonderful experience for whole family! She started just under 1 year old and her teachers made the transition so easy for us.
All of her teachers and site director sonia are so caring, friendly and knowledgeable, and we completely trust them with our daughter. It’s very reassuring as a parent to see your child get excited for “school” every morning.🙂

Well like every parent i was very worried about leaving my two kids with total strangers as it was their first time attending daycare but it took them less than a week to adapt to a total new environment with new faces! Your kindness and friendly approach made it easier for them to accept the daycare as their second home!To the staff i say keep up the good work…Daycares need professional staff like you to give us parents a sense of relief knowing & trusting that our sweet little souls are in safe caring hands.Thank You!
Love Northeast daycare! My son thrives here and the staff are absolutely wonderful!!
Love the family atmosphere of this daycare. Friendly staff, educational activities...my kids love it.
This  day care does not deserve a star. It deserves zero. This place is so so dirty and the management are a bunch of liars.
My daughter loves the staff and everything they have to offer the children. I

It's been a life-changing experience being connected with the amazing people at Norwood. You feel like part of the family, safe, appreciated, respected. Their staff is phenomenal, kind, nurturing, understanding. Everyone with children should be connected to this  amazing place. They offer so many free services: Free parent workshops with childminding, respite with delicious nutritious hot meals, counseling, parent coaching, child play groups, so much here is phenomenal I don't know how they do it all. Thank you to our team of wonderful people. You have been the village, family, and support network weour family was missing. You have given me strength,  safety, and opportunity. You have given my children an incredible boost, I cannot begin to express my gratitude but you have all done so much for my family and I will never forget the incredible generosity and encouragement of our Norwood family ❤️

If you have a special needs child or an autistic child I’m pretty sure this place is not for you. I sent my child here multiple times his diaper never got changed. I can recall one time I pick him  up and it was not full I was told they specialize in special needs children that they have help for it. I got to the point where I didn’t wanna take my son to daycare. And then they have the nerve to call me when I’m clearly having issues with her to tell me he’s not working out for them anymore ?? Like what the f the options are suppose to be “ nutritious “ but my child didn’t wanna eat any of it even if it was his favourite food 2/10 don’t recommend

This is a fantastic place with wonderful staff that puts on great events for kids and families here and at other facilities. I appreciate all they do for our community, the support I’ve had as a new parent, and the joy the small human gets every time we go.

Fantastic!! I've been taking my daughter who's 2 now for almost a year for respite childcare, home visitations, and soon potty training in my house. They have classes and many activities for little ones too! The workers are so pleasant and kind and they have a kitchen for homemade meals! This Centre made a positive impact and changed our lives! With no family/friends in Edmonton and trouble finding reasonably priced childcare, Norwood's Respite Temporary Daycare saved my sanity giving me a much needed break! The daycare also gives Violet socialization with other children preparing her for preschool years. Not to mention the staff who make this place as bright and wonderful for the little ones! All the social workers I've met are so great with kids and treat the parents with respect no matter your background.

I've taken an "exploring emotions" course here and use their child respite program here. The staff is amazingly helpful and they also provide free child-minding, coffee and snacks while you attend a course. Shout outs to Maven and Victoria for taking good care of my baby while I was in class. A lovely place with lots of programs and resources for families - and their ceiling of lights Christmas decorations are so beautiful.  I'd visit just to see them.
One of the best daycare in edmonton. The staffs are very professional and very friendly. I recommend this daycare for the parents who is looking for a very good daycare.

My son has been going here since he turned 1 and I have nothing but positive things to say about my experience with once upon a time. The staff are all amazing and really care about the kids, my son gets so excited to go and his social skills have improved immensely. Communication is top notch, lots of fun activities and just overall a great experience for a first-time mom. Highly recommend them.

I absolutely love this daycare, my older son went there for over 4 years and now his two siblings are going there..the teachers are awesome, great environment for kids. I can't thank them enough. Keep up the great work. 🙏 🙏👍🏽❤❤

My 2 kids was there for 6 years.The staffs  are absolutely great.I know my children are safe and learned from the teachers.Every day they send me an info how's there day going and I love to know it. I recommend this daycare 100 percent.

Highly recommended. My daughter wakes up every morning asking what day is it. Just to know that she is going to school. Teachers are awesome. I know what I am saying. I have worked in daycares in the city, have run my own downhome for 4yrs before closing it. I know when a child is comfortable and when they are resistant toward a certain program

Highly recommend Once Upon A Time Daycare. The staff is genuine, caring, and communicate well. My son started when he was 12 months and absolutely loves his teacher, Indira. He gets plenty of time outside playing;  he enjoys the craft days and the food.

Very good childcare that you can trust. The children wear uniforms, and the fees are higher than other daycares, but it is very well run. The daycare has separate rooms for five different age groups, they do a lot of different activities with their teachers, they have an art room, an actual gym to run around in when they have too much energy or the weather isn't good enough to go outside. They also have a kitchen and a cook who makes breakfast, lunch, and afternoon snack which are pretty healthy options.

Options Academy is an early childhood school that offers full day and half day academic and extra-curricular programming for children that are between one and six years of age. A fully comfortable environment for developing the skills high tech teaching facilities and well decorated infrastructure .
Both of my sons attended after school care here last year. Very organized, great programming, staff were very kind.
Amazing facility, and wonderfully kind, engaged teachers! So many activities and beautiful projects every day!

Friends of mine had their children attending this daycare. I am appalled at the lack of care and supervision provided. The children were segregated and left to sit alone. Huge lack of supervision, children bullying and inappropriate behavior(along with their moms)The director is lead by bully moms, and has no professionalism. There is no structure and activities to engage the children. If you love your children, find another daycare provider, this place is terrible.

In my child's experience, the off-site location within St. Brendan school is mind-numbingly boring and manned by elderly, unsympathetic staff that enforce stillness and quietness rather than encouraging play and engaging with the children.  The suggestion that my child would have to return to this location literally brought him to tears.  Leaving this daycare was the best decision.

Ottewell daycare has been a second home to my two children the last year or so. Management has made it seamless for our transition from a dayhome to a daycare.. even went above and beyond and helped my one son who was very anxious about going to school by making him at ease.

The employees there care for my children and more importantly show love and compassion towards them. I have nothing but positive things to say about this centre!

Ottewell daycare is one of the most loving and caring daycare I have ever dealt with. They are very understanding and accommodating for children with special needs. They go above and beyond teaching all the children about understanding special needs kids.

10/10 highly recommend!

Ottewell Daycare has maintained a high professional environment and accomadate to all our needs. Very respectful to the kids and all our kids enjoy the time they spend there making friends and interacting with the staff. Thanks so much!

This daycare has been so amazing for our kids.  The staff are creative, caring, attentive and just overall amazing.  My oldest will be moving on to Kindergarten this fall and I'm sad thinking he'll be moving on from the Moonbeams room.  On the bright side - the Sunbeams and Rocketeers have been absolutely fabulous too!  My children come home every day feeling loved, challenged and appreciated.  Thank you to everyone on the Oxford team.

AMAZING  Daycare!  The educators are Caring, Patient, Kind, HAPPY and Attentive to the children's needs at all time.  The children are also HAPPY,  play well together, are kind to each other.  Truly a reflection of awesome leadership.  Keep Up the Good Work and Thank You So Much for investing yourself into the children at your facility.
We've used several daycares, this one is by far the best!

Our journey with Panda Cub began when our child was just 11 months old and continued until he reached the age of 6. We are incredibly grateful for the amazing teachers who have been instrumental in our child's growth and development.

The level of care provided at Panda Cub is exceptional. The nurturing environment created by the caring teachers has allowed our child to thrive emotionally and socially. They've gone above and beyond to ensure our child's needs were met.

As parents, it's been heartwarming to see our child thrive and blossom in the environment that each of the teachers/owners created at Panda Cub. The memories, skills, and friendships they've gained are a testament to the positive impact of this daycare.

Our heartfelt gratitude goes out to the entire team at Panda Cub for their dedication. Your work is making a lasting impact on the lives of children, and we appreciate you being a part of our child's formative years.

Do not send your children here. Some staff members have very poor english so it's difficult to understand them when you need information about your child. They DO NOT change diapers. The child care workers at the day care are beyond amazing. They hear parents concerns, apply best practices in child development & the kids love them. Super satisfied & impressed by owner & staff. I am truly grateful for the teachers at Panda Cub House, your hard work and how you go extra mile for my kid is appreciated. God bless you.
It is a great daycare. Teachers are professional and courteous.

Very family and friendly atmosphere. The daily schedule is organized according to the age needs of the child. High-quality and balanced nutrition. The daycare centre is located in a quiet and cozy area, there are two outdoor playgrounds where children can play with water and watch how plants grow. The teaching staff works as a team and is always looking for interesting and developing activities for children. This is a photo from our graduation!

We were so happy to find Paradise Learning Centre after deciding to part ways with our previous daycare. The teachers and owners are warm, kind and practical. The centre is always neat and clean. Everyone seems to be treated respectfully. Would recommend the centre to anyone!

We love this place, my daughter loves the place too. Being a newcomer we were worried about selecting a daycare. But Sophia is so good and caring that our all worries are gone. We have been very happy with the Centre over the past 5 years while our daughters have attended. Many of the same teachers are still there and are wonderful and warm with the children. The new owners have added lots of great programming. My children have always been happy to go to daycare!

My son started Paradise learning Center when he was 6 months first partime and eventually full time. The daycare is organized and have daily planned activities, you get updates of pictures of your child and I could see him enjoying a yoga, painting, water games, sand games, etc. I think they have a really good time there, and staff are very kind and well prepared to look after your child.

I cannot say enough good things about Parkdale Daycare. The staff are the absolute best. It is clear from the first moment you meet them how much they love kids! Our son was at Parkdale for over a year and the professionalism and kindness that the staff showed everyday was incredible. We never worried about our son for a moment and we knew he would come home happy, healthy and benefit from the great day he had.

My two toddlers fell in love with the place and the caregivers at the first visit. Now they’re happy to spend the day at the daycare and get excited in the morning to go there. I highly recommend this place because my kids and I feel safe there.

Parsons Daycare is simply the best place to take your kids and I highly recommend to all parents. The staff are well-trained and on-top of issues. I was really sad when we had to relocate from the neighborhood. Thanks to Ashwinger and the entire staff for their hard work and dedication.

Parsons Daycare was a place my daughters called home. They were always excited to go, not because of their friends, but how they felt connected to a safe place. I strongly recommend Parsons daycare to all the parents,who are in search of a good place for their kids, so that they get a chance to learn and explore with fun. This is the best Daycare in the city. Being a new mom I was really worried leaving my toddler but they made the transition very smooth. This daycare is very professional and secured. Great and supporting staff, my boys going here for a long time. Nice facility. Thank you to all the staff for providing all the love and care to our kiddos.

Pebbles daycare is good. Better then the few others I checked out. Gave it 5 stars to make up for the previous reviews. I haven't had any problems. Maybe a daycare isn't the best place for a newborn...

This daycarebis great. Understandingband very patient. Staff incredibly kind and caring

I can't say enough good things about this wonderful daycare. It's small but mighty! The incredible kindness that we have received here as a family and the care that has been given to my youngest son has been such a blessing. They set the tone of kindness with the children and it is such a positive atmosphere. I get constant pictures and updates. The vibe is friendly and warm. I absolutely love this daycare for my daughter who just turned 2! Having a pandemic baby, I was nervous about the transition going into daycare for her. I’m sent updates on how her days been with pictures all the time. They always respond in a swift manner to any questions I have. I’m truly grateful to have a place where I know they are taking fantastic care of my daughter. Love you guys!

My child has been with this daycare since it opened, and will continue for as long as he can. The staff are amazing, caring and loving ladies. My son comes home knowing new things everyday, brings home artwork. He really enjoys his time there. I highly recommend them to parents who are looking for a fun learning experience for their child.

Finding a place to take your children and feel comfortable knowing that they are not just being taken care of but cared for with love and compassion is hard. Mrs Aman and the staff at pebbles n me daycare have been amazing with my children. They communicate with us throughout the day via messages and pictures to let us know how our children are doing . The staff here is so friendly and caring. My one year old loves going to the daycare every morning and i feel like he is well engaged and involved in activities on daily basis. I wanna thank the staff for helping me fill out the subsidies and grants. I will definitely recommend the daycare to my friends and family.

I will 100% recommend this daycare.

Best place for my children.

Peter Pan is an outstanding children's daycare that offers a nurturing, stimulating, and safe environment for little ones. Pink Elephant is an incredible Childcare facility. The staff are so kind, attentive and go the extra mile to provide quality care for my children. My children are so happy there and love all their Pani's (and Pan) {Pani/Pan is Ukrainian for teacher}. I highly recommend this childcare facility.

At Pink Elephant the children are treated by the staff as if they are their own. The facility is clean and the children are well engaged in activities. The staff are friendly and always greet you with a smile.

Our two kids - ages 2 and 4 have been attending Planet Kids Daycare for the past year. The teachers are fantastic!!! The staff truly take such good care of our kids. They go above and beyond to make the kids feel so loved and cared for.  Our kids love it there. There is a different theme each month which keeps them excited, and the field trips are great! Overall we are really happy with our experience here and would definitely recommend!

We have nothing but amazing things to say about this place. Sunny and Magda are doing an excellent job at keeping the kids safe, happy and learning. Our daughter was in their baby room and loved it!

The programming is diverse and the kids learn through play. Every month has a theme and special activities. They even took the babies to the zoo in the summer!

The daycare uses an app to report on potty time, naps and foods. They also send precious photos that you'll look forward to every day.

The daycare is meticulously clean, and has its own private little yard (hard to find downtown) with plenty of toys for kids to run around in.

12/10!

Our daughter has been with Planet Kids since day one and every staff member has almost become family to us! Everyone always makes us feel so welcome and have been fantastic to us. When we first toured the daycare, Sunny and Magda allowed our daughter to take as much time as she needed to see and experience every knook and cranny of the facilities, which I really loved. The kids have lots of fun and educational activities and field trips, which I absolutely love!

10/10 best daycare ever!!!

My 18 month old daughter joined 'Planet Kids' a few weeks ago and has really enjoyed her time so far. Navneet Kaur and her staffs are so attentive, really getting to know each of the children and always go the extra mile to make sure they are happy and well looked after! It is a wonderful daycare.
