Highly recommend Planet Kids Daycare for its staff and the effort they put into their kids.
The building is beautiful with nice big windows and they have a lovely outdoor play area. The staff are so friendly and caring! My toddler always leaves with a smile on her face!
Best place for kids..
Awesome daycare ..

This review is long overdue but definitely well deserved.  My daughter has been with the daycare for almost a year and as a parent I cannot express in words how great this daycare is!  From the owner to the providers and the level of care, interaction and fun provided by this Childcare centre is what I call ABOVE and BEYOND.    The care factor they show not towards just the kids but to ensure that the parents are at ease when they drop the kids is amazing.  The  programs they provide are so much fun as well as a very diiferent approach to the learning experience for kids.......my favourite is the role play.  I just wanted to say Thank you Precious Sprouts for everything you do and to parents who are looking for childcare.......you will not go Wrong with this one.

Both of my children attend this after school care. The staff are amazing and kind. The kids go tobogganing and skating in the winter right at the facility. This review is a bit on the late side, but better late than never, right?

Let me just start off by saying that I wish I could give more than 5 stars, because I have never had such a positive experience at a daycare, especially in Edmonton. The level of care and attention my daughter received at Precious Sprouts was unmatched and completely blew me away, and all of the staff was so easy to work with through different transitions. I always felt as though no matter the situation, there was always love and acceptance here. Thank you so much Daljit, Miss S and Miss K for your kindness and care, I am convinced you are all angels!!!

Primrose was a home for my son for four years and I am grateful for their care and involvement in his early development (aka, they even potty trained my kid, lol). This is an amazing childcare centre. The staff are wonderful and my son is very happy here.
Excellent child care service in a great facility
Great staff

If I could give 0 stars I would.

I registered my son in the mountain adventure camp, and have had nothing but problems with the staff out of progressive . The director and staff in the mountains were amazing, but the people you will deal with are the staff at progressive and they have made the experience horrific.

Although they managed to accept our $1800 dollars immediately, their welcome package wasn't even filled out with the program name or my child's name. We were never sent a course outline, or a who to contact if things go wrong email. And boy oh boy, did they ever cause things to go wrong.
Emails and voice mails were not returned, no one bothered to respond to confirm requested information was received.
Somehow, despite me having repeatedly brought attention to issues with the online course access since July 2nd ( it is now August 20th) to Lisa, Charmaine, Sarah in IT, Sarah the director, the general office staff ( with no less than 20 emails and more voice-mails ) not ONCE did one person pull up his file and double checked his information . They registered hi. In the wrong class. As a  result my son spent the summer doing 80 plus hours of work he shouldn't have had to do, and an entire course he shouldn't have had access to.

All of progressives staff, from director downward have been made aware, and not one person has offered apology or explanation.
That should tell you about the respect they have for the students and parents they have under their care.

That have shown zero remorse, zero accountability, zero respect for the fact that despite charging me for the most expensive option, despite having multiple levels of staff aware of the issue for 6 weeks, not one person of 10 who was made aware of the problem tried to fix it, take ownership, do basic fact checking or offer even the vaguest of apologies.  They couldn't even return an email. Not once.

In fact, despite the course deadline being TOMORROW, they have not even returned a call or email to let us know how to proceed.
My son was supposed to do 3 units online. Instead he has done over 60. He was granted access to the 3 units 2 days ago.

I am absolutely gob smacked by the lack of professionalism, by the absolute ineptitude at all levels .

If you care about your children, avoid progressive academy.  They do not seem to understand their role as educators. There is no transparency, no one to contact when there is an issue. They do not care about wasting a kids summer, or the fact we have spent 2 months trying to get a problem they set in motion solved.

My child is an extremely high achiever, attending public school, where this would never happen. This school is about as progressive or success focused as a school teaching creationism out of an Atco trailer.  All they want is your money .

My review specifically focuses on the current PA Pre-K program. Initially, the program was excellent - until 2021, but unfortunately, it has experienced a significant decline since then, coinciding with the appointment of Kayla as the new program director. In my experience, Kayla has demonstrated a lack of respect towards parents and has shown a tendency to label the children, which is concerning and has had a negative impact on the program.

One incident, in particular, greatly bothered me. There was a safety issue involving a child requiring emergency assistance, and instead of addressing the situation appropriately and providing feedback to parents regarding safety improvements, Kayla dismissed it as an accident. Furthermore, she displayed an aggressive and impolite attitude when discussing minor mistakes made by the children with their parents. This behavior only exacerbated the situation and left us with the impression that she enjoys creating unnecessary trouble for parents (I don't want to say, but it is very Karen.)

Moreover, I have reservations about Kayla's educational background and qualifications to manage a team of highly educated teachers. While the program's teachers remain commendable, hiring an underqualified director like Kayla reflects poorly on the reputation of the PA Pre-K program and makes it less appealing to parents. We enrolled our children in the PA Pre-K program because we believed it offered more than a regular daycare program. If Kayla only has experience as a daycare provider and lacks experience working in childcare or school management teams, it raises concerns about her communication skills, experience in dealing with young children, and fair and sound approach to addressing incidents and behavior problems.

Due to the negative experiences we encountered with Kayla, we made the decision to withdraw our younger child from the program. Unless there is a change in leadership and Kayla is replaced, I cannot, in good conscience, recommend the PA Pre-K program to any of my friends or local community. It is my hope that the program promptly addresses these issues for the sake of its students and the community's perception of its reputation.

I usually never writes reviews, but I had to do this time so since 2022 since the appointment of the new principal (Charmain) and pre K director (kayla) 2021 and accountant(Marquuxe) “who I am not sure that even she has any degree in accounting, (my 2 years old can do better math then her) and despite the disrespect to lot of parents, she basically unable to put a bill together clearly”. things started to go downhill. They don’t listen to you they talk over you they do a lot of promises never deliver, even though they charge premium $$$ for the school. The teachers over there are highly qualified no complains about them. I have three children in there already, but the administrative part of the school is unprofessional, unhelpful, and it feels they really never on same page when you talk to them. for example, the administration staff give their own children and their friends’ children, and their relatives’ children more attention discounts extra care etc. Meanwhile, for other kids treatment is totally different, their own kids can swear, be rude, even hit the teachers, but other kids should be perfect, even tho all my kids are well respectful kids yet it feels unfair for the rest of the kids to be treated differently, I only wish the owners of the school can investigate deep into that. Administrative honestly is the worst in anything I have ever dealt with in any kind of services in anything, since these people became in it. The hypocrisy is very obvious. We pay $$$ you don’t care about little kids who might need a little bit of help but your own administrative staff not teachers have special treatment if this is not tyranny I dunno what tyranny is. Also classes been totally big so not much attention to each student as it used to be before.

This is a very well worth it Education System. Class sizes are small, it’s uniform, they prep you for life. They had my daughter reading at a grade 12 reading comprehension level when she was in kindergarten. They had amazing talent opportunities and did not spent school money on their benefit. They used it for helping students in their education endeavours. They also have mixed children which was the reason I found them in the first place. My children are half Asian, my son looks full Asian. And tempo was high rated but all a bunch of white children. I felt my son would feel out of place and I didn’t like that. I love progressive for having such a race mix the children were all amazing, the field trips were so awesome. The school doesn’t leave any child behind, leaves no gaps in knowledge, they have payment plans for monthly payments instead of yearly tradition. My children learned and took a lot from this school with them to bring them success in life.

I sent my both kids to PA started 2021 school year. My daughter attended JK program at Sunflower room with teacher Ishani and Deema. They truly care and love my daughter. For the last 10 months, my daughter has grown and learnt not only academically but also attitudes and behaviors. I’m so glad we made the right choice and lucky to have amazing teachers for my both kids!

Incompetent centre and staff. They allowed my child to leave the school without seeing him picked up by a parent or signed out, resulting in my child missing for hours, found by the police wandering a busy avenue.

Accounting is a joke. No one has any idea at any time what monies are required to be collected and or have been collected nor do they track subsidies. This is the second time they have owed me payments back and it’s been over two weeks and continue to put it off. They will ask you to make a monthly payment you have already paid.

They close for two weeks in the summer but still charge you for child care for those two weeks. It would make more sense for the staff to have staggered holidays.

The bullying in this centre is out of control and no one does anything about it. I finally had to pull my child and it’s the best decision I’ve ever made.

Avoid this OSC at all costs.
Great kids fun and out going the works easy to talk with there when  needing  a hand  thank you cherry

Rainbow daycare is such an amazing place. They have a wonderful team that works so hard to keep the kids happy and safe. My son has been going to Rainbow for over a year now. My children are attending for two months at this daycare is amazing the owner, director John and Patty are professional, very good with children. This daycare spent the day at the mall and GalaxyLand. I thought staff members were very unprofessional with how kids were treated. I had been sending my kids to Red Apple Daycare since November last year, and we couldn't be happier with the service. I highly recommend Red Apple Daycare to any parent looking for an excellent daycare service!

My special needs daughter has been going here for awhile now. She absolutely loves the staff!!
They are so good to her they allow her to help do things, assist her with projects, and help her  with social skills and be a person she can go to when she needs help.
Jon the owner is one of my daughters favorite ppl. If she is having a bad day he will have her be his assistant to help with stuff around daycare. She loves to lead and he allows her to be herself.
The staff are trained and are caring. One teacher even does art drawing for the kids, they have a outdoor space for them to play is as well.
The feild trips in the summer are great they do all kinds of activities around the city.

My 3yo son goes to Red Apple since Aug 2018. He loves the daycare so much that he would not want to leave when we go pick him up. There are a few comment explains that:

1. Other kids behaviour/reaction: As a mom, my first checkpoint is to see how other kids act in the daycare because kids don't lie. Kids are all happy, energetic and friendly in daycare. There are not much tears and sickness happened around there.

2. Staff: John & Patty are awesome! They are caring, responsible and kind to all kids and I can tell kids loves them a lot. Both of them are very responsive to my questions and concern, that provides an ease of mind for me as a parent both work full time. Other staffs are great in daycare and show good care to kids.

3. Environment/Meal: The area is spacious and clean for kids to have activity around the daycare during cold days, and it has an outdoor playground with sandpit (attached next to the building). I like the outdoor playground because it is NOT an extension to the parking lot/drive way, which gives me peace of mind when my boy plays outdoor. My son loves hot lunch and snack provided and that they even offer fried rice once a week.

4. Extra activities during summer: John organizes weekly outdoor activities during summer and my son loves them so much (such as park visits, special events @ WEM, etc).

My boy went to other daycare before and I can see how difference he is in love with Red Apple. I hope this comment can help parent in search of daycare around Belmed area. :)

Finding the right daycare is never easy. Then minute we walked in The Redrose daycare is the best place. My kids love there I would like to make everywhere to check out that    very clean good understanding teachers
Being a member in redrose daycare, I learned so many things in such a positive environment. All staff members are very supportive and I am glad that I am working here.

My child has been attending Richard Secord Out of School Care (RSOSC) at the Enjoy Life Church location - one of their two locations - since September 2021 and I can’t say enough positive things about it. Initially I didn’t realize that RSOSC actually has two locations with one being at Richard Secord School and the other being at the Enjoy Life Church making it much closer to my child’s school of Greenfield. The staff at RSOSC are professional, attentive, caring and creative. It’s very typical for my child to come home with a variety of crafts and on days when the school is closed for PD days etc. the caregivers typically plan extra fun activities and theme days such as karaoke, henna, talent shows, tie-dying, Hawaiian day, Denim day, baking and more. During these challenging times of COVID the Executive Director, Jade, has been excellent at communicating the changing guidelines and seeking parent feedback through surveys. I’m so happy we stumbled upon this location last year and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for out of school care for their child.

Rise n Shine daycare has been an excellent child care center for my daughter. My daughter has been going to this daycare around 3 years now. All the child care providers seem kind and knowledgeable. Rise ‘n shine has been a wonderful daycare for our 2 years old daughter We have been using this daycare for almost 2 months now and we couldn't be happier with the care and attention that our daughter receive here. Rise ‘n shine has been a wonderful daycare for our 2 girls aged 3 and 5. We have been using this daycare for a little over a year now, and we couldn't be happier with the care and attention that our two girls receive here. The staff is incredibly warm, friendly, and nurturing, and they always make our girls feel welcome and safe.

The facilities are clean, bright, and well-maintained, with plenty of age-appropriate toys, games, and activities to keep our girls engaged and entertained throughout the day. Our girls particularly enjoy the outdoor play area, although small in size it's easily accesible with a range of fun / activities.

The Director is engaged in the daily aspects of the daycare, and the staff is knowledgeable and have a genuine passion for working with children. They are patient, kind, and always willing to answer any questions or concerns that we may have. They keep us informed about our girls' progress and we appreciate the regular updates and communication.

We have seen our girls thrive and grow under the care of Rise ‘n shine daycare, and we are confident that they are receiving the best possible care and attention. I would highly recommend this daycare to any parent looking for a safe, nurturing, and enriching environment for their children.

My daughter attended Rising Scholars and we’re happy to be back for another year! The teachers are kind, inviting and invested in your child’s education. I hear about Ms. Zohreen and Ms. Azia all the time at home, especially when we play school.

My daughter has learned so much in the past year, from little things like better hand washing and choosing vegetables for snack to bigger things like planets, whales, volcanoes and recognizing sight words. I really appreciate their approach to diversity and inclusion in the classroom where my daughter has learned about different cultures with her peers. I love the monthly newsletters to help me stay on top what my daughter is learning at school and ask her questions about her day. The best thing about our time here has been the friends my daughter has made and continues to make.

I know as a parent the transition to school can be hard, but the teachers are very supportive. They are a top Montessori school for a reason, and it shows every day in my daughters growth and learning. Rising Scholars Montessori is a great school and I highly recommend it to any parent! You won’t regret it.

Our daughter has been going to Rising Scholars Montessori since September. We have noticed that since starting preschool, she has become interested in learning and will often tell us about something she had learned at school. As a child growing up in Covid times, we have also seen a huge improvement in her socialization skills. The teachers take a great interest in evaluating each child's learning needs, and our daughter has benefited from going to Rising Scholars. She is always excited to go to school each morning!

Our daughter will soon be completing two years with Rising Scholars Montessori and the experience has been nothing short of amazing. She was 2 1/2 years old when she started and after the incredible void of social interactions during COVID, we were quite nervous as to how she would adjust. Ms. Zohreen and Ms. Azia were the most patient and caring teachers and helped make her transition very smooth. Their delivery of the curriculum has been the perfect balance between structured learning and many creative opportunities for fun. Our daughter is always sharing stories about school and has truly enjoyed being there. It has been amazing witnessing her growth over these years and we are confident this experience will put her many steps ahead as she continues to school. We would recommend Rising Scholars to our family and friends without hesitation and plan to send our son here next year!

Rising Scholars has been an incredible experience for my daughter and our family. The level of academic accomplishments she is reaching far exceeded our expectation and will have her well prepared for grade one. The teachers are kind and very organized. My daughter has genuinely enjoyed her time here and our extended family has decided that they will also have their children attend Rising Scholars based on her progress and experience. I highly recommend Rising Scholars to anyone looking for an educational program for their children.

Rising Scholars has been the perfect foundation stone for our kid to start his education. Ms Azia and Ms Zohreen are the most patient with the kids and have helped to nurture the child's overall personality. My son is ahead of other students in his next school and is one of the most hardworking students. We are so glad and highly thankful to Ms. Zohreen and Ms. Azia for the excellent work they have done with the kids. Highly recommend at least 2 years of Montessori education for all kids at Rising Scholars. Thank you Ms. Zohreen and Ms. Azia!!
My child absolutely loves going here! Often asks me to be the last parent there for pickup and always comes home happy. The teachers and kids are so friendly!

Honestly one of Edmontons best daycare centres. It is very clean and the staff is super friendly and actually cares about you kid. I personally met with the owners and they walked me through the facility and I was in aw. Their quality of service is incomparable. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for a clean, professional and caring centre.

The staff and the owner is super friendly with the kids and they really care about the kids.The place is very clean. Our kid is always happy at this place and she has improved a lots and quickly learning new things after joining the daycare.

I don’t like to give negative feedback however, I’ve been trying to register my child for over 2 weeks. The staff have been slow to reply to emails and phone calls. When I try to take to someone in person they are gone.

An absolutely AMAZING place! We have sent all 3 of our children to Riverbend Montessori Child Development Centre over the last 8 YEARS!! We started them at Riverbend Montessori when they were 2 and 3. The staff, the atmosphere, play areas, and other children are wonderful. If you are looking for a new place to send your children, this place is EXCELLENT. Our children learned, played, and their social skills increased so well as they grew. We loved the field trips, bike days, activities, nature walks, park days, ice cream days, birthday celebrations, sledding, Christmas concerts, celebrations of all cultural events, and many creations our children made here. We especially loved the updates and photos  we would get of our children of their activities during the day. They especially helped our last child adjust to going to Riverbend Montessori so well. He would cry when I left him, most likely because I took an extended maternity leave and he’s my baby ! (He is super attached to me). But Teacher Mylene would always be there to comfort him, and ensure he felt safe and cared for. Our family will always be forever grateful to Pam, Mylene, Mama Sana, Shazia, Susan (who have been there from day 1), and all the Riverbend Montessori staff. They treated all our children like their own family.

Side comment to the lady LB who only gave a one star rating because she didn’t want to pay the administration fee to hold a spot on the wait list. This DOES NOT reflect the quality of the business and does not justify one star. It takes a lot to maintain a business (the admin, planning, scheduling etc.). When you apply to the University of Alberta you have to pay an application fee to show you are SERIOUS to attend. Many places have an administrative fee. This is no different. If 100 people asked to be put on the wait list and only 30 were serious to attend, that adds up to a lot of time and energy calling people back and confirming a spot for them. If you just want a regular “daycare” with no fee, then that’s your choice. Go find one. But I can definitely say your child will not have the same  amazing care and experiences they would have received, if they had attended Riverbend Montessori. If you are serious, the admin fee is just a stepping stone to get your child into an AMAZING program, with amazing people, and other amazing children!

My son only joined this daycare for 2 months but the experience there was so wonderful that I really would like to give 1000 thumbs up to this daycare. Super friendly and responsible teachers, who are always available for questions and concerns. The center looks small from outside but is actually very decent in its indoor size, with very neat and tidy sections (open concept but kids are separated by age and grouped in different sections of the room). Kids are always busy with programs and activities and are never bored or left alone. New comers are cordially welcomed and very quickly make friends because all the kids there are so welcoming and nice! I've been through 3 daycares and this is just the best one. My son had been through a bad daycare before he joined Riverbend Montessori and this daycare is just a God-sent. I would definitely recommend it to anyone around the area looking for a daycare.

Riverbend Montessori has amazing staff with so much heart and a caring mindset! My son has been attending this daycare for over a year and we love it here! The teachers really make an effort to engage the kids and develop them in a very individualized way. Each of them welcome him with care and we can see growth in him every week! The management is committed to providing a safe, clean, and loving environment and we’re very thankful to Pam and the whole team at Riverbend Montessori. Cannot recommend this daycare enough!
Both of our kids have attended this daycare and it has been a very positive experience. Pam has a masters degree in education and cares about each child’s individual needs. Would highly recommend.
We’ve sent two kids to this amazing facility and they treat our boys like family. Would 1000% recommend!!!

Hello everyone, I have put my kids in this daycare for a year and they still say it is a very, very good place. It is clean and people are very nice. its is like their second home. And I wrote what I really saw. I have never seen such a clean and nice staff ever .

I adore this daycare! The facility is new (opened in May 2022), and the staff cares for the children. They do several educational activities with the children, and I was pleasantly surprised to see that my 3-year-old already learned how to write a few letters with them. I could see how much she has grown and developed under their care, especially her social skills. They also serve hot meals for lunch, but no beef and pork. But if desired, parents can send lunchboxes for the kids, and they will warm them up and serve them to the kids. I highly recommend this daycare!

I live in one of the apartment buildings beside this daycare, and for three hours while the kids were playing outside they just let a child scream and cry. This child was obviously distressed and needed comforting and none of the lady’s who were outside did a thing. They ignored the child and it went on for so long I had to shut my window. I don’t think this is acceptable for daycare providers and I would never in a million years send my child there after witnessing that.
This is far the best daycare! My daughter coming to this centre from one year, All staff and children make this place amazing .
The ladies are wonderful😊 over there  I have nothing but great things to say about the staff there 😊I trust them immensely with my little ones 💜

The teachers and staff are very nice. Healthy meals and snacks are prepared daily. There are a lot of activities for the kids, lots of toys to play with, and some craft materials for bigger kids. The Himama application is also very useful to track the daily activities and to send/receive messages to/from the teachers.

I have many compliments and highly recommend Roots. The staff are friendly and inviting; the kitchen is introducing our kids to new and different healthy cuisine; the Hi Mama app is excellent; the location and roof top play area are fantastic for us. My only complaint is that on the third day our boys (after getting the temp check and washing their hands) ran off without giving me a hug. My wife says thats a good thing but I was sad. Thanks for keeping our children safe and engaged with learning during the day. Much appreciated.

seriously such an amazing daycare!
Staff are so friendly and welcoming.  The best nutritious snacks and lunches for the kids.
Safe and fun environment for both staff  and children. I highly recommend Roots childcare 100%. They have amazing programs for all kids and keep them engaged throughout the day .

The cleanest, most friendly, most organized Daycare I have ever seen. I have 3 kids and been through 10-12 different Daycares in past years. This by far exceeds all. Staff are very well trained, experienced. Excellent communication and pictures though Himama app. I know about what my kid ate and when he got changed and if it was a wet diaper or soiled. It's fantastic!!! My 8 month old loves it there, much happier leaving the daycare then being at home with me.

My 2 year old's first time going to daycare, a lot of anxiety comes with the process, and I got very lucky to find Root's childcare. The staffs are so patient, nice and caring. My daughter loves her teacher, and when we go pick her up, I can tell my daughter is attached to her. Would highly recommend this childcare Centre, they work with the parents to make the process smoother and easier :)
A very good daycare with lots of space, two sessions aged 3 and 6 for my two daughters

I myself I have several forever friends from here just from meeting other parents!! This daycare was one of the best things to of happened to me and my family!

The Food is very Child Friendly; and if there is something on the menu your kid doesn’t like they will try their best to amend the menu to suit all the children’s wants and needs.
Teachers are awesome and great people to talk to. My kids definitely have their favourites!

I have recommended this a daycare to everyone and anyone who will listen to me!
I work with kids myself and this facility is by far the best we’ve dealt with as a family!

So good that I even use one of the teachers as my babysitter on the weekends and evenings when needed!! Absolutely exceptional work and behaviour from these beautiful bunch of ladies!!

Forever Friends!
Learning is Key!
They Make Learning Fun!

First and foremost I want to say all children are different and have a variety of needs and wants. Being in a daycare isn’t just all on daycare staff, it has a lot to do with the parent as well. Our attitude and how we deal with situations comes out in our children as we are the ones shaping their response mechanisms. Secord Childcare makes all children feel secure and wanted. We have been going here for just under two years and I would say that I feel comfortable that my kids are taken care of and loved just like their own.

The staff are nice, positive and are here to help all children grow.

Children’s emotions happen and frustration comes out of their little souls but I feel confident that the staff know how to handle the situation in a respectful and calming manner.

Thank you for taking care of my most precious things.

My daughter attended this childcare for one month. We left because she got to witness one child continuously hitting teachers. Scientific studies state that a witness to any form of violence can have the same emotional and physiological effect as being the victim themselves. This is not what our children should be subjected to. There were more excuses than solutions.

Further to this, there were a few times I walked into the room to no adult supervision this morning (and the last day of attendance) being one of those days. The teachers did not make a welcoming environment, and when this was addressed with the director, the greetings that were then expressed felt forced and more of a nuisance for the teachers than anything.

My daughter would end and start her day with a statement similar to, "I don't want to go to the daycare." She is the kind of child that normally loves entering engaging and stimulating areas. Her previous childcare was a place of enjoyment and learning, along with plenty of physical activity. I do not recommend this childcare. We will be vetting childcares more thoroughly from now on. It looks nice, but looks can be deceiving.

We had the pleasure of being at this day care. The staff is very kind and caring. My son has been there for 2 years and it is very sad to say goodbye because my baby has grown up and is going to school. However, I want to take this opportunity to express my gratitude towards you, the hardworking teachers, and wish you all the luck and success in your future endeavors.

Love this daycare! My nephew has been going here for almost a year now.  He always has great things to say about the activities and things they do day to day. The staff are amazing; so kind, caring, welcoming and super communication at all times! So happy he is attending this daycare!

I had the chance to meet the owner and was inspired by her passion and dedication to the childcare field. Unfortunately, the center does not offer OSC for grade school children otherwise I should have put my children in there.

My son is in the out of school care room and loves it here! The educators are all so kind, patient and enthusiastic! Keep up the amazing work being done there, my family really appreciates it.  Special shout out to the van crew - Ashley, Ron and others for making sure my little one makes it to school:)

Best daycare in the city!  It is such a relief knowing my son is taken care of with great programming and loving staff.  Everything is top notch from the director and staff, to communication, to yoga and the time spent outdoors.  Highly recommended.

I absolutely love this daycare my son has been going since February 2016 and  has fun and learns everyday they spend a lot of time outdoors they make neat things and the staff is very engaging and caring. Ashley the director is a very passionate caring and compassionate person and communication with all staff is very good you can tell they love what they do and my child is happy and content there its hard to find a great quality program however I have found one here :) they are top notch love it keep up the great work gals

I work with a lot of parents of young children and the amount of questionable interactions they have with their daycare's (not Seeds and Sprouts obviously!) blow my mind. Our daughter has been going to Seeds and Sprouts for two months, and loves it! The educators are fantastic, the communication with parents is great, and the daily outdoor activities (weather permitting) are a huge benefit!

My son went to many different daycares, but Sensorium centre is the greatest thing ever happened to our lives, my sone from day 2 was happy, and doesn't want to go home, the teachers are incredible, the center is amazing, my baby doesn't stay in one room, they have Jym for the kids, water games, smart activities,  outdoor games and endless care, the smile on my sons face every morning tell it all.
Highly recommend,  honest, professional and super amazing staff and the best manager I ever worked with, Alka cares from her heart, and always on the top of everything. Finally found a daycare for my son that accommodates his needs. The staff are extremely patient and supportive so is the owner, love how understanding she is. Each child does their own thing without the care in the world. Definitely deserves a 5 star, thank you Sensorium for allowing us to be a part of your family!

I am extremely pleased with my son's daycare. My son always has the brightest smile when he sees his teachers every morning. The owner of the daycare, Alka is absolutely amazing. As a staff I really like daycare policies, director, owner and programs they follow to engage children in daily activities. I would love to work here and be a part of this team. I recommend this daycare as it is a safe and educational place for your children
Seven stones daycare is very good ,safe environment and all staffs are good.I highly recommend to all parents to bring  their children there. Thank you.

Al Mustafa Academy offers wholesome learning environment. The standard of education is high and the admission is competitive. Spaces fill up quickly.

Your child's success in the program will be dependent on how much you're willing to commit to the homework, recitation, and weekly quiz preparation on weeknights. If your child loves learning and can work with a routine then this is the school for you. The school community is a group of people committed to their kids, and so I find that it has come along with nice families that care about success as an added bonus.

If you're looking for a school where you can proudly say your children learnt Quran sincerely, Al Mustafa Academy is the right school for you.

A welcoming staff to greet your children every morning and bid them farewell at the end of the day with smiles and warmth.

A professional team that tends to the needs of the students, parents and staff alike.

I personally feel it's where the school is a second home; a facility which thrives on good ethics and moral values.

A safe haven for all students from all walks of life regardless of their background, age and culture.

Students are enriched with Academic support, Islamic education and leadership skills.

My kid spent 2.5 years in this daycare. Having an opportunity to observe other daycare facilities, I can state that the Daycare "Skazka" is one of the best. You can be 100 percent confident that your kid will be happy there, and you get complete satisfaction from the daycare service as a parent.

I love this daycare, my child has been attending here since shortly after they opened. Very careing staff, huge open rooms and it is very clean and organized. Caring, professional, amazing staff to take care of your little ones. Clean, safe and productive environment for children to grow and express their abilities, needs and emotions. I trialed this daycare for two (but really one) day as a drop-in. Staff were quite nice, HUGE beautiful facility with tons of toys. However, on the second morning my son refused to go back, as in, he undid his seatbelt, opened the car door and ran away down the street! It was like he was fighting for his life! I realize this probably speaks more to my sweet, gentle, sensitive son's difficulty adjusting than the daycare itself. But what irked me was that when I suggested doing a few days of gradually introducing my son to the daycare with me staying there with him, the owner would have none of it. She said I was only allowed to stay 15 minutes (even though in their handbook it says parents can stay for an hour to help their kid adjust)! When questioned about that, she said "oh that's for younger kids". My son is 3. She also had the audacity to insinuate that he was being disobedient and that I was not disciplining him enough. I was so mad. If you work in childcare, shouldn't you be concerned about the mental health of the children more than your arbitrary rules?! So, we couldn't go back.
Newly opened Sep 2019 ! very clean and spacious facilities for kids , very maintained  rooms & play areas for all ages . very helpful and professional staff and management! Highly recommended :)
Very nice management and the team is great with children's..i recommended this daycare

My kids are treated like family here. This is the best daycare ever, my son has been going there for 3 month now  and he loves it, he does a lot of activities and the staff is so welcoming, caring and professional they do a great job🙏🙏🙏🙏

Now that my kids have graduated from there I now really see how well they had it.  5 easy stars.

Amazing daycare who truly cares. The owner is loving, understanding and very professional. The teachers are hardworking, loving and kind & if they're not they don't work there long😉. My son joined this daycare when they had just started in may 2022. Its been 10 months now and i am so happy and relieved that i chose this daycare for him. He was only 14 months old when he started and i was very anxious putting him to daycare that early. But the owner, director and ALL teachers at this daycare has been working so hard to keep my son happy and safe. The cleaning standards are just top notch always. Teachers are compassionate and caring. They get kids involved in lot of learning activities throughout the day. They celebrate lot of festivals and days. Plus meals are healthy and you get to choose between veg and nonveg if you prefer one or the other. I cannot describe what a relief it is for a working mom knowing that her kid is in good hands. Thank you to all the teachers and the director and the owner for all the work you do for these kids.

Star Learners is a great daycare! Our kiddo has been attending since September and we are really happy with our experience so far. Most of the educators are friendly and seem quite engaged with the children. They also do many different crafts and activities like finger painting, pom pom art, circle time, and zumba. The center director is kind, caring and responsive to our questions. We also enjoy the daily updates and photos/videos that the educators send us. Our kiddo comes home clean too! No muddy shoes or dirty/missing clothes like my friends' kids at other daycares. Meals are healthy and include food from different food groups. I can tell that the staff take great care in keeping our kiddo healthy and their belongings clean.

Even though our experience with Star Learners is positive, I'm only giving 4 stars because of the following: front doors aren't very secure (I suggest implementing a fob key system), we don't always get daily updates on what activities the children did, there is a language barrier with some of the educators, and since October our kid has been coming home sick quite often which makes us worried that other parents are sending their kids to daycare sick. Despite these issues, we do recommend Star Learners due to the other great experiences we have had with them. They are also clean, affordable and send updates to parents often! Their app is nice and easy to use too. I also loved the Halloween treat bag and art that my kiddo brought home recently.

Thanks Star Learners for all your hard work!

Edit: I'm updating my review to 5 stars since Star Learners has made great efforts to address our concerns, improving our experience at the daycare.

I am one of the teacher of this daycare. This is the best work place that I have seen  in my life. Very positive work place and good team work. Extremely down to earth staff. Always goes that extra mile . Very professional service with a smile.Very neat, clean and attractive atmosphere. Awesome people to deal with. I recommend it to all. Staff are well educated and provide tender loving care to kids.

I  am delighted to share my glowing review of Summertime Daycare's Out of School Care program. It has been an absolute joy for my daughter, and I couldn't be happier with her experience at this daycare.

First and foremost, the director, teachers and caregivers at Summertime Daycare is exceptional. They are not only highly professional but also genuinely caring and nurturing towards the children. From the moment we enrolled our daughter, they made us feel welcome and ensured that all her needs were met. They go above and beyond to create a warm and supportive environment where the children can thrive.

One of the standout qualities of Summertime Daycare is the wide range of activities and programs they offer. Every day, my daughter is excited to go to daycare because she knows there will be something fun and engaging waiting for her. From arts and crafts to outdoor games, and educational projects, the daycare provides a well-rounded experience that keeps the children actively involved and entertained. The variety of activities helps foster creativity, physical development, and intellectual growth.

Moreover, Summertime Daycare places a strong emphasis on social development and building a sense of community among the children. They encourage teamwork, cooperation, and respect, which has been instrumental in helping my daughter form strong friendships and develop important social skills.

I must commend Summertime Daycare for their excellent communication and involvement with parents. They keep us well-informed about our child's daily activities, progress, and any important updates through newsletters, app, and face-to-face conversations during drop-off and pick-up times.

Summertime Daycare is an excellent place for a little one to start their journey of self discovery, friendships, and learning! I have always been very impressed with the staff (directors and teachers) as well as the impeccably clean environment. I highly recommend the daycare to all prospective parents.

My child started his tenure with Summertime at age 3 and has excelled over the almost two years since. As a child of the covid times he took some time to get acclimated to not being at home, but the team at Summertime were always very caring and patient with him to ensure his comfort without parents nearby. I feel very lucky to have the Summertime team as part of our "village" to help him grow. From the moment we stepped through the doors we were warmly welcomed by the friendly staff, who displayed a genuine passion for working with children. The dedication and love they have for their job are evident in every interaction, creating a nurturing atmosphere that immediately put my mind at ease. I have witnessed the incredible bond my child has formed with their teachers, and it warms my heart to see the genuine love and support they receive.

The day to day activities are always changing and I really enjoy knowing that each week they focus on a new topic or idea to help expand their understanding of the world around. It's truly impressive to see how the daycare encourages each child's unique talents and interests.

The facilities at Summertime are fantastic, offering a bright and stimulating environment that fosters learning and exploration. The outdoor play area is a favorite of my child, where they get to engage in physical activities and build friendships with their peers. The classrooms are well-equipped with age-appropriate toys, books, and educational resources, providing ample opportunities for learning through play.

I cannot speak highly enough of Summertime Daycare. They have created an environment that feels like a second home for my child, where they are nurtured, inspired, and encouraged to reach their full potential. I am immensely grateful for the love, care, and educational foundation that Summertime has provided to my little one. I wholeheartedly recommend this daycare to any parent looking for a place where their child can thrive, learn, and blossom.

Amazing Daycare. I do have my 2 kids and they have been learning so much!! The stuff are very professionals, organized and so friendly.  Also , so clean, hygiene is so important for us as a parent and this place has a 10 👌

My children started attending Summertime Daycare during the Covid-19 pandemic.  As a parent of an infant and a toddler the staff reassured me that they practice the utmost care and diligence when caring for all the children at Summertime Daycare.

While practicing Public Health Safety guidelines in caring for my children during this pandemic, Summertime Daycare made me fell like my children are in the most capable hands.

The staff are very friendly, caring, professional, and loving.  Everyday at drop off my children are so happy to go see their teachers and friends.  The staff are very responsive in communicating my children's progress, and any recommended changes for their specific needs.

The daycare and I are always on the same page when it comes to my children learning and developmental goals like communication, potty training, and learning.

The curriculum  that the daycare have is very engaging and creates an environment for learning.  My children brings home some of the things they've worked on and I feel very confident that my children are learning as well as having fun at Summertime Daycare.

The variety of nutritious meals that my children are exposed to is great.  My children love trying new foods.

If you are a parent looking for a daycare where you will have a piece of mind knowing your children will be happy and safe, this is the perfect place.

I highly recommend Summertime Daycare for all your child care needs
Summertime daycare is a beautiful establishment that is kept very clean.  There are lots of toys and games for children of all ages to enjoy along with an outdoor space!

We have been attending this daycare  for the second year already.  The kids can't wait until the weekend is over to go to the daycare  as soon as possible. I have one child with special needs and he feels absolutely comfortable in a child's environment.  I am grateful to the owner and the staff for my children and I can work while my children are under reliable supervision and care!

We have been at the facility for five months and our little one had some trouble adapting.  The staff was incredibly kind, patient and supportive as our little one transitioned in to their care. The staff are exceptional, the communication is good and everyone seems to sincerely enjoy being at the centre both students and staff.

We had our 2 children enrolled with sunnview for about a year.

The morning staff were excellent, kind and very understanding. The afternoon staff were less helpful. The owner had to ask them to assist me to ready my kids to take them home. There were good days and bad days. Unfortunately alot of the time my kids got sick.

Sunnyview was accommodating with catching up with paying if I fell behind. But in a year I had 1 incident i was going to be late by 10 minutes, owner insisted I needed to pay extra, and even called my wife who doesn't drive to pickup the kids.

Sunnview will not accept us back due to they cannot handle my children. Guess the owner has a change of heart.

Lastly I never seen pictures of my kids in any of there instagram photos. My kids will have great memories. It's to bad they wouldn't help us preserve them :(
Great school! Great staff! Teachers are all so very lovely and caring.

Great school with even better teachers and staff. My child joined shortly after grade 6 year started. She learned more from attending Ormsby in less than a year then she did in the 5 years at her previous school. The schools secretary is always friendly and helpful.

We as parents of a 10 yrs old special need boy are very satisfied with our first year at Ormsby School. His teacher Ms.Eaton is always helpful, caring and supportive with him. The reason I gave 5stars to this school is that they always included our boy at the their special occasions like playing theater, playing recorder for the Xmas concert , even been for once the star of month, things that our son never experienced at his previous school for 3 yrs.
Thank you to principal Ms.Lesko and all the staff there for giving such a big back up support and understanding us on our first years in Canada!

I as a fellow student at Ormsby I would like to say that  this school is absolutely  amazing and full of so many  good suprises and the teachers are absolutely  nice and amazing well to me Daniel Kellany and my Sister Esther.

They absolutely will not email you back. No communication whatsoever. Your kid will constantly be sick. Subpar supervision. We were suppose to be given a credit for overpayment but that never happened despite email confirmation they would.  We were really disappointed with our experience. Theres better daycares.

We have had our daughter here since she was a year old.  The programs and staff are amazing.  They do so many things in a day that my daughter most days is sad to leave her friends and talks about her teachers all night. I felt safe leaving my daughter here from day one and have no concerns over her safety.  This year being three she was able to attend field trips and LOVED them. I went on one and commend the teachers for all they do corralling all of the little kids, it is quite an art form to see.

I am sad that we are moving and unable to keep her here, all I can hope is that we find somewhere just as amazing.

I put my son in sunshine when he was just under a year old. The teachers are amazing. They greet my son with open arms and hugs every morning. They read, sing and play! Sunshie Child care is one of the best daycare my two children loved to stay there and everyday. My 3 years old loves to stay at Sunshie than being at home because of having fun there playing with peers. The staff and Directors are easy to approach. Keep up the good work 👏 🙌 👍. Thanks you so much.

My grand daughter went here for a short time. I found the owner to be very caring and the staff to be friendly and helpful to the kids. Being a development worker in the field it's nice to see such a caring involved owner.

Came in to this daycare in January 2019 for a tour. On this tour I was told I could leave a $50 holding fee to guarantee his spot for July and it was refundable. I'm now moving to the other side of the city so my son will not be able to go here. I called April 1st and explained to the manager and asked for my deposit back, she said sure and that she would have the owner contact me to set it up. A week and a half goes by, no call. So I contact the daycare again, and she then tells me it is actually non refundable and the money I gave was to register my son... what?? I asked multiple times for the owner to call me, the manager kept talking over me so I finally hung up. NO CALL from the owner. THEN, I wrote a review on facebook, which the owner replies that they need my number, they have it, or to call the daycare ( I have twice). She finally calls me the next day and practically calls me a liar, that there's no way her staff would misinform someone, even on an accident. If you cant see mistakes can be made on your end, I would hate to have my child in this daycare when something goes wrong. I'm so glad I found a wonderful daycare elsewhere. If you're stuck in the area, check out Skyview Daycare! They're not much further than this one, if I move back to the area I'll definitely put my son in there!
New owners took over this place, gave me two weeks to find a new daycare as they had no way to transport my child to and from school. Bullying is also a large issue in this daycare.

Tawa Montessori Day Care is an absolute gem! From the moment I stepped in, I knew I had found the perfect place for my child. The staff here is exceptional, providing a warm and loving atmosphere that makes you feel like family. The Montessori approach to learning has had a profound impact on my child's development - they've become more independent, curious, and confident.

The facility itself is immaculate, and safety is clearly a top priority. The diverse range of educational activities keeps the children engaged and excited about learning. Plus, the regular updates and communication with parents are greatly appreciated.

I cannot express enough how thankful I am to have found Tawa Montessori Day Care. It's a place where my child did not only receive excellent care but also thrived academically and socially. I wholeheartedly recommend this daycare to any parent looking for the best possible start for their child.

My daughters attended Tawa Montessori for 3 years. They absolutely enjoyed being there and loved all their teachers (I believe this is because the teachers loved them too and showed them genuine care and concern). The teachers were very patient with them, and took such great care of them. They were very accommodating of our needs, and changes when necessary. They provide a safe space for play and for learning, and encourage the children to study, to be respectful of one another and to be helpful. The girls already miss being there and we do hope to reconnect sometime. Our experience with Tawa Montessori has been nothing but an absolute pleasure.

My kids have been going to Tawa Montessori for many years now. I have nothing but great things to say about this day care and OSC facility. The staff is absolutely amazing and they take such good care of the kids. The care that is provided to the kids is second to none! My kids love being part of this centre and even during the summer break they remember all the teachers daily. I cannot recommend this daycare enough - anyone who is able to get a spot here is extremely lucky. The kids are in very good hands here!

This is a very special daycare. We’ve been with this daycare for over 13 years, with 3 kids that have gone through. The main thing I looked for from the beginning was cleanliness, following public health protocols, and of coarse a good fit for the kids. They have been very consistent over the years, it started out with a husband and wife that ran the daycare for over 20 years, then transitioned to the current owner Raman who has brought the daycare to a new level.

They take the time to help each child individually develop their skills and provide opportunities for concerts to see your kids shine, they also go into the community to perform for seniors at the nearby hospital and group homes.

They take the time to understand your family situations/needs and try their best to help out in the way they can. For example one of my kids would not sleep at home but would nap long at daycare, you ask them to shorten the nap and things fall into place at home…it’s appreciated. In many scenarios they have gone over and beyond to accommodate, with things that you would only expect a family member to do for you, not a business.

If you do have concerns, when you bring it to their attention they don’t delay in addressing it to completion.

It is a Montessori daycare and they use positive discipline for the kids. One of my kids after awhile it didn’t end up being a good fit because he was quite rambunctious and didn’t have the focus/interest in the Montessori pieces. Although, the staff went over and beyond to accommodate and tailor to his needs which was very touching. We ended up placing him in a more learning through play daycare that made a better fit. But my other 2 strived in this daycare as it fit their personalities and temperament much better.

All the staff are very friendly with big hearts for the kids. I like that the owner continues to support their professional development. At times you’ll see them having staff nights after hours.

Overall this daycare is extraordinary! Thank you Tawa Montessori!

Tawa Montessori is the safest place I can think of. I trust them with my child. The teachers and staff are on their toes all the time and work towards the betterment of the little ones. Thank you Tawa Montessori!!

My son really loves going to the day care each time. Staff always find solutions with your concerns. It is easy to communicate with them when you request for something and full of considerations. Thank you for making my son feels at home when he’s check-in to Kidco.

Best daycare ever. The employees are very friendly and the director is very helpful. The daycare always is clean and smells clean walking inside.  Would like to add that this daycare never had any covid 19 cases. Bring your children here its worth it

It looks nice it looks like they know what they're doing looks like they care about the kids I don't have kids I go there but I think it's a good looking daycare they put creative minds all over the walls You Don't See Much daycares doing that

This daycare has provided childcare above and beyond my expectations. The staff are so caring and attentive with the children and my child's always looks forward to going there. I am incredibly happy with the daycare services provided by Tender Touch. The staff is friendly and attentive, creating a safe and nurturing environment for my children. If you are reading this review you are at one of the best daycares in Edmonton. Shalini the owner and her staff are in my opinion AMAZING! I went to this school almost 20 years ago 😬 I graduated here with my son attending my graduation. He recently graduated also. This school gave me the supportive community I really needed when I entered the world of motherhood. There was so many supportive teachers and staff who helped me throughout my time there. A few times After late nights with the baby, I fell asleep on the library couch and I felt safe enough to do that there. There was a daycare on site where my son went, which made drop offs and pick ups less stressful. I made friends here and we would have sleep overs with our kids, go out to lunch with them and travel the mall together. It made being a teen mom more enjoyable and because my friends were in the same stage of life I rarely felt left out. It made a major impact in my life as a young mom, one I won’t ever forget. My friends and I graduated and went on to college with more skills than we would have trying to maintain our lives at a normal highschool.

Braemar School is still around over 20 years later as a place of education for pregnant and parenting teens 13-20 yrs old. Run by Terra Association, without a safe, caring environment, I would not have finished my academic upgrading and went onto  university to complete a bachelor degree. Studying at my own pace, with competent teachers to help guide me were essential to my success. I saw too many young women drop out early. Don't be that girl, persevere!!

If students have been in the hospital or better take care of their sick children and adults we get to take the time off  work and do so without taking her children to the doctors or anything like that but now when they’re in the school the teaching them that you need to run to the doctors for every little thing that is wrong with your child from a mother of five that’s not the case I do not run to the doctors every time my child is sick but I do keep them away from other kids so they cannot get it was well as well as if you have a child was struggling with a learning disability and they need that one on one time in the computer room or whatever the case may be with a talking to counselors there they’re always marked absent which goes against the funding so then they get kicked off so once again leaving stress on a young mom for dangerous things to happen luckily my daughter has a great support team but some teen moms aren’t that lucky . I have had THE BEST experience here! Manju is such a caring, kind director who truly works with parents and puts her students first! Not to mention EMERGENCY CHILDCARE?! The Champions Academy Daycare in Edmonton has a very dedicated and flexible staff! The daycare is very professionally managed and all the kids I saw were really happy! I have two toddlers and work full time as a single mom. I highly recommend, it is a place where my children are at at ease and comfortable when I leave them for the long hours during the day. I feel comfortable and it is my children’s home away from home. ❤️

At first, I was skeptic about this daycare even though they have reported the daily activities of my daughters with photos or video clips through their app. After going to one of the best and priciest learning academic daycares in Windermere as the best daycare for my daughters,  I found that the only difference between that center and the Mastermind was the food and cleaning of a brand new place and not the staff or their learning activity. The Mastermind experience will certainly keep me coming back. The only issue I had with them was that they kept asking me to show them the payment receipt over and over again when they hadn't saved it, which was annoying.  All daycare staff are very friendly and accommodating.  When my kids were leaving, one of my daughters' staff members had tears in her eyes because she missed my little girl. My older daughter was very shy at first, but they were able to bring her out of her shell and get her comfortable talking with other children. This is a place I recommend to my friends and others.

We had extremely negative experiences at this daycare and I felt the need to let others know that I would not recommend this center. Apart from the more upsetting events, we experienced trouble with: their keeping of financial records and providing us receipts; No daily lesson planning; Staff not knowing what to do with my son during nap time (they asked me to put him to bed at 10 so he would take a 2 hour nap in the day…) ; staff not communicating with one another so I was asked the same questions over and over again…and more. The owners never reached out to me regarding questions I had about my sons care, I’ve waited 5 months for a response. Unfortunately I feel the staff are not supported to make positive changes.

GREAT daycare, loving caring staff, professional management, amazing activities.
Also there is a daily report to keep parents updated and my daughter is always happy to be there.
the most important thing to me is that the daycare is ALWAYS CLEAN which provides my kid healthy environment to grow up in.
I highly recommend it

My 15 month old daughter started here in December after they recently opened up. We have had nothing but good things to say about this place since! They’ve been very accommodating to our daughters needs and if we’ve had any special requests (photo updates, etc) they’ve always tried their best to accommodate those as well! The manager Cheyanne is amazing at what she does and great at keeping us up to date on our daughter and new things going on at the daycare. The staff are all very friendly and amazing with the children. My daughter is always ecstatic to get dropped off there because she has such an amazing time! This is our first child and we were skeptical about daycares at first but this one has really eased our minds. We 10/10 would recommend to anyone thinking about this daycare for your child!

My son is going to this daycare from day one and absolutely love it. All the teachers are so friendly and thoughtful. They are our family now. Prices are super low. Cheyanne is great. She became my sons best friend. This is the way should be. Thank you for that!

I have been working at "The Meadows" for more than 20 months, and my daughter has also been attending this daycare since I started working there. I have had an amazing experience there. Tanaya and Karen are very easy to talk to. The place is very clean and well organized. The app ClassDojo is used so parents can see what their kids are doing every day, including how they eat and sleep. The teachers and management go above and beyond to ensure that parents are well informed, promptly addressing any concerns and messages. My coworkers are all amazing, and they put their 100% effort into taking good care of these children and helping them be their best selves. They also provide amazing, creative, and fun programs every single day. I highly recommend this place to both staff and parents.

I can’t recommend meadows early learning enough. They have been amazing from the first time we toured the facility to each day we pick up our kiddo. They are attentive, caring and the centre is super clean.
The outdoor space is perfect for the littles and the staff is outstanding.

We can’t thank them enough for caring for our kiddo as if they were their own.

Thank you Meadows early learning for everything!

I would highly recommend this daycare to any one looking for a positive, loving and educationally nurturing environment. We are  very happy with the care, The teachers truly cared  and management addressed our raised concerns quickly and appropriately.

The activities they do with the children are so intentional and well planned, the staff seems supportive and kind and the director has been very receptive with regards to any questions we have had. Communication is prompt, professional and positive in nature. We also love all of the updates throughout the day! It's so nice to see my lil one so engaged!

My daughter Raiba (2 n half years old) is so happy there. She comes every day and it’s like she had learned something new and cute. She really likes her teachers. And i am very much happy to see her happy smiley face to go in school.

I started at Meadows in November 2021 and it has definitely been an amazing experience! This centre is a wonderful place to work at! The employees are amazing and hardworking, the management is awesome and supportive, and of course the children make it magical!! definitely the best childcare center to work at or send your child(ren) to 😊

Highly recommend this daycare to anyone! My daughter has been attending here for over 2 years and we will be having our son attend next year! They have the best staff and they also have the best on site chef, so I know my daughter is getting the best care!
Amazing daycare and staff. Great learning opportunities for the kids in the Montessori program. Well organized and clean. Management is amazing!

I feel like our family hit the jackpot in finding this absolute gem of a Montessori Daycare. Our three year old son settled in immediately, and is always so eager and excited to attend each day (he even wants to go at weekends!) We are constantly so impressed and pleased by the huge range of activities that the children do each day, and they have an amazing array of toys to play with, alongside truly excellent Montessori toys and learning materials. The staff are incredible, and so warm and loving towards all the children. Our son is learning to write numbers and letters, and we are so pleased with his progress. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this excellent daycare to anyone.

On a great day, I met a good day care with so professional  and nice staff members,
The day care is so awesome regarding the activities carried on there and is  very good because in 1 month my son was able to write and read through sounds  at the age of 4 ! and that’s all because of Montessori techniques. A very well managed and organized centre 👏🏻

I feel so blessed that I found this daycare .it's the best Montessori daycare with lots of activities I see a very positive change in my child's behavior and he is understanding the basic concepts . He wants to come to daycare on weekends too😁. Highly recommended,!!
This daycare has helped my children with the structure and the staff is very friendly and helpful it is also not as pricey as other Montessori daycares I have looked at 😀

I'm a kid who lives in the neighborhood near to this daycare and went to it as a kid, I just gotta say, every time I go on a walk and see it, I smile, everyone there was the best and was very helpful, this is overall just an amazing daycare!

Amyee, her staff and her facility are beyond wonderful.

I have a difficult little boy at times who gets overwhelmed easily, has adhd & odd and i have never for a second had a doubt or issue with Amyee and her team. I work very close by and will often pop in to see how my son is doing and im always impressed by the activities being done in the OSC. They take the time to plan fun & educational activities for the kids while in and out of school. My son loves his time at this daycare and is always excited to be here.

I've had daycares previous to this who would call me to pick my son up almost every day because of his difficulties. At sunshine factory I have never had this problem. I was also provided tips and support for dealing with my son at home, ive noticed a HUGE difference in my sons temperament since starting here almost 2 years ago.

I do and will continue to recommend this daycare at every opportunity.

My child loves to go to daycare everyday. He is always ecstatic to see his friends and the staff. The director is so kind and makes sure that everything runs smoothly, and addresses any concerns promptly. The staff are professional and well trained, i have such peace of mind at work knowing my child is safe and in a loving and fun environment. Thank you sunshine staff!

Amyee and her staff are amazing. My children are in the middle of a tough situation and Amyee has not only taken care of them but of the parents as well.
Totally goes above and beyond while staying neutral and amazing.
Highly recommend.

If there was a negative 5 stars I could click on I would! So my child got terminated from this daycare because they cannot handle him, a 3 1/2 year old little boy. It was suggested I get him assessed, I took him to his Doctor. A letter was written to the daycare that he was a normal little boy who did not need assessment. That was not acceptable at this daycare, I am being accused of not putting any effort into this assessment, that apparently  the manager of this daycare, (who by the way knows better than my sons pediatrician) that is not even necessary.  For the past few months this is all I heard about, assessment assessment! Try this on for size Amy, hire more incompetent workers that call me out of school because my son is having a bad day!  Who does that? What this daycare needs is structure and a lot  more experience interacting with children. I was told the staff being hired at this daycare all had teaching credentials, I am pretty sure if you were to ask any one of them to provide such paperwork, you would get the run around or absolutely nothing. The one and only daycare worker at this establishment that sees children for what they are (just children growing up) is Catherine. My son has been bitten on several occasions, he has been scratched on the face, punched in the face but not once did I hear about any of those incidents. They have a book full of incidents about my child (again being a 3 1/2 year old little boy) causing problems and hurting other kids. He was in this daycare for most of his life, spending 9 hours a day with the staff and picked up a few habits that he  should have been given a time out for, oh yeah right, Sunshine Factory has no disciplinary actions for bad behavior...NONE! So now that my child has learned some bad habits at daycare hes no longer welcome at this very daycare.

This daycare had an outing booked for the entire daycare.  They did not cancel and did not show up, leaving the venue with lost revenue and no way to receive recompensation.  Very disorganized and disrespectful.

This daycare is like family, I have had my 3 kids at this daycare for over 4 years now and i have never had any problems, the owners are very helpful,understanding and kind people, if your looking for a daycare with a family setting this is a daycare for you. This daycare will take good care of your lovely child.

As a parent at a school they service, I’m quite disappointed how they represent themselves out in public. Almost everyday I see this van dropping children off way before the school supervisory comes out (leaving the children unattended) and then the van speeds off (driving way over the speed limit in a school zone).
My grand kids go there very good daycare ,highly recommended, provide  diverse and inclusive environment. Staff is amazing ,bilingual, flexible and know the community needs.
Very good daycare, amazing staff very friendly, I had my kids there for a long time no complains at all I recommend to everyone.

Quality childcare, professional, clean, and welcoming environment.

Lena, the owner, goes out of her way to make every child feel comfortable. She has attention to detail, emotional awareness, growth mindset, hugs, patience, and care.

The other teachers and staff are welcoming too, especially Mary. Fairly low staff turnover, professional, and approachable if there’s any issues. A nutritious lunch and snacks are provided, which is helpful for busy parents.

Our oldest daughter was there for three and a half years before graduating and our youngest daughter started there four months ago.

We had a very thoughtful graduation celebration with cap and gown, presentation of the kids over the years, which went over and beyond our expectations.

Worth contacting Lena for a tour!

Both my children go to this daycare, my daughter loves pre school, she’s always excited to show me what she’s learned when she comes home.  My son is just as happy in the baby room. The love and attention all of these women give to your children is remarkable!  Great clean space, amazing food options to feed a variety of dietary concerns. I couldn’t ever imagine my kids being anywhere else.

We love this daycare! My son is excited to go every morning. He learns so much, he talks about painting, and circle time. The staff are all really friendly and the space is clean and tidy which was important to me when I previewed daycares.

Update: We now have two children at Tiny Hoppers and have been with the facility for over 2.5 years. We are still incredibly happy that our children attend Tiny Hoppers. Our daughters transition has been a bit harder then our son, but the staff are so nurturing and kind that I know she is in good hands!

My 12month old daughter has been going since September, I was so anxious at first because she was only cared for by family (not very many times), myself and my husband. I was so nervous about her sleep because at home she was always nursed to sleep and rocked. I made the care providers aware of this when she first started and asked how they could/would support her during sleep, and they reassured me that they would start off by holding her and slowly transition to her sleeping on the cot like the other babies (she now sleeps on the cot like the others, and naps much better at home as well). They also do so many cute, fun, and learning activities, I can't believe how much my daughter has learnt since starting in September. The ladies who work at the centre are all so friendly, we are always greeted at the door with a smile. My daughter is so excited to go and see her friends and teachers. I cannot say enough good things about this place! Highly recommend!! Thank you Tiny Hoppers for taking such great care of our daughter!

We recently enrolled our one-year-old daughter at Tiny Hoppers in downtown Edmonton and could not be any happier! As first-time parents, we were both somewhat anxious about leaving our child somewhere new, but the daycare laid all of that anxiety to ease as soon as we walked in the door.

The daycare itself is a clean, fun, and cheerful facility that is filled with experienced, friendly, and truly caring staff. The daycare has nice sized groups based on age which is perfect for keeping the kids engaged with others developing just like them. For us parents, the daycare is very conveniently located to our downtown workplace for easy drop off and pickup.

Most importantly, our daughter absolutely loves it here. There are rotating supervised crafts and activities for all the kids every day, both indoor and outdoor when the weather is nice, which has our daughter constantly smiling. Not only are the activities great but the activities promote key learning skills and are great for learning to be around and play with other kids, too.

We think Tiny Hoppers has been amazing and definitely recommend to any parent looking for a quality center for their kiddo or kiddos!

I have nothing but wonderful things to say about Tiny Hoppers! Both of my children have attended the center and enjoy every minute of it.
