The snack and lunch menu are constantly changing to provide the children with a plethora of different tastes from various cultures. The daily schedule involves: singing, dancing, art & crafts, activities to improve cognitive, fine motor, gross motor and self-help skills, and of course, outdoor time on the roof top patio. The staff are always accommodating and friendly. The center has a calming atmosphere that is clean, welcoming and organized. A report is issued daily along with pictures to inform parents of how your child's day went. Knowing that your child will be well taken care of and loved when you're not around is a huge relief! Thank-you Tiny Hoppers staff for all that you do!

Our two kids LOVE attending Tiny Hopper's Gateway. The rooms are bright and clean, with lots of educational activities both inside the classroom and outside in their big outdoor play space. The AM/PM snacks PLUS lunch are healthy and well-balanced. I also really appreciate that there are pictures shared throughout the day and we receive a daily report-out of everything they did. The staff and educators are great, and they always bring a positive energy in providing a fun, safe (and clean) environment for our kids.
Great day care. All the staff write excellent daily reports. Lots of outdoor time. Everyday there are pictures showing the children's activities. Management is on top of all potential issues
Wow! what an inviting, quality, educational childcare center.  Beautiful, fun, learning environment filled with quality toys, activities and caring, qualified staff.   Highly recommend.
Great place to work. Understanding management and great staff.

I've been working here for over two years now, so obviously I'm biased, but I do want to share my experience as an educator here. The director team is very supportive of staff members, and easily approachable. They're very accommodating, supporting their staff when we want to further our education as they recognize and emphasize the value of our own learning. There is a welcoming and caring environment between educators; the people you work with make a huge difference especially with this field!
Thank you team for your support and care!!

My daughter has been attending Tiny Hoppers Summerside for the past 3 years and she absolutely loves it there. The staff are amazing and truly care for the kids, and they are loved in return. I like the effort and thought they put into the meals and that they provide all that we need. They respond to any questions or concerns we may have with compassion and care and always help put us at ease.

We are so happy that our kiddo is at Tiny Hoppers. Great location and facilities (clean, laid out well, welcoming), and amazing staff that actually care about your kid – even when they are in a new room/age group. They have a great curriculum based program that empowers the kids to learn, weather pending), they do both a nature walk and outdoor/backyard play everyday, and have a vast and varied healthy menu for the kids that changes every month. They also are great at communicating changes, and are open and honest with parents.

I can't say enough good things about this daycare.

We have had both our children in daycare at Tiny Hoppers moving from the baby room, toddler room and preschool room. All the staff and educators have been fantastic and we trust them to take excellent care of our children. We have been very happy with the snacks and lunches - they are healthy and get rave reviews from the kids. I love to hear about the activities the kids get up to in the day and I’m happy they get lots of outdoor time. I feel as though the staff really care about the children. I highly recommend Tiny Hoppers to anyone looking for a great daycare for their children.

Tiny Hoppers Summerside is an amazing place. Its truly a home away from home for my children. The educators really make an effort to engage the kids and help them develop in a very individualized way They put their heart into everything. The management is really committed to provide safe, fun and loving environment. The facility is well thought of, rooms are  separate to keep the ages apart .Menu is incredible with lots of variety with special treats for holidays. Snacks are always healthy. My children are always excited to go to Tiny Hoppers.

The best Day care as far as I have seen. Highly recommended for all the children’s who wish to learn and explore. Staffs are friendly and dedicated to the core. We are happy and satisfied from Tiny Tots Daycare.

A great and safe place for children..my son is truly happy and loves going to this day care..he always say they have access to all art supplies and other learning materials..their classrooms are so open and welcoming to the children.  Field trips, animal presentation day, constant library visits, open ended activities, grand christmas/Halloween celebrations are only few of many many activities they do.  My overall experience as a parent with this day care is a big thumbs up. I am so grateful to all my son's teachers Miss. Sandy, Miss. Fay, Miss. Saranya, Miss. Nithya and Mister. Pugal for helping my son and for all what you have done.  Thank you ❤❤
Great daycare! My son loves to go! The staff are friendly and caring.

Absolutely great daycare!! The owners, and staff go above and beyond for the children and parents that attend this facility. I am so glad that I've decided to have my both daughter's at Tiny tots Daycare and OSC. They loves all their teachers and never wants to leave! My little one is learning so much, and I love all the updates we get! It's very reassuring that we have a safe, happy and loving daycare to send our daughter's! Thanks everyone for all the hard work! I could see the extra effort they put to be safe and keep the kids safe during this pandemic. I appreciate their hard work, and dedication. I highly recommend Tiny Tots Daycare

My daughter has been attending tiny tots for almost a year now and loves going everyday. Staff are always welcoming and informative. I trust them with my baby whole heartedly. I’m very lucky to have these amazing educators look after my daughter. Won’t be switching daycares any time soon.

It is amazing. Very hygienic, clean and well maintained. Classrooms are well lit with natural light. All the caretakers are friendly, energetic and know their job well. They take good care of kids, never seen children with runny nose, unattended. The owner-Mrs Waseema is very humble, polite and always carries a smile.

Our daughter has been attending Tiny Town for 1.5 years and she absolutely loves it! The staff are incredibly nurturing, kind, and we have piece of mind knowing our daughter is in such good care. The facility is kept clean, communication with the Director, Waseema, and her team is great, and our daughter experiences a wide variety of activities, learning and fun every day.  Having her here has no doubt contributed to her continued growth and development. Thank you Tiny Town staff for all you do:)

Our daughter has been going to Tiny Town Daycare for almost three years and she absolutely loves it. We have nothing but good things to say about them; their staff are professional, caring, and genuinely love the kids. The facility is clean, bright, and spacious & the owner has always been responsive and dedicated to ensuring the kids are well taken care of & safe. I always recommend them for anyone looking for childcare.

As a first time parent, sending my son to Tiny Town has given me great peace of mind. The facility is in a brand new building, has large windows and is very clean. The teachers are so friendly, gentle and caring. I feel extremely at ease leaving my son there as I know he is safe and very well taken care of. I have nothing but positive things to say about this daycare. I would highly recommend them to family and friends!

Three and a half years ago I chose this daycare for my daughter because it was very clean and bright with huge windows and lots of natural light. We have stayed there now with a second child attending because the teachers are so lovely and look after my children like they were their own. Both of my children have learned so much from the programming and they bring home crafts almost every day. Highly recommend.

Words can’t describe how amazing this daycare is .My siblings absolutely love going here every morning they're always excited to start their day. The staff is incredibly nice and friendly.also The environment is just soo clean and safe
I highly recommend Tipaskan daycare if you’re  looking for a daycare where your kids will be well taken care of and also genuinely enjoy their time This is the perfect place!
Thanks to the entire staff for their support 🩷

Thank you so much for getting back to me quickly about this review! It's really great to see that you're responsive, especially since I noticed that you haven't replied to other negative reviews. I was hoping that you would extend an invitation to those individuals to come and discuss their concerns with your team.

I really appreciate that you didn't take offense to my honest assessment of your daycare. It's clear to me that there are some serious issues with how it's being run. It's not surprising that you haven't responded to other people's negative experiences either.

During the short time I worked for you, I got to know all of the employees, but I won't mention their names because I'm concerned that they could be mistreated or threatened due to the poor management. It's my hope that you'll address these issues of unprofessionalism and the inadequate scheduling, as nobody wants a 90-minute break during an 8-hour shift.

Thank you again, and I hope you'll take these suggestions into consideration.

You just get this good and positive energy as soon as you walk in and to top it off the staff is amazing too!  They take such great care of my 3year old girl. it makes me happy to send her off every morning and know she’ll be taken care of. The teachers really make an effort to engage the kids and develop them in a very individualised way. They share pictures and activities of your kids on regular basis. The management is really committed to providing a safe, fun, and loving environment and we’re very thankful to the whole staff as they are always ready to help in every possible way. Absolutely recommend this amazing place.

I love Tipaskan Educational Day care, the staff are amazing. They treat the kids like their own. My two children love it there so much. They are caring, loving and have patience dealing with the kids. Good Job to you all and God bless you. 👏

This Tipaskan daycare amazing place! Very clean with great staff and very welcoming. My daughters have been going there  for almost 2 weeks  and I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. Please keep on the great job that you ladies do. Such a great daycare  with wonderful teachers. Definitely made the right choice by choosing this place!

My son has been attending Tot's World Out of School Care for about 4 years.  I have found the staff to be caring and supportive for both myself and my son when he was going through a rough time. They provide a variety of activities for the kiddos inside and when its nice, more often than not they have taken the kiddos to the school park across the street.

I have never had any concerns about cleanliness, staffing ratios, or my sons health and safety while there. I would recommend Tot's World Out of School Care.

My experience with TOTs World daycare and out of school care has been a great experience for my Son and myself.
The owner Neelam is a very professional and caring person. My Son has attended Tots world from Kindegarten to gade 5. I Highly recommend this daycare/out of school care.
Lyle.

My children have been attending this daycare since 2013. I don't understand the negative reviews. I have literally stepped (before covid) inboth sides of daycare and out of school care. There is nothing dirty. I have actually seen the staff makes sure the kids are safe and clean, they vacuum every day, wipe down tables, door handles etc are wiped down. Bathrooms are tidy as well. As far as the play area in the back they have a bunch of toys in great condition. All 4 of my children have special needs. The director and staff make sure my kids follow the the rules which I appreciate. They don't make exceptions nor single out 1 child for another. As for the staff she has the proper staff to kid ratio as far as I know. And when I have had to talked to the director or staff about a problem they are always willing to work on it with me to fix it.

I could go on and on about how much this daycare means to my family.

I did work there for a short period of time. The staff is great but there's not enough of them. If someone needs to use the bathroom, the children are left alone. The whole place is falling apart. I had to bring a garbage in the baby room because the dirty diapers were left in an open bin.

If I spoke about my experience as a parent there, not a staff, the owner would say private details about my children to other parents. She does not pay for the first weeks you work there as she requires free work in order to hire.
Be careful if you have a subsidy. The owner will still collect your full portion even if the government boosts it.

Poor owner and poor establishment.

I have brought two of my kids here now since 2008. I have been able to build a good relationship with the director. They have been able to help my kids with the structure they need and with the redirection  they sometimes need. My kids value thier time there and look forward to attending. The daycare has been very flexible with some of the things I have needed. They have been good enough for me to return with my second child now that my other is grown. Very down to earth staff.
We had an awesome experience in 2022. The team is cheerful and ever supportive. It's home for the kids, offers a clean environment, and has lots of fun activities.

They are a warm felt daycare facility. My son and I recently relocated to Edmonton and I was nervous how my son would adapt with so many sudden life changes at once.He has taken so well to all the staff members. I Must say the owner is consistent with the level of professionalism by all her staff across the board. I highly recommend this facility to all future  or current daycare users.

Tree of colours is absolutely amazing! My son has been with them for over 2 years and he loves getting there in the morning and gives everyone a hug before he leaves. They have incredible crafts and learning materials, my son is constantly singing new songs he learns.  All of the staff are amazing with the children, you can tell they truly love what they do. I highly recommend them and am so thankful I found them!

Both children love going there. Have made great friendships with the other kids while also being in a more structured environment which I believe has really helped them grow and mature. Staff are phenomenal and great to deal with. Definitely a choice I will never regret!
Love this center! It's very warm and inviting. The staff are friendly, trained and are great with the kids. I couldnt imagine going anywhere else.
Treehouse daycare, offers a high quality, supportive and family-centered program for young children in a warm, safe and best environment. Our primary goal is for children to feel safe and secure.

Very rude establishment, normally write positive feedbacks or walk away from negative ones, this one I could not walk away specially if family is involved. Owner is horrible and has no patience with children who are energetic and is not willing to work with or communicate with parents like a normal adult, you don't ask a person "what do you want", hear the complaint out first, before interrupting midway. Learn basic customer service! and how to treat kids, at the end of the day you suppose to be competent since parent leave you with their loved ones.

I don't know how they're still in business. Don't bother sending your kids or recommend this horrible place and don't spend your hard earned money. I bet there are very respectful care facilities in this area.

One of there workers who picks children up after school at the school bus stop yelled at a little boy little boy when he all got off the bus. The child she was picking up said he pulled his back pack.  The next day ( today April 12th) the little boys mom said for her never to address her child in that manner and if there's any issue go to contact the school and have them deal with it appropriately. The lady from the day care started yelling and arguing with the mom and continued to due so even when the bus pulled up and the kids were getting off the bus all hearing this commotion . Extremely inappropriate and unprofessional for someone who works in a day care! Definitely dont recomed. Is that how she acts in front of children at the day care?

Horrible and unprofessional daycare. They let go of my nephew with short notice because the manager said “he is a special need child and we don’t have a place for special need kids” mind you he has speech delay and is only 2.5 years old.

I had my share of dealings with different types of daycares and this one is by far the best. It's run by an amazing and understanding daycare director and her staff are all truly amazing . The best part, is that they use an app called "Hi mama" and I get to see what my little guy is doing through out the day.

Treehouse Montessori is a great place to send your children. Every part of this daycare is filled with love and care.

The teachers welcome the children every morning at the door with a hug. The directors are available all the time to support your family in transitioning well into the centre. The kids are always happy with the activities done inside the day care and all of the activities they can play and do outside on the playground with the massive background field and playground.

You can send your child to any daycare you want - but if you want to invest in your child’s future this is the place. Thank you to all the staff of Treehouse Montessori for your hard work and love for the children.

My son has been in this center since January 2023. We are very happy that we found this center for our 4 year old son. This place is very well organized.  Everything is equipped with quality Montessori materials.  There is also a lot of space inside and outside for walking and playground  space for children of all ages. It can be seen that the owner of this center cares about the education of children and the cleanliness of the center.  Winter and summer always clean and comfortable.  Every day we know what new our son has learned and we have every month education plan. This center is more suitable for a family who wants to see their children in a large team, like a school.  I recommend this center as a big family of which your family will become a part.

My daughter (5 years) has been attending to the Montessori since March 2022 and she enjoys it a lot. She has made lost of friends and loves teachers there. Kindergarten teachers are very friendly, welcoming, and open to conversations.

Also, the teachers are so dedicated to taking care of children and always available to get feedback on kids and anything else. We are really happy with the improvements my daughter has been making on math, reading and other skills.

The facility is well maintained and clean. I’ve seen all the classes are well cleaned and sanitized every evening. Parking lots are also cleared and well kept.

Thank you everyone at Treehouse Montessori!!

From the very 1st day our son joined the Treehouse Montessori Child Development Centre we were treated like family.
The staff is very accommodating yet can develop, teach, and reinforce the same values we have at home.
We noticed our son develop many skills over the course of his enrollment. He is now super excited and eager to learn new things and participate in all activities.

The staff, facility is very organized and professional. We feel very safe and reassured that our son is in good hands.

I love this place and so does my child. As a working parent, I deeply appreciate the staff being nice and caring, and the Director is really cares about the children and works with the parents. I’m grateful for their guidance and support. The facility is well thought of, rooms separated to keep the ages apart, but structured so that the teachers are able to help each other out. My son is happy and that makes me a happy parent. Appreciated the innovative leaning ideas and the efforts that the teacher put in for every other child.
Thank you for everything.

My 4 year old has been going to UTLDC since last year when we moved to Edmonton and it has been the best decision! Saba and Harman have been very supportive and accommodating from the first day. Since I was new to Alberta, Harman even guided me through the childcare subsidy process. All the teachers in rooms are so kind and treat children with utmost care. I really like the fact that children are not only playing on their own but the teachers make sure that they’re involved in various gross and fine motor activities throughout the day. They organize activities like yoga, take them out to parks, museums etc. my son has benefited a lot with UTLDC in just 1 year.

My 2 kids has been going to this daycare a year now, such a caring and great team working here they are all so kind, approachable  to kids, prefect management from owner Saba and Harman, my kids love going to this daycare I was the picky mom to chose a daycare  but this is just great place for my boys, you guys are amazing. We feel like a family now.
highly recommended this beautiful daycare.

This daycare lives up to it's name! The tender loving care that my son received while attending this daycare will always be appreciated! My son attended here for over year and started during covid. He was new to the daycare environment and struggled with separation, the staff were very patient, understanding, loving and kind as he transitioned to being at daycare. He learned so much and always had lots of stories to tell me. He participated in so many fun activities and field trips. Every morning and evening we were ALWAYS greeted with smiles from the teachers, it is such a warm and loving atmosphere. The facility is very clean and bright and the food is healthy. All the staff here are beyond amazing and approachable and loving to the children. The ONLY reason my son is no longer attending is because we recently moved to another city. It was heartbreaking for myself and son leaving and the staff were also sad too. We miss them so very much and I would 100% recommend them to anyone. We miss all of you!!

Great daycare, great staff. My child attended out of school for three years and they are amazing and truly care about their children there. Saba ( owner) was very attentive by insuring that the kids were always active and being taken care of very well. It was always easy to communicate with her and the staff. One of the best daycare, totally recommend it for parents who want to place their children in an environment that feels like home. Thank you University Tender Loving and Out of School Care staff for supporting my child though out the years.

This is an awesome daycare! Super close to The UAH, CCI, lots of other health care workplaces, and their hours are mostly pretty good for health care worker shifts as well. They have taken such good care of my son since he started here two years ago. They do lots of outdoor play, and have nutritious home cooked meals every day. My son has clearly learned a lot through his time here. The staff has also been so warm and caring to him. The director has always been super helpful, and put up with me and my first time mom anxieties when my son first started. Things were also always very clean and safe throughout Covid as well. They are great with keeping parents updated about the kids’ days and send pictures through an app which is nice. We are sad to leave and are only doing so because we are moving cities.
Thanks to your teachers, you have a wonderful daycare. Thank you for taking care of our children. Very friendly staff 💐

This daycare is fantastic. I send my child here and it is the best daycare service I have ever used. It is clean and safe with amazing friendly staff. Me and my daughter always feel so welcomed. They have a variety of engaging activities and I have never experienced any trouble with this daycare. I very highly recommend their service.

This daycare is an amazing place! It is very clean, with great staff, and very welcoming. My sister has been going here for 1 months and I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. Please keep up the great job that you ladies do.
Affordable daycare and huge space for kids and teachers are so nice and welcoming
Affordable price and helpful staff

My son has been attending this daycare for almost 3 years now, and I couldn't have picked a better place to put my trust in!
The staff goes above & beyond for the children in their care & I couldn't be more grateful for the bonds we both now have with them. These are relationships that will last a life time!
The love they have shown to my child, will be something I cherish for the rest of my life. They have left a lasting impact in our hearts.
Aside from a select couple family members, they are the only other people I have ever felt comfortable leaving my child with.
It was a big step for me to take, but also one of the best decisions I've ever made.
Not only am I single mom, but I also struggle with my health on a regular basis, and they have always been nothing but supportive, caring & encouraging.
Please remember to give your care provider extra thanks, they have a lot more impact than people would care to admit!

We absolutely love this daycare. My youngest has learned so much since he started and has become so social and outgoing. My oldest loves the atmosphere and amount of things he can do with his friends after school there. The ladies that work there are so awesome and do such an amazing job with the kids and also make everyone who comes through the doors feel right at home.

This is a very nice day care. Staff is very professional and kind. They always have new ideas and themes to engage with kids. And the place itself is very well maintained and safe for children. Highly recommend this day care!!
Very professional service with a smile.Very neat, clean and attractive atmosphere. Awesome people to deal with. I recommend it to all. Staff are well educated and provide tender loving care to kids.

The daycare and staff at the daycare are amazing my son loves being here they play games they have fun they laugh and learn so much all the kids are so well taken care like family and best of all the food is amazing and my son is very picky 💙

My son is currently with this day care. Teacher Surinder is very friendly. It is very nice day care. All teachers are super friendly & nice. My son really loves this place. They really took good care of my son. They always update parents with child’s progress. Would definitely recommend this day care.

Thanks,

Pooja & Abhi
All staff are very family friendly, calm and treat my kids like their own. I love the place. Director Surinder is an amazing soul ❤️

We love Waverley Day Care and so do our kids who have been going there over the last three years.The staff is caring and flexible, the facility is clean and is located in a school so the children can play in the gym or in the outdoor facilities.

oh i just loved going to this daycare, the staff were great super friendly, i really believe many people should know more about this school, had alot of great memories here, when i went to this day care i was 4 to 7, so its been a while but i still loved going!

The staff and director here are absolutely amazing. First time mom here and they have been so patient during the transition period, welcoming and accommodating. My child is so happy to attend here and that makes returning to work an easier process. By far the best daycare I've toured and so grateful to have obtained a place for my little one.

As a father of 3 children that go to this Daycare, I highly recommend.

The safety of this Daycare gives me peace.

There is a FOB key to get in and out of the daycare for parents and teacher access only.

The rooms are tucked in down the hallway, which makes you pass the Teacher’s main office before walking into the class rooms.

The teachers are very very good. The interactions with the teachers are personalized to understand my children’s needs, in terms of emotional, safety, and educational needs.

I highly recommend those teachers
( Analiza, Rain, Simran, Ena, Joiz, Teacher T)

Teacher Kelly has been wonderful, and been very supportive and communicative.

The activities that have been happening are also outstanding. Children go on walks often, play outside, have magicians, foam parties, a mini zoo, and many more to name.

My son started here 4 months ago and loves it. He is so excited to go in the morning and will sometimes wait for the teachers to walk them to the room. He eats really well and enjoys the rotating menu and snacks. The staff have all been great and keep him active with activities (like painting and sensory bins) throughout the day and greet him every morning. Also we love the mini trips to the soccer field nearby so our boy can run in the open spaces safely. Highly recommended.

My toddler has been going to this daycare for a year now and we are very happy with the care they provide. His motor and language skills have developed so much and he seems to be very happy to go there every morning. They have always been very reasonable with whatever issues that came up and the staff are very kind and treat the children very well. We are happy to have our son attend this daycare.

We love this daycare. Our daughter started here in February and it has been great. The facility is fairly new so it is well maintained and very clean. The staff are all very friendly and happy and they treat the kids with care and affection, and they have a lot of fun with them. Sometimes our daughter does not want to come home because she's having too good of a time! It's also great that she wants to hug all of the staff before we leave - that tells you something.

I love this place and so does my child.  I deeply appreciate the staff being nice and caring, and Florence (the director)really cares about the children and works with the parents. The teachers are really awesome. Rahma and Gemma especially make my baby feel at home and she absolutely adores them, and all the teachers have time to smile and talk to the kids. The facility is well thought of, rooms separated to keep the ages apart, but structured so that the teachers are able to help each other out. My baby is happy and that makes me a happy parent. They also have amazing activities all year round! If you're looking for a home away from home for your baby, please look no further 😊

The best place
feels like home at wee world . My kids been there since my oldest was 3 years old and he is 9 now.All staff are professional plus the awesome owner Florence who is truly and honestly there for families and children.
The best place where I feel that my children are safe and appropriately cared for ❤️
My daughter has been going here since she was 11 months old and we love everyone there!
Great place for my daughter

I can’t say enough great things about West End Montissuri. The director and staff are AMAZING. My daughter has been going for just under a year and she loves it - she has come so far with her learning and skills because of Monica and her program. The environment is well organized, clean, and extremely well planned out with continuous rotating new learning content. We also receive multiple updates every week on how our daughter is doing and what she is learning. My daughter looks forward to going and has said many times that she “loves her teachers”.

So grateful for Miss Monica and the staff at The West End Montessori School! They are all so wonderful and so attentive with the kids. They create such an amazing environment for the kids to learn and to have fun together. My daughter enjoys going to school everyday. I would highly recommend this school to anyone!

We have had our son in West End Montessori for the past 2 years. We are truly impressed by the care and dedication of Monica and all of the teachers at WEM. They really work to adapt to each individual child. Our son loves his school and teachers and has grown so much with their help. We really appreciate how he has developed both socially and in his independence and highly recommend the school.

My daughter started when she was 3 and a half, within few weeks of being in the school I noticed an unbelievable improvement in all her skills as well as her behaviour! She loves going to Montessori even wants to go weekends! She always talks about her teachers Ms Aditi and Miss Monica etc and how she can’t wait to tell them stuff and see them. The school has taught her to be a great big sister as they pair up older with younger and encourage them to help each other 😊
I notice how each teacher treats the children as their own and it gives me such comfort everytime I drop her off. My son starts in September and he can’t wait as he hears how fun it is and how his sister loves it there!
This place is the best of the best❤️

Miss Monica and her staff are incredible. Our child was at WEM for two years, and over two summers, including before and after-school care when they started kindergarten. The curriculum is varied and tailored to the kids' interests. Do note the drop-off and pick up times, however, as it may not fit all families' schedules. We had a good experience and lots of fun at WEM! Thank you Miss Monica (and team) for all the love, advice, and support for our kid and our family!
I can't say enough good things about Westmount Educational daycare. The staff are very warm and welcoming and our child is always so happy, comfortable and confident there. Highly recommend!

My experience with this daycare has been nothing but amazing. My son goes to the westmount location and he loves it. The staff is amazing and the way they work with families to make sure that they meet their child’s needs is just fantastic. I could go on and on about them but the best thing I can say is that they are such kind and fair people and I would recommend them to anyone looking for childcare.

Love this daycare… we joined recently and it is a very good experience… so far . Staff is really nice. If we have any problem we always talked to the supervisor and she always understand it and handle it very nicely.. everybody is so polite and nice. Lots of toys and activities for children. 😊

We were very happy with the care our daughter received at Westmount Educational Daycare. She was previously in a dayhome and this was her first daycare experience. She connected easily with the teachers and they were attentive and caring with her. I found management to be very responsive and professional, especially when COVID hit. They've been very understanding as we've changed our return date a couple of times. I would recommend it to anyone looking for care for their small children.

This place is awesome! The staff are so good with the children, everything is well communicated on a daily basis. My daughter is so happy here, she's really flourishing. I couldn't ask for better child care. I completely trust them to love and care for my daughter while I'm at work. Definitely recommend!

My daughter was here in after school program for 3 years. She was so happy even she didn’t want to miss any single day. They have safe caring and provide nutritional food following Canada food guidelines and do verities of educational activities, specially science experiments.

I love this day care my 2 older girls went here and I stay all the way in south but, i had to bring my youngest daughter here also. Everyone is so amazing, my daughter loves going to day care everyday,even when she's sick she still cries to go to day care. Her favorite person is Manju she can not stop talking about her. Thank you for being there for my kid helps me not to worry alot about her when she's in this Day care.

Had my non verbal 3 year old son, son suspected of autism go here, it was a horrible experience. He came home with sand in his diapers, he attended just 3 days and we were kicked out on the 4th day. all those days, He had sand in his diapers. He was accused falsely for biting other kids, took back their words when I pressed for further inquiry. His cloths were always wet and smelled of pee even when we dropped several changes of cloths and diapers.
We didn't get a list of what to bring, we made up a list of what our son needed.
They told me he ate for those days,, but I highly doubt it. After asking in details, they admitted he didn't eat. We started packing food he loves, but these food came back untouched . they probably never offered it to him. .
Reasons for kicking him out according to them,

- He is knocking things over, my 3 year old son doesn't do that
-My wife is uncooperative because she asked to drop of bottled water for him( due to worries of lead content )
-My wife didn't explain his autistic tendencies - this was a lie, this was one of the first info she gave.
-My kid bites other kids ( again a big lie, they retracted when i insisted on evidences)
-Other Kids want my kid gone ( a sweet group of 2 yrs and 3yrs old, asking my kid to leave? highly unlikely ) .

My kid was obviously traumatized and he couldn't tell us anything, we gave him days of tender loving care and I promised i will never take him to that place again. We finally found a day care that loves and accept him. He is happier and looks forward to going to the day care. He even started rattling some words.

Please be careful.

I have 2 of my children that go to this daycare. They're great, my kids are always excited to be there with all their friends. Anytime I've had any sort of concerns they've been addressed immediately. There was a few months where my family struggled with bills and this daycare was so incredibly understanding where as most others would have just kicked out the kids for late payments. I would highly recommend this daycare to anyone looking!

I would share how welcoming manager and all staff to community options as well for children and their families . I like educators put efforts to enhance children learning as whole. Very productive and admire environment.

Manager Narinder Kaur's dedication and passion for her work are truly commendable.
Safety and cleanliness are top priorities here. The facility is impeccably maintained, and stringent safety protocols are followed diligently. I have complete peace of mind knowing that my child is in a secure and nurturing environment.

Manager Narinder Kaur's dedication and passion for her work are truly commendable. She goes above and beyond to ensure that every child receives the attention and care they deserve. Her hands-on approach and open communication with parents make us feel confident and informed about our child's well-being and development. The educational programs provided here are exceptional. It's evident that the curriculum is thoughtfully designed to stimulate creativity, curiosity, and social skills in children. My child comes home excited about what they've learned and eager to share their experiences.

This is one of the dirtiest daycares I've ever experienced. Their play area/ gymnasium smelled like vomit today and there was garbage all over the place. Their toys are never washed and they're custodian room is dirtier than I've ever seen. A custodian room. Alberta health services should look into this place. If you love your kids, don't drop them off here.
amazing place to leave your kids and teaching and all the staff is very kind and helpful. amazing director also!

My girls love coming to daycare in the morning and love their teachers. My oldest has been so happy to have more daycare time with her friends since we transferred closer to the daycare for OSC. My youngest adores all the teachers and just loves talking to them.

Ever since enrolling my kid I’ve seen many improvements. The whole staff is awesome. I know that my kid is personally taken care of. It started happening for the first time that my kid don’t cry when I leave and instead waive bye to me. I would like to say thank you especially to Kiran for being an exemplary teacher for this important year of my kid’s preschool experience. No words can express the peace-of-mind she has given us. I highly recommend this place to everyone.

Our son had been attending here since September and is thriving! I am so glad to have found such a wonderful daycare, and look forward to seeing my daughter there as well. The staff is absolutely fantastic and really cares about you and your children. You will not regret having your child enrolled here.

My daughter has been attending Wildwood Childcare from last 3 years. It is an amazing place, I couldn’t ask for a better daycare. I deeply appreciate the staff being caring and supportive,  especially teacher EKTA my daughter was very picky eater but teacher EKTA always try to make her finish her lunch which is a very big relief for me. I recommend this daycare to everyone those looking for a best place for their children.

My son who is now 3 years old has been attending Wildwood Childcare since he was 13months old. I could have not have asked for better care for my baby! All the teachers at the facility knows the kids & I could see how some of the teachers(not his own) love my son & talk to him so affectionately! He was in teachers Ritu’s & Kanika’s class and they gave him the love attention that he deserved. I recently had a baby and I would like to thank some of the teachers(unfortunately I do not know all of their names but they would know who they are) as they were very accommodating & helpful & super understanding!! They would come downstairs to get my son as I couldn’t go upstairs! My son recently moved to the older toddler room & I am sure that he will be well taken care! Looking forward to him making more beautiful memories & having a great time at the daycare and with his friends!!! My new baby will definitely be going to Wildwood Childcare too next year!! 😊😊😊

My son will be at Wildwood for the 6th year this september in  OSC and he's enjoyed every year and summer. He always  looks forward to going and the staff there are amazing. Ekta is amazing with all the kids in her room as are all the staff for the different age groups and rooms. They plan activities and field trips throughout summer. My son never comes home upset and has made great friends while there. I highly recommend Wildwood to any parent needing childcare for any age.

We highly recommend this nursery. We have taken our son since February and they have been very attentive to his care, always promoting play and learning according to his age and interests. Our son loves going to daycare and that makes us very happy. All the staff is super attentive, we have nothing but thanks for them. The furniture is ideal for every age, they have several hours of free play outside and many fun activities. The food is excellent, our son always eats everything hehehe..
We recommend this beautiful academy! Thank you for all the love we received Julie, Hayley and Lisa the most loved by Simon!

My 4 year old son and 2 year old daughter have both attended Willowbrae Millcreek for over a year. I can not speak highly enough about this center. The staff are incredible and passionate about what they do. The center is always clean and organized. The food served to the children is healthy and flavorful. The programming focuses on learning, early education, routine, exercise and movement. They have created such a fun and safe environment for both my children to learn and grow.
Our family is moving and sadly with this comes leaving Willowbrae Millcreek. I feel very emotional about saying goodbye but also very thankful for the time my children were able to spend here.

Our son has been at Willowbrae for about 6 months now and we are so happy with them! Cheery staff members who genuinely seem to care for the kids, clean rooms, good meals provided, and live view camera's in all rooms. Highly recommend!

My son has been attending Willowbrae for the past 5 months (since he turned one year). The facility allowed us to do transition and half days to adjust, they provide two healthy snacks along with lunch (and milk), and have live view cameras in the rooms/outside so I can see my son through the day. The communication is outstanding (we get daily reports and pictures) and the facility feels very safe. The director (Lisa) and all of the educators have been fantastic and make my son feel very comfortable, always going the extra mile for him. Highly recommend doing a tour if you are looking for a great program with amazing educators!

This daycare is absolutely amazing!!! Our little one has been going for just over two months now and we cannot say enough great things about it. The staff are incredible and very organized. We would recommend this daycare to anyone.

My child have been going to this location for a year now.  The staffs are friendly and caring.  Everytime you walk into the center, the staffs will say hi or bye to you.  Also, seem like all the staffs know my child name too.  I recommend this Willowbrae for anyone need a daycare for their child.

Our child has been at Willowbrae for 7 months now and we are so glad we found her care here! Every staff member we have met is so kind and caring, from saying hello in the parking lot before/after a shift to asking my daughter about her baby doll by name. I love the liveview cameras as even further assurance that she is in good hands. Every single one of her teachers have been communicative, interactive, and affectionate. Miss Rina in particular has gone above and beyond. She waves excitedly when our daughter sees her from the window, she made a cardboard playhouse for the classroom, and she remembers so many details about my daughter's history and ongoing wellness. Thank you Willowbrae for making it easy to trust our baby is being cared for!

We had signing up our son last September for school and he had attended pre school. He loved this place and as a parent, Willowbrae Childcare Academy West Point had many outstanding offerings other daycares don't offer. They have an on-sight kitchen which meant they had wholesome cooked meals which made me jealous at times, the daily reports about what they learned today with a personal note of something interesting about what happened or something your child said and everything is very transparent. The instructors are all outstanding, professional and approachable. The learning taught was outstanding with their own Willowbrae SEEDS program which you can see what they learned and will be learning. As a teacher, I appreciated seeing this. When looking at other daycares, it felt like they let the kids do whatever.  The academy sells its self when you go for a tour, you get a sense this feels like a school.
In June, they put on the best graduation ceremony outside when my son was ready to attend Grade K next year! I could not have asked for anything more perfect for that special day! I highly recommend this place for your child!

I STRONGLY advise other parents to avoid this daycare.

My son was here only 4 months before he suffered a serious injury. I am very relieved he has since left it for another daycare. Here is my view:

Some employees work hard and try to do the right thing. But I think they are faced with an impossible task due to poor management from ineffective and disingenuous ownership primarily focused with putting lipstick on a pig.

I could write volumes about this place. But don’t trust me, trust your own eyes:
-Google “Alberta childcare lookup”
-go to the province’s website
-“type “west point” in Program Name
-click “view” under Inspections.

Today, you will see 8 non-compliances reported in the last 6 months, which doesn’t even include my son’s incident. Then, look up competitors and see how few violations they have by contrast.

Why can those other daycares meet basic regulatory requirements, but this one can’t?

If this were your business, wouldn’t you spend the little extra time and money obviously needed to get it running properly?

I won’t go into details about my son’s injury. I will simply say, the owner would not take any accountability for it (at all), despite giving their employee a written warning about it.

Think about what that means, and trust your gut.

We had our daughter here for a total of 3 days and are out a chunk of money now because of it. Starting from the transition days there were concerns. From babies being pushed around on a walk in a crib all together, to not wearing hats or sunscreen on super hot days, and over feeding milk to the point of puking. Oh and not to mention a staff on her phone under a stairwell while the children were literally just sitting in the crib under the stairs and my daughter was crying, how is this programming? No one even set up our biometrics and we were able to easily go in and out of the building. Issue upon issue that is concerning. This facility is overwhelmed and does not read quality care to me. It should have been a red flag to me when the Director went on leave. Trust your mom gut ladies and choose better.

My daughter has been attending this daycare for three months now. Like most children starting daycare for the first time, her first month was a bit challenging as she had to adjust to the new environment. However, with the help of Teacher Akram and Teacher Danis, she gradually adapted and became more comfortable.

Over the past three months, she has been genuinely happy here. Every day, she has had various activities to engage in, such as painting, sticker art, and doodling, among others. Unfortunately, due to our upcoming move, we have had to make the difficult decision to withdraw her from this daycare.

One thing that has stood out during her time here is the friendly and caring staff. The teachers have been warm and nurturing, which has made the transition smoother for my daughter. Additionally, having their own kitchen and providing real-time monitoring for parents has been reassuring.

I would definitely recommend this daycare to my friends.
Clean new facility, educators and management have been very friendly and helpful. App and liveview cameras have come in handy to view your child at your convenience.

Things I've noticed... Which show concerns for leadership within the organization .. staff are parking directly in front of daycare causing parents to cross drivelane with children.  Turnover of facilities director and assistant director appears to have trickled down to front line, curious if this is poor pay or culture ? The new director is always in her office at beginning of day and end of day, but had yet to be observed walking the hallway and greeting the kids or parents...  I'm not sure their background, but it is a noticeable and drastic shift from the leadership which originally attracted the customers and employees to the facility... I unfortunately expect more changes as this location struggles to find it's true leader...  in addition When staff aren't consistently getting down on the kids level to speak with them it's like they've never met a kid or learned how to successfully communicate with them..  frustrating, because the facility is nice... But if you start looking at staff  behaviour and culture there's growing pains to say the least ....

Update.. unfortunate to see that even after pointing out the obvious staff parking directly in front of the location, the Mazda CX5, Toyota Camry, and several white and silver Honda civics are still prominently parked directly in front,  even adjacent to the stroller ramp.. 22 years ago a FutureShop manager taught me that customers should never have to walk past an employee's car, it's a sign of respect... Or lack there of... For the people that allow them to be employed ..

I want to commend the teachers and staff at Windermere Daycare because they did great work with my two boys who had no background in group settings whatsoever and have an extremely difficult time being away from mom and dad.

My sons' teachers were attentive, patient, and supportive. When they realized that my youngest responded really well to music, they'd sing to him every morning when he entered the room to help ease his anxiety and crying. That little act meant a lot to me at drop-off.

The directors are professional, very approachable, and easy to communicate with. They always have an open door, and they were accommodating too.

This was my first experience with daycare for my kids and while on the search, I'm glad I overlooked the "bells and whistles" that some of the other daycares have that doesn't necessarily add any value to the level of care my children would receive. Knowing that my kids were being well cared for (and more) was all the assurance I needed.

Lastly, I love the diversity of staff members that work here and the diversity of children and families this daycare serves. I would definitely recommend!

I started working with Punnu and Maneesh in November 2015. I was new to childcare when I first started and learned so much in the many years of working here. These people have gone over and beyond for staff, parents and even the kids! Punnu and Maneesh have supported me through everything and they treat you like family. When I first started, I was full-time in one of the daycare rooms. I then decided to go back to school and they worked around my whole university schedule. For the last 5 years I worked in the OSC, during the summer they plan an amazing program for the kids which includes field trips once a week and different activities throughout the week.

I had an amazing experience with them, and I highly recommend this center. The staff cares about the children and makes an effort to get to know them and the parents. I truly enjoyed my time working here. I will truly miss each and everyone of them.

Great daycare. The staff is friendly, helpful, and genuinely cares about each child’s growth. My kid is happy, engaged, and loves the outdoor activities. Highly recommended for a nurturing environment that fosters both fun and development.
My kids loved this daycare for many years. The team is very caring and creative, providing kids with exciting activities throughout the year. Management is very accommodating and responsive.

I originally signed up to this daycare for kindercare a couple years ago for my oldest son. The organization, professionalism and staff have been amazing at every turn. I always felt confident that my child was well taken of care while I was at work. I was so happy with my son's kindercare that I registered my youngest into the daycare for full time care. My youngest would ASK to go to daycare because he always had a great time. He always came home with new crafts and stories for us. The staff greeted me and my child by name every morning and always wished me a good day as I was leaving.
Anytime we've had an issue or concern/question, I have emailed the daycare directly and Punnu has been very responsive to my concerns, investigates the matter fully and always openly communicated with me about steps she took to address any concerns or questions I had. I appreciate her level of professionalism and her dedication to providing the children the best experience possible.
Great daycare with excellent staff, a nutritional menu and tons of activities to keep the kids engaged and learning. Highly recommend!

Very rude staff. I was interested in putting my son in this daycare here but the way one of the ladies over there spoke to me. I will definitely not. In fact will advise all my neighbours against it. The fact that they hire such rude staff goes to show that they are inappropriate for kids. I did not get the name of the lady but she had shoulder length ginger coloured hair.
We love this daycare. My daughter has been attending it for 2 years now. Loving and carrying stuff. Thank you for taking such good care of my daughter
This place is fantastic, my son loved  it . All the staff were very friendly, they truly care about the kids.
Amazing place for kids, they have their own cook, set up awesome plans for the kids. Definitely recommended.

I have  been searching for a good day care at the west edmonton taking good care for me one year old baby since along time. I tried many daycares. Most of them couldn't treat my baby well. They were complaining all the time that my baby is kind a sensitive baby. Thus, it frustrated me n hindered my study. I had to deffer my study n sat home with my baby.
Finally, I found the wonderkids daycare. Verry professional, humble n dedicated staff. They take great care of my baby. She doesn't wanna leave the daycare n loves her teachers alot. My second daughter who is 5 years old is also there n she is considerably happy n entertained there.

I would strongly recommend this daycare as the best one at the west side.

It is wonderful daycare, teachers there is truly care for kids. My son was has a bed appetite, but after 2 weeks in this daycare he started eat food a lot thank for teachers there! I advise everyone this daycare !

I don't want to recommend this wonder kids. I bring my 2kids for tryout. My 5yrs old son have special behavior but his good as long you don't bagging him. The person who took care of him have no patience they said all day my son crying screaming so the kickout my son. I found other daycare  1day there really amazing they know how to handle the kids and have a big heart to those who have special behavior or need. This wonder kids I don't recommend they don't have patience and the area are dirty outdoor shoes same you can bring inside also. Sorry but BIG NO

My child loves this daycare. The staff are professional, environment is safe and very clean for kids with lot of fun stuffs. I really appreciate the daily updates of my child's progress. I would definitely recommend this daycare to anyone.
Nice daycare. Clean and organized place, knowledgeable and patient staff.
Have had 2 kids here for a couple of years. What a great place, very friendly and welcoming.

My son attended Rainbow (Argyll) Daycare 2 weeks after he turned 1 year old. Being first time parents, we want to pick the best daycare for our child. And Seema and the Rainbow Team has provided care and love beyond measure. Sadly, we have to transfer our son to a new daycare due to our work situation.

I highly recommend them if you live or work around the area. They provide breakfast, lunch and snacks to the children and they have an app where you get updated on what the kids are doing. Their location has spacious space to play around and fenced in playground. You will feel that your child is in safe hands. You will never go wrong choosing them to be your child’s daycare provider. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

When I get my first job here (ever in 9 years) , I was so glad for finding Rainbow Daycare which located just across the block. Huge plus points as they start opening as early as 6:30a.m. It accomodated my workshift that starts at 7:00a.m.
Seema is very friendly, and her team (Jaswinder, Naoko, Neena) were superb in many areas. From cleanliness, the spacious place and playground, provided snack and lunch, all of them were topnotch. Daily nap time, field trips to neighbourhood area, fun activities were such great additionals in this daycare provider. They also uploaded kids activities in Storypark app, which is awesome!
I am so sad as my daughter can only be there for 6 months time as she will go her kindergarten by Sept. Will missed all of them, especially my daughter who missed her best friends there Amara and Eloise.
Thank you Seema and team for making my first work arrangement and Hannah's first daycare a wonderful experience! May your World of Joy Child Care Centre will continue successful in future.

Clean, safe and fun environment for kids. They also provide breakfast and lunch, as well as snacks. They also go above and beyond with updates of how the kids are doing and what they are doing with pictures and videos. Amazing staff, friendly and easy to communicate with. Love this place.

My son has been attending Rainbow since the beginning of the 2018 school year and he loves it! He gets picked up from school and participates in the after school program. He has so much fun with the child care workers and other kids that he's sad to leave when we come to pick him up. The administration has been so easy to work with and they are great at responding to communication, either by email, text, or phone. They also update us parents on a regular basis with photos and class lessons. It's been a great experience for us!

We absolutely love the ladies here! They were very understanding and soothing when we started looking at Daycare’s for our little girl, just over a year old. They have been amazing from the start and have made the adjustment of me starting college and my significant other working full time easier than it would’ve been. They’re wonderfully accommodating and very helpful.
My daughter has a wonderful time here and gets very excited when it’s time to leave for daycare.
We love Rainbow!
We attended a band concert here if grade 8s . Place is very open and
Went to Brownies here in 1992. Good snacks.
Outreach to community providing various types of musical entertainment
Small but very beautiful
Good place to play Volleyball

I remember when they just opened this YMCA, I used to go to their drop in program Kids in the Hall.
It was in a Party room and it was a pretty big space and the kids would play board games, dodge ball, floor hockey, socker, other fun games or do crafts or just hangaround.
The councelers always made it fun and always made sure all the kids were entertained and included in any activity.
I think maybe too many injuries occurred in such a small space so they moved it to the gym at a much later point. Still... that room was where it was at.
Very clean , the people treat you with the up most respect. A great place and Organization to belong too. A place that gives back too the  community.
Very nice staff, very clean pool. Went on a Monday evening during public swim time and it was terrific. 👌
The staff here is so helpful. If you lose your card here, they will have it for you. I honestly love it here

Susie, the director, and the staff are great with my baby. So far my baby has been in the infant room and the junior toddler (or however it's called) and she is comfortable with the ladies taking care of her in both rooms. She got used to the daycare pretty quickly with not many issues which makes me comfortable thinking that she feels well taken care there. I had high anxiety leaving my baby to be taken care by others considering that I practice attachment parenting and my baby has never slept without me nearby, but she naps at daycare better than she does at home! Overall the place is always clean, and they send photos of the daily play experience and updates on how much baby is eating, napping and how many diaper changes are performed. They also offer morning and afternoon snacks.

Generally speaking there’re Pros and Cons in this daycare.

Pros: 1. Affordable price, which is $25/day with the support of federal government, unfortunately it will be end till April.
2. Varieties of programs for kids to play and learn, in daycare and home kits as well. This is something we enjoy the most.
3. Weemarkable App provide pictures indoor and outdoor, weekly snack menu, messages between parents and caregivers.
4. Friendly staff, my son likes one Filipino lady Editha, she helped my son during potty training, offered some helpful information.
5. Start from April they will offer lunch
6. If the daycare shutdown due to Covid, they will offer credit return for the following month.

Cons: 1. Before you decided to join this daycare, be ready to pay full month, even you join the daycare in the middle of the month.
2.During Covid time, they shut down the main entrance to stop parents go inside picking up kids. Just imagine when the weather is minus 30 degrees, and parents waiting outside freezing like idiots and hoping the staffs could see us and come out to open the door faster
Susie and her staff make you comfortable leaving yo kid with them. Very clean and organized.  Pity I had to pull my kid out....for reasons not related to the daycare...highly recommend the daycare.

Love this early learning centre. My daughter went and now my niece, the staff are amazing and really care about the kids. It’s warm and welcoming they follow great routines and help settle the kids into a routine that can be integrated into home life. Love that it was catered and takes the stress of lunches away. They use a learn through play approach which I found very effective for my kids.
Beyat knowledgeable, trustworthy, and careful YMCA team I've ever had the pleasure of working with.

This YMCA is just amazing. Love how my daughter gets so much love from the staffs. The staffs are very approachable. Lots of activities during the summer holidays. Thank you for giving me that peace of mind while am at work. My kid is just a happy person when when she is back home.

My daughter has been going to this place for two years both winter and summer care. She loves it there as it provides stress relief from school and also she learns a lot of children games from board games to art. They have very friendly staff and they bake for the kids and throw lots of parties where they sing, eat and dance. I feel it is a happy place for children.

This is a awful place.my toddler had very bad experience here.he was so resistant go to this child care.my child was not happy at all during his time in this place.once the director bought the child outside to me in the winter without his hoody or socks.so pathetic.Do not even deserve one star.I am glad I took him out of this day care.

I am so happy that my daughter stay here.
This is a good place for kids, friendly staff, good teachers, good service and atmosphere ❤️🙏

My daughter is developing well and every day the children do something new. good work schedule. I recommend this kindergarten to everyone👌

Best daycare ever! Never met such caring and hardworking staff. The staff work hard to provide a safe and caring environment for each child. The management were both caring for the staff, children and their families. The children learn through their own interest based play.  Educators facilitate amazing learning based on what the children are interested in. Love it.

My daughter had a terrible experience at this daycare. If I could give zero stars I would. I would go to pick up my daughter and she'd be wearing a fleece jacket on a 20 degree day. Other times she'd be under dressed. When I'd complain to the management they'd say I don't know what you expect us to do? As a child on the shy side she faded into the background. They are overloaded with children with various issues, don't expect your child to be attended to unless they have behavioural issues.
My son loves this place! Lots of outdoor time, lots of interaction with the seniors who live here. They care about the kids and do great work.

Our family has always trusted the YMCA Childcare name and this last 5-6 month experience has been no different!  The summer camps are AMAZING, the director and staff are lovely and my child really enjoys being there.  Thanks to the Mount Pleasant YMCA for all they do to support parents.

YMCA

IT"S FUN TO STAY AT THE

What a great experience. We use the out of school care and summer child care programs. The staff goes over and above all of our expectations. Our daughter LOVES going to daycare every day and has built some amazing friendships. Highly recommended

Amazing daycare teachers and great staff!!! Feel blessed to have my son learn and grow in such an amazing facility . So sad we have to leave due to relocation, and we highly recommend here if you’re looking for high quality day care center.
There alot of places,make you visit to the city area you never been down,like new ide from people like you,come down to downtown area 👍👌🙏

This place is amazing! Our son cried every day at his old daycare. He just didn't want to go. We switched him to Shirley Stollery YMCA daycare and now he cries if he doesn't go. The staff are amazing, they are always there for the kids and never ever leave them alone in the room. They work hard to include every child in activities, take them outside to play, rain or shine, and have a social support program if you need to talk to someone. They observe every child and provide you with recommendations on how to deal with issues that arise. For example, my child was speech delayed and they provided me with materials on how to help him speak more and now he doesn't stop talking lol. He also wasn't engaging with other children and the staff incorporated his interests in the activities to catch his attention. Staff works with you figure out your child's interests so he can engage in activities. We were so lucky to get a spot here. You will never regret sending your child here.

Incredible. The staff here are so caring and creative and go out of the way to have every child reach their potential. We had staff reach out to provide additional supports we weren’t even aware were available. Both my children thrived here. Normally they are scared to be in new places without their parents but the staff have really made them feel like they’re family.

This place is kid wonderland. The staff there helped to raise my older daughter who is now 7, and now the same educators are helping to raise my 20 month old. Staff retention says a lot about the workplace environment. I’m so grateful to Shirley Stollery for providing us with impeccable and loving childcare.

Be prepared to put up with bs. My son only spent two hours and they were already calling me to come help them feed and put him to sleep. They stereotyped me assuming I was on income support and that I must of took the bus. The staff did not cater to my sons dietary needs after being told multiple times not to give him dairy. Needless to say I pulled my son out immediately and will not be returning. They also tried charging me 75$ for two hours of him being there. Save yourself the headache and go somewhere else!

I'm not sure, if we are the only ones or other people too are in the same situation about this ymca out of school care center. For past 3 years, we are trying to get our kid enrolled here, but to no avail. I regularly monitor their website and it regularly says - "waiting list closed". If briefly this message doesn't appear, then also their director says, "our waiting list is closed". I think their process is NOT at all transparent. If they are trying to say they didn't admit any new kid for past 3 years, I won't believe that. All in all, this place is more of a disappointment to the people of this neighbourhood.
Awesome facility with wonderful staff.

We love this early learning center. My daughter is attending this center, and she LOVES the center and her educators. The 1.5 yr old already has a group of babbling friends welcoming her every morning, and the staff here are amazing and really care about the kids. In fact, the whole center and staff are warm and welcoming. They follow great routines and help settle the kids into a routine that can be integrated into home life. Their Weemarkable reports are so much more detailed than any other daycare centers I have seen and take various photos of the daily activities my kid participated in. It very much helped us aware of what our kid was up to while we were busy at work, so we could still set up some routine at home for the weekends and continuously help her learn through play. The fact that we can choose to get the lunch catered is also amazing since it takes the stress away for working mom and dad while our kid tries a variety of foods.

Dear swim instructors, there are signs around the pool to designate where classes should meet... USE THEM, FFS! Sometimes kids move up a level, sometimes new kids sign up. They need to be able to find their instructor! Don't stand by the Seal sign if you're teaching Dolphin! This isn't the first time it has happened, and I've brought it to your attention, but obviously it didn't help. How many times do I have to complain before basic common sense kicks in? 🙄

The only facility/gym I use. Membership price is good compared to other places. Pool is clean and nice flow, gym is clean and lots of variety for equipment. Every time I try another gym I just come back to the y knowing it’s the best facility I’ve used.

I’m so happy that my son is at this daycare. My 2.5 year old has now been attending YCCC going into his 4th month. I wanted to wait a while to write a review to get the full scope of the operation.

The first month I had placed my son for the mornings only to help him adjust. I sat in with my son one day to see how all the kiddos interacted and what their day looked like. After a month he was doing so well that I left him there for nap time and picked him up right after. After a couple weeks of doing that I left him there longer. It took a while but the daycare and it’s staff allowed me to slowly integrate my son and were understanding and accommodating to both the needs of my son and I. When I pick up my son now he is happy and smiling.

I also love this daycare because they have designated snack and lunch times but would always offer snacks when a child would appear to be hungry or if the child asks for one. Food and water is never restricted! I can bring all my sons favourite foods so that he actually eats. Sometimes some food comes home and sometimes all the food is gone! It’s all based on when and how much the child wants to eat. Not based on other daycares “menus” where the child may not like certain foods.

As for diaper changes, they check and change frequently. My son always leaves with a clean diaper on and has never developed a rash.

The environment of the daycare is also welcoming and accommodating. I also love the fact that it’s situated in an elementary school and not off a busy road where it’s loud or close to undesirable places. They have an enclosed  playground just for the little ones outside. The daycare also plans various activities, picnics, walks, playground visits, outdoor games ect.

My son comes home happy and I’m satisfied that he gets a day filled with lots of fun play, storytelling, arts and crafts ect. Also his speech is greatly improving from being around the other kids! All I can say is that the ladies I have interacted with and who take care of my son are all amazing. Their job can be difficult dealing with little human beings all day long but you can tell they love and care for children. I’m happy that my son attends this daycare and recommend it to anyone. Thank you!

I really dunno what to say!
I had concerns cause my daughter was mentioning that one of the staff was hitting her in addition to some staff yelling at the kids and some other stuff!
I spoke with one of the staff on June 26th and addressed my concerns again and asked that my daughter won't be kept alone with that staff member.
Not to mention that my daughter was bitten by another child and they didn't even write an incident report or do anything about it!
When I came to pick up my daughters they gave me a one day notice saying that June 27th is the last day for my daughters at their centre.
There's something going on in this daycare centre and the staff keep defending each other in a fishy way!
The daycare director barely visits the centre too! We tried to call her, she never answered or returned our phone call either!
Very unprofessional!
I usually don't like to put bad reviews but the way they treated us was really bad and it hurts.
If parents are worried about their children and they can't share their concerns with them then there's something not right going on!
I feel bad for some of the good staff there and they know themselves, they deserve to be working in a better and more professional daycare centre.

My daughter has been at Youngstown daycare a month and a half now, by the third week I wanted to write a review but thought, let me wait so this isn’t written too soon. I am so happy I enrolled my daughter here! At the previous daycare my daughter was in, she was in a 2-3 year old room so I was anxious for her to be with children a couple years older at Youngstown but honestly, she’s thriving and it’s what she needed! My daughter has a speech delay so being around children that talk and interact has been beneficial. All the ladies working here are amazing, kind and have such great attitudes. They want your children to be happy, healthy and do well. The thing I’m most impressed with is that they make sure the children are fed and not hungry. An issue with the previous daycare was that my daughter was always hungry at pickup. breakfast/lunch/snacks was being provided by the facility but I would bring extra and it wouldn’t be given to my daughter. it would be very hard taking her home because she’d be throwing tantrums and starving. But here, her whole attitude is changed, I trust that she’s being fed the food I provide and she’s never in a bad mood when I come to pick up. She cried when I left in the morning for the first week, than by the second week she was walking into the daycare room by herself, going straight to her chair or to the educator for breakfast forgetting about me lol! There’s a lot of stuff they do with the children: reading, arts and crafts, games or just letting them do their own thing and play. There’s lots of variety of toys as well. They do potty training which is great! My daughter is attached to her baby doll and they’ve been working with her to break that attachment so she’s not dependent on the doll and need to bring it everywhere. I’m just so amazed. The owner is so nice and is there frequently to not just oversee the daycare but to step in and help out in whatever rooms need extra hands. I would definitely recommend this daycare!

I would like to express my gratitude to the dedicated staff at Youngstown Day Care Center for their tireless efforts in providing quality service and nurturing care for my son. I would convey my appreciation to the staff who have been a major influence on his growth and development during his time at the center.

My children are attending this centre and they love it. The staff is wonderful and understanding. They have big hearts and welcome everyone with a smile. When my son was diagnosed with something that could affect his emotions, I told the staff right away and they were able to make accommodations when my son had a rough day. I also communicate with the staff daily about my children so if my children are having an off day, the staff is able to make the adjustments when my children are struggling. I love the staff and the centre.

I am immensely grateful from Child Development Dayhome as they were supportive of my career as an Early Childhood Educator. The agency is making sure that educators are adhering to high quality childcare by ensuring that educators are capable and knowledgeable about child development. They have tons...tons of resources!
