My best experience was able to pursue my education while working as an educator and able to share my knowledge to practice. As a new consultant, I always look forward on working with families, educators, and children and meeting them at where they at. I am confident that when children are in care, CDDH "offer families peace of mind" because I see how my colleagues/staff put too much effort at their work. In my first 3 weeks, I feel supported, and my coordinator is one of the best! Their dedication and passion for the work that they do each day inspires me.

i have been working with this company for over 10 years now and loving it.  There is a reason we have such low staff turnover.   The team is amazing to work with and so accommodating with schedules, appointments and of course kids.  i have also had both my children with our dayhomes and it was an amazing experience.  the children didn't want to leave at the end of the day when i went to pick them up.  they would also ask to go on the weekends.  Overall a great place to work and have your children cared for!

Child Development Dayhomes has been a wonderful support and resource for the opening of my own family Dayhome.
All along the way of opening up my dayhome, and meeting the requirements laid out by the government for a licensed dayhome, my Child Development Dayhomes consultant was on hand to answer all questions and offer all forms of help to make sure I felt well equipped for opening my home for quality child care.
Since having my dayhome in operation I have had the constant guidance and support of my consultant as I have experienced the benefits and challenges of running a dayhome. I am constantly being offered and have received so many opportunities for my own professional development and learning and have gained so much in my own knowledge and skills through the encouragement of this dayhome agency.
Child Development dayhomes takes care of handling all fees and paperwork with my dayhome families, so I can concentrate on providing the best, quality care throughout the day with my dayhome children and families.
I am so thankful that I applied to work with Child Development Dayhomes, to partner with me in my desire to provide meaningful, safe care and learning in Early childhood Education!
I highly recommend Child Development Dayhomes as an agency for those Educators looking to begin their own journey in providing safe, quality care and learning to children in their own family dayhome.

We used this agency for both my sons Dayhome’s and they are absolutely fantastic! The educators are top notch along with our consultant! We’ve even referred our family and friends to this agency and they’ve had similar experiences! Would highly recommend! Keep up the good fabulous work :)
I have to give this agency 5 stars! I contacted them online and got responses on the following day. Jennifer, the lady who I spoke to is professional, efficient, and very supportive.

Fantastic agency! My kids love attending and always come Away happy! My consultant Megan has gone above and beyond especially when I was looking for back up care. There is always great communication from the staff and agency with multiple check ins throughout the year. The agency has taken so much stress off my plate. I would 100% recommend!

This agency is amazing- as someone who works In the education industry kit was important to find a place where my sons physical needs were met but also his social and emotional needs. We have been with this agency for 3 years and have loved every minute. His educator is dedicated, compassionate, caring and vigilant. She goes above and beyond and knows my son better than most family. We consider her part of our family. When he started there after Covid- he was on the 13th percentile for speech. We of course (like most) were on a wait list- fast forward 5 months- when his name came up for assistance they re-assessed and he was at the 87th percentile!!! Now some of that was maturity and some of it was being around people again but with 1000% certainty I can say that it was also because of the hard work of his educator. She worked hard and diligently with him on sounds and letters and now he is rocking and rolling ready for kindergarten! She was also our potty training angel! Asked us our method and how she could help!!! We have had nothing but amazing experiences with her.
Now to the office staff-  if it weren’t for Karen helping us get subsidy and helping us navigate the government incentives we would still be paying full price! She had nothing to gain by doing so! They have been beyond flexible and the communication between agency and parents is bar none! If your looking for somewhere that will take your kids and nurture and love them as if they were their own! This is the place!!!

This is a wonderful agency and we can't say enough about our particular dayhome provider Imelda Ciano. They made the transition of going to dayhome so easy and our daughter is excited to go. Her speech and vocabulary have also exploded since being in dayhome. We love the constant updates and pictures Imelda provides to us and the agency has been great with follow up and handling the ever changing COVID situation. We highly recommend this agency to anyone.

Great agency. Megan was such a doll helping me look a day home I would be comfortable with! Definitely relives the stress of look for a suitable home to keep your little precious ones in! Always a positive experience with this agency, especially when dealing with Megan.

I am new to the whole process of child care and have found it to be a trying and difficult process. Megan of It's a Child's World Day Home is AMAZING!!!
Even though I have not even signed up with this agency, Megan has been relentless in helping me find just the right fit for my young son and I with my crazy schedule.
Megan goes above and beyond to help her perspective client families and it is clear that she genuinely cares about people. Her kind and friendly demeanor are a most welcome type of communication in a care world that in my previous experience seems to care only about the money.
I don't thinks it's appropriate for one client's experience of poor communication with one day home provider within the agency to have the power to reflect so negatively on the agency as a whole, which is why I posted this today. Keep up the good work Megan!!

Jessica was fast at getting back to me thru email when I was finding a spot for my son. she was amazing to deal with and helped us find the perfect day home for my son around our area, Leslie at the front has been great helping us with question we have. great to deal with

My daughter was with Kawaljit for 5 years and it was a wonderful experience. She was carefully selected for the following reasons:

1. Very clean environment.
2. Very healthy meals that fall in line with my daughters vegetarian diet.
3. Great attention to detail.
4. Keeps the parents very involved in the day-to-day activities of the children.
5. The number of children at any one time are kept at a very small number. This allows for a more personable interaction between Kawaljit and the kids and for the development of interpersonal skills by the kids.

I highly recommend this Day Home and I only wish there was an after-school program so that my daughter could continue being there.

Our dayhome is wonderful, it is the Agency itself that is not. Their communication needs work. Particularly when it comes to changes in fees. We have had several price changes since our dayhome joined the agency, and there has never been any notice or communication about the change in the fee.

We have been very pleased with our experience with this agency. They were able to find a provider close to home, are very responsive to any questions I had. The Dayhome supervisor did regular check ins at the Dayhome and with us to see if we had any concerns.

We were matched with Kawaljit - and have been so happy with the care she provides. My child was happy to go each day to her home, she was very transparent with information and shared pictures and videos throughout the day of activities and my child. There is a variety of activities which helped my child achieve his milestones. There is both independent play time as well as directed activities/reading - some of which is directed by the agency. Kawal provided ample outside time when the weather was good as well. Each day also has quiet time/nap time, as my child grew out of the nap he was still able to lay down and have some quiet time during the day. We liked that Kawal provided healthy homemade lunch everyday - we provided snacks which my child always ate. We had discussions about a healthy diet and she was very open to talking about what will work for my child as there were some food struggles we had to work on - we made it consistent at home and the Dayhome.

Our child was cared for very well and looked forward to attending each day.

We have been with this agency for the past 2 years. The NEFDHA agency provided us with a Dayhome provider who is close to home, We are very satisfied with the service this agency has provided us!

The agency has placed us with an outstanding day home, KAWALJIT MULTANI KAUR.
I really love the quality of care, understanding, and patience kawal provides to our child. I highly recommend this day home facility because Kawal not only is she highly skilled, talented, experienced, educated, trained and cares for the children like her very own! I see our child pictures and videos  constantly doing different activities daily that’s good for our child growth and development as Kawal continuously expose things that piques our child interest. I truly appreciate the creativity, conscientiousness, and meticulousness. I also truly appreciate how Kawal so dependable and so reliable with answering inquiries in a timely manner.
She also provides an amazing vegetarian diet provides snacks throughout the day. Her home is in tip-top shape! She really helped  our child meet all her milestones of learning. Thank you for the great service you have constantly provided our family Kawal and also thank you to NEFDHA for helping our family with a suitable day home !

I want to thank northalta and their wonderful team. You guys have been excellent!  super professional, handled the time of the pandemic so well by keeping us always informed. They have been an amazing resource communicating about the grants available to parents and helping us with every step. You guys deserve recognition. Thank you very much for all the work you do. I also want to mention that the care provided by Marilyn to our kids has been incredible and they couldn't  be in better hands. We are very grateful to have found a great team of professionals to care for what we care most which are our kids.

Been with Northalta for 4 years. The administration staff has always been very helpful and prompt with replying to any questions. They also have been accommodating with allowing my children not to attend during the summer while holding a place for them upon return in the fall. They also took the time to help other mom friends find a dayhome for their own children close to their work/home.

I recently enrolled my two kids at a dayhome through Northalta Family Day Care Service Ltd and I couldn't be happier with the level of care they provide. Michelle was incredibly helpful in guiding me through the enrollment process, making the transition into a new environment seamless. The quality of child care offered by the day home is top-notch and my kids are always happy when I pick them up at the end of the day. I highly recommend Northalta Family Day Care Service Ltd to anyone in need of quality child care services.

My kids exp. With this dayhome is not good . Hopefully in the future all northaltha dayhome will have real time camera that parents can see. I said this based on my kids experienced in this dayhome I do not recommend this dayhome. Daycare is better.

THIS COMPANY IS THE WORST DAYHOME AGENCY COMPANY!!!! My daughter was with Saima Maryam, and when my daughter started I asked her about updating the daily pictures, and activities where that is sent to the parents? And this lady had the audacity to tell me that, “with this agency we don’t do that since the parents will get upset if the see she sent me my daughters picture with the other kids”. Then I said to her to be clear as it states in the contract it says “if parents had to post it on social media or even the dayhome caregiver then they need the consent of the parents. As she starting getting aware that I read everything and I know what I’m talking about. And I pulled the contract out and even showed it to her. Then she knew she was caught as she responded saying “oh yeah we do but no parents ask for that”. Then from there she didn’t want to provide food to my daughter as she told me “my daughter was the only kid who was older as the rest of the 2 kids were only drinking milk”. Then on a day I was dropping off my daughter told me Saima Maryam scared her, and she admitted it when I brought it up to her attention but made it look like it wasn’t a big deal. After that incident about 2weeks after my daughter shares with me that Saima Maryam hit her on her hand. As soon as she told me this I never sent her back and immediately stopped her from going to her dayhome!!!! The AGENCY’S they DON’T CARE AT ALL!!! THEY ARE ALL TRASH and BAD MINDED PEOPLE!!!! I gave it 1 start bc it wouldn’t let me post this review unless I give it a start!!! THEY DESERVE NONE!!!!

My son has been with an educator, Namhee in Chappelle, over the last three years. She has been an incredible day home educator and we were so lucky to have her as the educator. I'd like to express my sincere gratitude for the wonderful care and education she has provided to my son during his time with her. Her dedication and commitment to his development have been truly remarkable and I am very thankful for the love and support she has shown him.

My experience with the agency was overall good and I appreciate their support and supervision to the day home, ensuring it offers the best care and education.

This review is for one of the caregivers, TAYYBA in Windermere. I first met her on February 2020 and explained that my son was hyperactive and he wasn't speaking yet at 3 years old. She showed me a huge binder of credentials she had obtained in this exact type of children and never felt challenged by my description. She said she knew how to manage. In effect, she knew! Tayyba was great every day we went to her. My son started speaking in no time, he was showing progress in every field, he became more organized and learned how to control his impulses. Tayyba also provided very good and nutritious home made food. Her place is always clean and organized and she has endless activities to support children development. My son is now at school full time and not going to Tayyba's Dayhome anymore, but we are still friends and he visits her time to time and have a great relationship with Tayyba's son and daughter. She is the most amazing Dayhome we have ever had experience with. 💕

Day providers are good. But admin side of this agency is irresponsible. Every month they are charging extra and doing adjustments later. Every month I have to call or email management. So much adjustments in fees. I lost track how much exactly we are paying. Even I email start of the month please deduct fees responsibly.  Still they charge extra. Don't know they have accountant at all or they are doing this on purpose. Please stay away from them as they don't care about your money. Also they don't care if you leave them because of their admin mistakes.

I was pleased to be accepted with two spots in a new dayhome through Southgate Medallion, from both the dayhome operator and agency rep. I was in the process of filling out paperwork that was sent to me from the agency. I was in constant communication with the rep as I had questions along the way. Over the weekend while awaiting the response from my last email I filled out the paperwork ready to send them in first thing Monday morning, but instead I received an email saying that there were no longer any spots for me at the dayhome. I quickly responded looking for an explanation why, with a copied message from the dayhome operator previously congratulating me for getting two spots. I did not hear back and I still haven't a week later. This agency is very unprofessional and I would not recommend them to anyone.

My 2.5 yr old daughter and I absolutely love her educator from this agency, not to mention the care and professionalism that the consultant affiliated with the educator shows, as well.
Not only that the educator is a genuinely kind person who takes a wonderful care of your child, she provides creative activities and programs that my daughter enjoys daily. My daughter constantly surprises me with new songs, skills, and dances that she's learned from her teacher. The teacher sometimes lets my daughter bring some books so she can continue enjoy reading them at home. She also makes the best snacks and meals that are both nutritious and tasty. Lastly, I really appreciate that she provides thorough feedbacks on my child daily when my husband or I pick her up or by sending us pictures of what our child did during the day.
The consultant visits the day home once a month to check up on the facility and program of the day home and also provides feedbacks to the parents. When the educator goes on a vacation, they find a back-up care close to your place so there is a minimal disruption.
There really is nothing I can complain about the educator or the agency. I'd recommend this agency to anyone I care about. Keep in mind though, that if you want to register your child, do it in advance. My daughter was in the waitlist for about 1.5 yrs?2 years?, then finally found a space only after one kid grew old enough to go to kindergarten.

Thanks, Southgate Medallion Family Day Homes!

Not recommended this lady at all.
Very professional and reliable team. They responded all the queries I have.
Both of my kids attended here for a year, and we had a very pleasant experience, caring teachers and a great chef preparing nutritious snacks for kids!
This is a best daycare I have ever seen!! Everything is perfect!! Safe and secure environment for children… ❤️❤️
